author: {'steamid': '76561198005406731', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 4723, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4723, 'last_played': 1665458725}
review:
다 좋은데 나중에 로봇 추가되고 나서? 그 쯤 부터는 뭐부터 해야할지 어질어질한 스케일이 되었는데 한판당 1시간씩 걸리니까 겜 할 엄두가 안났음.. 초중반에는 정말 맘에 들었는데, 혹시 차기작 생각 하시면 쓸데 없는 볼륨( 멀티, 로봇 등 너무 많은 요소 빼고 기존 요소에 집중하는 방식으로 .. 지역 확장이라던지, 1부 2부 나누는 방식이라던지 ) 스킬트리 요소나 캐릭터 참신함은 맘에 들었음..

후반 가면 1판당 걸리는 시간 때문에 플레이 하는데 압박이 오니까.. 요즘 트렌드대로 후반 되더라도 플레이 시간은 단축 되는 편의성이 좋아졌으면 좋겠음..

author: {'steamid': '76561198118719905', 'num_games_owned': 255, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 11462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2531, 'playtime_at_review': 11462, 'last_played': 1712248869}
review:
Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children is a good and long X-COM like RPG.

This game has a system that lets you customize your characters stats and abilities called 'Masteries' that grants you several different options to build a class, you get masteries from enemies you defeat. Every character has one base class and later on two advanced classes that fulfill different niches, you are able to change a characters class after you have picked one, and the abilities that you have learnt from one can be used by the other.

The crafting system in this game is pretty vast too, letting you craft consumables like grenades and potions, but also weapons, armors, accessories and even masteries! After recruiting a specific character you can even (minor spoiler) [spoiler] build drones, they have their own mastery system so you can build them like a new character from the ground up, you can even give them custom names! [/spoiler]

The story is slow paced, focusing on slice-of-life and drama rather than non-stop action/adventure like other RPGs. If you can't stand the plot moving along at a snail's pace then I wouldn't recommend this game for you.

Pro tip; Increase all animation speeds and disable level up announcements along with aim, ability and dash camera movement in the gameplay settings, you will need it if you want to save time in the later missions that have entire armies of enemies.
developer_response:
Thank you for telling us about the core content and settings of the game. We're trying to expose these things as much as possible in the game, but I realize that it's much more effective for a game expert like you to mention it once.

The complex mastery system and slow game storytelling represent Troubleshooter. We've been getting a lot of comments about this since the game's release. We've been thinking a lot about giving up on this, too, but we thought a lot of gamers wanted a new format, not just a different game in appearance.

We want to stick to our features and don't want the gamer to fit into our game. Maintaining our features and increasing gamers' access to them is one of our biggest concerns and a must-solve issue in the future. This will strengthen Troubleshooter's unique features and improve the game so that more gamers can set foot in the world of Troubleshooter with a modern approach.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039094741', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 7310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 3697, 'playtime_at_review': 6994, 'last_played': 1712390243}
review:
Очень хочется расписать на тысячу слов, насколько невероятна эта игра, но тут до меня и так уже это сделали, поэтому буду краток.

XCOM-пошаговка с встроенной визуальной новеллой, интересный нетривиальный сюжет, инновационная прокачка и достойная сложность. В своём жанре она для меня переплюнула даже XCOM, а это что-то, да значит. При этом явных минусов за ней не наблюдается, тут, конечно, ругают перевод на русский. но команда ДО СИХ ПОР прямо у меня на глазах его делает. А переводить там очень много. И на данный момент он более чем достоин, по сути, он практически завершен. Очень благодарен команде переводчиков за это, ибо без родного языка переварить было бы её ой как непросто.

Именно такие игры должны быть в авангарде. Меня бесит, что в тренде всегда максимально тривиальный шлак, а такие интересные и запоминающиеся игры оказываются в подполье. Dandylion - для меня лично вы стали открытием года. Желаю вам дальнейших успехов и развития.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team speaks the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

It's a real pleasure to be remembered as a team that makes a good game for someone, even if we don't have commercial success. And your review is really valuable to us, knowing that these memories give us a boost to get us back up at the moment we're about to give up game development. If we can show the next game to the public, it's probably because of the support of people like you.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123009478', 'num_games_owned': 101, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 880, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 806, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1712419357}
review: 非常不错的游戏，之前已经玩过了，期待现在的版本。更期待游戏的下一作！加油吧！！
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果我们准备的游戏内容能愉快地填满你的时间，那对我们来说也是很大的乐趣。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198044698845', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 10234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10234, 'last_played': 1677213967}
review: This game is awesome, lots of content, awesome music and so many options to customize it can be overwhelming. There is no simple best build for each character and what works against certain enemies doesn't work at all for others so you have to think and adapt your tactics. I can't think of another game with this much content and fun customization, sometimes I decide to try another team composition and get amazed at how many synergies this game has.
developer_response:
We're a small independent game development team and the ability to produce graphic resources is especially lacking. This has led us to consider different combinations in more parts of the game, except for the outer parts of the character. We're glad that our intentions seem to suit your taste.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198301767147', 'num_games_owned': 273, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 2853, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2813, 'playtime_at_review': 1391, 'last_played': 1712454562}
review:
Gameplay is really good though some maps can get boring due to how many enemies they have and how long turns take with no speed up/skip button, especially if you divide your team. Crafting's felt mostly useless so far, I expect it to be mostly a minmaxxing thing since gear has levels and it's not rly worth it to keep upgrading a low lvl legendary item even if it is legendary. Mastery system is actual genius not even because it's something especially revolutionary, but with the way it's implemented, variety and freedom it gives you when buildcrafting, a long time ends up being spent just coming up with combinations of mastery sets that completely change the way you use a certain unit.

Story is cute when it comes to the characters themselves, but absolutely abhorrent when it comes to its worldbuilding; the tonal dissonance between what's actually happening and what you've been doing contrasted with how it's presented in game is actually crazy, and crazy as in "it's genuinely insane someone wrote this and isn't either a full blown proud and open fascist or they kept mashing keys on their keyboard until this ended up being legible enough to pass as a story"

Like, besides you pretty much just being "cops but flashy" (and cops which, at least 20+ hours in have been shown in nothing but the best of lights), the game unironically tells you at a point that "spoonism has been deemed an anti government movement and will be suppressed in all districts". That combined with other small stuff sprinkled in every mission such as it being illegal to cross districts, troubleshooters being able to accept someone like Anne AT ALL (besides them just straight up being government-sanctioned vigilantes). The game legit hasn't shown a single cop being straight up bad or any infighting on the PD while showing all enemy factions as irredeemable 99% of the time (because there were that one cutscene with Scott talking to his friends right after you blow him up and the one with Sharky and John showing the sense of community spoonists have lol). It shows Valhalla to be this prospering, technologically advanced nation that has a higher crime rate than any real country; every faction is lab-grown to exist as "the bad guys" with no real motivation or circumstance that would guide them to that besides "rising to the top" of a system they themselves established and maintain; they ARE the top. The factions in this game are the equivalent of the most base level goon you can imagine: no ambition at all or anything going on inside their heads, they just live to break stuff and commit crimes simply for the sake of committing crimes.

TL;DR: Gameplay's rly fun but can feel very boring when there are too many enemies since turns take very long when stacked; story characters are mostly pretty fun but the worldbuilding is absolutely horrendous
developer_response:
Even if you gave a bad review of the game because of the things you mentioned, we wouldn't have had any objections.

Long waits due to a large number of enemies are like a double-edged sword to us. When a character can handle a lot of traits, a large number of enemies are not a big deal. However, previous processes may require the patience of gamers, as you say. These processes still have room for improvement. We will not repeat the same mistakes in future developments.

The story of the game shows a lot of events and a lot of characters in parallel. This is a good way to tell the story of different characters, but it can make the story feel distracting to the viewer. It was really difficult to tell the surrounding characters, enemies, and background stories that fit perfectly with the stories of different characters through one game, and we couldn't fully implement it.

It's not easy to promise that the game's storytelling will improve. However, we'll cover a lot of the material in this game in more detail in the follow-up.

Thank you for this review.

review: Its basically anime Xcom game. If you like that kind of gameplay you should enjoy it.
developer_response:
As of yet, Troubleshooter is not worth the brand enough to be evaluated independently. That's why "anime XCOM" is the phrase that best represents Troubleshooter in the current situation. author: {'steamid': '76561198069109265', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 21126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21126, 'last_played': 1710050422}
review:
游戏时长352个小时，第一次给STEAM游戏评价，以下是我希望制作者可以去改良的地方：
1.天赋栏的扩充，由于后期副本强度的明显提升且装备强化对人物角色强度的提升不大的情况下，更多的天赋组合一定程度上可以增加容错率，当前的天赋栏位在60级本的情况下给玩家的选择机会不多，迫使玩家在选择生存性的同时必须要放弃很大一部分的进攻性能力。
2.能抗能打的野兽宠物确在很多时候成为了攻略高难本的核心要素，我甚至可以说炼狱难度的60+本也都是靠宠物轻松推过去的，但是宠物本身的速度相对较低，希望可以适当提升一下宠物的速度，而不是带着反击冲进怪堆里先吃一波伤害再打，突入训练和一枪一个确实解决了先手的问题，但是后期敌我双方速度都很高的情况下，不带突入训练和凯丽的技能辅助外，一个宠物丢在那里可能就要吃灰很久，加之反击天赋还会额外增加回合时间，导致了宠物在无额外加成的情况下要比队伍其它角色的速度慢太多。
3.装备的数值还有待提升，目前游戏的装备和套装系统在实战中的效果远远不如一套经过反复锤炼的天赋配板，而后期地图的敌人数值成长要远远高于可操纵角色的属性加成，导致了游戏平衡体验变得十分地糟糕，即便是强化到满级的套装和武器，在面对后期的数值怪时仍然没有很大的优势，在没有冲击场和二心的时候很容易被击杀，即便是花了很多时间在刷本刷装备上，最后仍然倒逼玩家在速攻和持久攻防战中进行选择。

总结：战棋从最初的火纹时代到现在已经经历了30年，这是一个十分成熟的游戏机制，换句话说，把一个战棋游戏做得很糟糕的难度反而更大。但是这个游戏让我获得的负反馈比其他战棋游戏多上不上。我承认游戏内的要素多元化可以让它变得丰满，但是《纷争终结者》的多元化则变了味，更像是战棋类游戏嵌套了网络游戏的骨骼，装备数值，野兽宠物的天赋组合，特定天赋的解锁，无人机天赋的获取。缝合了很多网游的要素，反复刷材料和刷本，宠物的养成，看上去好像给玩家带来了很多额外的游玩要素，实际上反而成为了一个乏味枯燥的反复吃隔夜饭阶段，这些环节本可以通过更好的平衡性和数值调整来取缔，在成吨的刷副本时间投入后获得的回报乏善可陈，玩家即得不到队伍养成的体验，也无从谈及策略类战棋游戏的体验。我想说，并不是每一种游戏都适合嵌入网游的框架，如果缝合了多种要素，至少请不要忘记初心，让战棋游戏多一些策略构筑的要素，多一些数值平衡和角色的成长，而不是打开了战棋游戏，最后变成了一个反复刷材料的网络游戏，让游戏性和体验感都大打折扣，别忘了，你是一款战棋游戏！
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

我能读懂你的文章，感受玩家长时间玩游戏的洞察力。 首先，感谢您分享您的洞察力。

我们通过推出游戏后4年多时间的更新，发现游戏制作者的想法和游戏玩家的想法存在很大差异。玩家们希望游戏能在更快速，更快的时间内完成。相反，游戏制作者正在思考如何让玩家们进行更多的挑战。

我们还没有找到这个烦恼的答案。但有一点可以肯定地说，如果一味地听从任何一方的意见，结果都不太好。相反，为了继续缩小两种立场的差异，积累过程的话，双方可以妥协。

您提出的意见将成为今后我们游戏更新的宝贵基础材料。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561197961662234', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 21530, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2752, 'playtime_at_review': 21530, 'last_played': 1711695498}
review:
Played a bunch of games with similar genres - Dreadlands, Gears Tactics, Wasteland, Solasta, Phoenix Point, X-COM. This game in particular stands out on top. Nothing really wrong the games mentioned above, just that for the price, there's nothing really new that they offer. This game though, seems like an absolute steal, even at full price. It's literally a better X-COM that hits all the right notes!

There's over a thousand masteries, so you could literally spend hours to spec or re-spec your characters and builds for the missions. Just find one that fits your play-style. If you ever hit a wall, then you need to make adjustments - there's no one strategy that works for everything.

The game is very fun that I don't even noticed how much hours I've clocked in to this game! Literally just like X-COM, each turn, everyone uses a 2 action point system. It's very simple (no need to change what's already perfect), yet there's so much depth that comes from the builds/masteries. Almost anything the enemies can do, you can do them as well. Love the VHPD support squad, I've not seen other games that does this, though I do wish there was more we could do with them, such as being able to adjust their equipment, masteries, being able to radio reinforcement, and such. The ability to give them auto-commands and dismiss is a plus, since some people don't like them at all. Also loving the occasional three-way battles, I've also not seen many games that does this, it really adds another layer to the battle. The game-play is absolutely engaging, they aren't lying when they say each map is uniquely designed, you are given the option to approach them differently in some cases. So much things to do, the items, crafting involving weapons/armors/upgrades/accessories, machines, and pets. Many pets with their own perks and a whole new completely different sets of skill tree! There isn't really any B.S. mechanics that turns players away, such as turn-limits or random infinite enemy spawns if you stay in one place for too long. I mean... there might be some, but it's very few and at the very least in this game, it's very approachable and do-able.

Loving the comical voice lines from some of the characters, especially Leton and Sion. LOL! They are just so funny that I literally cracked up a few times when I first heard them. Art-style is pretty good, it fits the theme and setting perfectly! Soundtrack is awesome, just be careful not to play recklessly when you start hearing epic combat music playing!

Loving how some of the story missions are uniquely done - perspective can shift, so you can experience things from the opposing side. I feel like more games should include this into their story telling. It definitely makes things more interesting.

As of now, the online multiplayer seems to be PvP oriented only. This is probably a long-shot, but I would love to see some PvE with co-op gameplay. I'm aware that this may not be for everyone since it can drastically slow down the game-play, but I'm sure there are people out there that would love to enjoy this awesome game of a masterpiece with friends. Solasta and Wasteland was able to accomplish this, so hopefully some co-op features can be included in the future.
developer_response:
If the game we made filled someone's time with pleasure, that's all the reason we develop the game. The review you left behind is the driving force behind the development team to continue its development.

Troubleshooter is the first game we've ever made. And it's the foundation of the game we're going to make in the future. Especially the mastery system and story will be a must-have when talking about the brand Troubleshooter. You'll have a more refined experience of these two elements through our future development.

There is an element called Joint Training in the game, and it is not difficult from a technical point of view to create a co-op element based on it. However, it took some time to think about how to solve some of the problems in terms of the design of the game, such as the amount of time other players or enemies have to wait while acting, and whether or not the same characters are allowed to play. Unfortunately, no answer to this has been found until now. We are well aware of how fun it is to break through a challenge through cooperation rather than competition with someone. That is why we will continue our research until we find an answer to this.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030722439', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 12610, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 4337, 'playtime_at_review': 9786, 'last_played': 1712419781}
review:
This game showed up highly rated in multiple outlets. Having played it I see what the hype is all about. it's every bit as good as people say.

This game is basically XCOM meets Korean MMO. It's a finely balanced game with scaling progression so that nothing seems stale (you don't unlock machine crafting until three quarters of the way through the game, for example). There is a ton of customization in each character's mastery sets. And to top it off the story is quite engaging.

Really the only criticism is the poor translation.  Aside from that you'd have no clue this was made by an indie developer.
developer_response:
We're realizing how important translation is through this game development. We didn't think anything else was important if we could make the game fun. But we realized that without the right translation, the game would disappear before it was even shown to gamers. Now it is a factor that holds as high a ranking importance for us as updates to games.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004498657', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 9867, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1972, 'playtime_at_review': 8516, 'last_played': 1712404150}
review:
遊戲是推薦的，但天賦系統老實說實在太多太複雜了，我是建議未取得的技能可否使用反灰色標示，不要只是一個?號放在那，並提示取得途徑，不然我總是在抄別人的天賦組合時，東缺一個，西缺一招，有時候缺的是關鍵技能，那整個效果就差很多。

另外關於刷材料鍊等，重複刷很花時間，若不使用修改器之類的(線上模式也不可能修改)，加上當今其他傑出的遊戲也不少，可能玩到後面也無力再繼續刷了，有沒有可以不要手動打關卡的設定，刷到最後真的沒心力再刷。

另外開發人員回覆率確實很高就是XD
developer_response:
( 這篇文章是在機器翻譯的幫助下完成的。)

無論存在多麼多樣的天賦，如果使用不當，就等於沒有。 為了避免這種情況發生，我們將研究如何讓更多的玩家更容易使用天賦。

自動戰鬥系統是遊戲首次發行後經常提出的要求之一。 但是【紛爭終結者】是一款電腦遊戲。 我們要保存區別於行動遊戲的PC遊戲特徵。 雖然我們的這種方式可能看起來有點過時，但我認為包括你在內的任何人都會喜歡這種電腦遊戲。

感謝您的評論。

謝謝。

author: {'steamid': '76561198006668599', 'num_games_owned': 1249, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 6748, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1066, 'playtime_at_review': 6017, 'last_played': 1711971170}
review: If you like tactical RPGs, you should really enjoy this game. It's almost too ambitious with plenty of systems to engage but still extremely fun. The story, or more precisely the way the story is presented, is the weakest part.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112945932', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 1160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1063, 'playtime_at_review': 411, 'last_played': 1711646931}
review: good, a lot of fun.
developer_response:
More stories and more colleagues are waiting for you. 

I recommend that you complete all the scenario missions at a low level of difficulty first. Then you can recruit more colleagues and use more diverse masteries to change your character powerfully. 

You can try again at any time after completing any kind of mission in the game. In this process, you can change the difficulty of the mission or select more people to participate in the mission. Therefore, it is not necessary to complete violent cases or normal cases from the beginning.

Enjoy the story first. Then use your strategy on the battlefield to your heart's content.

author: {'steamid': '76561198803107451', 'num_games_owned': 18, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 14799, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14799, 'last_played': 1704226311}
review:
我唯一一款上200小时的游戏（在此之前，游戏时长最多的是废墟图书馆）。世界观宏大却只现一角；角色除了主角外甚至连boss手下的小喽啰都刻画得令人印象深刻；初期游戏模式致敬xcom却在中期走出了属于自己的路，这在我看来是青出于蓝而胜于蓝；没开启创意工坊有点可惜，推荐给喜欢自己动脑搭配BD的玩家。
    最后真诚祝愿开发组越做越好，期望以后能赶超月亮计划并在游戏界拥有属于自己独树一帜的一席之地。下一个游戏进度如何？什么时候才能上架，快端上来罢，已经等不及了。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

我们确实遇到了Project Moon。 我们和那个团队有独立游戏开发公司的共同点，我们还和他们分享了游戏开发的想法。 他们成功地树立了自己的认同感，并且比我们跑得更快。 我们不会落后于他们,也不会停止游戏开发,让游戏玩家更清楚地看到我们自己的特色。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198054978943', 'num_games_owned': 331, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 17060, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 9008, 'playtime_at_review': 15025, 'last_played': 1712276280}
review:
TLDR: XCOM meets Final Fantasy Tactics in terms of gameplay.

- You get to mix and match a variety of abilities to build a character to fulfill a role. Highly customizable. One thing to note is no you don't get to make a custom character at the start but you do end up with a variety of characters inclined to a specific role such as melee, magic, etc..
- You get to tame and raise a pet. Also extensively customizable with their unique race sets. Now you too can subject the enemies with what you had been dealing with on the receiving end, my favorite was my gigantic dodge tank spider that webs everything that misses them in melee. Send them in, wrap em up, lightning barbecue.
- You get to build and upgrade a drone. Also extensively customizable with their own modules. Mostly used it as a defensive moving cover that shoots lasers.
- Some missions took more than 30min with large maps but there are checkpoints and you can easily quit and save or reload to a previous checkpoint. No manual saves, the game is not punishing so don't worry about it too much if you fail.
- I didn't see the purpose of the motivation system other than a hassle, you can just as easily make your team eat stuff for a pittance amount of coin. I wish they just went with a "select meal set combinations before a mission" to give buffs instead of having to manually recover it or made it an after mission recovery tax.
- Story wise it kept me engaged and has been consistent in relation to the various actors and factions. The end of the first part left more questions than answers but I enjoyed the gameplay enough to make the DLC a definite buy.
- Music definitely goes into my own personal playlist to vibe with and the art is wonderful and evocative.
- What reminds me of FFT is that your opponent uses the same rules as you do. It makes it fun to engage and learn from an encounter then applying it to them afterwards. Game mechanics and how it flows together is a strong suit of this game and the main reason why I highly recommend this for any fan of turn based tactical rpg's.
developer_response:
Thank you for mentioning Final Fantasy Tactics while introducing Troubleshooter. If the game we created reminded you of FFT, that alone would be a great honor for us.

Troubleshooter is a game that will be the foundation of all the games we're going to make in the future. The story of many of the characters in the game is not over yet, and we think the various systems in the game can be further expanded.

Our plan is going to be implemented through future developments and the origin of all that is this game. That's why we wanted to implement a variety of materials through this game. We think we're very lucky that this kind of attempt suits your taste.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198345392215', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1711189006}
review: 挺好玩的 就是韩语听着不太习惯 要是有日语配音就好了
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

支持更多的语言语音是一次愉快的体验。对此，开发组的想法也是一样。但是对于像我们这样的小独立开发组来说，这是一件非常不容易的事情。我们是开发专业的队伍，没有外语专家。因此从与配音演员联系开始，很难判断配音演员的演技是否是我们所希望的。

为了解决这个问题，需要和当地的游戏发行公司签订合约进行工作，但是像我们这样对小公司的游戏感兴趣的游戏发行公司几乎没有。最终开发组认为，现在只有更加集中于我们能做的事情。我认为，如果能够坚持不懈地做下去，总有一天机会会来的。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198391281411', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3468, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 438, 'playtime_at_review': 1911, 'last_played': 1712170295}
review: I've only been playing this game for a few days but I'm completely hooked and really like it. My husband recommended this game to me because I'm a big fan of XCOM and other turn-based tactical games. Having a game like that which is so story focused is just brilliant. author: {'steamid': '76561198294378310', 'num_games_owned': 61, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 2306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 591, 'playtime_at_review': 1719, 'last_played': 1711354182}
review:
I wish I could give it a neutral rating.

*Review edited after I spent more time on the game*

+The combat (in general) and character building is great. 
+Good amount of equipment options.
+Everything is menu based so not a lot of time spent walking around altho there is a small area you can walk around eventually with vendors.

-So I'm 25+ hours in (on veteran) and the combat is starting to annoy me. Many of the maps feature a hilarious amount of enemies. My team at the moment totals 7 for a few of these missions and the last map I did had 36! Enemies and the goal of the mission was kill them all. Take into account there is basically no aoe abilities for you so it's a lot of single target combat and turn waiting. This is becoming tedious. Also take into consideration most of the enemies don't even have a chance to kill your team and it's just feels like it's wasting my time. A previous mission had 26 and I had 3 or 4. I mean what the heck. I'd rather have 10 hard to kill enemies than 36 easy ones. 

-The dialogue and the way the characters speak are so unnatural. Nobody in the history of the planet talks like most of these people do lol. 
-The story beats can be extremely nonsensical at times. Actually a lot of the time. I have no idea what is going on or what they are talking about half of the time, or keeping track of even WHEN it is. That's right it's not a linear timeframe. 

-The crafting System is a mess. Avoid it.

Even then I'm still playing it so it but idk. May be due to sunk cost fallacy at this point.
developer_response:
Our translation levels are not high. And this comes up more seriously at the beginning of the game. We were aware of this right after the game's release and updates over the last four years always included improvements in translation. Sorry for making a bad first impression on you. All I want is for you to just keep the game going. I'm sure then you'll see more of a better version of the game.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080055737', 'num_games_owned': 442, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 4805, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 431, 'playtime_at_review': 4372, 'last_played': 1711897921}
review:
As an old player of the XCOM series, this game has given me a tremendous surprise.
Firstly, in terms of the story, the game's background, characters, and the interconnections between events are undoubtedly rich enough, with a diverse range of character portrayals. Although there are some traces of Korean entertainment's cookie-cutter approach, overall, it does well in such a fictional setting. Unfortunately, many plot hints were left unresolved in the end. I hope that in the subsequent works, the storyline can be improved to have a proper beginning and end.
Secondly, in terms of gameplay, there are no situations where shots have a 99% hit chance and still miss, as in the XCOM series, and the turn limit has been removed, which gives players more room for maneuver.
Instead, there is a complex system of talents and counters. With 830 talents, it's quite complex, greatly enhancing the replayability, but also increasing the complexity. I suggest including a talent point simulation tool for each character in the sequel, allowing for simulations and an at-a-glance preview of all talents and character attributes, even including simulations of talents and attributes against specific types of enemies, which would make it more complete.
Although the game shows signs of roughness in many places, it is not easy to persist as an independent game for many years, and the development team's serious attitude towards players is even more touching. I hope the sequel will be even more brilliant.
作为一个XCOM系列的老玩家，这个游戏给了我非常大的惊喜。
首先在故事层面，这个游戏的背景情节、人物和事件间的关联无疑有足够的丰富度，人物塑造非常多样化。虽然能看出一定的韩式娱乐作品的模板化痕迹，但总的来说在这样一个架空背景下做得不错。遗憾的是有非常多的情节伏笔最后没有交代清楚，希望在后续作品中能够尽量完善情节，有始有终。
其次在游戏玩法上，没有XCOM系列的贴脸99%命中率MISS的情况，同时也去掉了回合限制，这一点让玩家发挥空间更大。
取而代之的是复杂的天赋系统相生相克对抗。830个天赋还是很复杂，极大提高了耐玩性，但也提升了复杂性。建议在二代游戏中内置每个人物的加点模拟器，可以以全天赋情况进行下进行配点模拟和各项人物属性所见即所得的预览，甚至可以包括对抗某类敌人的天赋、属性模拟情况，就更完善了。
虽然游戏在很多地方存在欠缺打磨的痕迹，但作为一个独立游戏坚持多年非常不容易，制作团队认真对待玩家的态度更是让人感动。希望二代游戏更加精彩。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

纷争终结者能从非常了解XCOM的玩家那里得到称赞,这对我们来说也是莫大的荣幸。 纷争终结者深受XCOM的影响，现在正在树立我们自己的特征。 

游戏的故事是我们最看重的元素。 只是通过一场游戏传达个别角色的故事是非常困难的事情。 但是我们计划通过未来的开发直接或间接地扩展现有角色的故事。 

天赋是决定战斗胜负的最重要因素。 也许天赋是代表纷争终结者的特征。 根据情况使用各种天赋可以说是游戏的最大乐趣。 我们认为这个系统还是可以改进的。 个性方向不仅包括天赋个数的增加，还包括A的可用性的提高。 只要游戏持续更新，我们对天赋的苦恼就会持续。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198250599086', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 412, 'last_played': 1679455226}

developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team speaks the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

More stories and more colleagues are waiting for you. 

I recommend that you complete all the scenario missions at a low level of difficulty first. Then you can recruit more colleagues and use more diverse masteries to change your character powerfully. 

You can try again at any time after completing any kind of mission in the game. In this process, you can change the difficulty of the mission or select more people to participate in the mission. Therefore, it is not necessary to complete violent cases or normal cases from the beginning.

Enjoy the story first. Then use your strategy on the battlefield to your heart's content.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198959831852', 'num_games_owned': 78, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 3173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1150, 'playtime_at_review': 2905, 'last_played': 1711858344}
review:
ゴミ屋敷を見ているようだ。
追記
良い点
・XCOMを踏襲している
・イベントを飛ばせる
悪い点
・主人公がニダニダ言ってるみたいで気持ち悪い。受け付けない。（即キャラ音声OFF）
・いちいち無理矢理ダメージを与えるとかゲームに介入しすぎ。（爆発で火炎ダメージやら電撃ダメージやら。爆発範囲もCOM側しか使用しないからか範囲を広めにしている）プレーヤーのミスでもないのに何でいちいちダメージ受けんの？せっかく回復アイテムとか作ったから使わせたいとか？
・冒頭でも書いたゴミ屋敷。どこに何があるのか覚えないといけない。特性等付け替えるのも すべて把握が必要となる為、無駄な時間浪費が激しい。
・チートキャラを出して、やる気をなくさせる。ストーリーに興味なく、純粋にゲームをしてる人はこの時点でやめるでしょう

総合評価
XCOMをプレイすればいい。
developer_response:
( 以下の内容は機械翻訳の助けを借りて作成されました。)

ゲームがリリースされてから4年が経ちました。 そして、私たちはゲームのリリースから今までずっとゲームを更新しています。 ゲームのコンテンツの量は決して少なくありません。 最初からゲームのすべてのシステムを把握しようとせず、ただゲームのストーリーを楽しみながら、必要な部分だけ一つずつ知っていってください。 あなたが時間に余裕があるたびに少しずつゲームを楽しんでみてください。 ゆっくりね。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果我们准备的游戏内容能愉快地填满你的时间，那对我们来说也是很大的乐趣。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198066233927', 'num_games_owned': 277, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4644, 'last_played': 1710838111}
review:
An excellent XCOM style game with no respect for your time.
There are no manual saves in a single player game where failing means losing 1+ hour of progress. You are replaying missions to grind bosses for their masteries. After 75 hours I still haven't even recruited all the playable characters and the crafting system is left untouched as it also requires grinding for materials.
developer_response:
There is no manual storage system in the game. However, if you are working on a mission, a checkpoint is created automatically and you can restart the mission from this checkpoint at any time. Also, you can set the interval at which this checkpoint is saved in the options of the game, so I think that using this system well will reduce the inconvenience of proceeding with the mission as much as possible.

Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children is a game that will be the foundation of every game we'll ever produce. So we're working on implementing as much as possible with this game. We're sorry that our efforts don't match your gaming preferences. But we know that your preferences are something we should fully consider. We'll study what we can do to reflect your preferences in our future developments.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996918471', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 19696, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19689, 'last_played': 1710657664}
review:
This game is an absolute gem which would I never have discovered if not for a friend who immediately recommended it to me upon learning of my love for Turn-Based Tactics / TRPG games. They were [i]gushing[/i] with praises for almost every aspect of the game. I bought it without hesitation.

... and then proceeded to struggle to get into the game. It took me about 5-6 on-and-off attempts of starting new campaigns before the game finally clicked for me. And then it had me completely hooked.

This game is [i]a lot[/i]. The devs evidently operate on a "more is more" philosophy. The sheer amount of gameplay elements can be very intimidating at first, and the game takes its time to introduce you to them. I'll summarize some of the key elements of the game and what makes it truly special. 

For Turn-Based Tactics veterans, here are some features that will be familiar:
[list]
	[*] Isometric grid with cover-based combat; 2 Action Points per character turn (the main reason everyone compares this game to XCOM)
	[*] Action Time system to determine turn order (based on Speed stat and combat actions/effects - much more interesting and engaging than simply player turn vs AI turn)
	[*] Unique characters each with their own stories (no permadeath)
	[*] Chapter-based visual novel storytelling with replayable missions (similar to Disgaea)
	[*] No base-building or management, but you have a hub where you can engage in shopping and crafting
	[*] An extremely customizable "perks" system (known as Masteries) for each character
[/list]

The Masteries system is where the game truly shines and was the biggest draw for me. You can think of Masteries as what are often called Perks in other games, except you have to collect them and equip them. They're functionally similar to Materia from Final Fantasy 7 - you can collect them from defeating enemies. You can also "Research" (craft) more of them by combining other Masteries. You'll start with a limited pool of Masteries you can craft at the start of the game, but as the game progresses you'll encounter new enemies and accomplish certain achievements, which unlocks more Masteries to craft.

Equipping Masteries to a character's "Mastery Board" may modify stats, grant additional abilities and so on. Equipping specific combinations of Masteries grant additional bonuses, known as "Mastery Sets". These sets can introduce completely game-changing behavior. The game encourages you to try different setups, which can be saved and freely switched between (although you may need to grind a bit to collect Masteries). As you level up each character, they will eventually have access to 2 advanced Classes which give access to Class-specific Masteries. To give an idea of how drastically they can change how a character plays, here's an example of how I built Albus (the main character) at different points in the game:
[list]
	[*] A magic-focused Wind caster with extremely high crit chance and crit damage to nuke enemies at medium distance, yet capable of cutting foes down should they get too close
	[*] A terrifying swordsman who chain-kills bleeding enemies
[/list]

The Masteries system is a theorycrafter's wet dream. I probably spent more time tweaking Masteries and experimenting with different combinations more than actually engaging in tactical battles.

Speaking of battles, it's important to note that battles can take quite a while, especially on higher difficulties. Some battles can last 1-2 hours (even with max animation speed). Battles play out in a pseudo-"Bronzeman" approach to saves - you can't make manual saves during battle, but quitting the game saves your progress mid-battle, and there are also auto-save checkpoints throughout the battle. If you have a busy schedule and aren't able to sink multiple hours of playtime at one go, this is something important to take note of. Difficulty-wise, I recommend genre veterans to start the game on Hard difficulty and then move to Cruel (the highest difficulty) as soon as you're comfortable with the game's systems. This is how I played the game and it presented enough of a challenge to keep me on my toes.

I mentioned the devs having a "more is more" approach to gameplay - here's a non-exhaustive list of the many gameplay features included:
[list]
	[*] a relationship and bonds system that unlocks additional abilities between bonded characters (similar to the friendship system in XCOM 2 WOTC or Fire Emblem)
	[*] a simple food/drinks system outside of combat to provide temporary in-combat buffs
	[*] a loot system that will have you hunting special enemies to try to get powerful gear
	[*] a serviceable crafting system for equipment and consumables - you can also craft special equipment sets that grant additional bonuses as you equip more of the set
	[*] a whole-ass beast taming system that will have a later character capturing beasts like pokemon. They too can be customized with Masteries
	[*] a drone-building system to complemented by the crafting system - another later character can build drones to be deployed in battle. They come with a completely separate Modules system that is analogous to Masteries, but you craft them with materials instead of other Masteries
[/list]

All these systems combine to make for an amazing game that deserves a place in any TRPG lover's library.

Some reviews take issue with the translation of the game (the devs are a Korean indie team, so their localization budget is limited). I got used to it pretty quickly; if you speak more than one language or regularly interact with non-native English speakers you'll probably have no issues.

To cap off this review, I'd like to give a special shoutout to the devs, as many others have too. This game is [i]clearly[/i] made with love and passion and is worth every penny. I also think it's just so neat that a small Korean indie studio is able to communicate with a global audience thanks to machine translation tools. I bought all the additional content at full price to support the devs and I'm extremely excited for the sequel they've announced as being in development!
developer_response:
Troubleshooter is the first game we've ever created. And it's the game that's going to be the birthplace of all the games we're going to produce. So we wanted to make a lot of things happen with this game. We're very happy that our plan seems to have been appreciated by you.

As you mentioned, Troubleshooter's combat system essentially borrowed the XCOM method. We borrowed a system that many gamers have verified, and we were even more strongly asked for Troubleshooter's own identity by gamers for the interest in it. 

We've incorporated a lot of things into the game to respond to the above demands. As a result, many systems have been applied to the game, and the most representative is the mastery system. This system is a direct factor in determining the outcome of a battle. One thing is that you already have a full grasp of this system and seem to be using it to your advantage in your battle. You already dominate the battlefield.

We wanted to implement as much content as possible through this game. It's clear that more game content can be expanded. But it was hard to implement all of those things in one game. We had technical limitations, we had real challenges like budget issues.

The story of Troubleshooters: Abandoned Children is over, but Valhalla and the Troubleshooters are just getting started. We will continue to develop the game as best we can to show you an evolved version of what you mentioned through future development.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198110296976', 'num_games_owned': 69, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 2827, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2339, 'last_played': 1710500263}
review:
X-com 좋아하는데, 그 동안 소중히 키운 내 대원들이 한 번의 실수로 / 버그로 사망할 때마다 자식을 잃게되는 부모마냥 친우를 잃는 동료마냥 가슴을 깎아내는 나날이 이어졌습니다.
그에 반하여 이 게임은 캐릭터가 죽는일은 없어서 너무나 평안하고 행복합니다... 이게 게임이구나 싶습니다. 그동안 내가 해왔던 x-com은 그저 고문일 뿐이었구나.
스토리도 나름 괜찮고, 우리나라에서 만든 게임이라서 그런지 우리나라 사회상에서 공감갈 만한 내용들이 은근 있어서 재미있었음.
developer_response:
XCOM은 정말 훌륭한 게임이지만, 글쓴이분께서 지적한 시스템이 누군가에게는 큰 압박으로 다가오기도 합니다. 그건 저희에게도 마찬가지였어요. 그래서 저희는 더 가벼운 느낌의 게임을 만들고 싶었습니다. 거기에 트러블슈터 브랜드만의 정체성을 더하고 싶었고요. 저희의 이런 노력이 글쓴분의 취향에 맞는것 같아서 정말로 기쁩니다. 저희가 준비한 것들을 모두 즐겨주세요!

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198354118648', 'num_games_owned': 153, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 7269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7269, 'last_played': 1707069787}
review:
假的战棋游戏：XCOM2（99%命中贴脸miss）
真正的战旗游戏：纷争终结者
在我玩过那么多战旗游戏里面中最好玩的一个：优点-剧情人设世界观设定丰富饱满有血有肉，（里面点歌的BGM好听）比XCOM2不知道好多少倍（自认为）然后制作组更新比较勤快。缺点是每局的游戏用时略长（大概30分钟~1小时左右）而且要刷取的东西太多，肝度爆炸（不过肝帝狂喜）就这我都还没打完剧情（130小时了快
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

XCOM系列游戏真的很棒，【纷争终结者】也深受其影响。 我们现在正在努力树立属于自己的认同感。 而且，我很高兴这种努力的结果符合你的喜好。 我们认为这个体裁还是可以进一步发展的。 如果我们制作的游戏能为发展做出贡献，并送上愉快的时光，那将是非常愉快的事情。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198143323346', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 19434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 8944, 'playtime_at_review': 3447, 'last_played': 1712429062}
review:
10/10 game.  

I have no idea why this is so obscure.  I am so glad I stumbled onto it.  Incredibly polished with tons of complicated systems.  Tons of fun.  The story is like a shonen manga.  And supposedly made by only a small team, which is really hard to believe.  So much thought was put into so many different things. The battle mechanics have alot of originality combined with great ideas from other games.

I'll echo what I think are the only minor gripes mentioned by others.  Any translation difficulties are primarily found in the tutorial explanations, which are sometimes not clear.  The story translation is much better though.  If you screw up a mission, there isn't any sort of serious penalty to be paid, which is hard to criticize, since they are basically combining an xcom style game with a shonenesque story.  When you lose motivation, which is the only outcome of a bad mission, all you have to do is hang out at the silverlight, puttering around with mastery/crafting etc. or just get up and walk away from the computer for a few minutes and suddenly your motivation shoots back up to green.

Anne Macy needs to stay home and go to school.  Let the adults handle it.
developer_response:
We, Dandylion, are a small independent game development studio in south Korea with six team members. Individual team members are equipped with the skills needed to develop games. They are mainly computer science, math, and art, but unfortunately, humanities, social studies, and foreign language skills are severely lacking. A lot of inexperience in game translation would have been caused by this lack of ability. Many people have given us suggestions for better translation and we're trying to reflect it as quickly as possible. We're hoping this kind of effort will help your game progress.

Anne has a busy day like you say. We will try harder not to stop developing the game until the day we can turn her future story into a game. :D

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100717204', 'num_games_owned': 141, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1709998047}
review: 游戏是好玩的，这种好玩可能来自于城市和人物设定吧
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果我们准备的游戏内容能愉快地填满你的时间，那对我们来说也是很大的乐趣。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198009473688', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 1175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1175, 'last_played': 1710341143}
review: 오랜만에 한번 해보려 했더니 실행이 안되는 건 뭘까...
developer_response:
이전에 실행이 정상적이었으나 지금 실행이 불가능하다면 외부적인 요인이 영향을 끼쳤을 수도 있습니다. 아래의 설명을 참고하여 저희에게 로그 파일을 보내주세요. 로그 파일은 저희가 문제를 파악하는데 큰 도움이 됩니다.

라이브러리 → '트러블슈터: 버려진 아이들' 에서 마우스 우클릭 → '설치된 파일' 선택 → '찾아보기...' 선택 → 게임이 설치된 폴더가 열림 → Release 로 이동 → bin 으로 이동 → LogTransporter.exe 실행

감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198316885664', 'num_games_owned': 200, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 902, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 902, 'last_played': 1709643625}

但是，关卡用时太长了，这让反复刷的过程极其无聊烦躁，对我来说这太浪费时间了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198115737598', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 2713, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1950, 'last_played': 1711213842}
review: 노가다성이 좀 강하긴 하지만 재미있네요. 그런데 적에 비해 아군의 근거리 비중이 너무 높은 듯.
developer_response:
반복 작업이 필요한 부분이 있는 것은 사실입니다. 또한 이런 요소가 게임의 다양한 요소에 스며들어 있기 때문에 함부로 제거하기도 어렵습니다. 다만 이러한 요소들이 게임의 이야기를 진행하면서 자연스럽게 거치는 장치가 될 수 있도록 하는 방법에 대해서 저희가 더 고민해 보겠습니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198334645394', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 15244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9604, 'last_played': 1710508869}
review:
游戏非常好玩，不过回合制只是皮，抢高地和墙后加闪避之类统统不重要，大多数时间不需要保持阵型探视野，快点养出大哥冲上去杀穿才是主基调。
这是一个刷子游戏，刷等级天赋装备宠物，核心是天赋，游戏中一半的时间在研究不同的天赋组合，一半的时间在刷新的天赋，不喜欢刷刷刷组天赋，又不喜欢抄作业的人慎重入。
喜欢刷刷刷的和喜欢尝试各种邪门玩法的一定要试一试。

随便打个比方，奶妈安，你可以带法师套打伤害，也可以带辅助套加buff回血，也可以带地属性天赋加格挡当肉，好不好用不说，组天赋需要一点自己的理解和尝试。多试试不同的组合效果就是主要玩法。
============
吐槽一下不爽的地方
靠回合制经验玩到中期被高达薄纱，这高达设计是不是有点过分
看了攻略想去刷剧情12马尔科的，最低难度关灯丢雷，敌人黑暗混乱，敌人平a暴击流血，我平a格挡，重开
敌人暴击流血，重开。
敌人没暴击，流血，我一下格挡。。寄
所以说，buff场地只是锦上添花，核心还是天赋
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

我们在一些任务中为故事的展开准备了特殊的装置。 另外，即使因这种装置决定胜负，也不会影响游戏的故事。 但是，即使是为了游戏的故事而安装该装置，我们也会进一步研究如何部署，以免伤害游戏玩家。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198076369489', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1934, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 925, 'last_played': 1709860803}
review:
I bought this game from the positive reviews, particularly Mortessen Reviews (the 100% guy). 

I am an avid TRPG player and was looking forward to this game. But I found it to be absolutely boring. Just play the same map 10 times, fighting the same stupid mobs.

The powers were confusing and research was unintuitive.
developer_response:
If you repeat the same map, something seems wrong. We only consist of a unique map, except for a handful of iterative missions. So we'd like to tell you that our game is capable of a variety of maps and tactics as it appears in other reviews, but we're sincerely sorry that you didn't feel it right to you.

We'll do our best to improve the experience about them.

Thank you

author: {'steamid': '76561198084116213', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 63911, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 303, 'playtime_at_review': 61711, 'last_played': 1711288027}

author: {'steamid': '76561198076271950', 'num_games_owned': 292, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 1184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 694, 'last_played': 1710000890}
review:
前期有个废铁堆下的不速之客支线任务，我70%的命中率连续MISS6次，怪逃跑任务直接失败，然后我重新做任务，再次遇到连续MISS7次，怪逃跑了之前全白打任务再次失败。
这个奇怪的设定我已经很多年没遇到过了。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

我们通过许多先前的评估确认游戏中显示的概率和实际概率没有问题。 在游戏中，各种天赋的效果决定了命中率和回避率。 如果某个敌人总是使用天赋来躲避你的攻击，你可以使用另一个天赋来应对。 请灵活运用你拥有的特性。 你肯定会更容易地赢得任务。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198288685788', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1709711208}
review:
之前买过，账号忘了，现在想重新体验又再买一次，游戏如果是对于美式战棋爱好者来说，绝对能值回票价！强烈推荐！而且制作组也会积极回应评论区的玩家意见，态度十分良好，更是值得支持的一点！
  另外跟制作组提一点翻译上的个人小建议，那个通用攻击天赋一枪一个不知道能不能换个名字，比如一击毙命啥的，毕竟这个天赋对于各个职业甚至野兽都属于十分常用的天赋，不止专属枪手，考虑到阿尔伯斯，席翁啥的都不用枪，配天赋的时候看着着实出戏。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

谢谢你的建议。 在你提到那个主题之前，我没有发现那个天赋的名字有任何问题。 你的建议很合理。 如果 纷争终结者的状态处于开发阶段，我们现在就会立即更改那个天赋的名字。 但是现在很多人已经习惯了现在的名字。 我们不能随意更改它的名称，因为在这里我们更改那个天赋的名字可能会给一些人带来混乱。 今后在决定天赋的名字时，会充分考虑你所提到的部分。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198086457357', 'num_games_owned': 1222, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 6582, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2568, 'playtime_at_review': 798, 'last_played': 1712418126}
review:
Excellent game, so full of content... Feels like an AAA game and better than most
The main game loop is tactical squad combat, grid based, on large levels with lots of ennemies and a few allies.
There are so many systems in it, which I usually don't like because I don't like feeling like I have to study for 5 years to get there.. But in that case, it doesn't overwhelm you, you don't have to use them all, and they're introduced progressively, and you can ignore some of them (for instance, you don't have to tweak your equipment, or produce your own drugs if you don't want).
The characters are interesting, the story is adequate, and the large levels are a joy to play.
I'm a bit ashamed I bought a game with so much content while it was on sale, so I've bought the extension and most cosmetic content to make up for that. These devs do deserve a much better success than what this game got, imo.
developer_response:
I'd like to begin by thanking you for purchasing not only the game, but also other content, to support us in developing the game. We're still going to improve the game because Troubleshooter is the foundation of every game we're going to make in the future. When these updates come together, the gamers might feel a little overwhelmed when you first start playing. Besides increasing the quantity of games, the development team will also think carefully about ways to increase access to the content of the game.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019566749', 'num_games_owned': 183, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1678479768}
review:
I haven't played nearly as much of this as I'd like to, but I'd just like to note: in the year or so I've had this game in my Steam library, it has consistently received 2-3 updates a week, every single week. I can't recall seeing any other video game on Steam get updated so frequently and consistently. And it's nearly four years old!

That alone, I think, deserves a positive review and a pat on the back for the devs.
developer_response:
We're overjoyed that our little efforts have been evaluated positively by you. Troubleshooter is the game that will be the foundation of all the games we're going to make in the future. That's why we're going to continue with big and small updates going forward.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the "Ally Units Action Speed" and "Non-ally Units Action Speed" in the "GAMEPLAY" in the game option.
Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198274702887', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 5718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3876, 'last_played': 1710345213}

author: {'steamid': '76561198252957116', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 6554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 6554, 'last_played': 1712419511}
review: cant run in windows 11 ?
developer_response:
Troubleshooter works fine in a Windows 11 environment. If the game doesn't run, other external factors will most likely cause problems. Please refer to the procedure below and send us a log file:

You can send us your log files manually.

Please follow the guide below:

Go to your Steam LIBRARY → in the list on the left, hover the mouse cursor on Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children and click right mouse button. → Properties... → Installed Files → Browse... → (Troubleshooter installed folder is opened) → Release → bin → run LogTransporter.exe

Please let us help you!

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198426189542', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 440, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 143, 'last_played': 1710126459}
review:
(아직 초반 플래이 중이라 추후에 리뷰를 업데이트 할수도 있습니다 + 해외 공대생이 과제 끝내고 한밤중에 적은거라 리뷰 내용이 중구난방 일 수 있습니다)
스토브에서 과거에 구매하였지만 플랫폼 이슈로 인해 스팀에서 다시 왔습니다 ㅎㅎ
초반 경험을 토대로 하자면 작은 한국 게임 회사에서 만든 수작이라 듣고 무작정 구매한 게임이지만 생각 이상으로 잘 짜여진 시스템 등등이 매우 인상적입니다. 
게임 업계쪽 투자와 창업을 늘상 생각중인 저에겐 한국 소규모 개발팀에 대한 희망이 느껴질 정도...!
정말 가능만 하다면 개발자 분들은 직접 만나뵙고 싶을만큼 게임에 대해 진심이라는 것이 느껴집니다 (스팀 상점 리뷰, 빠른 추가 DLC [제가 처음 이 게임을 검색했을때만 해도 사람들이 돈줄쫌 나자고 의상쫌 만들어서 팔라고 건의하고 있었는데 그 짧은 기간 사이에 많은 의상과 추가 단편 DLC가 만들어 졌네요!], 등등 ). 
물론 초반 플래이 중인데도 몇몇 단점이 느껴지는 것은 사실인듯 합니다. 우선은 그래픽과 모션등 이 최신 게임치고는 조금 밀린다느 느낌을 받았습니다 (소규모 팀에게는 너무나도 당연한, 그리고 필연적인 - 그러나 플래이 몰입도자체에 지장을 줄 정도는 아닙니다. 에초에 던제 게임들이 극 사실적이거나 뛰어난 그래픽으로 여필하는 경우 자체가 드물지요. 솔찍히 풍화설월 보다도 눈에 편하게 잘 모델링 하신것 같습니다). 그리고 스토리와 캐릭터 컨셉이 약간 비 대중적(? 정확히는 게임 자체와 뭔가 엇갈리는?!?) 인듯 보입니다 (아직 극초반이라 후에 추가적인 스토리 상에 설명등이 있을것으로 기대중!) 그러나 모든 단점들을 포함하더라도 여전히 턴제 게임을 좋아하는 게이머라면 부담스럽지 않은 가격에 꼭 한번쯤을 해볼만 한 게임인것 같습니다 :)
턴제 게임을 풍화설월로 입문해서 페르소나 용7 등등 많은 수작들은 즐겼고 그 게임들이 하나같이 제 인생게임 리스트에 올라갔는데 이 게임도 곧 올라갈 것으로 보입니다 ㅎㅎ!
좋은 게임 만들어 주신것에 진심으로 감사합니다

PS. 라이브러리에서 도전과제를 보다가 첫 임무 클리어율이 50프로가 조금 넘는다는 것을 알게 되었습니다... 저는 게인적으로 이러한 저조한 클리어율의 이유를 모르겠지만 (아마 인디게임 특성상 저렴한 가격에 구매 후 라이브러리 행이 되는것일까요..? ㅠㅠ) 개발자 분들이 한번 확인 해보시면 좋을듯 합니다 !!
developer_response:
오랜 시간동안 저희와 트러블슈터를 지켜봐 주신 것에 대해서 먼저 감사의 말씀을 드립니다. 그리고 스토브에 이어 스팀에까지 찾아오셔서 이렇게 힘이 되는 글을 작성해 주신 것에 대해서도 다시 한번 감사의 말씀을 드립니다.

게임 초반 플레이의 단점은 사실입니다. 많은 분들이 공통적으로 지적하는 부분이기도 하고 아마도 이것이 바로 첫 임무 완성 업적의 퍼센티지가 낮은 직접적인 이유라고도 생각합니다. 말씀하신 '저렴한 가격에 구입' → '라이브러리 행' (스팀은 게임을 모으는 게임이니까요?!) 도 일부 있겠지만, 게임의 초반부에 끝내주는 그래픽 혹은 영상 등을 통해 게이머의 시선을 확! 사로잡지 못하는 저희의 한계가 더 크게 느껴지는 부분이기도 합니다. 저희가 독립 게임 개발팀을 유지하는한 위의 두가지를 실제로 구현하게 되는 날은 머나먼 훗날의 이야기일 것입니다. 그럴수록 우리는 우리가 더욱 잘하는 것에 집중하려고 합니다. 첫인상은 평범하더라도 게임을 진행할수록 트러블슈터라는 브랜드에 강하게 매료될 수 있는 기법들을 연구해 나갈 것입니다.

멀지 않은 미래에 한국의 게임 업계에서 우연히 만나, 

'그 때 그 리뷰를 썼던 사람이 나요!' 
'으잇! 만나서 반갑습니다!'

하고 웃으며 이야기 하는 날이 오길 기원합니다. ^-^

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

PS: 아 게임 옵션에서 '아군 행동 빠르게 연출' 과 '아군 외 행동 빠르게 연출'을 사용하여 게임의 속도를 조절해 보세요. 좀 더 쾌적하게 게임 진행할 수 있을 겁니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072760026', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 319, 'last_played': 1710379481}
review: I've never heard of this developer but this game surprised me. Tutorial was well explained, mechanics are deep with lots of statuses, abilities, masteries, and ways to customize your character.  Plays like xcom but with an anime flair which I much prefer now. Nothing feels rushed or anything. I can get home from work, take a few repeatable missions at my leisure and call it a night. I've only got 5 hours in it now but will update once I complete the game.
developer_response:
I'm so glad that the game mechanics we defined seem to suit your taste. Our first impression of Troubleshooter is XCOM. But we've added various elements to the game to build a new brand called Troubleshooter. You'll experience more of those things as you progress through the game.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the "Ally Units Action Speed" and "Non-ally Units Action Speed" in the "GAMEPLAY" in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015913752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 142, 'playtime_forever': 3783, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3724, 'last_played': 1709664066}
review:
I am kind of mixed at the moment. On one side, I am having blast with this TRPG, developing my characters in every possible way however on the other side, although the game wants to tell us a story in a dystopian/cyberpunky world(which is right up my alley), after several chapters -trying so hard to have my focus on the story and every character- it just lost me.

I think it safe to say that if you are not coming here for the story(as an RPG fan) there is a lot to enjoy here. Definitely following this developer closely.
developer_response:
In fact, the story of the game is also the element of the game that we value the most. That it confused you may have a problem with how the story unfolds. The story is a place where the past and the present intersect, and Valhalla is a superpower, a sword, and a gun exist at the same time. These factors may confuse you. We will expand this worldview through future developments. You will also be able to get a clearer sense of the identity of the story we will create.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198174260113', 'num_games_owned': 126, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 7040, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1942, 'last_played': 1710591425}
review:
Пройшов основну гру, без DLC. Для мене окрім візуалу всі хороші речі у грі перекриваються негативними "але".
Гра наповнена різними механіками, але всі вони затьмарені гріндом.
Грінд як такий - річ не погана, але з покроковими боями і надмірною кількістю ворогів на місіях це перетворюється на симулятор очікування свого ходу.
Майстерностями можна зробити білд персонажу на свій смак, але відомостей про набори немає як і про деякі окремі майстерності або їх складові.
Знання про набори майстерностей можна придбати, але виключно по порядку (без можливості вибору класу/елементу/персонажа) і по спекулятивній ціні.
Наявний крафт екіпірування, але речі мають вимогу до рівня персонажа і прогресія зупиняється на рівні 35-му - зростає основний параметр (броня, сила, супротив), а решта зменшуються (влучність, критичні попадання, блок, ухилення).
Можна поліпшувати екіпірування, але це потребує багато ресурсів і зростає лише основна характеристика (не під твій рівень, а фіксованими кроками до +9).
Можуть випасти унікальні предмети з босів, але вони швидко втрачають актуальність через низькі базові показники.
Починається гра за Альбуса з розкриття його мотивації і цілей, але чим далі тим більше фокус зміщується навіть не на компанію якою він керує, а на події у місті загалом.
Розкривають історію персонажів (включаючи антагоністів), але роблять це маленькими уривками через флешбеки з різних періодів їх життя з повторенням уже розказаного.
Як відповів мені розробник: більше значення у грі покладалась не на бої, а на історію та розвиток персонажів. АЛЕ історія "покинутих дітей" як у загальному, так і окремих героїв не досягла фіналу
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team speaks the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

Troubleshooter is basically a game that follows the rules of TBS, but is oriented towards SRPG. In other words, we are putting more meaning on the story of the game and the growth of the character. In that sense, Troubleshooter may not be your cup of tea for valuing the strategy of the game solely. Maybe your encounter with Troubleshooter was the wrong one from the start. If one day you think of a game in the SRPG genre, I look forward to meeting you again.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198178061242', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 10134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 5137, 'playtime_at_review': 521, 'last_played': 1712445371}
review: I've played a lot of game tactics... and this is one of the best... lots of fun, difficulty (on hard) is challenging (and fun!)... I'm at 8 hrs atm, looking forward to play more and i'm sure i'll be exceeding 100 hrs for its contents... well done for the dev. team!
developer_response:
Nice to meet another fan of tactics game. Troubleshooter is our first production, but we want to become a development team that specializes in producing games of  tactics genre. I look forward to continuing our relationship with Troubleshooter through our future development.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the "Ally Units Action Speed" and "Non-ally Units Action Speed" in the "GAMEPLAY" in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198069626172', 'num_games_owned': 56, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 934, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 335, 'last_played': 1710137308}
review: 真不错
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果我们准备的游戏内容能愉快地填满你的时间，那对我们来说也是很大的乐趣。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198050495513', 'num_games_owned': 1279, 'num_reviews': 187, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1709699956}
review: having fun 2 hours in. reminds me of persona, x-com and Pokemon mixed into one.i didn't expect to be into it as much as i am, but everything seems unique and very in depth. lots of reading as there is no voice acting, but that's cool, it makes you pay attention more. will update as i keep playing.
developer_response:
Troubleshooter is now a brand new launching game brand, and the characteristics that allow us to express our own personality in one word are not yet clear. However, we are ambitious in future developments to make the Troubleshooter series a brand that can also be referred to as a yardstick when evaluating other games. I hope you enjoy the Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children and join us in our future work.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the "Ally Units Action Speed" and "Non-ally Units Action Speed" in the "GAMEPLAY" in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198860695017', 'num_games_owned': 30, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 4257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4257, 'last_played': 1658059003}
review: 游戏怎么样先抛开不谈。单就这个开发组的诚意真就挺少见的，也许是我玩的游戏还不是太多的原因吧。反正这么勤勉的回复玩家的评论我是没见过
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

我们是由6个人组成的小型独立游戏开发组。 无论采取何种手段，我们的思想都存在明显的局限性，没有尺度去判断我们的发展方向是否正确。 我们通过与玩家的沟通找到了这个问题的答案。 而且寻找答案的旅程仍在进行中。 因为我们仍打算改进【纷争终结者】。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198164264558', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1709113672}
review:
재미있네요~  엑스컴이나 이런거 좋아하시는분들은 좋아하실듯
저는 턴제겜이 잘 안맞아서 ㅠ 재미는있는데 턴제겜 특유의 지루함을 못견딤
developer_response:
우리는 즐거운 시간을 보내기 위해서 게임을 합니다. 이런 시간에 자신의 취향에 맞지 않는 게임을 억지로 해야 한다는 것은 정말로 싫은 일입니다. 그럼에도 불구하고 소중한 시간을 내어주시어 트러블슈터를 경험해 주신 것에 대해서 감사드립니다. 그리고 좋은 평가를 통해 작은 독립 게임 개발팀에게 앞으로 나아갈 힘을 주신 것에 대해서도 감사드립니다. 우리는 이 장르의 게임을 계속 개발할 것입니다. 언젠가 이 장르의 게임이 궁금해지실때, 저희를 찾아주세요.

PS: 아, 게임의 환경설정의 '게임플레이' 탭에는 '아군 행동 빠르게 연출' 과 '아군 외 행동 빠르게 연출' 항목이 있습니다. 이 두가지 값을 조절하여 대기 시간을 최소화 할 수 있습니다. 어쩌면 저희 게임을 좀 더 즐길 수 있게 되지 않을까 생각합니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004095753', 'num_games_owned': 1010, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 1466, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1466, 'last_played': 1697293665}
review:
Such a great game with frequent updates.
Please add support for Steam Deck!
developer_response:
Even with Steamdeck, Troubleshooter works fine. However, there is no separate UI for the small screen, so you need to use the zoom function of the device well. It takes a long time to prepare an update just for Steamdeck. However, we are now preparing for the next piece and it is very difficult to do both at the same time. We are a small independent game development team of six people. We are still updating Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children, but a large UI update is really difficult for a team like us.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199069972446', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 16258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16000, 'last_played': 1708958676}
review: 白金通关，整体游玩体验还是算极佳的，除了个别敌人。天赋系统贯穿整个游戏，可以说是最好玩也是最头疼的的一个系统，希望可以适当加以改善。作为一款二次元战棋，剧情方面，中规中矩但世界观很大后续还是很好发展的，看制作组了，立绘是重头，算是加分项了。总体下来是值得一玩的战棋游戏，期待制作组后续的更新和第二部游戏的制作。

author: {'steamid': '76561198145482985', 'num_games_owned': 79, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4506, 'last_played': 1708161873}
review: 第一次游玩到现在也挺久了，最近看到说准备结束更新筹备新作，就回来把DLC和音乐设定集都买齐。虽然没有玩完，大概只玩了本篇的80%左右，但还是很喜欢这款游戏，也很喜欢开发商非常认真又偶尔自嘲一下的幽默感，谢谢你们做出这么好的游戏。Troubleshooter曾经陪伴了我好几个独自悲伤的夜晚，玩累了就挂着听着背景音乐，也很喜欢游戏里的每一个人物，都塑造的很完整。没有玩下去只是因为玩到了需要大量刷天赋和捕捉宠物的阶段，感到有些玩不动就放下了。这次回来建了个新公司，但是租下工作室之后也没有动力再玩一遍，这些是我的问题。游戏很好，但还是自私地希望新作可以选择性地让我不那么肝……虽然我知道有很多玩家会很喜欢这种肝hhh——来自半夜还在播放Troubleshooter原声碟的一位中年人
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

我想起了深夜写自己经历过的游戏的人。 他坦率地逐一记录自己经历的游戏内容，并与开发者共享。 

读你的评价时，我脑海中的形象如上。 我们不会忘记反省那些不让你继续玩游戏的事情。 为了推出后续作品，需要不少时间。 但是我们会尽最大努力展示不会让你失望的游戏。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198292017579', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 18804, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 18804, 'last_played': 1711287513}
review: 这辈子买过性价比最高的游戏，画面玩法剧情音乐美术全部上乘水准。尤其制作组对细节的追求令人发指，比如第一次打拜克伦那关，每个角色甚至包括警督，第一次找到拜克伦竟然都有不一样的对话，关键这样的细节遍布整个游戏，能感觉到制作组对角色的爱，反面教材是小时候玩过一个玩法类似的游戏北欧女神，那个游戏角色入队以后就不会再有任何相关剧情，就像没了这个人一样。剧情对各种反派和小人物的描写也非常赞，各种不重样的场景和丰富的世界观设定，能感觉制作组确实是在塑造一个世界。唯一挑刺的地方就是后期随着队友人数的不断增加对角色个人的描写明显力不从心了，DLC1剧情就明显感觉有点水，不过DLC2对新角色的完整塑造和前面伏笔的回收还是很精彩的。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

有些东西物美价廉,这对卖家来说也是非常令人振奋的。 这是在游戏世界中通用的语言,我们很高兴我们制作的游戏能得到某人的这种评价。 【抛弃的孩子们】的故事已经结束了，但【纷争终结者】的故事还没有结束。 通过今后展开的故事，您可以体验到我们没有讲完的故事和比现在更先进的系统。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198339118866', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 16942, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 7, 'playtime_at_review': 15215, 'last_played': 1711624274}
review:
[h1]steam买的第一款游戏！也是唯一全成就的游戏！[/h1] 
这个游戏真的耐玩！可以试各种职业，流派和天赋的组合方案。
喜欢冰人和盗贼的形象！看起来很飒很有趣！
宠物和机器人也很多样化！
——————————分割线
但是还是有一点累的！如果完美主义的话（全天赋、全宠物、全装备）肝度太大了。我这种佛系玩家就想玩了玩一局，不玩了就放着。而且偶尔重复去玩一些关卡，因为价值观很正，除暴安良很有代入感，所以重复不觉得腻。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

【纷争终结者】是将成为我们今后制作的所有游戏基础的游戏。 不仅是游戏系统，游戏的故事也会直接或间接地被提到我们未来要制作的游戏中。 但是我们的目标是制作一个未来让你不那么累、能够专注于游戏本质的游戏。 在这方面，你告诉我们游戏的缺点和优点，这对我们会有很大的帮助。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

review: 对抗性非常激烈，哪怕到后期一不小心也会死，挖了很多坑没填，期待新的dlc。顺便说一句60关博士怎么打，网上说的不怎么对。黄机器人，用黑星的歼灭，配铁甲弹+机械猎人；红机械人，用莱顿的大招旋风腿，必中+冻结，冻上之后就能打了；格挡的那个先不用管，他秒不了你，最后围上一顿打就行，他格挡不了所有的攻击，其他的随便打

author: {'steamid': '76561199109067790', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 9426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7753, 'last_played': 1708402285}
review:
总体来说还是十分推荐的 玩起来特别上头 也没有xcom那种紧迫感  我很喜欢
先谈谈优点  对于战棋门槛的降低 感觉更多的像RPG的模式  只要你养成的好走位啊阵型啊什么都无所谓 天赋搭配的可玩性非常高  剧情也十分优秀 不是无脑的日式RPG王道剧情 对于一个战棋游戏来说这个剧情已经是顶级的水准了 大大超越了火焰纹章或是别的什么有名的战棋游戏 最值得一夸的英雄艾琳的特性设计 [spoiler]只能在视野里没有队友的时候才能变身为英雄状态持续三回合  一开始觉得啊触发好难啊好鸡肋啊  后来玩多了发现哎这不是捏他了超人梗  只有在没有人的时候才能撕开白西装开启超人模式 瞬间觉得酷毙了  最喜欢的角色是老师 虽然只是一个工具人 但是只要老师在就会觉得十分靠谱 而且散发老师美爆了我的天 [/spoiler]
再谈谈我觉得有点小遗憾的地方 就是不是每个人都有个人天赋 且个人天赋组成的附加天赋组效果有点小鸡肋 在高难度下单走英雄艾琳过于脆弱很遗憾  还有就是许多套路缺乏一定的减伤或者破格挡支持在dlc难度下没法玩 希望作者能多添加或者优化一下现有的天赋  加强一下弱的天赋组  还有就是莱顿这个角色超级明星状态感觉就是花里胡哨然后被一拳打死 上手性低且强度一般
最后期待一手更多的可玩角色 甚至是 第二部！
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

正如你所提到的，【纷争终结者】包含了很多RPG元素。 我们感到遗憾的是，在许多战棋游戏中，游戏的故事结束后，玩家们没有机会使用辛苦培养的角色。 因此,我们为了弥补这一点,积极在游戏中引入了RPG的要素。 你好像察觉到了我们的意图，并充分利用了它。 你这样的游戏玩家对我们来说就像祝福一样。 看到有人充分利用我们做的东西，就像厨师长看到客人津津有味地享用自己做的菜一样，是一种乐趣。

我们试图通过大量的天賦给玩家培养角色的自由。 只是让所有的天賦都变得有价值并不是一件容易的事情，显然也有没有被使用的天賦。 这是我们在未来的发展中一定需要解决的重要因素。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561199014470468', 'num_games_owned': 272, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 5156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4944, 'last_played': 1709977638}
review:
披着战旗皮的刷宝游戏，玩家的下棋水平不会太影响成败（我困难模式还推得蛮轻松，卡关了就研究研究天赋搭配），关键是要有肝有耐心。所以前期玩家养成体系还没建立起来，缺乏爽度，加上部分剧情只能自动播放、战斗回合不能跳过有些拖沓，可能会劝退部分玩家。

后期依然量大管饱，2/3时唐突加入宠物系统和机器人系统，我第一反应不是“还有新玩法好耶”而是两眼一黑🚬我人的天赋都配不过来居然还要我管宝宝......养胃到我至今没打开过这游戏，容我调理好再大肝特肝。

对原画我大夸特夸，每位角色都画好酷....我会坚持到莱顿入队谢谢制作组让我觉醒“挂冰袋”的新xp…最初是被看板娘艾琳吸引进来的，说到这个可能无人care但我还是要提一嘴，商店标签的女性主角有点误导（。ps：看到商店pv桃园结义三人组的旧头像立绘了，官方要是看到这条能告诉我art book有收录旧头像立绘吗

感情戏上不能指望bg.......黑星和凯丽有点强行，还有吉赛尔和阿尔伯斯的过往我喷了......但同性羁绊写很不错每一对都有闪光点！符合我对韩国人擅写同的刻板印象（？

对制作组：只是一篇自言自语的东西希望你们不要太在意，感谢你们的辛苦付出，今年蒸汽“爱的付出”奖我应该会投给你们——
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

我不懂中文，所以通过翻译器理解了你的文章。 虽然翻译器的水平还没有达到人类期待的水平，但在读你的文章的过程中，我非常开心。

角色之间的关系是引领游戏故事的重要因素。 关系赋予了他们为什么参与这场战斗的动机，让他们继续他们的旅程。 遗憾的是，在角色之间的关系中没能展现出更深层次的叙事，这对我们也留下了遗憾。 但是他们的故事才刚刚开始，所以他们的关系也会发展成多种多样的面貌。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561199108559394', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 29908, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22398, 'last_played': 1710656271}
review:
在花了很多时间养野兽和无人机后，最终通关了第二个DLC。
极高自由度的角色养成、优秀的剧情，绝对是值得好评的游戏。
不过获取一些需要的天赋和装备需要进行无意义的重复通关，还是挺消磨游戏热情的。
并且有三个我觉得很不合理的地方：
1，一些野兽身上携带的装备，特别是那几只獴咕身上有我需要的装备，结果驯服之后回到基地一看，野兽身上的本来自带的装备都没了？！驯服本身就是需要额外付出的行动，我觉得应该为驯服的野兽保留装备作为给玩家的正反馈。
2，如果在夺取敌人机器控制权的情况下完成任务，不仅不会提供应有的掉落，连它的情报量都不增加，这种负反馈真的不合理啊。
3，机器人的天赋是不会掉落的，就算夺取了它的控制权都拿不到。这意味着要想解锁拜克伦、毁灭轮的天赋只能达到100%情报量，也就是说重复刷关，特别是那几个费时费力的超大关。获取无人机天赋应该提供更便捷的手段。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

你的"总时数"可以让我知道你对游戏考虑了多少。

1. 
獴咕具有模仿特定职业的特点，为此必须要有设备。 然而，与其他野兽相比，只有在驯服獴咕时才能获得额外的设备可能被认为是特惠，并可能削弱其他野兽的存在价值。 为了獴咕变更游戏规则并不难。 但是不能忽视公平性问题。

2.
这已经实现了。 如果你一直保留入侵的机器单元直到任务结束，就可以获得有关机器单元的信息分数和道具。

3.
我们来思考一下学习模块的各种方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561197980095343', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 8559, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 92, 'playtime_at_review': 799, 'last_played': 1712015579}
review:
This game is like if XCOM had a baby with a JRPG. It is VERY good, deep, engaging, overall a lot of fun. I can tell that there is A LOT more game left to play. 

The localization to English isn't amazing, a significant portion of the game is "unpausable and unsavable" in that you can't open the menu (esc) without skipping the current dialog tree (esc). These nitpicks shouldn't discourage you from picking up the game, just letting you know that when you encounter them, you aren't alone. 

Masteries are incredibly baffling, but just google "Mastery set troubleshooter" and you'll see excellent results from the Steam Forums and the game's Fandom wiki.

This game was a gift. I doubt I would have purchased it on my own. My life is definitely better with this game in it.
developer_response:
If the game we made was a small gift to you, it would be a great honor for us. This is the driving force that keeps us making the game.

Mastery is the central system in the Battle of Troubleshooter. Understanding and utilizing this system has a huge impact on the outcome of a battle. However, you finally fully understand the system and seem to be enjoying it. We're so sorry that we didn't provide you with an easier way to get information about mastery in the game. The mastery system is something we will continue to develop. We will not only diversify mastery from now on, but we will also think more deeply about how to make it easy for anyone to use it.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198258656574', 'num_games_owned': 235, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 12328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12328, 'last_played': 1707022536}
review:
想了想还是给了推荐，毕竟制作组不易，希望第二部出的别搞难度这么变态。反正这部是越到后面难度越大越变态，不死人是不可能的，完美主义者劝退，特别是最后一关打高达毁灭轮，算了最简单的难度，还是按照贴吧群里面最优的配置，一群人把高达围住，用金蛙拖时间把机器人电量消耗完才勉强耗死。
  看了看最后dlc通关的成就，也就1.1%，就知道这难度了，打个剧情做这么难确实没必要。我也没信心打猴山和最后一关了，看个剧情就完事了。
  如果大家玩游戏的可以加一下贴吧的群，steam的讨论攻略加点最多打完小丑就打不到dlc2了。还是要靠群里的大佬加点天赋，刷才打完dlc2普通难度。。。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

我们制作了连接正规游戏故事的DLC,必须出现持续上升的最大等级和更强大、更新的敌人。 我们认为应该让购买DLC的人有新的感觉。

也许这就是你所说的部分引发的原因。 现在这个部分不可能全面矫正。 但是,这一部分在激发玩家挑战欲望的同时,为了维持适当的难度,将暂时继续进行改善工作。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198054267963', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 8176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8176, 'last_played': 1707045890}
review:
The quick description of this game is XCOM with RPG elements and random loot drops. The setting is a "30 minutes in the future" type of world where some people have developed elemental psychic powers. Throughout the game you fight various criminals, cultists, and monsters. The game is clearly made with love and care by an indie dev so I will recommend it.

With that said there are some things that I would like the devs to consider as they work on the sequel.

-streamline the crafting system. It works now, but feels extremely clunky. Hell maybe have the vendors deliver to the workbench at a higher cost
-It can feel frustrating to fight the same bosses. We get a notification thanking us for arresting these people, yet in the next story mission they are running around perfectly fine
-a minor one, but taming should disable auto-retaliation such as cover. 
-balance towards the end of Crimson Crow felt off. All the enemies became bullet sponges that also dealt crazy damage. Previously combat was like a puzzle, but towards the end you just had to brute force and hope for the best. Don't let the people who can auto run the hardest maps dictate how you make your game, most of the players aren't like that.
developer_response:
As you mentioned in the first sentence, we have actively introduced RPG elements to the elements of XCOM. XCOM is the representative game of this genre, and we have played this game for a lot of time. We love XCOM, but we don't want Troubleshooter to be XCOM. We will continue to update to establish the brand Troubleshooter and expand Valhalla's worldview through future developments.

Your suggestions mean a lot to us. We will project them into future development, but I think the third point should be considered right now. We will think about how to implement it.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198359461194', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 20738, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 303, 'playtime_at_review': 17097, 'last_played': 1712289141}
review:
At this point, I've played this game extensively, and I've finished the main story, and I very much love this game. I appreciate the fact that you have some options as to how each character can play, but I also prefer my characters to have unique roles, and I think Troubleshooter strikes that balance well.

Another good balance the game hits is difficulty. The game is not too difficult, but not too easy either. In fact, the game does a pretty good job of making sure you need to use the mastery system intelligently to prevail in later maps.

Like some other people, I did notice the translation work was rough at first, though it has improved over time. There were some plot concepts that almost felt like jokes that I didn't really get, perhaps due to cultural differences. However, I would say those issues do not get in the way of either gameplay or overall story.

Generally speaking, this is a fantastic game. One of those underrated gems that you might miss if someone didn't tell you about it. If you're a fan of strategy RPGs, you don't want to miss this one. It's well worth the time and price.
developer_response:
We stated in our product that you purchased Troubleshooter and that we support English. Therefore, we should support English translation that you can understand, and you didn't have to endure uncomfortable translation.

I would like to express my gratitude to you for never giving up on Troubleshooter. The story of Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children is over, but this will be the foundation for all the stories that will unfold in the future, and the characters and worldviews that are now appearing will be mentioned directly or indirectly in our future development. We hope that your experience will become more enjoyable through our future development. (Of course, we will do everything we can to provide a better translation then.)

Thank you for this review.
