author: {'steamid': '76561199124974383', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2032, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1703608060}
review:
I am completely indulged in this game at the moment and purchased the full package to support the studio hoping to see the next SRPG game soon.

I would strongly recommend this game for the XCOM style SRPG with the amazing twitch in magic and sword, and of course for the much better art and graphic designing. The depth of the strategy is suprising after 10+ years in fire emblem series especially when I chose the most defficult + challenging mode.

However, here is still some suggestion for better game playing experience:
1. the talent combo is too complicated as there is no instruction for how to construct the combo
2. the elements for handcrafting the equipment is way to complicated as you need to keep chasing around the different shops and the handcrafting place to extract the elements. I hope there can be improvements in acquiring the material. For example, when finding there are some materials you don't currently own but you can still extract the materials from the stock, you can simply click one button to extract the material directly;
developer_response:
First of all, we are so grateful to hear that you support our team's game! And we are so happy to bring you the pleasure we want to give players from our team!

We'll do improve the way to get the talent combo information steadily! Until that, We recommend to use Roberto NPC in shooter street! He can give more information the unknown information through some Vill. But the Vill amount to need to get information is increase by use counts. We'll also consider to get the better way to craft equipments as you say about craft material.

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198160140923', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 13039, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12771, 'last_played': 1704010196}
review: Please make Luna playable
developer_response:
I'm well aware that many gamers want to get Luna in their team. It's not impossible. But as you know, it takes a lot of storytelling to make it possible, which probably matches the equivalent of a single DLC. But we're not in a condition to produce any more DLC. We have to hurry up and prepare for the follow-up from now on. There might not be Luna's story in the follow-up either. But one of the games we're going to produce may cover the story of Anne and Luna in the future. :D

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198278896175', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1703089055}
review: 韩语难听，这是人类能说出的语言吗？怎么才能关掉啊！
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

这个世界存在多种语言。 任何语言都不能被评价为比其他语言好坏。 我们不能支持汉语语音显然是可惜的。 但这不能成为不尊重其他国家语言的理由。

( 而且我们在Steam的商店页面上明确表示不支持中文语音。)

你还没有进行两个多小时【纷争终结者】。 所以你还是可以退游戏。 希望你的宝贵钱能用在更有价值的地方或更好的游戏上。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561199019895333', 'num_games_owned': 62, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 602, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 601, 'last_played': 1706545873}
review: 不错的战棋游戏
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

请务必继续进行游戏。 你不用着急。 也没有必要提高难度。 请慢慢享受游戏的故事。 你的同事增加，你使用各种各样的【天赋】，不知不觉中你会支配战场。

啊，请考虑在游戏选项中使用加速游戏速度的选项【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】。你可以从【选项】 → 【环境设置】 → 【游戏进行】中找到上述选项。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561199200441572', 'num_games_owned': 339, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 9695, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8884, 'last_played': 1704292022}
review:
无可挑剔的一款战旗游戏，无论从游戏机制还是剧情音乐
不过刷天赋和刷材料颇为麻烦，制作组应该增加一些相关的指引，有些天赋真难找
比如46紫困难才有的地狱火掉的，不看攻略挺难拿到的
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

我们越是更新游戏，游戏就越复杂。 但如果玩家不能使用它，我们制作的东西就没有任何意义。 所以我们正在努力尽可能多的将内容收录到游戏的帮助中。 只是游戏的一切是否应该收录在帮助中还是个疑问。 在非常多的游戏中,存在隐藏的要素,应该公开到什么程度,游戏开发者和游戏玩家的看法明显存在差异。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561199059182270', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1151, 'last_played': 1702298364}
review:
游戏能看到制作组的诚意，完了17个小时还是放弃了，其中有些店还是我个人不太喜欢的点。
1.人物造型偏年轻化和杀马特风，剧情也不是很能支撑起来人物。很快剧情就没有吸引力了。
2.天赋系统太复杂，我反正是一直到最后都没有搞明白。
3.想模仿xcom但是模仿的不好，最后让我反而想重新玩xcom了。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

天赋是游戏的核心系统，如何充分利用它决定游戏的乐趣。 我们在游戏中为了说明这一点做了很多努力，但是好像我们的努力不够。

【纷争终结者】不会盲目模仿XCOM。 它不会是每个玩家都想要的。 我们正在努力以XCOM建立的战斗方式为基础，结合【纷争终结者】的属性。 因此，如果你期待只改变外表的XCOM，【纷争终结者】就不会符合你的喜好。 我们作为一个独立游戏开发团队，正在努力打造新的战棋。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198093444367', 'num_games_owned': 118, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 14580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14580, 'last_played': 1626414588}
review: fun game
developer_response:
First of all, I would like to thank you for experiencing Troublehooter for a considerable amount of time. We will come to you with another game by further developing the elements that you enjoyed.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198417796172', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 3638, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 595, 'last_played': 1707473583}
review:
本来还以为打到后面体验能有所改变，结果顶着油腻的建模、廉价的特效、让人血压升高的战斗玩了10个小时还是那个鸟样。
我想游戏到了第二章就只剩下了30多%的人坚持，就已经能说明很大的问题了，评论区一看各个都说能玩很久，结果一看成就通过教程关的都只有80%，第一章枯燥无味的体验还有莫名其妙的游戏设计直接劝退一半的人。
这10个小时里面也就剧情的观感好点…还是那种中二风挑人的。
结论：不推荐，除非你真的很喜欢韩国便宜手游画质的油腻3D建模。

————
12月15号追评
闲下来时想起这游戏，突然看见自己的评论被制作人回覆了…所以又多玩了一会。好吧，我承认我之前说的话有些过激了。
游戏体验比前期好了，尤其是在前三个队员已经完成转职，解锁了更多技能，安入队后。尽管模型的粗糙以及打击感的缺失仍然让这游戏在本就漫长的战棋对决中少了点战斗带来的爽感，但看见自己在众多天赋中配搭成形的bd直接秒杀敌人还是挺乐的。
还有不得不吐槽，一个单机游戏居然做成了跟网游差不多的感觉，还有大厅、联机对决什么的，有点难蚌。

总的来说，这游戏后期还是挺好玩的，就是前后体验太割裂了…我会接着玩下去的。
现在用心做游戏的厂商没几个了，steam也没中评，想了想还是给个好评吧。
要是什么时候把打击感和模型改改就好了。还有剧情没配音，要是有的话观感会好上不少。（安，俺滴安）
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

纷争终结者和最近的游戏有很大的不同。 最近的游戏应该能够在开始游戏后短时间内接近该游戏的核心内容。 但是纷争终结者拒绝这个语法。 反而坚持以前传统SRPG的语法。 世界上应该存在各种各样的游戏。 我认为现在很多人喜爱的游戏潮流也是因为传统游戏的存在才存在的。 Dandylion是一个独立的游戏开发团队。 我们将制作与世界潮流略有不同、我们认为的游戏。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198272809836', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 16513, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3385, 'last_played': 1706167017}
review:
我玩这类游戏的习惯都是组织后宫突击队，所以公司名称直接就是“镁铝”集中营，但是玩了几十个小时了，镁铝没见着，4个糙汉子（艾琳：你再说一遍！）+1个未成年+1个黑皮大妈（），棒子明明立绘建模都是一把好手的，这次建模咋就拉成这样（立绘还是很好看的）
但是顶不住太上头了啊草，独立游戏的价格，要素太丰富了。

要说唯一的缺点，就是糟糕的地形了，让人想起玩机战OGMD的“夜间捉妖”关卡的噩梦
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

我们主要通过天赋给玩家改变角色能力作为开发的核心。 但是，正如你所说，通过由特定角色组成的团队获得的乐趣是意想不到的。 很抱歉没能给你更多的选择权。 但是，你喜欢的角色的故事会通过我们的未来开发延续下去。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198324322664', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3682, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3566, 'last_played': 1709787580}
review:
剧情，战棋元素，培养系统都很不错的一款游戏，能看到制作组丰富的想象力，
同时也是我接触的第一款有韩语配音的游戏，真的很喜欢 Sion 的配音！
2D 美术同样也十分优秀，总之是在各个方面都很引人入胜的作品。
偶尔会出现主线不推进或者关卡不显示的 bug ，重启一下游戏就能恢复，不过还是希望制作组能够稍微留意一下并进行修复。
（ bug 出现在一个游戏早期的关卡和 Giselle 加入公司的剧情）

author: {'steamid': '76561198088657785', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 11671, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11671, 'last_played': 1702221891}
review:
어려움 + 고위험고수익으로 일부 미션 제외하고 dlc 엔딩까지 클리어. 야수나 기계는 별로 키우지 않음.

@장점
- 전략성
- 감성적인 연출의 스토리
- 특성판 시스템으로 인한 동일 캐릭터라도 여러 빌드가 가능
- 분량 : dlc까지 했을 때 기본적인 메인+서브+강력 미션만 해도, 최소 150 ~ 200시간
- 캐릭간 밸런스 : 12명이나 되는 동료들인데 저마다 역할이 있어, 딱히 버릴만한 캐릭터는 없음

@단점
- 진입장벽 : UI, UX가 상당히 난잡함. 게임시작하자마 정리되지 않은 온갖 정보가 나옴
- 스토리 : 스토리가 장점이긴 한데, 군상극이라 집중되는 내용이 아니고, 초반부터 나오는 스푼교가 유치한 설정임
- 극후반부 억까스런 특성으로 무장한 적 : dlc스테이지 후반부 쯤에 특정 적들이 불쾌한 수준임.

총평 :  SRPG를 좋아한다면 할인이 아닌 정가로 구매해도 후회없을 게임
developer_response:
단점 부분이 정말 아프게 다가오는 평가라고 생각합니다. 사실 저 단점들 중 어떤 하나로 인해서 나쁜 평가를 남기셨다고 해도 저희가 할 말이 없었을 것입니다. 실제로도 언급하신 단점들로 인해서 트러블슈터를 나쁘게 평가한 분들도 많습니다. 저희에게 참 많은 것을 반성하게 하는 점이었습니다. 그럼에도 불구하고 좋은 평가를 통해 작은 개발팀에게 게임 개발에 대한 용기를 잊지 않도록 배려해 주셔서 감사합니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198180479889', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3474, 'last_played': 1702417996}
review:
꾸역꾸역 하고 있긴 한데 3번이나 접을뻔했고, 지금도 또 하차할지 고민하면서 리뷰씀
보통 이벤트 아니면 리뷰 안쓰는데 너무 화가 나서 개발진 보라고 꼭 써야겠음
후반으로 갈수록 대체 왜 하고 있는지, 왜 이걸 참으면서 해야하는지 모르겠다

장점들은 다른곳에 많으니, 불만점 위주로 쓰자면,


1. 시야, 지원요청 시스템
시야 개념이 너무 나빠서 좀만 맘편히 걸어가려고 하면 적 발견 > 지원 요청 > 내턴 안옴 > 겜 포기 or 빡종 무한 반복
초반에는 적 발견 당해도 대응해서 싸우면 금방 끝나니까 별 감각이 없었음
근데 지원요청은 대체 누구 머리에서 나온건지 진짜 화가 난다
맵 구석구석의 모든 적이 몰려와서 짜증나 죽겠는데, 겜 템포가 너무 느리다보니 적 공격하는걸 계속 구경하자니 화가나서 ALT + F4에 자연스럽게 손이 감... 5장까지 메인/서브퀘깨면서 50번 이상 강종해본듯
너무 화가나서 스피드핵 3배를 해도 내 턴 구경하는게 하늘의 별 따기임
적 지원요청만 없었어도 강종 횟수가 1/3으로 줄어들었을듯


2. 의미없는 적 정보 / 특성 / 아이템 노가다
적 정보 컴플리트 고점을 대체 왜이렇게 높게 잡아놨는지 모르겠음
엘리트몹 정보 모으기 고점이 이렇게 높은겜은 진짜 몇 없을듯

특성, 아이템 확률은 왜이렇게 더럽게 낮은지, 온라인 계정 특성/아이템 2배 확률 없으면 겜같지도 않음
겜 키고 2배 안떠있으면 겜 끄는게 일상임

드랍률 낮은것도 화나늗네 유닛당 드랍하는 특성 개수가 여러개인데 어째서 꼭 한개씩만 드랍하는지 이해가 안된다. 그냥 각각 개별 확률로 여러개 주면 좋을거같은데 꼭 쪼잔하게 이럴 필요가 있을까?
모아야할 특성도 더럽게 많고, 특성 제조도 너무하다싶을만큼 비싼데, 2배가 아니면 게임 진행하면서 자연스럽게 특성 맞추는것조차 너무 빡빡하다

게임에서 미는게 특성 짜는 재미인것 같은데, 특성 모으다가 이미 게임에 정이 떨어져서 하기가 싫음
보통 보스 고유 특성같은건 다른게임은 기본으로 주고, 자잘한 보조를 노가다해야하는데 여기는 무슨 온라인 RPG마냥 전부 다 노가다해서 얻어야함
노가다는 하기 싫고, 그러다보니 자연스레 특성이 없고, 그렇게 되면서 인터넷에 있는 특성판도 못 맞추고, 캐릭터 성능이 제대로 안나오니까 재미가 없음
장점을 노가다로 전부 망쳐버린 느낌임

아이템도 맵에서 드랍하는 아이템 레벨은 어째서 이렇게 낮은지, 보통 게임하면 17렙 존 가면 20렙도 떨궈야하는데, 여기는 무조건 맵보다 낮고, 가끔 훨씬 낮은것도 뜸. 겜 내 상자 뒤질 의욕도 안생김
제조를 하려 해도 재료 드랍 빈도, 개수 전부 엉망진창이라 겜하면서 만드는건 거의 불가능한 수준이니 아이템 수급이 상점밖에 없어음
유저 맥이는 느낌이라 RPG의 묘미인 육성, 장비 맞추는 재미 모두 사라져버렸음


3. 야수 시스템
지젤 얻고 야수 길들일 수 있다고 하니까 겜 하기 싫어졌음
보통 이런 수집과 관계된것들은 초반에 다 해금되어야하는데 지젤을 얻을때 쯤이면 이전 맵은 거들떠보기도 싫음
야수 육성 보상 특성도 보고있자니 의욕이 더 사라짐. 야수는 또 언제 얻고 언제 키우지 라는 생각이 들면서 게임을 한동안 안키게 됨

4. 기괴한 로봇 이후 적들 스텟
로봇 이후 게임이 갑자기 안좋은 방향으로 급선회한 느낌이 강해게 들기 시작하면서 강종이 더 심해짐
바이크론인지 때릴때마다 쳐 도망가는거 보고 있으면 쫓아갈 바에 그냥 게임을 끄는게 더 편안함
도망갈거면 단단하지를 말던가, 왜 내가 로봇하고 술래잡기하고 있지? 하는 생각에 자괴감만 듬
이미 충분히 전투 시간을 어째서 이런 엉망전창인 방법으로 늘리려고 하는지 도저히 이해할 수 가 없음


후속작 나온대서 꾸역꾸역 엔딩보려고 하는데 이제는 진짜 너무 지쳤다
엔딩 본 유저 비율이 너무 낮은데는 이유가 있었음..
developer_response:
소중한 시간을 할애하여 취향에 맞지 않은 점을 기록으로 남겨주신 것에 대해서 감사드립니다. 장점만큼 단점에서도 배울것이 많다고 생각합니다. 그런면에서 우리의 게임 제작 철학에 대해서 돌아보는 좋은 계기가 되리라고 생각합니다.

다만 우리의 게임 개발 철학이 틀렸다고 생각하지는 않습니다. 게임만큼 개인적인 취향이 분명하게 보여지는 분야가 또 있을까 싶을 정도로 게임은 다양한 요인에 의해서 평가받습니다. 그런면에서 저희가 추구하는 게임 개발 방향이 평가를 남기신 분의 취향에는 전혀 맞지 않은 경우였다고 생각합니다.

하지만 우리는 대중적인 게임을 만드는 것을 목표로 하는 팀이고, 더 많은 대중의 취향에 맞춰야 하는 과제를 안고 있습니다. 개발 인원은 고작 6명 뿐이고 과연 우리 6명이 모든 대중의 취향을 대변할 수 있을까 하는 의문을 가지고 있었습니다. 그런면에서 남겨주신 평가는 저희가 알지 못하는 또 다른 취향을 발견하게 된 좋은 계기라고 생각합니다.

평가 감사합니다.

review: 物超所值

author: {'steamid': '76561198052538251', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 2349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2349, 'last_played': 1700337676}
review:
Wow, I never really expected to find such a masterpiece from an unknown Korean developer. ) Long story short: if you're a big fan of tactical RPGs like "X-Com" or "Mario: Rabbids" - just buy this game and play it. No questions asked. )

"Troubleshooter" is a real hidden gem among games of its genre with a lot of depth. The gameplay is thoroughly polished and satisfying. The characters and their stories are very well designed. The soundtrack is pretty good. The visuals - just awesome! I've missed this smooth asian artstyle so much.
There are also different types of missions (eliminate, rescue, survive, retreat etc), tons of equippable items and masteries for each character, class changing system, crafting, resource management, side quests and even bonds you need to level up to form friendships between characters. All things needed to get lost in this game for an enormous amount of time. The best option for those who doesn't want the game to end too soon. )

The only issue I'd complain about is the storytelling which is somewhat frustrating. During the first 20 hours the game throws dosens of names at you, shows a lot of characters with something they need to settle between them (without specifying anything) and leaves the player with waaay too much guessing like "wtf has happened here?!" And by the time those puzzle pieces come together you'll just forget those names and circumstances you were trying to know about. There's a thin line between "intriguing" and "frustrating". Unfortunately the story writers have crossed this line in a wrong direction - it just takes too long (tens of hours) to get into the game's lore completely.
developer_response:
" leaves the player with waaay too much guessing like "wtf has happened here?!" And by the time those puzzle pieces come together you'll just forget those names and circumstances you were trying to know about. "

I understand what you're talking about. The game unfolds the story by crossing the past and the present. And this is how it repeats every time a new character emerges, so what you point out is more prominent.

This was the way we chose to break away from the way the story unfolded too plain. But this way also makes it difficult to understand the entire narrative of the game without a good story.

We're a small, independent game development team, and no one writes stories professionally. That's why our limitations are clear. At one point, we can't suddenly write a good story. However, in our future development, we'll try to make sure that what you point out doesn't repeat itself.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198870028429', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 4397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4365, 'last_played': 1702262572}
review:
정말 재밌습니다. 캐릭터 디자인도 캐치하고 그래픽은 하다보면 익숙해져서 크게 못난점을 느끼지 못했습니다. 특성 맞추는 것도 취향에 맞아서 엔딩 보기도 전에 DLC부터 구매했어요.
하지만 '이건 이랬으면 좋았을텐데' 하는 아쉬운 점이 몇 가지 있네요..
1.메인 캐릭터들의 서사/스토리 부족. 
단역들마다 각자의 사연, 스토리가 있는건 좋지만 그게 메인 캐릭터들 보다 더 메인으로 여겨지는건 좀 아쉽습니다.. 심지어 동물들도 사연과 과거 얘기가 나오고 있는데 메인 캐릭터들에 대한건 아무것도 모르고 있으니 이게 맞나 싶더라고요(ㅋㅋㅜ)  서로 상호작용이나 대사도 적으니 정말 친해서 같이 다닌다기 보단 그냥 '회사동료'니까 뭉쳐있는단 느낌이 들었습니다..앤과 헤이싱의 '여우씨' 같은 이야기들이 훨씬 많았으면 좋았을텐데 아쉬워요.
2.부족한 이동기
이동하다가 질려서 게임 끈 적이 한 두번이 아닙니다..맵이 넓은데 이동할 수 있는 범위는 한정되어 있으니 한 판당 소모되는 시간과 에너지량이 많습니다. 차라리 텔레포트 기능을 추가해서 초반이라도 원하는 장소에 캐릭터를 둘 수 있게 하는게 좋지 않나 싶네요.
developer_response:
등장인물들의 서사를 이끌어 가는 과정에 부족한 역량으로 큰 아쉬움을 드려 죄송합니다!! 그리고 그럼에도 불구하고 즐겁게 즐겨주셔서 감사합니다!

소수의 적으로 다수의 적을 제압하는 형태를 만들면서 지형의 레벨을 활용하려는 욕심에 의해 맵이 많이 넓은 형태로 제작되었습니다. 이러한 부분이 말씀대로 미션 진행 과정에서 하염없이 이동만 하게되는 경우가 발생하게 되는 것은 저희 팀의 게임 디자인 역량 부족으로 그러한 부분이 줄어들 수 있도록 꾸준히 개선하도록 하겠습니다! 

당장 개선될 부분이 아니라 아쉽지만  이동 부분은 게임플레이 옵션에서 최대한 연출 속도를 올리시면 지겨움이 줄어드실 것이라 생각합니다!

지적하신 부분은 현재 작품은 물론 차기작 개발에서도 개선하여 더 많은 즐거움을 드릴 수 있도록 최선을 다하겠습니다!

좋은 지적 감사합니다!

즐거운 하루 되세요!

author: {'steamid': '76561198004390937', 'num_games_owned': 866, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1864, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1656, 'last_played': 1701888075}
review:
A true delight!

Troubleshooter is a super hero mercenary team management x-com TRPG, and I love it for that. It scratches an itch few other games have. The characters are fun and appealing, the animations are expressive, the subsystems (like masteries) are dense like chocolate cake, and the combat is the right mix of hype take-downs, near misses, and nail-biting tension. 

It's an easy recommendation for anyone not afraid to really sink their teeth into something unique!
developer_response:
" something unique "

Everyone who is developing the game will be meeting head-to-head again today to hear this expression. And we will enjoy our little achievement with this one expression you left behind. And we will not neglect preparing for the next update and follow-up to expand the world of Troubleshooter.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019907252', 'num_games_owned': 538, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 2782, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 731, 'last_played': 1704579572}
review:
Excellent tactical rpg, d'une grande profondeur, avec une ambiance orientée visual novel anime/manga.
Il faut accrocher à l'ambiance, mais si vous adhérez c'est du très bon.
Pas punitif comme un X-Com, et on ne peut pas vraiment choisir l'esthétique de ses unités, mais au vu de tout le reste, des possibilités, la diversité des builds et batailles, on est sur un jeu bien aussi profond et à expérimenter sur le long cours. Votre partie sera très longue et satisfaisante. Chaudement recommandé !
- - -
Excellent tactical RPG with great depth, featuring an anime/manga-style visual novel-oriented atmosphere. You need to resonate with the ambiance, but if you do, it's very good. It's not as punishing as X-Com, and you can't really customize the aesthetics of your units, but considering everything else, the possibilities, the diversity of builds and battles, you're looking at a game that's just as deep and worth experiencing in the long run. Your playthrough will be very lengthy and satisfying. Highly recommended!
developer_response:
As you mentioned, Troubleshooter is a difficult game to access the core content of the game in a short time. It takes a little longer for the game to start getting more fun than other games. However, once gamers get used to the game, Troubleshooter is a game that can be enjoyed for longer than any other tactical RPG. I hope everyone reading this review will experience the joy.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022343050', 'num_games_owned': 629, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 367, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 305, 'last_played': 1701585203}
review:
I've been pushing myself to play this more as I'm only a few hours in, so I will update as I get farther along... but for now: I hate it.

I went into this one pretty excited. The art looks gorgeous, I love XCOM and turn based strategies in general. Lots of mentions of customization in other comments sound great!

So what is this mess of a game I'm playing that's so different than everyone else? First off there is no actual character customization that I've seen so far, just stat / skill customization. So you're stuck with these cookie cutter characters that run the regular anime tropes without so far providing anything new. I hope they get more likable. I also hope they expound on where the magical skills of these teenagers come from. As it is I don't feel any investment in them and it seems silly that they are able to take down crowds of heavily armed combatants. Very cartoony, which takes away any feeling of depth to what initially seemed like would be a pretty gritty world. I assume this will be fleshed out later.

The English translation is abysmal. I normally don't care about this, I play a lot of indie foreign games which struggle with grammar and clarity... yet this is so far worse than some of the really cheap Chinese ports from much smaller companies. This really impacts you when you get to dialogue choices and you find out that the options you can pick mean way different things than you'd expect them to mean from the way the responses are phrased.

Gameplay in combat is OK. I like the systems. As others have mentioned the percent hit chances seem less sadistic than X-Com. I have been playing with a controller and while you can do everything with the controller, it's very clunky and un-intuitive.

My biggest issue with this game so far is it does not respect the players time at all. The intro on-the-rails tutorial is your only touch of game-play before a very long series of dialogue and flavor scenes. Oh and if you leave mid-tutorial it doesn't save so you have to start over. After lots and lots of motionless dialogue and backstory scenes you finally get to some combat about 30 minutes in. During combat, or during dialogue, or navigating menus, you're often locked into mini-animations or sections that just can't be skipped. It makes everything clunky and slow, and again a waste of time. This is doubly harsh as there does not seem to be a mid-combat save system, so if you die you have to repeat all these dialogues again. 

You can hit select to skip turns, or skip many types of dialogues, but seemingly at random you cannot skip others. Mix in the clunky UI that takes a while to do anything with accuracy, the lack of in-combat saves, the very long build-up before you can actually play the game... it's not great. If the characters and story start to feel more engaging, the world starts to feel more meaningful and less silly, some of this can be overlooked.

On a technical note: When I started the game it wouldn't let me change the resolution in the menu. It was grayed out. I ended up having to modify the resolution in the "game_options.xml" file to get this not look like pixel-art.
developer_response:
It is strange that the user must directly manipulate the game_option.xml file to adjust the resolution of the screen. I read your review and tried to change the resolution of the screen in the options of the game and found that it changed normally. Please check if you are in a windowed or full screen state.

Your play time is relatively short, so we think the impression of Troubleshooter can change as you continue to play the game. But it's true that Troubleshooter doesn't make a good first impression. This is due to our lack of game development skills. 

It is also true that the level of translation is not good. We thought translation was not a big problem if we only knew how to develop games. But this was our mistake. The bad translation was the biggest obstacle that prevented me from starting the game. Since then, a lot of efforts have been made to improve the translation, but there are still many things that need to be improved. As long as we keep updating the game, the translation will be improved as well.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the "Ally Units Action Speed" and "Non-ally Units Action Speed" in the "GAMEPLAY" in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120126693', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 12411, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12411, 'last_played': 1679328104}
review:
I would say this is a true hidden gem of turn-based strategy game

The amount of content and customization they have in this game is massive
This is the game that core game-play is actually fun and not rely on story-telling
(which is somewhat interesting but trust me the game-play is what make this game unique)

Most think of x-com when it comes to this genre of turn-based game which simplify the explanation. But, I wouldn't want to compare this to x-com or any TRPG game ever cause it really deserve its own spot.

What really key feature of this game is the [b]mastery system[/b] where you can adding multiple "passive" ability to a character then those can be combined to create a powerful "passive combo" which can dictate the battle.

That mastery system is not only limited to characters but also your companion: [spoiler]pet & mech[/spoiler], which also adopt the same idea, thus making possibilities almost endless with character and party building. 

The gear of this game is semi looter-game type where you can farm and roll the stats
so min-max player can be crazy about build. But don't worry, with normal level of gear, you could go to the end game easily thanked to mastery system.

Want to build do a fun build , YES
Want to do [spoiler]Pokemon-like catching and evolution[/spoiler], YES
Want to build a [spoiler]mech[/spoiler] , YES
Want to build super character who can 1-hit all the enemy in single turn , YES

Just buy it!!!!!
developer_response:
" I wouldn't want to compare this to x-com or any TRPG game ever cause it deserve its own spot. "

The sentence above may not impress most gamers who read your review. But for us, this is everything we want when we developed Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children. 

XCOM is a game that really represents this genre. And because we borrowed a basic combat system from XCOM, XCOM was frequently mentioned in Troubleshooter's evaluation.

This was like an inevitable homework for us. If we gave up on this homework, we would have just been recognized as a development team making cheap games that mimic XCOM. 

We didn't just start developing games to be that kind of development team. We wanted to straighten out the identity Troubleshooter, and we've been updating the game for four years since the game's release. 

All of our attempts are because we wanted to see one sentence above in the review.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198423050668', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 36858, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36689, 'last_played': 1710837294}
review:
DLC2つを含め、全実績解除まで来たのでレビューを残します。

まず、SRPG好きでイラストデザインがご自身の好みに問題なければ
間違いなくおすすめです。

始めてプレイを始めたのは2020年でしたが
非常に意欲のある開発チームの仕事のおかげで
2023年現在に至るまで全く飽きておりせん。

・ストーリー、テキスト
１点、フルボイスではありません。
無条件でボイスが無いと楽しめないという層も一定数いらっしゃると思いますが
フルボイスで無い事がこのゲームの楽しさにマイナスな影響を与えているとは感じません。

世界観やキャラクター、組織のバックグラウンドがちゃんと考えられており
SF作品としてまずストーリーがとても良く出来ています。

会話や各テキストは、日本語のローカライズに一部不自然に感じた部分が出た事はありますが
理解が出来ないレベルのものでは無く
全体的にノベライズとして稚拙な文章や表現は無く、しっかり楽しめます。

・ゲーム性、システム、ボリュームなど
難易度が自分で自由にコントロール可能で
詰むような事はありません。
難易度は上げれば上げただけちゃんとその恩恵もあります。

特性からビルドを考えるのが非常に楽しく
装備に関してはハクスラ要素もあります。

前述してますが難易度がコントロール出来るので
ざっくりでも進んで行けるし、凝る人はすごい凝れます。
ストーリーを進めていくと
キャラクターだけでなく更に凝れる要素達も開放されていきます。

まず、DLCを抜きにして本体が
定価で買って十分満足できる内容、ボリュームです。

・BGM、SEなど
BGMは全体的に耳に聴き馴染みの良いサウンドです。

EDMやK-POPのトレンドなどとは違い
普遍的なアコースティック寄りのサウンドの方が多い印象です。

ボッサ風なものや、クラシカルだったりブルースだったり
ロックだったりポップだったりと
色々とありますが全て聴き馴染みが良いです。

SEも邪魔に感じたり、安っぽいと感じたり、合っていないと感じるものは一つもありません。

・オンライン、オフラインについて
私は最初からずっとオフラインでプレイをしています。
理由は始めた時期がソロゲーをやりたくて探して手を出したので
特にPvPなどのコンテンツを求めてこのゲームをプレイし始めていなかった
という超個人的な理由です。

なのでこれから始める方は
他プレイヤーと交流ができたりPvPが出来たりと
オンラインでなければ出来ない要素もちゃんとある為
オンラインから始める方がいいかもしれません。

ただ、オフラインでも何の問題もなく十分楽しめるゲームであることは
ずっとオフラインモードでプレイしてきている私のプレイ時間で証明出来ていると思います。
developer_response:
( 以下の内容は機械翻訳の助けを借りて作成されました。)

あなたのプレイタイム、そしてゲームをプレイした期間を考えると、あなたを名誉開発チームと呼んでもいいと思います。:D

その長い間、私たちを見守って私たちのアップデートを経験してくださったあなたに、まず感謝の言葉を伝えたいと思います。

日本の声優が有名であることは周知の事実です。 ゲームの評価で、日本人でないゲーマーでさえ、日本の声優の録音を望んでいるのを見て、私はこの事実を再確認することができました。 私たちも日本の声優の録音を考慮したことがありました。 しかし、この試みはすぐに挫折しました。 日本の声優の方々を起用するためには、弊社の3ヶ月分の会社運営費が必要だったからです。 開発チームの規模が小さいせいもありますが、今も私たちは3ヶ月後に開発チームが存在できるかどうかについて確信を持てずにいる状態です。 このような私たちに日本の声優を雇う費用を用意することは不可能でした。

おそらくこの時から、私たちは私たちができるゲーム開発にもっと集中し始めたのだと思います。 何かが私たちの手の届かないところにあるということを確認してからは、むしろ心が楽になったというか？ 私たちが一生懸命ゲームを開発し、それをより多くの人が楽しみ始めたら、いつかは私たちにも日本の音声をサポートできる機会が来ると思います。

そのために、私たちは今日もゲームの次のアップデートを準備し、新作のための技術を積んでいます。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198184275205', 'num_games_owned': 238, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 8163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6980, 'last_played': 1701590589}
review: 非常棒的战棋游戏，一口气玩通关简直爽爆，在我心中超过了XCOM的地位！希望能开放创意工坊
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

我们总是在完成【分争调整者】的开发后开放创意工坊。 但是我们仍然在开发【分争调整者】，不久后我们将开始开发游戏的后续作品。 也许我们没有时间为创意工坊的开放做准备。 只是我们会更加努力地给你传达很多消息，让你对游戏感兴趣。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198828148567', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3976, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1702093419}
review:
[h2]뉴비가 3시간 정도 해보고 남기는 구매의향이 있으신 분들 혹은 뉴비들에게 전하는 말[/h2]

*본인은 이런 류의 게임은 해 본 적 없는 사람입니다!*

맨 첨에 진짜 뭐가 뭔지 하나도 모르겠는데 튜토리얼겸 해서 경찰들 움직이고 몇 번의 에피소드 깨다보면 조금씩 게임 룰이 이해가 가요! 물론 아직 복잡해 보이는 ui에 적응 하는 중이지만...
주인공들이 하나씩 모여가는데 이게 스토리도 꽤 재밌고 전략적 턴제 rpg의 맛이 나서 즐거운 것 같습니다.
일단 즐겨 보고 나중에 더 후기를 넣어볼게요!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[h2] 30시간 정도 해보고 이어서 후기 [/h2]

스토리가 진행됨에 따라서 동료들도 영입하고, 각작 다양한 특성과 캐릭터 육성 유형이 생기는데 이게 참 rpg 유저의 마음을 울립니다.

지금은 검객으로 출혈 광전사 컨셉을 잡은 주인공을 키우고 있는 중인데 너무 재밌네요..!
여러 디버프와 연계할 수 있는 특성과 스킬들을 조합하는 게 넘 재밌어요.

경찰을 지휘하기 귀찮다는 다른 유저분들의 댓글을 봤었는데 그냥 저는 일괄 탐색이나 주둔으로 자동사냥 해 두고 주요 캐릭터만 조종하면서 재밌게 하고 있습니다.
developer_response:
저희 역량이 부족하여 많은 부분 서툰 모습이 많은 게임이지만 최선을 다해 많은 즐거움을 담으려고 최선을 다한 작품입니다!

그렇기에 이렇게 짧은 플레이 시간에고 긍정적으로 봐주시는 것만으로 진심으로 감사드립니다!

그리고 불편한 점이나 개선했으면 좋은 점이 있다면 스팀 토론을 통하여 알려주시면 최선을 다해 개선하겠습니다!

날이 많이 추워졌습니다!!

건강 조심하시고 즐거운 하루 되세요!

감사합니다!

author: {'steamid': '76561199139087052', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1701407014}

author: {'steamid': '76561198076826528', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 27559, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25048, 'last_played': 1704198586}
review:
シミュレーションＲＰＧが好きならおすすめ。
あとは、キャラクターの魅力こそがこのゲームの根幹であると
言えるため登場キャラに好感を持てるかどうか。

ストーリーを通してキャラの生い立ちや過去の出来事、
キャラ同士の関係性や心情などが丁寧に描かれており、
話を進める程にキャラクター達の魅力が増し愛着がわいてくる。

ストーリーは警察組織、犯罪組織、マフィア、宗教、戦争、
貴族社会、さらには敵の会社の愚痴まで様々な話が盛り込まれて
いて飽きない。敵側の視点で描かれる場面も多く、敵は敵で苦悩
している点が垣間見えるのも良い。

野獣を仲間にできたり、アイテム制作やドローン制作など
やりこみ要素もあって長く遊べる。ＢＧＭもかなり良いと思う。

注意点としては、中盤以降は味方が一撃でやられる場面も増え
敵に攻撃され続けて自分のターンが回ってこない、
敵の数が多すぎるなどでストレスを感じる可能性がある。
難易度は設定で６段階から選べるので詰まることはないと思うが、
実績を狙う場合は骨が折れるかもしれない。
developer_response:
( 以下の内容は機械翻訳の助けを借りて作成されました。)

私たちがゲームを通じてお伝えしたかった物語をお見逃しなくご覧いただき、誠にありがとうございます。私たちのチームは、この物語を皮切りに、彼らが生きる世界で繰り広げられる様々な物語を作り続けていく予定です。時には今の登場人物とは全く異なる人々の物語が始まることもありますが、彼らはいつか皆が一つになり、大きな世界を構成するまでゲームを作り続けようと思っています。

長く、多くの時間がかかるプロセスですが、ご一緒していただければ、心から感謝いたします。今作の改善はもちろん、次回作でもより多くの楽しみをお届けできるよう、精一杯頑張ります！

author: {'steamid': '76561198073420618', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 5632, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4346, 'last_played': 1710355693}
review:
Добротная тактическая JRPG от корейских разработчиков, которую многие упустили из виду. Всем любителям жанра советую, коль вам не чужда аниме стилистика.

Из плюсов:
- Разнообразие персонажей, каждый из которых является уникальной боевой единицей со своими навыками и способностями.
- Непосредственный сюжет.
- Уникальная система мастерства, а именно пассивных навыков, которые в свою очередь объединяются в наборы и дают более ощутимые бонусы, что в свою очередь может кардинально изменить геймплей.
- Приятные саундтреки.
- Система крафта.
- Цена.

Из минусов:
- Однообразие второстепенных заданий.
- Затянутость (имхо)
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

It's a real pleasure for the game's developers to get a recommendation from someone. And it's also a great pleasure for us that the game is introduced as a game of JRPG genre.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978461848', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6030, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6020, 'last_played': 1707755977}
review:
Fantastic strategy RPG with a X-Com gameplay and JRPG systems. The developer is constantly pushing out updates and adding new things.  

The game also plays well on the Steam Deck with a few tweaks.
developer_response:
We still have a lot of things we want to implement through the Troubleshooter series. Not only the content of the game, but also the environment suitable for Steamdeck is one of them. Currently, it is difficult to do large-scale UI work. However, in the follow-up, we will respond better than now.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004786130', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 725, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 725, 'last_played': 1701177905}
review:
I'm sure its a good game but there are too many things that annoy me. Feels too linear. It has you play random character that you don't build or get familiar with.

There is a one on one part in a battle where you are asked if you want to fight someone, apparently the right answer is no because you just get one shoot playing a character you've never played before, against a character you've never seen before.

I swear to good every time I have to click through "....." I want to punch someone. That's not dialogue Japan.

"What?"
"......."
"huh?"
"......."
"......."
developer_response:
"......." We never thought this expression would be awkward. This is because in Korea, it is often used as a line to express silence without answering during conversations. It's a part that's often used to express silence that doesn't answer in many conversations because it doesn't have voice support. We'll think about the expression of this part again.

Anyway, we'll do our best to make the game more enjoyable through constant updates!

Thank you for your review!

author: {'steamid': '76561198062264614', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 15272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6586, 'last_played': 1704459432}
review:
Great game and great developers who communicates often in a humble and polite way. :) Something that is sorely missing nowadays, so thank you for that, it's much appreciated.

Pros:
- Most importantly, it's FUN! It's easy to think "Just one more turn", only to discover that you've spent several hours playing. :)
- Excellent QoL features, like the Strategic view, the map and the target preview.
- I love the mastery system, it's a very cool idea with the mixing and matching and the "bonus" abilities. I still have a lot to learn but it's really sweet so far.
- The story is nice, but I have played eastern RPGs for most of my life so I may be a bit biased.
- The tactical battles, which is the "meat" of the game are fun and there is a lot to do besides commanding your team (chests, mini-bosses, discovering masteries, levelling classes/characters and so on).
- Good characters. I usually find some characters annoying in games, but this has not happened in Troubleshooter so far.
- It feels quite atmospheric. The rainy night city maps is one good example of this.
- So far I haven't had any gamebreaking bugs. Once I had to exit to the title screen when an even didn't start in Silverlining, but that took about 5 seconds and then it solved itself.
- The music is great, especially the heroic Troubleshooter theme (don't know the name of the song).
- Graphics are ok, everything is clear and there are no camera issues. Speaking of the camera, the camera controls are great. Zoom, angles and tilt are all built into the game. And it rotates in 45 degrees.

Troubleshooter reminds me a lot of Xcom but some key differences:
- I never ragequit in this game, in Xcom I always ragequit using Alt+F4. There hasn't been any random team wipes in one single turn in Troubleshooter (yet :D ).
- A hit chance of 50 % in Troubleshooter means that you'll hit half of the time, while in Xcom a hit percentage of 75 % means that you'll hit one time out of five and the other four times your team will be wiped.
- No need for alphastrikes.
- 45 degrees rotation instead of Xcom's default and somewhat annoying 90 degrees.

Cons:
- There are some minor translation issues. But you can still understand everything so it's not a huge deal.

TL;DR: A very underrated gem of a game! I highly recommend it and I hope the developers get more attention. I usually don't get DLCs and such but I made an exception for this game and got most of them to support the devs.
developer_response:
"Just one more turn"

I am well aware of the power of this idea. Personally, through the HOMM series and the Civilization series, I believe I've experienced a kind of time slip. If the Troubleshooter can be one of the games that matches this expression in the future, it will also be a great medal for the development team.

"Excellent QoL features"

In fact, when we first released the game, we found a lot of inconveniences in a lot of areas. Then, many people shared their opinions with us, and we just adapted them to the game. Thank you for appreciating our little efforts.

"mastery system"

We valued the character's growth and wanted to help gamers use their imagination to the fullest in the process. This idea has created the mastery system now, and it's one of the key elements of the game.

We have had a lot of influence from XCOM. At the same time, I had to deal with the homework that had to make Troubleshooter feel different from XCOM. The updates of the last four years have all been a process to achieve this. And I'm glad that the result was well received by you.

"minor translation issues"

Dandylion is a Korean development team. That's why this problem will endlessly haunt us as long as we continue to develop games. However, as long as our updates continue, updates for better translation will go hand in hand. We cannot guarantee a complete translation. However, we are ready to revise translations that interfere with the game at any time.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198134592450', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 3466, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1708415441}
review:
韩国出品的美式战棋，核心战斗与XCOM类似大战场+强移动力+高自由度，外围结构加上了不错的叙事性，整体的游玩感受还不错。

比较吸引我的是……这游戏有一种似乎不是刻意为之的幽默感。比如开局的教学关是几个特警战斗，说要撑到纷争终结者到场，之后一顿移动、视野、掩体、射击的教学，正当我以为就是XCOM时，几个画风明显不一样的大兄弟进入战场，之后抽出激光剑开始打近战，让我笑出声~后续的剧情也时不时有一些莫名其妙的幽默感，倒是让我增加了对这个游戏的好感。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

见到理解我们一定程度想表达的幽默感的人，真心高兴！ 大部分用户不是很在意这些部分。 因此更加高兴！

我们会通过不断的更新，尽最大努力带给大家更多的快乐！

祝你度过愉快的一天！

author: {'steamid': '76561198327905291', 'num_games_owned': 232, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 6718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1703400801}
review:
目前已经通关主线剧情任务，难度为【困难】，额外设置为【高风险高收益】
除了后期的敌方狙击手需要注意英雄位置，新地图敌方位置不明确会有卡关之外，基本上不需要专门练级，不需要对游戏特别了解也可以通关。
[b]=++【游戏引导有条不紊】[/b]
虽然大量的信息对于刚上手的玩家有些不友好，但帮助系统非常详尽，可以查阅任何与游戏相关的说明文本，甚至是计算伤害量的公式。
[b]==+【主线剧情中规中矩】[/b]
【困难】模式下我通关主线剧情大约100小时，剧情给人一种还没有结束的感觉，倒是很期待"安 梅茜"和"露娜"这对"苦命鸳鸯"的后续，不知在DLC中是否有提及。来自"艾丽"一行人的不公正遭遇能够体现出开发者对于现实中的映射。
[b]=++【游戏机制丰富多样】[/b]
不同的职业可搭配不同的天赋和技能，可玩性很高，有的附加天赋效果需要玩家去猜才能凑齐。再加上非常多的状态效果和装备效果
[b]—==【某些剧情任务和场景己方AI动作不明确】[/b]
比如在"第四章--决意--雪上加霜"中，有一次凯莉的刷新位置离"火花王呐故立"非常近，我方小队完全跟不上救援，凯莉已经处于"完全隐蔽"状态，仍然直接跑到敌方正面攻击，导致其被击败，任务直接失败。在战斗镜头45°下某些场景由于树木和建筑的遮掩，可能会导致误操作
[b]=++总体而言推荐游玩[/b]
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果我们准备的游戏内容能愉快地填满你的时间，那对我们来说也是很大的乐趣。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561197967662463', 'num_games_owned': 557, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 9120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9120, 'last_played': 1681787833}
review: A hidden gem, 3d turn based tactics with memorable squad characters each with unique skills and subclasses. Load up your  team with their plot-related specialisations or tweak them with your favourite abilities. Skills can be equipped and unequipped, so game is great for experimenting with builds. Catchy music. Adjustable difficulties. Highly customizable swappable skills and synergistic skill sets, skills that proc off other skills and other squad members abilities, make the game feel really unique.  Not to mention a crafting system for weapons, armor, skills, drones, and later on pets (who fight).  Re-play missions to farm item drops and grind exp.  Currently 50% off, totally worth it!
developer_response:
Troubleshooter is a game that will be the birthplace of the games we're going to produce in the future. So we're trying to implement as much as possible through this game. We're glad that these systems all came together and gave you a good experience. We will study how we can further develop these systems and try to implement them in our future games.

Thank you for this review.

review:

developer_response:

author: {'steamid': '76561198296259149', 'num_games_owned': 82, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 15098, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15098, 'last_played': 1700882432}
review:
내가 한 게임 중 제일 오래한 국산게임. 
단점도 많지만 장점도 많았다.
1편에서의 스토리 떡밥이 2편에서 잘 풀리길..

2편에서의 바라는점. 

- 온라인모드를 제거하고 게임과 스토리에 올인  
- 언리얼 엔진을 100% 활용한 그래픽 개선  
- 몇몇 캐릭들의 성우 교체  (딱 집어 말하진 않겠습니다.)
- 텍스처(글씨) 로 대충 떄우는 특성들... 이펙트 효과  및 특수효과 개선 
- 적들의 얼굴 다양화 ( 얼굴은 다 똑같고 두건.대머리.안경 쓰는 수준 밖에 안되서 색깔놀이로 밖에 안보임) 
- 특성을 줄이고 스킬의 갯수와 다양성 필요 (쓸수 있는 스킬은 진짜 없고 매번 같아서 지겨움 )
- 전투 씬 및 각 종 애니매이션화 같은 연출 효과 (너무 밋밋하다고 해야할까) 
- 카일리도 디스트론 같은  다양한 종류의 머신 제작 (  드론 너무 멋이 없어 ㅠㅠ  )

사람마다 틀리지만 그냥 제가 느낀점이며 2편이 잘 나오길 바랍니다.
developer_response:
' 2편에서의 바라는점'

에서 언급한 부분들이 상당부분 저희의 계획과 부합합니다. 다만, 저희 팀이 외형적으로 전혀 변하지 않았기 때문에 아무리 상용 게임 엔진을 가져다 쓴다고 해도 천지가 개벽하는듯한 변화는 만들기 어려운 것이 사실입니다. 다만, '버려진 아이들'에서 지적받은 단점을 보완하고 '버려진 아이들'과는 다른 경험을 제공하자! 는 것이 저희의 목표입니다. 적지 않은 시간이 필요하겠지만 가끔씩 저희의 행보를 지켜봐 주세요. ^-^

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064036672', 'num_games_owned': 1064, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 4518, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3763, 'last_played': 1701019232}
review:
A srpg with deep systems that seems mainly inspired by xcom but there is a lot more melee in this game. The basic premise is that you are a para security force that helps maintain order and you mainly fight gangs. The game has a social dystopia that is often seen in recent korean games. There are cultists who worship spoons too. 

The strategic layer is not super involved and has you manage equipment and skills while also choosing areas to "sponsor" that give you rewards periodically based on their safety rating. The performance and progress of other players also affects security level which is neat. 

The combat mode often gives you generic police officers as well as your characters to take down gangsters. The enemy often vastly outnumbers you and eventually evolve to a point where they are a threat to you but not to xcom levels. The stages have difficulty levels and you can also choose an overall difficulty level that you can change in between missions. 

What's more unique to this game is that "perks" drop off enemy kills. As you level up, you unlock slots to put those perks in. You can also combine them to "craft" new ones. These perks also have hidden set bonuses that you discover as you play the game. 

This game has been getting weekly updates since it was released a few years ago. A true labor of love by a communicative dev. A sequel is also allegedly on the way.
developer_response:
The first impression of Troubleshooter by someone who knows XCOM will be the same as you mentioned:

"  systems that seems mainly inspired by xcom "

XCOM is a game that really represents this genre. Troubleshooter's basic combat system borrowed a system recognized by XCOM. From then on, we had to solve the big homework: 

" Building the originality of the Troubleshooter "

In order to establish the identity of the Troubleshooter, we have been combining various elements through game updates for over four years since the release of the game. So as you mentioned, the game started with TBS but is turning into SRPG.

What's important in RPGs is that as a character grows, it plays its role, and those individuals come together to form a team. And the team faithfully executes your commands to create a strategy and you get the pleasure of seeing it.

We think this is the best experience that Troubleshooter can give. And you already know that.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991577951', 'num_games_owned': 1180, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 14171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11212, 'last_played': 1701552447}

author: {'steamid': '76561198014648263', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 14647, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14647, 'last_played': 1700590957}
review:
I'm not big on writing up reviews but.. for this game, I'll make an exception because it's exceptional. 

There are extremely deep systems at work here that create endless opportunity for fine-tuning party member builds - if you're into that style of play, I promise you hours of fun/addiction. Add in purposeful replay options and huggable devs and you have a recipe for a very rare game.

Get it. Get it now.
developer_response:
" extremely deep systems at work "

We have not been able to create a feature for gamers that allows them to transform their character's appearance in a variety of ways. Instead, we have invested all of our development resources in creating the ability to set the character's abilities freely. Our efforts seem to have met your expectations, so we can start the day in a good mood today.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039759555', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 14292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14292, 'last_played': 1700841518}

author: {'steamid': '76561198806179578', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 20548, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19165, 'last_played': 1703840140}
review: 非常有意思的作品，制作组的态度，更新的频率以及有趣的内容让我感动，在如今这个浮躁的时代不可多得。我个人是希望能把故事继续讲下去的，当然你们有自己的考量。最后祝福你们，能够摆脱困境，越来越好。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

在这次游戏中，"纷争终结者: 被遗弃的孩子们" 的故事很有可能无法继续下去。 但这并不意味着 "纷争终结者: 被遗弃的孩子们" 的故事结束了。 我们没有告诉你的故事，在我们的未来开发中一定会延续下去。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198114391200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 9707, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9707, 'last_played': 1679294077}
review:
분명히 몇몇 단점도 있지만 이 게임을 추천할 만한 이유도 분명히 있다.

그중 가장 중요한 이유는 꾸준함, 

그로 인해서 발전할 가능성이 무궁무진하기 때문에.
developer_response:
저희의 살아남기 위한 노력을 좋게 평가해 주셔서 감사합니다. 

분명한 단점에 대한 개선과 미래의 가능성의 구현을 하나하나씩 구현하는 개발팀이 될 수 있도록 최선을 다할 것입니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993664749', 'num_games_owned': 205, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 65, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1700693472}
review:
Terrible excuse for a "game"

Worst tutorial experience I've ever seen with sound design that makes you want to rip your ears off.

I bought this to play a game, instead I got tortured for 30mins with pop ups.

I assumed it would hold my hand for a few turns and then I could play the level, but instead it gives you high level characters to fight trash enemies that do nothing on their turn and die after 1 attack for multiple levels while it forces you to read pop ups telling you the basic controls of a genre that's been out for over 30 years while adding nothing new to the formula.

Do not buy this game unless you've played ever other TRPG to death and absolutely need something new, I'm just refunding this and going to play Battle Brothers, War Tales or any other of the hundreds of TRPGs that respect you and let you actually play the game.
developer_response:
If the way a game is prepared doesn't suit your taste, you don't have to endure the inconvenience and continue the game. Games exist to delightfully fill one's time, not to be an object of patience.

It is true that the way we prepared the game is far from the current game trend. But not every game has to follow the trend. This is because someone may want to relax and enjoy the game with their favorite tea. Troubleshooter is tailored to those people's tastes.

It's a smart choice for you to refund the game. There are really a lot of teams in Steam that make games better than us and the games they've created are really great games. I don't want your precious money to be used to bother you. I hope you can heal the inconvenience you felt in the Troubleshooter through other better games.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054084348', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 18135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15397, 'last_played': 1701840886}
review:
One of my favorite games in recent years. Stumbled upon it randomly one day and was more than pleasantly surprised. The world, characters, and story are well crafted and lead to great world building. All of these combined for an experience that doesn't feel like the same old recycled stories, ideas, and tropes. The Development team has also been a great job constantly polishing the game to a better state. The two DLCs have been solid, and well worth playing.

Highly recommend this game if you like XCOM style tactics games.
developer_response:
Making a memorable game for someone is like winning a big medal for game developers. I imagine you experiencing all the things we've prepared and using those elements you're completely dominating the battlefield. That alone is fun for us.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087577677', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 9475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9318, 'last_played': 1709836612}
review: Tem elementos de RPG em construção de classes e equipamentos, uma grande variedade de missões e inimigos, uma história interessante, se um pouco confusa, e horas e horas de gameplay. É um do meus jogos favoritos, e está no pedestal com XCOM como um dos melhores jogos de estratégia em turnos que existe. Você não vai se arrepender.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

As you mentioned, we are actively introducing elements of RPGs to the existing TBS genre. As a result, Troubleshooter is approaching SRPG. We are really happy that our attempt seems to suit your taste. :D

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002161807', 'num_games_owned': 2840, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 8474, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8474, 'last_played': 1679207291}
review: I have 141 hours played and I think I'm pausing playing until I get a new PC. This game literally warmed my heart the first day of playing it. I was purely happy it was so good. I consider this an incomplete review. I will one day delete it and write a real review. When I someday complete the game, I expect this to be one of the top games I have. There are two DLCs that continue the game, the first of which is free. The developers intend to create a second game. developer_response:
We are so happy that you are enjoying playing our game!

Feel free to let us know if you have any questions or suggestions for improvement! We'll do our best to bring more pleasures.

Looking forward to your next review!!

We'll be praying for you to get a nice, new PC!

author: {'steamid': '76561198147621661', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 7785, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7784, 'last_played': 1700612567}

author: {'steamid': '76561198035849902', 'num_games_owned': 1122, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 73062, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72771, 'last_played': 1703008453}
review:
This game stands out as a gem in the realm of Korean tactical gaming. I found immense satisfaction immersing myself in countless hours crafting diverse builds and experimenting with team compositions. The intricate process of molding not just individual characters but entire teams added an extra layer of strategic joy to my gaming experience.

I willingly embraced the challenges of the cruel difficulty setting and can confidently assert that it's not only manageable but also significantly more enjoyable compared to other games. Navigating this level of difficulty truly hones your skills and sheds light on potential shortcomings in your meticulously crafted builds.

The narrative, while not without a few gaps, held its own, contributing to an overall enjoyable gameplay experience. The visual aesthetics, particularly the art, are commendable, though I must admit the character models occasionally left me feeling a tad uneasy. It's understandable, given the likely constraints the development team faced with limited resources. On the bright side, the game boasts a surprisingly low bug count – in fact, I can't recall encountering any significant bugs during my entire playthrough. Perhaps they were minor and slipped under my radar.

Primarily designed for solo play, the game does offer multiplayer options for those eager to engage in character-dueling shenanigans. It's essentially a battlefield where you can test the limits of brokenness in your character designs. Dive into multiplayer if you're keen on witnessing the glorious spectacle of characters gone utterly bonkers. Lastly I would like to add this is one of the few games that actually have a multiplayer option for this genre.
developer_response:
After reading your review, I thought you had a complete grasp of our game. And then I found your playtime the moment I was going to write you back. And I thought. 

There's nothing I can say to this gamer in terms of gamer experience.

Troubleshooter is a slow game. There is a process that must go through in order to create the state of the team I want, and to someone this may be considered an unnecessary process. Nevertheless, we would like to thank you for enjoying the whole process of the game. We look forward to continuing our relationship with you through the updates we will proceed with and the games we will produce in the future.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198324288252', 'num_games_owned': 370, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 8115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7520, 'last_played': 1703432615}
review:
Out of 349+ Games I have on Steam, this is my favourite and the only review I have written. That alone should speak for itself.

If you are one of those people who really like to master games or who say "You know a game is good when you need a calculator to really play it", then this game is for you.

If you like beautifully written stories and complex characters who all have their own stories and life in a beautifully crafted world and may even be able to make you cry (which no game has done to me before), then this game is also for you. 

If you like simple games, then please pass on this one.

Even when I was 80 hours into the game, I keept unlocking new systems. And I dont speak about little changes or QoL. I talk about unlocking new Characters with new abilities and new Systems that could be a game in themselves. 

You unlock a Character that is able to tame every creature in the game, turning them into allies which you can tame, customize attacks and even have stats depending on how you tame and evolve them. Or a Character that is able to use material you collect to build dronies which you can build out of diffrent parts and AI modules to customize to your playstile. Or just hack mechanical enemies to take control over them.

I would like to use a comparison to explain how complex this game is, but I dont know a game more complex. 

The first system you unlock is called masteries, which  in themself act like passive effects, which can be something small like "+10% crit chance", or something  huge like "you can move after killing a target without being spottet". There are 830 of these masteries you can obtain which in the right combination can further be combined into 532 mastery sets which strengten and or alter the effects of the corresponding masteries. And if done right, you can have a lot of masteries and mastery sets active simultaniously.

Because of that the Game will most likely completly overwhelm you, thats at least how it was for me. Trust me, you dont need to understand yet, the time will come.

But if you want to have an easier start, I recomend a youtuber named "LifeofAshuram - Troubleshooter", for guides on the different systems and character build showcases.
Or to get a hang of the skillceiling. Im at 125 hours and completed  the story without DLC. On normal difficulty im barely able to beat the hardest levels with a full team.

He does them on cruel, the highest difficulty, with ingame modifiers to make the game harder, using ONLY ONE character...

So let me add; If you like feeling like a noob after 125 hours of playtime, this game is for you.

In my opinion, this game is in no way inferior than known full price TRPGs like Fire Emblem or Final Fantasy Tactics and that for a pricetag of 22,99 or even 11,49 on sale. 

Or to put it simple: this game is a masterpiece and I cant recommend it enough.
developer_response:
We didn't want the non-combat elements in the game to be a secondary element that exists solely for combat. So we put a lot of weight on the characters' narratives. We feel rewarded because you seem to have enjoyed it.

The complexity of the game means that there are many elements in the game, but it also means that those who start the game need a certain amount of time to get used to it. Many of the features have been added through the updates we've made, but I don't think we've thought deeply about how we can use them conveniently. This is one of the homework that needs to be addressed in our future development.

Thank you for providing a good guide for gamers looking to start this game. We're trying to provide as much game information as possible to the game's help, but it's not as great as the video guide you recommended. I hope this guide will shorten the time required for new gamers to get used to the game and make it enjoyable.

Lastly, it is a great pleasure for the development team that Troubleshooter has become a game that has been reviewed by you. I hope there will be more games that are so good that you want to leave a review on your game list.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198382384397', 'num_games_owned': 184, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1700574950}
review:
스팀덱 사용자 입니다.
폰트크기를 조금더 키운 옵션이 있었으면 합니다.
나이가드니 글자가 잘 안보이네요
developer_response:
게임 '환경 설정' 의 '인터페이스' 에 '글자 크기' 를 통해서 글자의 크기를 조정할 수 있습니다. 다만...저희가 게임을 개발하고 있을 때는 스팀덱이 아직 등장하기 전이라 작은 화면에 대한 예측을 할 수 없었기 때문에 아무리 글자 크기를 크게 한다고 해도 분명한 한계가 있습니다. 저희의 미래 개발 과정에서는 스팀덱과 같은 핸드헬드 장치에 대한 고민 과정을 꼭 포함시킬 것입니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047029229', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1701332414}
review: 很不错的游戏。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果我们准备的游戏内容能愉快地填满你的时间，那对我们来说也是很大的乐趣。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198261414759', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 26487, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22989, 'last_played': 1703360753}
review: 遊戲還不錯，就是聖母婊的劇情不是普通的差。
developer_response:
( 這篇文章是在機器翻譯的幫助下完成的。)

遊戲的故事是開發小組認為遊戲最重要的要素之一，我們正在努力透過【分爭調整者】來實現這一點。 但是透過這次遊戲的製作,我們意識到了製作好故事是多麼困難的事情。 為了創造你可能喜歡的故事，未來的遊戲會說更多的故事。

感謝您的評論。

謝謝。

author: {'steamid': '76561197974101863', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 576, 'last_played': 1703394145}
review:
재밋습니다. 근래 해본 2만원대 게임중에 퀄리티 지리네요.

캐릭터들도 억지스럽지 않고 좋습니다. 
작가분 역량이 부족해서 무리한 대사를 남발하는 게임들 많은데 그렇지 않으면서도 캐릭터들 개성이 살아있는 것 같아서 좋습니다.
전투 시스팀이나 기믹들도 상당히 재밋구요.
아직 시작? 단계라 좀 더 해봐야 겠지만 지금까지 한 것 만으로도 충분히 추천할만 한 것 같습니다.

다만! 한가지 진짜 너무 아쉬운 부분이 UI가 너무 불편합니다. 전투 UI도 불편하긴 합니다만, 기지에서 UI너무 불편하네요.
뭐 어떻게 바껴야 한다 라고 말할 재주는 없지만, 특성 관리라던가 너무 이해 안가서 초반에 고생 좀 했습니다.

아 그리고 코스튬 더 나왔으면 좋겠는데, 지금있는 것들은 색깔놀이가 대부분이고 좀 안땡기더라구요. ㅎㅎㅎ

아무튼 재밋게 즐기고 있습니다. 이 개발사 게임은 저는 앞으로 일단 구매하고 볼 것 같습니다.
재밋는 게임 만들어 주셔서 감사하다는 말씀 전하면서 이만 또 게임하러 갑니다.
developer_response:
" 특성 관리라던가 너무 이해 안가서 초반에 고생 좀 했습니다. "

저희가 가장 많이 지적받고 있는 사항 중 하나가 UI 인 것을 고려하면 평가를 쓴 분의 감이 틀리지 않음을 증명합니다. 사실 UI 에 빠진 기능은 없습니다. 다만 저희가 너무 기능성에 중점을 둔 나머지 사용 편의성은 그에 미치지 못하였습니다. 차기작에서는 더욱 나은 모습을 보여드리기 위해 심사숙고 할 것입니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561199046477489', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 17178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17100, 'last_played': 1710521734}
review: 最初はキャラクターのボイスに違和感があったけど（日本語翻訳等ばっかりしてる為）、めちゃくちゃ面白い
developer_response:
( 以下の内容は機械翻訳の助けを借りて作成されました。)

日本の声優さんたちの実力は海の向こうの韓国でも定評があります。 韓国でよく知られている日本の声優も多いです。 しかし、そのような方々を雇用することは、私たちのような小さな独立ゲーム開発チームにとって事実上不可能なことです。 将来のいつか、私たちも素敵な日本の声優たちの演技を提供できるように、ゲーム開発にもっと力を入れていきます。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561197993883579', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 34260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33541, 'last_played': 1707570657}
review: It's a very deep customization and team building game, but it takes awhile to get into that aspect of the game.  Much better and any other X-com style game I've played.  The problem is the scaling of abilities.  It takes too long and discover the masteries, so that you can actually customize your characters.  So you just have to keep grinding to find the mastery.  For new players, I recommend you keep adjusting the difficulty level for the missions.  The game gets much better after you've spent many hours into it.
developer_response:
We've been updating Troubleshooter for over four years, and I think the number of content in the game is never small. However, there is a learning curve for gamers to access all of the content in the game and to handle it seamlessly. As you say, gamers need time to get used to Troubleshooter. 

This was tolerated in the past, but it can feel frustrating in the current gaming trend. I don't think every game has to follow the trend. However, game development teams should not neglect their efforts to save gamers precious time. We will also try to create results to offset these shortcomings through future development.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199564799009', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5203, 'last_played': 1699334599}
review:
턴제 전략 RPG겜이 취향에 맞는 사람들한테는 굉장히 재밌을거임

아이템 파밍하는 재미도 쏠쏠하고, 특히 특성 조합 맞추는 재미가 쏠쏠했음

RPG요소도 강해서 템맞춰주고 특성판 제대로 끼워주면 적진 한복판에서 혼자 무쌍짓도 가능해져서 성장하는 재미가 있음


단점은 동료가 한명씩 해금되는데 덕분에 극초반에는 움직일 캐릭터가 거의 없어서 많이 지루함

물량이 상당히 많아서 경보터져서 전맵의 적이 몰려오면 게임속도를 최고로 올려놔도 턴 돌아오는게 굉장히 오래걸림

메인퀘스트 이외에도 서브맵에 다양한 서브스토리 + 신규 몹들이 있는데, 따로 알려주질 않아서 대부분 지나쳐버리는게 아쉬움

스토리가 읽는맛이 좋기는 한데, 중간에 탁 끊겨버린 느낌이라 후속작이 기대되지만 언제나올지 몰라서 찜찜함
developer_response:
마지막에 지적해 주신 단점 3가지는 저희가 트러블슈터를 출시한 이후부터 지속적으로 지적받고 있는 사항입니다. 여러차례 이에 대한 보완 업데이트를 진행했지만 단점을 없애는 수준에는 이르지 못했습니다. 이것은 저희의 소중한 게임 개발 경험이 될 것이고 저희의 미래 개발에서 이를 반복하지 않도록 모든 팀원의 머릿속에 각인시킬 것입니다.

큰 단점에도 불구하고 장점 또한 언급해 주셨고, 좋은 평가를 통해 작은 게임 개발팀에게 앞으로 나아갈 힘을 주신 것에 대해서 감사의 말씀을 올립니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561199168381671', 'num_games_owned': 45, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 24138, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20327, 'last_played': 1705834837}
review:
差不多340小时全成就，天赋组合的搭配很有意思，虽然有些组合天赋过于强力，很多天赋又特别垃圾，同样的问题也体现在职业上，从DLC开始就特别明显，每个人的职业和天赋（[strike] 疯狂的野兽+最后的顽抗[/strike]）基本上固定下来了，因为另一个职业垃圾到玩不了或者根本不想玩的程度，导致团队的职业、职责的多样性就降低了很多，很多时候其实就靠那么几个人打。
总体来说问题不大，还是买了全服装DLC支持，希望下一个DLC或下一部作品能改进吧。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

" 因为另一个职业垃圾到玩不了或者根本不想玩的程度，导致团队的职业、职责的多样性就降低了很多，很多时候其实就靠那么几个人打。"

开发团队追求的最大目标是突出个别角色的优缺点。 玩家会以此为基础,根据情况组建团队解决问题。 所以你指出的缺点真的是个大问题。 也许我们应该从头开始重新思考我们的游戏设置。 但是在游戏几乎完成的现在状态下,很难做出大的变化。 我们一定会记住这一点,以免在我们未来的发展中重复同样的错误。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198817989803', 'num_games_owned': 76, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 28849, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28849, 'last_played': 1699937884}
review:
I don't write reviews.
Ever.
Troubleshooters is an exception somehow.

This game is fantastic.
Nothing is a 10/10 but this is pretty damn close.
Made by six incredibly talented people no less.
I've wanted to express this for almost a year now but i thought it would be fitting to wait until the ending of Crimson Crow.

My only regret is not paying full price, instead buying it on discount last thanksgiving.
I pray my praise passes the language barrier unscathed.


Though this may be my only chance to ask since the devs are Chads and respond to every single review;

So what is the point of Shooter Street?
Side quests and immersion sure but the MMO type multiplayer seemed out of place.
Don't get me wrong, I have no issues with the multiplayer but the jump to a pseudo MMO hub was odd.
developer_response:
First of all, thank you for enjoying our game! And your review  keep us challenging ourselves!!

In the past, we wanted to provide a place where players could play and interact with each other after the ending scroll, using their characters in the game, which is why we introduced an online mode when we first started developing Shooter Street. However, it's just currently a space where only some content such as "Joint Training' and trade due to our lack of competence.

In a next game, we're going to try to make it less greedy and more complete so that we give more fun to players. Despite it, in the current game, we also have a plan  to evolve shooterstreet to add more enjoyable contetns.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009089996', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 11548, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11548, 'last_played': 1699828180}
review:
For a turn-based strategy game this is top tier. If you enjoy these kind of games, get it. 
Read on for more details, but seriously, just get it. 

My review is late because I purchased this game while it was in early access. Played through it and enjoyed it, but the story wasn't finished yet. Then life took hold and I forgot about it, years later I was still getting updates from Steam and decided I would check it out again after I finished school. I've now completed the game and both DLC this week. It was so good I felt like I was doing the game a disservice if I didn't share how impressed I was.

The amount of character customization starts out a bit limited and scales to nearly overwhelming. If you are a little OCD about trying to get the most out of your characters you will be googling some helpful videos and guides. Otherwise you can experiment with trial and error. 

A large part of customizing your character is slotting in 'skills' called masteries. The descriptions are pretty good and straight forward for the most part, but what happens is if you equip a correct combination of 4 you unlock a 'bonus' mastery that doesn't take up one of your precious mastery slots. There are over 800 of these masteries, which opens up a huge rabbit hole of possible combinations and theory crafting. 

Your roster of characters keeps growing and the story progresses and the roles you assign characters is allowed more fluidity. Each character also has 2 advanced classes they can switch back and forth between with potentially very different play styles and mastery choices.

Eventually there is equipment, crafting, pets, and drones. Even relationships between characters that can allow them to support each other in ways that are enjoyable to watch. Such as when an enemy goes to attack one character and gets shot and killed by 2 other characters before they even get the shot off.

The amount of depth for the ways the enemy can destroy you is mind boggling. Each time I thought I'd made an invincible character they would show me I needed to start over. I played on normal and even then the boss character in each scenario could and would often 1 shot my characters. This was almost always my own impatience, but a constant reminder that I needed to use my team in concert and as a unit.

The things I didn't like:
There is no manual saving, the game saves constantly, so it'll pick up right where you were when you left if you exit at any time, even in battles. This wouldn't be so bad, but to learn a game I often experiment to see how things work. I couldn't do that here without most likely failing a mission. Like when I tried out poison gas for the first time, it hung around like a smoke grenade giving them a -40% to my long range accuracy while doing very little damage, so I used my precious turn to give them a buff. I like to try and experiment and the lack of ability to manually save discouraged that until after you beat the game. I only play in offline mode and think it should be allowed there. There is an online mode I didn't try out so will not comment on.

Probably this biggest announce I had is that the game takes up 20% of my processor power at all times. If I'm just looking at the mastery list, it is running full steam. I have a super high end $5k Alienware desk top and I've never heard the fan come on to cool it until I played this game. There is no ideal state, it is always doing way more than it needs to in the background. I don't have a steam deck yet, but I watched a video review that said it was laggly and unplayable on the steam deck and I suspect this is the reason why. 

These 2 issues are my only real complaints and do not actually stop the game from being the masterpiece it is. I noticed some other reviews commented on the story being hard to follow or understand, maybe that was patched before I played it but there was very little of that in my play-through. A few things go unresolved or unanswered, but they could easily be addressed with a future DLC. Like there are some bad guys that ran away that I want to tear apart and have it reflect in the story.  

If you got all the way here, thanks for staying with me. It was a lot of words to say, BUY THIS GAME! Even if the price wasn't so reasonable it would be well worth the price and you're in for MANY hours of fun and pain.
developer_response:
" I purchased this game while it was in early access. "

More than four years have passed since we launched Troubleshooter on Early Access. First of all, I would like to thank you for purchasing our game and playing until the end of the game without forgetting the Troubleshooter.

" character customization "

The limitations of the graphic resources we can create are clear. Therefore, it was impossible for us to implement the character appearance customization function of the A-class developer. So we put our heart and soul into character performance customization. This is embodied in the mastery system and the ability system. It's true that it takes time to become familiar with this system. You seem to have completely grasped this system and used it to truly enjoy the battle.

" equipment, crafting, pets, and drones "

Someone may feel burdened by these factors. That's why we wanted to categorize these factors as thoroughly selective. But access to these factors still needs to be improved. In order to make your time using the above factors more enjoyable, we will not stop improving the above factors in the future.

" I couldn't do that here without most likely failing a mission. "

I agree with you about the inconvenience you feel. We are being asked to use VHPD's training ground to create a space where we can test various mastery and capabilities. We have been using all of our development resources to develop DLC so far, and many new feature development requests have been put on hold. Now we're going to start a practical discussion of these features that have been put on hold.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198257130439', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 798, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1707331999}
review:
No que diz respeito a ação do jogo, é bem legal. Segue o modelo consagrado do XCOM. Os gráficos não são uma obra de Da Vinci mas estão a contento. 
No que diz respeito ao tempo entre missões, muuuuuita caixa de diálogo com conversas bobas, infantilizadas e que pouco acrescem ao início do jogo.  
Os menus também não são um ponto forte do jogo. É possível se perder com eles no início do jogo mesmo com o tutorial para ajudar. Depois de estabelecido o escritório do Troubleshooter, os menus se tornam uma confusão só. O menu de "Mastery", por exemplo, tem vários pontos não explicados e nem um pouco intuitivos, e não haver a opção de língua portuguesa atrapalha quando não se é fluente em inglês.
Outro detalhe que não agrada:  não é possível personalizar os personagens. Sendo um jogo que foi pensado para ser jogado OnLine, customização deveria ser um elemento a ser considerado importante pelos desenvolvedores, afinal, é assim que bons jogos online dão aos seus jogadores os meios para criar sua identidade na rede. Senti falta de poder mudar tudo nos personagens disponíveis, para dar à equipe um pouco da minha personalidade. Em jogos similares, é possível mudar desde nome, trajes a cabelo, cor de pele e gênero. Em troubleshooter não. No máximo, muda-se a cor do traje.
Eu não me agrado do modelo mangá de animação fora da batalha, mas isso é pessoal e certamente há quem goste do estilo.
Apesar de alguns detalhes negativos, eu recomendo o jogo. Para quem gosta de tática por turnos, o jogo cumpre o que promete. Tem potencial para ser melhorado e espero realmente que seja. Comprei em uma boa promoção e acho que valeu o montante pago.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

Troubleshooter was inspired a lot by XCOM. At the same time, Troubleshooter had to solve homework that had to show something different from XCOM. That's why the more gamers who love and enjoy XCOM, the more difficult it is to accept the sense of heterogeneity they feel in Troubleshooter. 

We wondered what many gamers would want from an independent game development team. One thing is for sure, I thought they wouldn't want a game that only changed the look of XCOM. Since then, we have made updates to establish the identity of Troublesooter.

And four years later, I think we have our own color. We're not going to stop developing games so that this color can be another special color, not a color that's been altered from XCOM.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044163078', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 9134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8298, 'last_played': 1704621784}
review:
劇情、音樂、角色設定都OK，但是有幾個致命缺點，買之前必須審慎考慮

1. NPC很爛，而且很拖時間
有許多關卡會配給警察NPC，你可以選擇手動操控或者讓電腦自動操控
然而，這些NPC基本上內建的天賦跟裝備就是打人跟抓癢一樣，被敵方格擋率幾乎100%
當場上有4-8隻警察的時候，整場遊戲大概就有1/3以上的時間在看他們移動、被打、打人像抓癢，浪費時間
完全是連砲灰都算不上的垃圾NPC，卻要消耗掉大量時間，有幾關還被設定成失敗條件(如果警察NPC全滅)
完全意義不明的設計

2. 格擋的效果太逆天
雖然這對敵我雙方都有效，但是在敵方身上就特別令人煩躁
基本一拳可以打1000的，爆擊可以兩三千的，被格擋就瞬間剩一兩百，變成抓癢
這導致敵方有幾種怪幾乎100%格擋的就是無限浪費玩家的時間
數值設定完全有問題

3. "衝擊場"跟"電光石火"這兩個天賦的效果根本做壞了
玩到中後期大概有一半以上的敵方會帶這兩個天賦
搞到反應射擊(自動補刀、警戒射擊等)對這些怪就是毫無作用
你要設定敵方有這個，那幹嘛設計反應射擊給我用???
衝擊場則是強制你一拳最多打掉他半條血，一樣是浪費時間的設計，完全意義不明

總之，只是爬劇情可以，但要刷裝或是玩更久就不建議了，除非你的時間多到很可以浪費的程度

另外，劇情過完說是episode 1結束，從遊戲釋出到現在也沒看到episode 2之類的
是爛尾了嗎?
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

很遗憾有些内容不合您的意。 但是如果没有这些，游戏的战斗将非常单调，只是数值支配一切。 我们彻底区分了享受游戏的故事和深度享受游戏。 为了享受游戏的故事,单独存在难度就是一个例子。 

游戏的故事会一直延续下去。 有可能开发出另一种DLC，也有可能开发出新的游戏。 不管是什么，现在登场人物和故事都会受到很大的影响。 一部电影，一部游戏，一部小说接连不断，在整个文化界随处可见。 我们也想成为其中之一。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198141567056', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 10228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9787, 'last_played': 1702115376}
review:
终于拿到了No.1纷争终结者的成就，有一说一最后一关的挑战性有些太高了。
非常优秀的RPG游戏，战棋只是一个载体，其实更像火炬之光，暗黑破坏神这种刷子游戏，刷到强力装备，天赋的感觉真的很爽
优点
1.庞大的天赋树系统，其实不看攻略玩游戏的话，每次摸索出新天赋组合的成就感是非常大的，看到缺一个天赋各种尝试有种猜字谜的感觉，非常对我口味。
2.一骑当千的快感，前中期割草是真的欢乐，后期摸索出连斩老板，气魄黑星各种乱杀也是很爽的
3.绝对丰富的剧情，任务和副本，能够支撑100个小时的游玩
不足
1.剧情上老板有点摄像头了，不是很讨喜，后面基本脱离了老板的故事，剧情经典挖坑不填，后面总是花大量篇幅描述反派，搞得我以为我才是反派来着。真正让人印象深刻的反派只有博士，本的流浪艺人团感觉莫名其妙的，可能是因为没在主线被打死的有原因？感觉会在二代成为某个boss。
2.后续关卡甚至有点像解密游戏，点名批评大猴子，连动太bt了，后排基本一秒融化，只能用不死魔女生抗，加上周围一圈恐怖的额小猴子，没想出什么好的刷法。最后一关的难度更是恐怖，4位高达的数值高到离谱，8000双抗，3000双攻，10000血，100格挡100闪避。。。第一次进去基本是开门杀，只能针对性配一套天赋，才能勉强抗衡
分享一下我过最后一关不死人的打法（开了高风险高收益）：艾琳在前面吸引火力，气魄+事前计划黑星歼灭射击把闪避高达秒了，莱顿把格挡高达用大招控住，老师放杀手印章充能大地螃蟹秒一个（注意放螃蟹之前要把监视吃完，不然幸运没了），剩下的人再集火揍死一个，基本就过了，博士纯菜鸡，我让贼妹去把他单杀了。旁边的白毁灭轮都是搞笑的，才500攻击基本在刮痧
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

" 其实更像火炬之光，暗黑破坏神这种刷子游戏，"

你的推测是正确的。 开发团队希望通过【分争调整者】让玩家在战棋的规则下享受刷子游戏的乐趣。 这是开发团队展示【分争调整者】独有的特征的意图。

1.
游戏中有很多登场人物，每个人都有属于自己的故事。 我们想通过他们的故事展示游戏的叙事，这有时也会通过恶棍讲述。 这一部分同时受到很多表扬和批评。 只是同意通过恶棍减少叙事的比重。

2.
我们想通过DLC与其他敌人展示战略。 我认为DLC除了延长现有内容的寿命外,还应该展现更多的东西。 只是应该同时准备对新事物进行充分的事前介绍和游戏难度的逐渐增加,但是这个部分我们没有充分准备。 我会把这次游戏经验作为宝贵的基础,努力避免重复同样的错误。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561197965916137', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1699549871}
review:
오래전에 사놓고 안했다가 이제서야 해봄 
턴제 게임이니 게임 진행느린건 호불호의 영역이겠지만
장면전환이나 대사같은게 느리다고 해야하나 플레이 외적으로 상당히 답답하게 느껴졌음
원하는대로 진행이 안되고 뭔가 턱턱 막히는 느낌의 장면전환이라던가에 답답함 느끼는 분들은 생각해보고 구입하시길
developer_response:
" 장면전환이나 대사같은게 느리다고 해야하나 플레이 외적으로 상당히 답답하게 느껴졌음 "

이 부분에 대한 저희의 최적화가 아직 부족했거나 최근 게임의 감성을 따라가지 못했던것 같습니다. 더 많은 대중들의 취향에 부합하는 게임 진행 방법에 대해 연구하겠습니다.

감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049853891', 'num_games_owned': 99, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 17510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12310, 'last_played': 1701599753}
review:
初看会觉得像XCOM，但上手之后就会发现这个游戏有他自己的魅力，确实刷装备和配天赋蛮上头的。
还有就是等一个中文配音或者日语、英文配音吧，韩语配音确实听起来好怪....
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

提供更多语言的配音员录音是我们真正想做的事情之一。 但是作为独立游戏开发公司，我们起用外国配音演员是非常困难的事情，而且判断他们的演技是否符合我们的意图更是困难的事情。所以这些事情都是由大型游戏销售公司代理的。我认为我们现在要做的是让游戏更加有趣，让大型游戏销售公司对我们制作的游戏感兴趣。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198165497831', 'num_games_owned': 239, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 6681, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6681, 'last_played': 1699453324}
review:
最高难度打到猩红乌鸦最后一关之前都畅通无阻。前面无非就是你秒我我秒你，要不就花点脑子解高台狙击手套娃。但是猩红乌鸦最后一关是什么东西？那几个精英毁灭轮是给人打的？个个都一下秒人，而最脆的毁灭轮都得让输出位打个四五轮才能打死。个个都杀人加速闪避加速，动一下还带一次警戒。我纯肉艾琳被一刀暴击几千，两条命的莱顿更是死了爬起来吃个借机然后接着死。黑机器单位吧，黑客技能快装满了，成功概率居然高达百分之三十几，sl黑客成功很有趣是吧？哦，确实挺有趣的，要不我也不会sl出连续两次黑客成功把这关过了。拿了毁灭轮的控制权后，就看着这些近万血的铁罐头互相几百几百的刮痧吧，操作极其无聊，打完后除了疲惫没有其他感觉了。
好评给前面所有的流程，希望以后不要再整什么数值怪关卡了。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

我们在制作DLC时,认为最重要的因素是新的角色、故事和新的战斗经验。 我认为新的角色和故事并没有脱离到现在为止的很多。 但问题是新的战斗经验。

不仅仅是外表上出现了新的敌人，我们给这些敌人带来了新的行为模式。 这迫使玩家使用新的天赋，到目前为止很好地压制敌人的玩家角色被迫改变。

任何尝试都不可能受到所有玩家的欢迎。 但是这种变化让我们玩家的反感比预想的要大。 我们将通过此次DLC深刻反省什么是更普遍的变化,并将其反映到未来开发中。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。
