author: {'steamid': '76561198273730947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 18993, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18993, 'last_played': 1699257572}
review:
This is possibly my favorite turn-based tactics game in terms of both gameplay and story/characters. For reference, my 2nd place ranking would go to XCOM EW or Solasta purely for tactics gameplay. I didn't care much for XCOM 2 because it felt soulless with the procedural generation and they removed my favorite feature from the first game, the jetpack. 

In Troubleshooter, the combat and mastery systems are excellent. The amount of skill masteries is mind boggling. This game requires some intelligence to figure out (without looking at guides), which is a breath of fresh air. Troubleshooter is a slow burn in the beginning to add team members and unlock masteries, but I enjoyed this feeling of progression and would not have preferred it otherwise. The player eventually has a huge and powerful team by XCOM standards in later missions. The characters in the story feel human and are interesting to learn more about and see their interactions with others. The characters are aesthetically pleasing, which is a great improvement compared to many modern western games, and I became emotionally invested in them. The world building is excellent. I like that the missions are hand crafted and not procedural generated. The art for the story scenes is great (and fully skippable for people with short attention span). The huge amount of content provides good value for the price of the game. My play time is only for one complete playthrough, including the DLC's and all side missions, but it did have a fair amount of idle time with the game in the background while I did other things. Overall, this game is a masterpiece and the developers seem like very cool people. I'm looking forward to the next game from them. Maybe it would be cool to play as the "bad guys" such as Vendetta and try to take over the world, although this would make it difficult for the game to be as wholesome.

Some things that could have been better: The Crimson Crow DLC was good, but I would have rather have had more story pertaining to the existing team members and more of a conclusion to their stories. Misty was cool, but I was already attached to the original crew. The difficulty also spikes significantly in the Mungo King side mission and the final story mission of the Crimson Crow DLC. I needed to look up the forums for advice on how to complete those two missions. I assume the devs designed it this way because of a small minority of whiners on the forums with OP mastery builds saying the game is too easy, but those two missions are significantly increased in difficulty compared to most other missions. I prefer the difficulty of the base game (completed all missions on "hard") and I don't mind that it's "easy" if you have figured out good tactics and mastery builds. I like feeling "powerful" in the game if it has been achieved through effort and intelligence. Maybe some tweaking could be done with the highest difficulty setting to allow for masochist satisfaction.
developer_response:
" but I was already attached to the original crew "

All the characters who join Albers' team have a story. It describes why they came to Valhalla and how they came to work with Albus. But not much is known about the background surrounding them. Maybe you want a story with these backgrounds and characters intertwined. We agree that there is a lot to be said about this. Our future development will have a lot of direct connection with the background now and the characters now. Through that, we will expand Valhalla's worldview.

" The difficulty also spikes significantly in the Mungo King side mission and the final story mission of the Crimson Crow DLC. "

We wanted to show not only new stories but also new enemies and ways of fighting through DLC. However, we were overzealous and failed to deliver enough time and advance information to players to prepare for new things. This caused many players to panic. This is entirely a mistake by the development team. We will remember this development experience to avoid repeating the same mistakes.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120048655', 'num_games_owned': 143, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 15387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15319, 'last_played': 1702166455}

author: {'steamid': '76561198043735850', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 10116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1000, 'last_played': 1704669458}
review:
Troubleshooters is best described as a JRPG with an XCOM battle system. While the game clearly shows that it is made by a small indie studio, it definitely holds up gameplay-wise. The animations and Soundtrack, while not hindering enjoyment, are quite rudimentary and repetitive. The english translation is clearly made by a non-native speaker, but is very understandable. Sometimes, weird formulations hinder my understanding of game mechanics, but other than that there is nothing blatantly wrong. All that said, the setting is interesting and the story so far is worth reading. 

Gameplay-wise it is quite different from XCOM, as the number of combatants are much higher, player and enemy numbers both exceed 10 pawns in any given engagement. In a single mission, the enemy count even in the early game is upwards of 30 enemies. Combat is much more forgiving as well, as even on high difficulties your characters can take a few hits no problem. The difficulty is highly customisable, with several difficulty levels and modifiers you can apply to missions. Everything lower than the highest setting is pretty easy though, although I have not gotten to later levels, where the difficulty might pick up. As for the modifiers, I have not tried activating any yet. Also, your key team members cannot die but take moral damage if they get knocked out, suffering from increasing mali in deployment.

Overall a very enjoyable experience, which is more accessible to casual players than XCOM. HIghly customizable characters and difficulty keep me interested. There also seems to be a large amount of story content, well worth even full price,
developer_response:
" as the number of combatants are much higher, player and enemy numbers both exceed 10 pawns in any given engagement. In a single mission, the enemy count even in the early game is upwards of 30 enemies "

Troubleshooter borrowed XCOM's combat system. We thought gamers didn't just want XCOM that changed the appearance of the character. We've been updating for the past four years to establish the identity of Troublesooter since we thought about this. The battle you've experienced with the Troubleshooter is the identity of the Troubleshooter created by these updates. 

This simply does not mean that there are many enemies that appear. As your character grows, you will be able to experience Hack & Slash on TBS. A single attack can cause numerous interactions and it changes the battlefield more dynamically. 

You can't feel anything like this right now. But as your co-workers grow and your characters grow and more mastery becomes available, you will be dominating the battlefield.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024172003', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4753, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3497, 'last_played': 1700997684}
review:
장점
1. 턴제 좋아하면 무조건 좋아할수밖에 없음
2. 각각 캐릭터마다 '특성'이라는 것이 존재하므로 전투컨셉을 스스로 잡을 수 있음

단점
1. 장비의 자유도는 많이 떨어짐
2. 시나리오 위주의 진행으로 호불호가 있을수 있음.
developer_response:
게임이 후반부에 접어들수록 특성의 다양성에 비해 특정 장비가 선호되는 경향이 크게 나타납니다. 저희가 캐릭터 별로 무기를 준비하는데 급급하여 한 캐릭터가 사용할 수 있는 다양한 장비에 대해서는 준비가 부족했던 것이 아니었는지 되돌아 보겠습니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130259971', 'num_games_owned': 235, 'num_reviews': 138, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1697214114}
review:
엑스컴을 재밌게 해서 국산 게임 중에 엑스컴과 유사한 게임이 있다는 말을 듣고 플레이해 봤어요
개인적으로 대화가 너무 오글거리고 유치한 느낌이라 버티지 못하고 하차했지만
캐릭터들 각각의 개성과 일러스트는 마음에 들었어요 👍👍
게임 컨텐츠도 많아서 취향이 맞는 사람들은 엑스컴만큼 재미를 느낄 수 있는 게임일 것 같아서 추천드려요
developer_response:

author: {'steamid': '76561198380469694', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 14209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14209, 'last_played': 1698913478}
review:
아주 재밌습니다 저의 취향에 딱 맞아서 너무 재밌게 했습니다. 
처음에 캐릭터가 아닌 NPC 조종하는 게 많아서 생각보다 지루한 느낌이 들더군요 .여러 컨텐츠들이 열리고 나서 할 게 많아서 그때서부터 시작이란 느낌이 들고 그 후에는 정신없이 게임을 했어요
특히 여러 특성이 많은 게 아주 재밌습니다. 계속 특성 이리저리 생각하다 보니 시간이 많이 지나가 버렸네요
거기다 야수포획도 아주 재밌습니다. 야수들 보면 포획생각밖에 안날 정도로 재밌다 생각합니다. 가장 귀찮은 부분이 야수 특성 맞추기인데 유전자 편집기가 생기면서 매우 만족했습니다 기지에 한 대만 있으면 좋겠다 싶을 정도입니다.
후반 갈수록 높은 곳에 저격수들이 많아지고 공격을 한 번 하면 사방에서 날라오는 반격이나 보복사격이 날라와서 급사하거나 턴 속도가 느리거나 조종하는 게 낮은 캐릭터들은 뒤에서 놀다가 몇 번 사용하기가 힘들었어요.   
적들이 가지고 있는 특성 중 엄폐이동이나 충격 장을 든 적이 많아지면서 한판은 괜찮은데 게임 특성상 보스파밍이나 특성파밍때문에 같은 곳을 몇 번 도는데 이런맵은 도감 채워야 하는데 많이 피곤하다는 느낌을 받았습니다.
마지막에는 보스보다 옆에 건담들이 훨씬 강하고 너무 단단해서 아군캐릭보다 체력비례딜이 있는 검은 꽃게 한 마리가 다른 아군캐릭 여러명있는거 보다 훨씬 건담을 상대하기 편해서 아쉬운 느낌을 받았습니다.
턴제게임이 취향이신 분들께 추천드립니다.
결론 : 건담만들고싶어요

author: {'steamid': '76561198082295035', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 6039, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2681, 'last_played': 1700046483}
review:
XCOM + 聖火降魔錄 / 2，可惜加的部分並不是把優點加起來，而是把缺點加起來，除此之外還加了一些獨創的缺點。

首先說說那個格擋吧，這大概是遊戲史上最低能的設計了。XCOM被戲稱為醍醐味的就是那個令人又愛又恨的命中率，然而這系的格擋系統讓你就算命中傷害也可以只剩下5%左右，醍醐味兩倍。高難度下敵方的血量狂升，相當於你必須要骰爆擊才能有該有的傷害，醍醐味三倍。知道XCOM為什麼說又愛又恨嗎?因為那就是平衡點，而這系統超過了平衡點，只剩下煩躁。

好嘛煩躁，你不想學XCOM給隨時存檔，也好歹學聖火給個限制次數的悔棋，當然是沒有。所以你可以打兩個小時之後被隨便一個敵人衝過來爆擊你人就沒了。
喔，我有沒有說這遊戲視野小到你沒有辦法估計對方的攻擊範圍?你們每個人的視線都只有大概二十五公尺嗎? 世界上有個東西叫眼鏡啊。

好嘛你可以說我git gud，那讓我就抱怨一點跟實力無關的東西。系統，有些系統看起來就是做到一半的未完成品，例如說那個轉職，基礎職業十六級，上級職業十六級*2，大概可以在五個關卡之內從零升到滿。技能每欄給四格但實際上只有幾招。沒有存在感的地區系統，沒有實際壓力的薪水系統，我玩了這麼久還是不知道有什麼意義的rank系統。
拜託，不要了的東西就拿掉，謝謝。

喔隊還有那個警察。一點屁用都沒有只能拿來當砲灰的廢物，拿著突擊步槍穿防彈衣的部隊一對一打不過拿手槍的垃圾。到底給這些部隊幹嘛?關卡好好設計不要無腦塞人行不行?我還沒打到後期一場就要兩個小時，一半以上的時間在看這些垃圾互戳。精簡一下，關卡做的精緻一點不好嘛?這遊戲可以很好玩的啊。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

【分争调整者】借用了XCOM的基本战斗系统。 因此，【分争调整者】上市后与XCOM相比了很多。 我们是独立游戏开发组，游戏玩家对我们这个小开发组的期望并不只是模仿XCOM的游戏。

自从有了这种想法后，我们为了打造与XCOM不同的【分争调整者】独有的系统而更新了游戏。 然后过了4年多的时间，我们正在寻找【分争调整者】独有的认同感。

XCOM是代表这个类型的优秀游戏。 开发团队也很喜欢XCOM。 而且你也一样喜欢XCOM。 对于这样的你来说，我们制作的系统可能会感到异质性。 但可以肯定，这是我们要走的路。 如果有一天你想体验其他SRPG，而不是XCOM的话，我们的目标是到时候制作一个替代游戏。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198112576879', 'num_games_owned': 49, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 7612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5492, 'last_played': 1699337915}

developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

我们收到了很多扩展 "好感度"，制作更多游戏内容的邀请。 只是我们最了解和最喜欢的游戏领域是 "战棋"。 我们开发团队的规模很小。 因此，我们总是被强迫选择和集中。 我们的选择是更加专注于 "战棋"。 如果我们集中于 "战棋"，开发组的规模进一步扩大，相信总有一天您想要的方向开发也会成为可能。:D

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198054350862', 'num_games_owned': 473, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 1731, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1498, 'last_played': 1700672456}
review:
This is one of those games that i'd call a rough diamond.

It's anime XCOM. Plain and simple.

If you're willing to overlook certain things (story can be hard to follow, localization needing serious improvements, font, UI, a tutorial system that comprehensively teaches the various systems) then diving into this game will surprise you with how much depth can be found.

Character build variety is insane. The mastery system allows you to dynamically shape and alter your character playstyle, and character classes also allow you to experiment a bit with interesting concepts you might have in mind for a character. It'll tickle your brain in a good way if you enjoy watching something come to fruition.

The music is.. O.K. I wouldn't call it particularly memorable or great, but it is serviceable. They played it pretty safe here, and I can't blame them. 

There's a lot of fat to chew on if you're down for it. I just think that admittedly a lot of people are going to put this game down pretty early on (much like I did) if the immediate results aren't satisfactory, and it takes a good while to get into the meat of the game.

Honestly if you stick with it, it only gets better.
developer_response:
What has always been pointed out to us since right after the game was released is that the first half of the game is so boring. In response, we also reduced the size of the map in the first half of the game and adjusted the number of enemies appearing. But this issue still seems to be unresolved. Nevertheless, I really want to thank you for giving strength to the development team through good evaluation.

As you already mentioned, the longer you play the game, the more interesting it becomes. You can recruit more colleagues and wear more mastery. Of course, we have more equipment ready. You're now getting out of the first half of the game. I hope you will check the last words of the review.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014706635', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 18900, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18900, 'last_played': 1698723801}
review:
I was assured by several people that I would love this game if I loved strategy games. I don't really have any affinity for XCOM. 

At first, I was overwhelmed and unimpressed. But, I gave it a few more hour,s and suddenly I found myself with over 200 played hours and investing in the DLC.

If you're the kind of person who loves customizing their units, unique abilities, reactions, buffs, and more, I can guarantee you'll invest several hours in the many systems that make everyone's experience fairly unique.
developer_response:
I'm so glad that Troubleshooter met your expectations. Your assessment made it clearer that the first impression of Troubleshooter was not very impressive. And I've come to realize that trying to inject too much into the player from the beginning is also a very bad thing. 

In our future development, we will consider these shortcomings carefully from the set-up stage.

Thank you for this review.

developer_response:
We are looking at Grinding and Difficulty in your review. 

Grinding is something we intended to do. However, the process of getting something makes a lot of adjustments to make the player feel bored or frustrated. Nevertheless, it seems that our efforts are not enough yet. So far, all updates have been the biggest goal to complete the Crimson Crow DLC. From now on, I will resume updating the convenience of the game that I put off.

The level of difficulty of the game can vary greatly depending on the level of difficulty you set. But you are a skilled player in this game because you already have over 100 hours of playtime. We're going to study closely which areas someone like you found particularly difficult. 

Thank you for providing a good review chart.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059369082', 'num_games_owned': 405, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 17756, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17756, 'last_played': 1698848562}
review:
真紅のカラスまでクリアしたのでレビュー。
ビルドなどの試行錯誤が好きな人にはどこまでもやりこめる、気づいたら時間が溶けている恐ろしいゲームw
1ステージに時間がかかるとか(ハクスラするには致命的...)、ドローンのモジュールドロップがなく情報獲得率でしか手に入らない(ラストのデストロン何体倒す必要が...)、DLCのスナイパー･銃持ちの支援射撃地獄、DLCからの難易度殿跳ね上がり、ラストのガン〇ム、ド〇、百〇？、マイスターのデストロン地獄、正式リリース前のデータ(１００時間位)が無くなってた、とか色々言いたいことはあるけど...それを補って余りあるくらい文句なく面白かった！！！間違いなく価格分以上楽しめた。キャラクター、ストーリー、音楽も良かった！グラフィックは...及第点w
でもストーリーが、大量にキャラが出てきた割にあまりストーリーに絡まず仕舞いだし、ここまで広げた風呂敷をきちんとたためるのかという不安があるけど次回作に大いに期待したい！
あと真紅のカラスのサントラは出ないんですかね？
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

ゲームに登場するキャラクターはそれぞれ自分の話を持っていて、この話が紹介されると、そのキャラクターは味方の仲間になります。 しかし、そのキャラクターの物語を構成する要素については、まだ多くのことが説明されていません。 開発チームはこれらの話をゲームの後続開発を通じて解いていく予定です。 多くの時間がかかりますが、私たちはヴァルハラの世界観を拡大し続けます。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198419980033', 'num_games_owned': 2632, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 21349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7512, 'last_played': 1702575605}

장점 : 할게 많다. 캐릭이 미형이다. 자기 나름의 특성을 조합하는 재미가 있다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079484498', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 5568, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1683, 'last_played': 1709817471}
review:
I love Xcom, I love Turn based tactics. I love anime. This game has it all 3. 

I've played dozens of missions and barely scratched the surface. There is so much to learn and still learning new things as I play. Getting new characters is slow which is understandable and i'm personally okay with it. I love the customization of characters so you can decide what kind of build you want with the masteries. The UI looked overwhelming and hard to navigate at the start but I got used to it easily. 

Highly recommended game!
developer_response:
It is true that there are many things you need to know in advance to have a fun experience of the game. Many people give up the game here. But you seem to be going through this process well. I'm sure you'll soon have more options and your Troubleshooter team to dominate the battlefield based on them.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027730807', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 26780, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20829, 'last_played': 1710598770}

author: {'steamid': '76561198327041430', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 31765, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17945, 'last_played': 1703643313}
review:
优点：上百种天赋搭配，只要有想法，就可以搭配出自己喜欢的作战方式。在研究的过程中很容易进入心流。当自己搭配的天赋在战场上印证时，那种成就感真的特别高！
缺点：由于战场地图很大，还有战争迷雾的存在，就导致不了解敌方布局的情况下，很多时间都浪费在了跑路上。让人有一种疲劳的感觉。
总结：瑕不掩瑜，绝对值得一玩儿的游戏！
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

你提到的缺点是游戏会消耗不必要的时间，这一点一定要改善。 另外，如果能够适当调整整体地图的大小和出现的敌人数量，我认为将会得到很大的改善。 在未来的发展之前，我们不会忽视改进现在的游戏。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198856064401', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 8382, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7935, 'last_played': 1698721070}
review:
とんでもない作品に出会った。
よくXCOMと比較されるが、XCOMをやったことがないので
FFタクティクスと似た感じだという印象。
DLC2でようやくすべて完結ということなのでレビューを。

（良いところ）
・ストーリーの良さ、キャラクターの魅力
　どんどん先が気になりついつい進めてしまう。
　キャラクターも深掘りされていて、個性があり愛着が沸く。
・中毒性の高さ
　ハマる人はとことんハマるような作品
　ビルドに凝り始めたらもう終わる。
・できることの多さ
　これはマイナス面にもなるが、モンスターを飼いならす、ドローンを強化
　などはやらない人も多かったと思う。
　しかし特性やモジュールなどを考えて始めるとこれがまた奥深い。
・ビルドの奥深さ
　これが難しい要素でもあり楽しい要素でもある。
　最強のビルドができたと思って違うステージにいくと虐殺されることもあり
　とにかく脳内で考える時間が多かった。
　試行錯誤が好きな人におすすめ。

（悪いところ）
・攻略サイト不足
　現代では攻略サイトを見ながら進める人も多いだろう。
　しかし日本語Wikiはあまり更新されておらず、参考にはなりにくい。
　個人の攻略ブログが頼みの綱でもあり、これがなければ途中で難易度的に諦めていたレベル。
・難易度の急上昇
　途中から明らかに難易度が上がり始め、何も考えずに進めると
　DLCに至っては何もできず即死するレベル。
　（困ったら攻略ブログのビルドをパクろう）
・日本語吹き替えなし
　これは非常にもったいないと思うが、金銭的にさすがに難しいか。
・１ステージに時間がかかる
　これは仕方がないがどうしても時間がかかる。
　対策として、全てを最速にして、音声、演出もできるだけカットすると良い。
　（レベルアップとアイテム取得はカットしても問題ない）

ハマる人はどっぷり浸かってしまう作品だが、
ストーリーが気になりどんどん深みにハマるのがズルい。
続編も製作中ということなので数年後世に出てくることを期待したい。
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

* １ステージに時間がかかる
これは、ゲームの発売直後から今まで私たちが解決できなかった代表的な欠点の 1 つです。 実は今のミッションも地図の大きさと登場する敵をかなり減らした状態です。 それにもかかわらず、この問題は依然として解決されていません。 もしかしたら、私たちの改善方向に致命的な間違いがあるかもしれないと思います。 私たちは問題の原因把握からやり直します。

* 日本語吹き
あなたの推測が正確です。 私たちは6人で構成された小さな独立ゲーム開発チームです。 そのため、ゲームの販売が少なくともチームが維持されています。 ゲームを発売してから、いろいろな言語の声優演技があればいいなという意見をたくさん聞きました。 特に日本語声優の演技に対する要望が多かったです。 それで、私たちも同じ分量の日本語声優の演技について見積もりをもらったことがあります。 その価格は、開発チームの 3 か月の維持費に匹敵する水準でした。 日本語の声優を雇うのは遠い未来のことになりそうです。

* 難易度の急上昇
これもまた私たちの失策です。 ゲームの後半部とDLCで新しい敵と新しいパターンを悩んだ結果、既存のものとは異質な結果が出て、誰かにとってはこれが興味深かったかもしれませんが、誰かにとっては非常に不快なことになるかもしれません。 私たちは後者を見落としすぎて、前者に没頭しすぎたようです。 これは私たちにとって大きな経験として刻印されています。 私たちの将来の開発で同じ過ちを繰り返さないように努力します。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198325828401', 'num_games_owned': 260, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 941, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 941, 'last_played': 1692892244}
review: 有兴趣出别的配音吗，日语啥的
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

支持更多的语言语音是一次愉快的体验。对此，开发组的想法也是一样。但是对于像我们这样的小独立开发组来说，这是一件非常不容易的事情。我们是开发专业的队伍，没有外语专家。因此从与配音演员联系开始，很难判断配音演员的演技是否是我们所希望的。

为了解决这个问题，需要和当地的游戏发行公司签订合约进行工作，但是像我们这样对小公司的游戏感兴趣的游戏发行公司几乎没有。最终开发组认为，现在只有更加集中于我们能做的事情。我认为，如果能够坚持不懈地做下去，总有一天机会会来的。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561199052640186', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 34, 'playtime_at_review': 1335, 'last_played': 1711468503}
review:
재미없다고는 못하겠고, 일단 계속해 볼 생각은 있음..

그런데 캐릭터 대사는 제 취향은 아니네요 ㅜㅜ 항마력이 조금 딸려요...

젤 아쉬운 점은 난이도 조절을 일반몹 강함보다는 숫자로 조절하려고 했다는 거..? 그럴거면 애드되는 무리 하나하나를 좀 쪼개놓던가 무슨 한 번에 열몇마리씩 붙어버리니까 내 캐릭터 조작할라면 체감상 몇분씩 기다리는 느낌임 도저히 못견디겠음...그게 제일 큰 단점 사실 이 리뷰도 그거때문에 조금 힘들었습니다.

이것저것 고려해봤을때 재밌긴 해서 계속 하긴 할거 같습니다. 

답변도 친절하고, 알려주신 옵션 덕분에 해결된 부분도 있고 해서 수정 글 답니다. 

고생 많으십니다, 좋은 게임 만들어주셔서 고맙습니다.
developer_response:
무엇보다 먼저 즐겁게 즐겨야 할 시간에 불편을 드려 죄송합니다.

[h3] 캐릭터 대사에 관하여[/h3]

캐릭터 대사라는 부분이 캐릭터 음성 부분이라면 해당 부분에서 취향의 문제가 큰 듯 합니다. 실제로 유치하다거나 오글거리는 의견만큼이나 만족하시는 분이 많아서 이 부분에서 저희가 다른 개선점과 달리 큰 대응을 할 수 없는 상태임을 이해해주셨으면 합니다. 물론 이런 결과는 저희 역량의 부족입니다. ㅠㅠ

[h3] 난이도에 관하여[/h3]

캐릭터 성장 빌드에 따라 1 vs 다수의 핵앤 슬래시에 가까운 전투가 가능한 설계로 게임이 만들어졌기에 게임에 익숙해지는 정도에 따라 많은 숫자가 난이도 설정에 주요 포인트가 된 부분이 있습니다.

이 과정에서 적을 빠르게 처치하지 못한 상태에서 벌어지는 적 다수의 행동의 지연을 줄이기 위해 "환경 설정" >"게임 플레이" > "아군 행동 빠르게 연출"/"아군 외 행동 빠르게 연출" 옵션을 사용하시길 추천드립니다!

또한 "게임 플레이" 옵션에는 익숙해진 정보 메시지들을 간략화하여 게임의 속도를 최적화하는 다양한 설정과 게임의 가시성 확보를 위한 설정 등이 존재합니다!

게임을 하면서 익숙해져서 지루해진 연출 등이 있으시면 간략화 하시면 게임 진행이 빠르게 진행될 것 입니다!


난이도 설정의 경우, 최고 난이도에서 빠르게 다수를 처치하려면 최적화된 특성판과 어빌리티 사용이 필요하며 이는 저희 전투에 매우 익숙한 분들이 하시는 난이도이기에 적이 많아져 클리어 시간이 늘어진다면 난이도를 낮춰 플레이하시길 권장드립니다!

여러모로 소수의 적과 대전하는 주류 턴제와 다른 부분으로 불쾌감을 드려 죄송합니다! 다만 대부분의 유저분들이 처음에는 익숙하지 않으셔도 익숙해진 이후에는 매우 빠르게 전투를 클리어하시는 경향이 많으며, pkh0812님도 충분히 그렇게 플레이 하실 것이라 믿어 의심치 않습니다!

[h3] 게임을 구입해주시고 평가를 달아주셔서 감사합니다! [/h3]

많은 부분 부족한 게임이지만 많은 분들이 즐겁게 플레이해주시는 상황이니 불쾌한 마음을 조금 거두시고 저희가 준비한 많은 이야기와 다양한 전투를 즐겁게 즐겨주시면 진심으로 감사드리겠습니다!

그리고 무엇보다, 저희 게임을 찾아주셔서 진심으로 감사합니다!

불쾌한 부분을 느끼게 한 점은 더 개선하여 더 많은 즐거움이 쉽게 다가올 수 있도록 최선을 다하겠습니다!


즐거운 주말 되시길 바라겠습니다!!

author: {'steamid': '76561199105308454', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 52074, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52070, 'last_played': 1705681857}
review: 2년이 넘는 긴 시간동안 즐겁게 플레이했습니다. 스토리던 그래픽이던 완벽할순 없겠지만 srpg라는 장르를 알려준, 제 생애 최고의 게임입니다. 특히, 커뮤니티 제보 했을때 성심성의껏 답해주신점도 감사했습니다. 차기작이 나오려면 많이 걸리겠지만 기대하고 있겠습니다. 늘 응원합니다
developer_response:
부족한 게임을 오랜 시간 즐겨주신 은혜 더 좋은 작품으로 보답하겠습니다!

그리고 차기작 준비하면서도 꾸준히 현재 게임이 더 많은 재미를 줄 수 있는 부분을 찾아 업데이트 하도록 하겠습니다!

저희에게 게임을 계속 만들 용기를 주셔서 감사합니다!

author: {'steamid': '76561198043030394', 'num_games_owned': 355, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1686, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 710, 'last_played': 1700556960}
review: 재밌는데 최적화가 심각하긴 하네요
developer_response:
저희의 최적화가 기대에 부응하지 못해 죄송할 따름입니다. 죄송하지만 그래픽 설정을 조금씩 낮춰가면서 최적의 설정을 찾으셔야 할 것 같습니다. 그 중에서도 특히 '렌더링 스케일' 은 게임 프레임에 큰 영향을 미치므로 이 값을 조정하는 것이 큰 도움이 될 수 있습니다. 또한 게임이 설치되어 있는 디스크가 하드 디스크 드라이브라면 게임 설치 폴더를 SSD 로 이동시키는 것도 게임의 일부 구간에서 성능 향상을 기대할 수 있습니다.

게임에 대한 업데이트를 이어가는한 게임의 최적화 또한 작업 대상입니다. 나아지는 모습을 보여드릴 수 있도록 저희가 최선을 다하겠습니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198178230510', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 9957, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9957, 'last_played': 1698262518}
review:
Luego de haber pasado por todo el juego + ambos DLCs en la dificultad normal, puedo decir que el juego tiene una historia buena que contar. 

Tal vez la historia no sea la quinta maravilla del mundo pero tiene bastante que contar y los personajes te terminan cayendo bien con su jugabilidad o personalidad, aun si estos caen dentro de varios clichés de series animadas. Las misiones pueden durar 30 minutos por lo bajo una vez que alcanzas los últimos capítulos pero ahí es donde debes de saber distribuir a tus personajes. Ademas de que hay bastante mecánica, al punto de que aun en las ultimas misiones de la historia principal puede que estés aprendiendo una o varias a la vez. 

Y ni hablar de los DLCs que es donde la dificultad se dispara de una manera increíble, con nuevas habilidades y personajes jugables; ademas de ser las misiones que más exprimen las mecánicas si es que no las aprendiste durante la historia principal, sin mencionar varios enemigos normales que son casi inmortales. Agregando que uno de los DLCs esta gratis.

Espero de verdad que los desarrolladores logren mucho más con su siguiente juego, porque encuentro que Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children tiene bastante pasión y cariño.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

I want to say thank you first to you who have experienced everything in the game. It takes a lot of time to experience all the stories and content of Troubleshooter. The story of Albus, his colleagues, and the world in which he belongs, is far from over. We will further expand the world of Valhalla through future development. I really hope you can join me on that journey as well.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198330349254', 'num_games_owned': 44, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 4155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4155, 'last_played': 1698260410}
review:
70 часов.. Я не одолел дополнение к игре из-за АХУЕННОГО баланса. Спасибо за сгоревшую жопу.
Что можно сказать про игру?

Из плюсов

-Скиллы персов. Занимательно собирать нечто ебанутое из персов.
-Бои. Задачи в СЮЖЕТЕ почти все всегда занимательные. Ты не страдаешь чувством того, что тебе скучно. Все, кроме пару миссий действительно интересно проходить. И не напряжёно. От хкома тут только обертка, так что не обманывайтесь на это. Играйте в оригинальный X-com. Опыт от баланса получите совершенно другой.
-В целом приятная стилистика новеллы. Персонажи нарисованы хоть и необычно, но интересно.
-Сюжет. Не ровный, в итоге ничего не дающий в плане ответов, но истории персонажей все таки интересны. Преимущественно.
-Если вы любитель боев на часок-ваш вариант.
-Халявное ДЛС. Оно... есть. Уже хорошо. Оно не сбалансировано, но оно есть и его можно пройти. [spoiler] рискните  [/spoiler]
-Музыка

А теперь к минусам.

-Баланс. Его нет. Скиллов много, енами живучие и сильные. Ты либо ваншотишь. Либо будут ваншотать тебя. Таких бесячих противников поискать надо. А иногда и нормально, со свистом проходишь.
-Система гринда скилов. Ты выбиваешь скиллы из противников, потом их тратишь либо в перса, либо на создание нового скила.
-Система крафтов. Шляпа. Расходники надо крафтить постоянно. Зачем? Хз. Крафт предметов не нужон. Крафт дронов едва ли.
Крафт скиллов... Боже.. Лютый гринд.
-Нет русского языка. Или он есть, но типо в бете. Переведено не все.
-Графика. Боже...Не смотрите на лица персонажей. Вообще. Графика весьма сильно средняя.
В итоге можно сказать, что игра так-то не плоха. Купил ее за 300р и не жалею.

В ней есть проблемы. Проблемы иногда серьезные. Иногда нет. Но в целом играть можно. Даже с удовольствием.
Будет скидка-берите. Богатый? бери и за 800. В игре можно провести недельку другую за игрой. Пройти сюжет или пару миссий после. Есть онлайн режим. Хз зачем он там нужен. Я не тестил, да и пинг там..
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

Many people, including me, would agree with that even if you wrote a bad review about Troubleshooter because of the shortcomings you mentioned. Nevertheless, I think the reason why the game was well-received was probably that the price of the game played a big role. 

This is more like a warning to the development team than a relief. If we don't get good reviews for the content of the game and the low price is good, it means that our development is not that good. 

We will strive to become a game development team that is evaluated not by the price of the game but by the quality of the game.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105144703', 'num_games_owned': 797, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 485, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 485, 'last_played': 1698242191}
review: 爱死这萨克斯和爵士了
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在机器翻译的帮助下完成的。)

你可能会觉得游戏的前半部分进展很郁闷。 在这种情况下，可以使用以下设置来加快游戏的进行速度。

1.
请考虑在游戏选项中使用加速游戏速度的选项【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】。你可以从【选项】 → 【环境设置】 → 【游戏进行】中找到上述选项。

2.
不要增加游戏的难度。 游戏中的所有任务，只要完成一次，随时都可以重新挑战。 你不用一开始就选择高难度。

3.
请先完成 "剧情任务"。 请尽快完成"剧情任务"，引进同事。 之后进行 "大型事件" 和 "普通事件" 是推荐的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198093374657', 'num_games_owned': 306, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1698217717}
review: Can't say I've played enough of it, but so far it's akin to XCOM and I love the anime artstyle. Although the lack of character customisation kinda sucks, it's made up with its diverse customisation in other areas such as character builds and dialogue choices.
developer_response:
Customizing the appearance of a character is one of the functions we lack. And it needs the ability to create a certain level of graphic resources. We are a six-member independent game studio. There is only one person in each field required for game production. For this reason, we had to focus more on the building of the character than on the appearance of the character. I think you can feel the joy of character building as you continue to play the game. :D

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038187044', 'num_games_owned': 106, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 19862, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19862, 'last_played': 1697997986}
review: Хорошо. Очень хорошо. Хоть на всё ушло больше 200 часов я очень доволен. Мне всегда было над чем подумать. Сердцевина игры это билдостроение. Создание за счет пассивных и модифицирующих баффов создать убермашины по уничтожении врагов. Для этого надо подкачаться, создавать синергии. Всё взять не дают, а самые вкусные бонусы засекречены. Противники тоже не простые. Надо адаптироваться под их особенности. В общем молодцы. Жаль конечно что сюжет очень душный. Много слов о ни о чем. И разработчики заявили, что следующая часть будет про других персонажей. Плохо когда нам рассказывают про зарождение легенды, но не про её историю. Возможно сказалось, что игру разрабатывали много лет. Во время раннего доступа и после релиза.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

If Troubleshooter made you think about the character build and the result of it made you happy, that's why we make the game. You fully understand the game's core system and it seems to be taking full advantage and dominating the battlefield. We will not stop developing games so that we can introduce you to more advanced games.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198261061783', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 9672, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9672, 'last_played': 1681054041}
review:
令人惊艳的游戏内容，博大精深的故事背景，持之以恒的维护频率，
竟然在我几乎玩遍了各种SLG类游戏后，仍能在心里给这款韩式二次元战旗游戏留下一方位置。
他们的勤奋，甚至曾一度让我好奇，
一家公司在这么多年对一款相对冷门游戏的痴迷中，是如何生存下来的。
在越来越浮躁和快餐化的市场（世界）中，这种精神和情怀，
令我充满敬意与信任，这已经超出了游戏带给我的感动。
所以请你们继续加油，作为一个玩家能做的就是在未来的道路上，
继续支持你们！！！期待你们更有趣的作品！！
谢谢你们让我玩到这款游戏！
————原谅我在拥有这款游戏5年后，才写下这篇迟到的评测~
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

你写的评价和评论我都看过了。 【分争调整者】上市已经很长时间了，Steam有很多优秀的游戏。 尽管如此，还是没有忘记我们，再次来到这里，非常感谢。

我们是一个规模较小的独立游戏开发团队。 因为不受外部投资,所以可以按照我们想要的方式开发游戏,但由于不稳定的开发环境,游戏开发存在很多限制。

但是因为有像你一样理解我们意图的游戏玩家，我们今天也可以继续开发游戏。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198358038739', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1700414253}
review: 支持
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果我们准备的游戏内容能愉快地填满你的时间，那对我们来说也是很大的乐趣。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198971404405', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 126718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126029, 'last_played': 1705325216}
review:
간단히 말해 정말 재밌습니다.
해당 평가에 대한 신뢰성은 저의 플레이 시간이 말해주리라 믿습니다.

다만, 신규 유저에게 있어 허들이라고 할만한 점은 사람에 따라 초반이 상당히 지루할 수 있습니다.
이 게임의 가장 큰 재미 중 하나는 '특성'을 조립하여 본인이 의도하는 방향으로 유닛을 커스텀하는 것에 있습니다.
그러나 초반에는 조작 가능한 유닛의 수도 적으며, 조합 할 수 있는 특성의 수 및 특성칸 자체가 제한적이기에 이러한 재미를 느끼기가 힘듭니다.
달리 말해 게임의 초반만 잘 넘긴다면 이만한 게임을 찾기 어려울 정도로 재미있게 즐길 수 있을 것이라 생각하며, 적극 추천합니다.
developer_response:
보잘 것 없던 저희 게임이 지금까지 계속 개발할 수 있었던 원동력은 녹차님과 같은 분들이 저희 게임에 관심을 가져주시고 플레이 해주신 결과입니다.

녹차님과 같은 분들의 관심이 없었다면 개발팀은 진작에 이 게임을 개발하는 것을 포기했을 것입니다.

진심으로 오랜 시간 동안 저희 게임과 함께 해주셔서 진심으로 감사합니다!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198044729400', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 88149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86397, 'last_played': 1705537382}
review:
Many people call this game "Anime Xcom" but I feel it is unfair. Xcom -at least the modern iteration- wishes it had the character customization this game has, and while it has no base management to speak of,  the battle layer is also a cut above xcom's, with things like the type of terrain and even the time of day having strategic value. There is also a dynamic turn system instead of a static one (Kinda like the Tactics Ogre games, only much more ingrained in the gameplay, to the point where it actually becomes a key resource to manage in order to make lategame battles smooth). 

All this can be overwhelming for a new player at first, but it shows that the only similarity with Xcom is that they are both turn-based games. Troubleshooter has a very unique identity and is a gem of a game that definitely deserves more popularity.
developer_response:
" Troubleshooter has a very unique identity and is a gem of a game that definitely deserves more popularity. "

Unique identity. Our updates over the past four years have only been to see this word in our assessment. Ever since we borrowed the XCOM way of fighting, it's been our biggest goal to build an identity unique to Troubleshooter. And we didn't know if we achieved this goal. It was only through external evaluation. Today, we confirmed through you that our development direction is not wrong. We will further develop this through future development.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198349652809', 'num_games_owned': 171, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 10674, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2870, 'last_played': 1705275316}
review:
The type of game where if you can get over the weak graphics and subpar English translation, it's ridiculously good.

The devs absolutely didn't need to put in so much depth into the game, with the huge mastery library and sets, the gear and crafting, the beasts and drones, all the cg, everything. But they did and they still update the game, these devs absolutely love their game and it shows.

Expect an XCOM: Chimera Squad style experience, but more heavily focused on story and character interactions. You should speed up the game speed in the options, a lot of the game is waiting for animations to finish playing. Story options actually make a difference in how the mission plays out, which wow, more games need to do. The characters actually interact with each other in the story instead of pretending only the protag exists, which is another surprise. They have actual unique character designs, too. Characters can select different skills and masteries which have a real effect on how the character plays and moves on the map as well.

Again, if you can get over the hurdles of weak 3d character modeling, low quality graphics, and awkward translation, it is a phenomenal experience.
developer_response:
" The type of game where if you can get over the weak graphics and subpar English translation, it's ridiculously good. "

You already bought the game fairly, and you didn't have to understand this. This fact alone has disappointed you and you could have criticized it harshly, but you didn't. You gave us an opportunity and we will use it for future development.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198638570646', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 13408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2865, 'last_played': 1701158975}
review: 我喜欢这个游戏，但是将来有没有可能拥有更多国家的配音？
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

支持更多的语言语音是一次愉快的体验。对此，开发组的想法也是一样。但是对于像我们这样的小独立开发组来说，这是一件非常不容易的事情。我们是开发专业的队伍，没有外语专家。因此从与配音演员联系开始，很难判断配音演员的演技是否是我们所希望的。

为了解决这个问题，需要和当地的游戏发行公司签订合约进行工作，但是像我们这样对小公司的游戏感兴趣的游戏发行公司几乎没有。最终开发组认为，现在只有更加集中于我们能做的事情。我认为，如果能够坚持不懈地做下去，总有一天机会会来的。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198009021982', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 11423, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7879, 'last_played': 1710016720}
review:
Epic game. The best turn based tactical rpg in my opinion. Not sure how I missed it in 2020 when it was released but at least now I can play a complete version with 2 available DLCs.

You have 9 (12 with DLCs) characters which you can customize with a ton of masteries. There are almost a thousand different masteries and you can equip around 30, certain combinations of 3 or 4 masteries activate mastery sets to give you extra bonuses. You can capture and summon beasts and customize them too, you can craft equipment, upgrade it, you can craft drone parts and create drone and customize them with their own masteries too.

There are a lot of ways to collect masteries - you can get random drops from killing enemies, you can learn to craft them by killing enemies and collecting their information, you can capture, evolve and train beasts, you can build drones of different types and level them up, you can make certain choices in story missions and you can unlock certain achievements which also give you access to masteries, you can craft some of them to learn how to craft others.

There are 258 achievements for this game, some of which are progress related ("complete mission XXX"), some are challenges which modify how you play the game slightly ("kill certain enemy in certain mission", where you usually can progress even by losing so will need to go back and find a way to win).

The amount of content in the game is huge for its price. It took me 100 hours to complete the main story, now I am at 130 hours and still progressing through the first DLC (which is actually free for some reason, why?). Spent several hours yesterday just customizing my characters with masteries to make them stronger after trying and failing the last mission in the DLC.
developer_response:
What we want to inform the most through this game is the mastery system. This is because this is the most important factor that makes Troubleshooter different from other games.

And I was able to confirm that our intentions were well communicated to you through the evaluation you wrote today. And you've already fully understood the mastery system and you're making good use of it in combat.

Although you complimented us on the amount of our game, we still have a lot of stories to tell. We will definitely tell you these stories through future development through a better system.

I sincerely hope that I can be with you on my future journey.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198281913184', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 7994, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2645, 'last_played': 1698460782}
review:
Update:
I think I should have praised the game a bit more. The late game (dlcs) gets more challenging and force you to play with your brain again, unlike the common tone in this genre where the game play gets to brain dead state from mid-to-end. And I can't really think of a better sRPG(?) game than this one except for XCOM2. I have been constantly let down by the other choices out there. Definitely buying the next title at release. 

It's sad that the characters are mostly capped at the end of the base game though, as you don't have more slots for upgrade. 


__________________________________________________________

Not bad, a quite solid turn-based strategy game. Initially I thought it is just a XCOM-like copycat, but after playing a bit I think it does have its own merit. 

Cons:
In actual combat, which is when you "play" the game, the available options and strategies are way less than in XCOM2. 
First, there are very little effects from high ground (high ground does not seem to change the range of abilities nor the visible range, not obviously at least), and naturally the maps are designed mostly horizontally. 
Second, there is no wall and floor destruction as in XCOM, further reducing the point for positioning and possibility of flanking. 

Pros:
The game has a quite interesting talent system, and making the game more orientated towards a RPG game. You build your character around different talents, and optimizing them is probably necessary on higher difficulties (I play on the highest difficulty without custom choices, and I don't think it's anywhere being hard for me. I guess the real challenge may come from optional difficulty settings). I think there are several hundreds talents and many characters with DIFFERENT classes and builds (unlike the dumb case in XCOM). 

MEH:
The gameplay is basically optimizing your characters, and seeing them absolutely murder swarms of enemies mindlessly (not really, you DO SOMETIMES need to not do STUPID things if you want to get a clean win, as some bosses and elites are quite strong and might one-shot your character).

The story and anime like characters. I don't know, it's better than noting, but so far I'm not impressed.
developer_response:
Creating a game with XCOM-level strategy was a really big challenge for us. But in the middle of developing a game, we asked ourselves a question.

"What do we want to make? Just another version of the game of XCOM?"

Right after asking this question, our development direction began to change. I borrowed XCOM's proven combat system, but decided to make the game more like an SRPG by adding the character's story, growth, and various items on top of it. 

But a lot of people were attracted to the XCOM-like way of fighting, so they started Troubleshooter, and we had the challenge of imprinting these people with a new brand called Troubleshooter. I think the part you mentioned as an advantage is the result of our efforts over the past four years.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199089268502', 'num_games_owned': 101, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 13392, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 37, 'playtime_at_review': 11259, 'last_played': 1712325120}
review:
很喜欢这款游戏，看到现在的剧情也只是进行了一部分，希望可以看到剧情完结和流畅的PVP的登场，祝游戏越来越好。
说说目前的我的体感。
1.需要耗费的刷取时间确实是比较长的，游戏前期会压力较大。
2.我认为可以把武器防具和饰品分开，制作的套装可以提供较好的基础属性，boss身上掉落的视频可以提供更高的上限和能力，目前因为角色是两个专职，套装的效果对某些职业来说显得比较鸡肋，同时因为只有boss掉落高品质物品，导致有许多比较好的套装效果吃不到，如果可以给装备附加套装效果感觉也是可以的，就比如重要的法系防沉默只有黄金三件才有，无法添加到高品质武器确实是有些遗憾。
3.狂战士系的AI移动目前容易原地打转，然后去寻找打转之后距离最近的目标，导致攻击目标与设想并不相同，不是很清楚是如何运作的。
4.有些角色机制割裂较为严重，比如阿尔伯斯，物法双修但是样样不精，导致角色自身定位模糊，希望能将角色职业特色改的明了一些，就类似清道夫黑星用于清除杂兵，战法可以贴身和boss作战这样子，这些职业做的就相当的不错。
5.有些角色技能与当前职业并不适配，或者重复性较高，比如比安科作为一个远距离的角色，她的风鞭是将远处敌人拉至身边，这与定位感觉并不相符，
6.在游戏中途不查询攻略独自寻找需要的天赋的时候较为困难，有许多无法知道在何处获得。
7.希望可以多出一些机制有意思的boss角色比如大型怪物或者是需要达成某些条件才能击败的boss
制作组作为一个规模不大的制作组，能将战棋游戏的内容设计的如此丰富我觉得是十分用心在做这款游戏的，我也看到制作大大们能够及时的回复每一条评论，这是许多制作商都做不到的，希望游戏越来越好，制作游戏考虑玩家体验的制作组永远是伟大的♥
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

1.
这是很多人共同指出的部分。 因为无法改变故事的流向，所以正在调整任务的大小和登场的敌人，但仅凭这些很难说游戏前半部分的任务达到了令人满意的水平。

2.
如果我们因为得不到任何东西而感到遗憾，那是因为它的稀缺性很高。 具有讽刺意味的是，这样的系统也为我们提供了某种动机。 这也是很多游戏开发团队采用的方法。 然而，这些系统显然也应该存在限制。 我们不能让玩家进行无尽的挑战。 我们也会更加明确这种限制，在玩家适当的挑战之后，让玩家得到合理的补偿。
感谢您的评论。

3.
这是我们的意图。 我们认为这种不稳定很好地表达了其天赋的意图。

4.
游戏的战斗规则并不完善。 但是这个战斗规则通过今后的更新可能会有所改变。

5.
一个角色并不完美。 只是这些角色聚集在一起,可以组成一个完美的团队。 从这个角度来看,即使自己不能打败任何敌人,但给同事们创造好机会,并不认为是与这个角色的职业相距甚远的技术。

6.
游戏越更新越复杂。 即使继续更新，我们也会考虑补救措施，以免降低对游戏内容的接近性。

7.
这也是我们真正想要的东西之一。 只是现在的游戏结构很难实现。 在我们未来的开发中,我们将竭尽全力学习游戏开发技术,以便我们能够实现。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198103741801', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1697552285}
review: xcom2 ยากชิพหาย เล่นแล้วเส้นเลือดในสมองแตก เลยหนีมาเล่นเกมนี้แทน
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

More stories and more colleagues are waiting for you. 

I recommend that you complete all the scenario missions at a low level of difficulty first. Then you can recruit more colleagues and use more diverse masteries to change your character powerfully. 

You can try again at any time after completing any kind of mission in the game. In this process, you can change the difficulty of the mission or select more people to participate in the mission. Therefore, it is not necessary to complete violent cases or normal cases from the beginning.

Enjoy the story first. Then use your strategy on the battlefield to your heart's content.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198849183216', 'num_games_owned': 86, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1340, 'last_played': 1702191675}
review: 韩漫二次元画风xcom，但系统更网游养成，构筑策略玩法不少。本来对这个画风不太感兴趣结果玩起来好上头。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果我们准备的游戏内容能愉快地填满你的时间，那对我们来说也是很大的乐趣。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198010614273', 'num_games_owned': 348, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 979, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 484, 'last_played': 1697909182}
review: 好玩
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我想告诉你两个可能有助于你游戏进行的提示。

1.
不要增加游戏的难度。 所有任务只要完成一次，随时都可以重新挑战。 因此，请将难度降低到普通或以下，并快速进行游戏故事。 这样你就可以得到更多的同事和更多的【天赋】。 之后把上次的任务设定为更高的难度，然后重新挑战那些任务吧。

2.
把游戏的速度设置得快一点。随着比赛的进行，你将会遇到比我军人数更多的敌人。 等待敌人的顺序是一件无聊的事情。 这时可以利用【快进队友行动】 和 【快进队友外的行动】更舒适地体验游戏。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198891744116', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 10822, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4889, 'last_played': 1704112568}
review:
정말 재밌게 하고 있음...........
문제는 동료들이 넘 늦게 들어옴
그리고 중간세이브기 없음
음.............슈로대 광팬으로서 
이건 참..........뭐라할까 슈로대는 너무 
유닛이 많아서 출전시킬 유닛에 고민이 
됐다고 하면 아니 초반에 그래도 좀
줘야하지 않나 싶음............나중가면 어떨지 모르겠지만...............
developer_response:
게임 초반에 동료의 영입이 너무 늦게 진행되는 것은 사실입니다. 저희도 게이머분들의 지적을 통해 이것을 깨달았으나 이미 너무 많은 이야기가 진행되었고 동료의 영입이 이 이야기와 너무 깊이 관계되어 있어 이야기 자체를 건드리지는 못하고 있습니다. 

초반에 동료를 얻기까지 통과해야 하는 미션을 최대한 간소화 해봤지만 궁극적인 해결책은 되지 못한 것 같습니다. 다만 게임의 중반부를 넘어서면 전반부보다 훨씬 속도감 있는 게임 진행을 경험하실 수 있을 것입니다.

게임 초반의 저희의 부족한 게임 기획능력으로 인한 지루함을 좋은 말로 표현해주셔서 감사합니다. 미래의 게임 개발에서는 같은 실수를 반복하지 않겠습니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978121081', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 6981, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6981, 'last_played': 1671751291}
review:
I haven't actually played this game in a while, but looking through my library, this is one of those unexpected titles that I was very well impressed with. First off, I'm a tactical rpg guy. Fire emblem, shining force, x-com and so on, and I knew this would fit the bill. And it really did. Second, it ran well at max settings on my old (4790k + gtx970) rig.

And I realise now I'm pretty pissed, so in short, gameplay is excellent, meta game is solid, variety of tactics is wide, characters are endearing and story line is...... Japanese. By Japanese, i mean it was obvious the characters were invested with what was going on and they really cared. What was going on however, and why it was important should be left to better scholars that I. I still like it though.
developer_response:
Fire Emblem, XCOM, and Shining Force. These are really great games. (Personally, I pick Shining Force as the best SRPG of my life.) If Troubleshooter reminded you of these games, that in itself is a great pleasure for the development team. We won't stop working on game development until the day you include Troubleshooter on the list of games you take as an example when you evaluate other games.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977471028', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 14139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7544, 'last_played': 1698617627}
review:
A very pleasant surprise. Do not let the anime look scare you away! [edit: +100h and free DLC later]

...X-com/xenonauts/turn-base strategists... By the end of Troubleshooter you wish more of the story and world. Huge thanks to Mortismal Gaming for highlighting this one as one of their favorite games which made me finally purchase and dive in.

Let's get the anime part away first. Yes, it is a bit misleading together with the name Troubleshooter. The name itself makes me think of tech support which is not at all what it is for. I believe this is majorly due to cultural differences from Asian developers and Western audience. I have watched some Anime myself and enjoyed plenty of shows, however, the storytelling still felt jarring at first together with the characters. As aforementioned - they did grow up on me during the game time and boy(/girl)! What a magnificent turn based system they have here.

The slowly opening up build options where you literally constantly have to think of alternative costs of including one perk over another is massively fun and engaging. Up to half of my ~150h game time would be spent in menus looking at the perks and trying to figure out which ones I can afford to take over losing others. Great, great fun! (if you are not a fan of complicated systems I believe you can just search for builds and do a cookie cutter). Every character has a multitude of build options opening up for you to experiment as you wish. I still think I will go around making my melee characters ranged etc.

The story goes through specific quest tasks which you can choose to open up more of the side tasks as well. I went straight for as many main quest ones on the hardest difficulties until facing a brick wall (sniper training). However, this made me backtrack and try out the "challenge mode" which is even more harder, but rewards with more higher level perk drops from defeated enemies. I would recommend to push the difficulty as high as you enjoy and playing through all of the missions in lvl order to get the full story. Doing only the major quests made me wonder from time to time what was going on - all which was told by the side quests I had skipped.

By the end I am now looking to get the DLC on next sale and I have not checked out what the multiplayer part is about. I can not think of a logical reason why this game even needs a multiplayer - it is such an amazing experience just solo, but hey - it is there if you want it! There is SO much here. Highly recommended!

edit: +100h and the FREE DLC later. 

I really enjoyed the new enemies and continuation of the story. The new characters were welcome for more build tinkering (berserker!) and the new quests did provide some challenge early on - exactly what I was missing the on the original. Great FREE DLC!

So... there's even more quests than the Silverline task board shows you. The multiplayer hub has quests for all the traders in it after the initiation of beating the fellow Troubleshooter. Originally I tried 2 times, but as the final move swept me it felt like more of a puzzle than anything and I thought I would come back later. As the main questline kept me interested and I pushed the difficulty to the top pretty soon I never thought of going back to the initiation quest until I started the FREE DLC.

However, I think this reveals the 3 greatest flaws in the game: 
#1 As Troubleshooter has 2 separate "hubs" where you operate from (Silverline and market area later on) there is no one place that collects all the new quests. Together with 
#2 the game has some seriously long loading times that I do not know where they come from - perhaps networking? The graphics and actual hub areas are so small that it really should not take that long. So jumping between the hubs is annoying and makes me want to minimize it. 
#3 the difficulty options do not go as hard as I would prefer. Taking into notice I play a lot of these type of games and enjoy challenging experiences (learning through failing). As the build system allows for some redonculous builds and power I quickly found myself bored. No new perks, no gear drops (best to craft them). In a way it becomes Diablo 2 where you farm gear without worry.

So waiting for next sale on the other DLC and perhaps adding another part 100h later :) WELL worth purchase!
developer_response:
If Troubleshooter reminded you of XCOM, Xenonauts, and turn-base strategy, our game development goals are as good as they have already been achieved.

We're a small independent game development team. And we think what gamers want from a development team like us is not to copy a famous game, but to play a new game with our own elements.

We borrowed a combat system proven by XCOM. From this moment on, we started to be considered a subjack of XCOM and we had to start thinking about making Troubleshooter different from other games. This problem is still unresolved. We are still updating to establish the identity of Troublesooter.

However, I found out from your review that the way we are going is not wrong. Of course, it doesn't mean that our challenge is complete. As you pointed out, online mode still hasn't given gamers a proper answer to 'what are the benefits of communicating with other gamers?'

Even if DLC development is completed, the game will be updated in the future. Of course, the update won't last forever. However, we will do our best to make it a game where many people who have seen your review can agree with you.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060458186', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 8210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8210, 'last_played': 1672720403}

author: {'steamid': '76561197996725585', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 267, 'last_played': 1697229264}
review:
I'm very sorry but I cannot recommend this (even though I wanted to play the game for quite some time actually). I've played loads JRPGs and some TRPGs but Troubleshooter just isn't my cup of tea. While it has bright sides, for the most part it falls flat. Still, I can see that the developers do care about the game and community so for that I'm grateful because unfortunately it seems to be a rare thing these days.

Some thoughts in no specific order:

* The story is all over the place and, what's worse, it is painfully bad. The main hero is yet another your average schoolboy with superpowers with no background and no personality. Then you randomly meet some other heroes but you know absolutely nothing about them, they come and go, and you forget who they are in 30 minutes. The world is boring and I had no interest in it. Dialogues are very bad, heroes keep saying the most generic lines I can even think of. They try to add jokes here and there but it seems like the script was written by a child. For example, there's a cult that literally worships a spoon, and I'm being deadly serious here. I mean, such jokes *can* work: for example, Naheulbeuk featured a cult of evil guys who were worshipping sleep, and it was quite funny. It just depends on how such jokes are presented and executed.

* 3d characters are plain ugly. I literally did not want to open the roster screen because I knew I would once again see *that Albus' face*. Harrier Du Bois is more beautiful than him.

* The missions are very easy but very long. There are loads of enemies that you have to kill (arrest?..) and it takes forever for everyone to act. In fact, 50% of the time you just wait for others to take their turns. At the same time, you don't need to think about strategy at all: you just rush there and things happen by themselves. I read that after around 20 hours the game becomes more complex but I can't imagine playing 17 hours more to get to the "interesting part".

* The game presents loads of mechanics, stats, numbers (all written in different colors) but I could not care less because I can just faceroll and kill everyone by using a single attack command. This is (partially) because you always get backup from characters who are much stronger than you (I mean like 2-3 times stronger).

So, I dunno, I have absolutely no desire to keep going and study the game further, unfortunately.
developer_response:
It's a pity that what Troubleshooter is trying to convey is not in line with your taste. However, what the current Troubleshooter has built up has become entirely the identity of the game. 

There are parts you evaluated objectively, too objectively. The level of our 3D characters is really bad. This looks worse compared to 2D illustrations. This is something that even those who have a favor with our game don't say well. This is something we really need to reflect on and it must be improved in future development.

Also, the disadvantage is that it takes a relatively long time to complete the mission due to the large number of enemies appearing in the mission. This phenomenon is especially noticeable at the beginning of the game. You can't change the story of the game right now because the process of recruiting colleagues is deeply related to the story of the game. So I tried to reduce the size of the mission and the number of enemies that appear in the mission as much as possible, but it doesn't seem to meet your expectations.

We will not make the same mistake in future development by remembering your objective evaluation.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198396100878', 'num_games_owned': 100, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 17487, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10317, 'last_played': 1701267304}

author: {'steamid': '76561198108998464', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 25141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 718, 'last_played': 1709031381}
review: Great game. it is basically XCOM with more RPG and Anime elements. Loads of fun, a lot of depth, and even some random gear drops to keep farming interesting! Highly Recommend to anyone who enjoys tactical rpgs.
developer_response:
Usually, Troubleshooter is introduced as a story-based TBS. But as you said, farming and character growth are a big part of the Troubleshooter. In that sense, I think the term tactical RPG you mentioned is really a good expression of Troubleshooter.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198210668204', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 30658, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30658, 'last_played': 1692330867}
review:
This is an excellent game by any standard, but when you factor in the size of Dandylion's development team, what they accomplished here is truly phenomenal.

I won't reiterate the VAST numbers of systems at play in this game.  Other reviews have done so, and better than I could.

A point I would like to make, though, is that no other tactical RPG, including XCOM, has made me feel as rewarded for learning and understanding the underlying systems.  If you run into a mission guns blazing, with no plan and poorly thought out builds, you will probably die on any difficulty.  On the other end of the spectrum, players who have mastered the systems can do things in mission that boggle the mind  (Search youtube for LifeofAshuram).

It's a fantastic game.  It's currently half price.  If you have any interest in this genre at all, you should pull the trigger and buy it.
developer_response:
Thank you for conveying your enjoyment to other gamers and also giving a helpful review to the development team.

XCOM is such a great game and is practically representative of this genre. Troubleshooter has also been heavily influenced by XCOM.

But we don't think what gamers expect from an independent game development team is simply a game that mimics XCOM. We are well aware of this, so we are still thinking about adding unique features to the game. These concerns will continue and will be realized through Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children and future development.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048173964', 'num_games_owned': 15, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 796, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 248, 'last_played': 1697237920}
review: So far I am loving this game. It has so much charm and awkward style. The controls are not best but works well. It's a bit slow in acquiring more characters but I look forward to having more members join my squad. I probably write more later
developer_response:
More stories and more colleagues are waiting for you. 

I recommend that you complete all the scenario missions at a low level of difficulty first. Then you can recruit more colleagues and use more diverse masteries to change your character powerfully. 

You can try again at any time after completing any kind of mission in the game. In this process, you can change the difficulty of the mission or select more people to participate in the mission. Therefore, it is not necessary to complete violent cases or normal cases from the beginning.

Enjoy the story first. Then use your strategy on the battlefield to your heart's content.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097905387', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 77496, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73553, 'last_played': 1697834507}
review:
ド嵌りしました。

　アーリーの頃からちょいちょい遊ばせてもらっていたのですがプレイ時間がいつの間にか４桁時間を超えていたので、時間を泥棒された少しの恨みと、とても面白いゲームを作ってくれた開発陣の方々に大きな感謝を込めて初お勧めをぽちっと。

　ストーリーは、犯罪多発地域を取り締まる民間企業を立ち上げた主人公と、それぞれにちゃんと思惑を持った上で集う仲間たち。それに敵役の動機が絡み合って…みたいな感じで自分的には続きはよと言った感じです。

　ゲーム的には特性と呼ばれるスキルを各キャラに付けて敵をぶっとばしていくゲームだと思いました。
　特性は敵からの確率でのドロップやストーリーでの会話の選択肢、実績の解除でも取得することがあります。現時点で機械含めると９００個以上ありました。揃ってくると相当悩めると思います。

　なので逆に特性の無い序盤ほど難しい、2・3人に小突かれただけですぐ死ぬ、囲まれたくないから少しづつ進む。
　しかもステージによっては敵の数がこちらの数倍とかいて気づいたら全方向から敵がこちらをチラ見していた、みたいな状況になり、結果１ステージ２時間とか平気でかかる。

　なんてこともありましたが、全部どうにかする方法、ちゃんとゲーム内にあったようで「あ、そういうことぉ？」といった感じに思わせてくれることがちょくちょくあります。
　とは言え戦闘中にゲームを落としても次回起動時に続きから出来るようになっていますし、撤退してもその時点までの経験値などもちゃんと手に入っているので、あまりデメリットと思ったことがありませんが…。

　そしてゲームが進むと次はこの集めた特性の内容を理解して制限の中で上手いこと組み合わせて（何度か敵を倒すとその敵のステータスが見れるようになるので）その敵を倒すためには……みたいなことを考えていたらゲーム時間の大半が特性を付ける画面を映していることに気づくと思います。
　あとは度重なるアプデでヘルプが充実してきたようで、詰まったらヘルプを見ると良いかもしれません。

　既に販売からけっこうな日数が経っておりゲーム内容は概ね他の方が書かれている通りだと思います。


　あ、戦闘中のアイリーンのあの煽りモーション、いつ見ても楽しいです。

　次回作も制作中とのことで期待しています。
　個人的には絵と音楽、共にとても好みなので次回作でも同じ人が担当してればいいなぁと勝手に要望。
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

あなたはすでにTroubleshooterを完全に見抜いてTroubleshooterをあなたの心の中に良いゲームとして残しておくこともできましたが、このように良い評価を通じて私たちに前に進むことができる力になりました。 そして、あなたが開発チームとゲームをアーリー時代から見守ってきたことに対して、私たちはあなたに感謝を感じながら、同時に私たちのこれまでの歩みに対して反省する時間を持つようになりました。

私はあなたが書いた評価について何も付け加えることはできません。 あなたのプレイ時間とアーリー時代から私たちを見守ってきたという事実は、あなたの評価に莫大な正当性を与えます。 私たちはあなたの文章を基にして、私たちの未来開発にどのようなことをもっと発展させなければならないのか悩むだけです。

あ、絵を描く方は次回作でも私たちと一緒にする予定です。 音楽の選曲はゲームの雰囲気にもよりますが、できるだけ多くの人に呼応してもらえる曲を選ぶために努力します。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198277704277', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2001, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 286, 'last_played': 1697351430}
review:
I was hesitant when Steam recommended this game for me, as a quick glance in the comments told me that this is a XCOM-like game, which I tried to pick up multiple times and failed. Yet somehow, this game managed to cross out everything stopping me from enjoying XCOM, and includes several features that keep me hooked.
Both have a cover system, but this one is rigged in the players' favour, unlike in XCOM. Maybe I'm yet to reach the rear parts, but all the supernatural bullshittery is finally on my side for a change. No longer am I controlling four random gonks with guns against teleporting, abducting, armour-piercing supernaturals. And actual characters with a story engage me emotionally far better.
If you like XCOM and don't hate some RPG elements, you would like this game; if you hate XCOM for the same reasons as I do, then you would love this game.
developer_response:
The Troubleshooter actually had a lot of influence from XCOM. And we're now painting a unique color on the Troubleshooter. The most representative ones are the story of the game and the mastery system. I think these two systems are the biggest reason why you feel differently from XCOM from Troubleshooter. 

Please proceed with the game until the end. You don't have to play the game at a high level of difficulty from the beginning. Once completed, you can try again at any time by changing the level of difficulty. Recruit colleagues and collect mastery while enjoying the game's story at a low level of difficulty. And test your strategy again at a high level of difficulty. :D

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116964798', 'num_games_owned': 195, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 10085, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7561, 'last_played': 1697618669}
review:
Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children is a wild ride of tactical RPG goodness that'll have you cheering one moment and tearing your hair out the next - just as expected from a game that pays homage to XCOM mechanics.

The heart of this game lies in its Mastery system, where you can fine-tune your character to your heart's content with a mind-boggling array of masteries and mastery sets. It's like a playground for theorycrafters and min-maxers.

Character building is a blast, with hundreds of skills to choose from - though not quite as unrestricted as some might hope, it's still a delightful experience to experiment with different builds.

But the fun doesn't stop there; the game throws in Crafting, Monster Taming, and Bestiary systems that are an absolute joy to explore, adding layers of depth to your journey.

Speaking of depth, the difficulty system keeps you on your toes. While it's tied to a fixed list, you can tweak it with additional settings that add extra challenges and rewards. Plus, the flexibility to adjust it mid-playthrough is a godsend.

Underneath it all, there's a compelling story, but sadly, the English translation needs some serious love. It's like watching a great movie with the subtitles constantly out of sync - frustrating, but still worth it.

Lastly, a minor hiccup: online saves can be plagued by pesky ping spikes. The good news? You can switch to offline saves for better stability, but it'd be nice to sync them back and forth seamlessly.

In a nutshell, Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children is a tactical RPG extravaganza with its quirks and charms. Get ready for a rollercoaster of fun and frustration as you master your way through this wild world.
developer_response:
As you mentioned, the Troubleshooter is heavily influenced by XCOM. In particular, XCOM's core combat system forms the basis of Troubleshooter's combat system.

That's where our challenge started. We benchmarked a system that was recognized by many people and now we had to introduce our own unique system. That was what many gamers wanted from independent game development teams. So what was created is the mastery system. There are definitely differences in the professions a character can have, but you can use them to make a lot of changes. From your evaluation, we can see that you have already fully grasped our intentions and are using this system 100%.

Troubleshooter is the first game we made. And we plan to expand the worldview of Troubleshooter further in the future. So Troubleshooter is a game that will be the birthplace of all the games that we' We will challenge as much as possible through this game. And these things will become more concrete and more advanced in our future development.

Thank you for joining us on the adventure of Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children. And I look forward to your future journey.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118098968', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 117712, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 35, 'playtime_at_review': 110708, 'last_played': 1711631954}
review:
it's a good game, with caveats: if you are the sort of person who likes customization of characters, this game would give you far more hours of fun than the actual time it takes to run through its content. If you absolutely hate the hassle and prefer prebuilt characters who get stronger only based on levels and items, you would hate this game.

either way it's an experience that's hard to find, and there will be those polarized into either loving or hating this game because of its mechanics. I do hope the developers don't go the crowd pleasing route and dumb down everything though, because it's currently more unique than similar games because of this aspect, and if it becomes more generic it would be hard to compete with more mainstream titles with far more developmental resources.

there is also a lot of comparison with xcom, however, aside from its battle system, there are few similarities. There is no perma death in this game, no time limit, no resource management, and no real penalty for failure other than your feelings and time. It's more of a sandbox for character 'builds', which the story serves to test if your build is good enough to pass.
developer_response:
No matter what I say in this reply right now, it can't be compared to your playing experience.

" I do hope the developers don't go the crowd pleasing route and dumb down everything though "

I think this is the one thing we should be most wary of in our future development. We will compromise with reality many times in the development process. We will always remember this to make decisions that do not undermine our identity each time.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199031873827', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 12869, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11898, 'last_played': 1702516438}
review:
かなり面白い。SRPG好きは一見の価値あり。
大変気に入ったので、追加コンテンツは音楽とアートブック以外全部購入済。
以下はゲーム性もイラストも含めて素晴らしいゲームと思っている人間が書き散らす「個人的な要望」です。

・衣装。
追加も含めてアイリーン、シオン、アン、カイリーの服が癖が強過ぎて良いのがない。（アイリーンのアライグマとかが苦手なので特に選択肢が……）キャラ全体に言えることだがもっと普通のデザインのものを追加して欲しい。

・それぞれの衣装は手に入れたら誰でも着れるようにしてあるとより良い。それが難しければ、例えば衣装の一部の色をユーザー側で変更できるだけでもカスタム感がでて良い。そういう自己満足的なカスタマイズを楽しむ価値があるゲームだと思うので。

・ステージの長さによる冗長さ。
多方面から指摘されているだろうけれども、各ステージが広すぎる。素材などを集める際に周回するようなステージは、明らかに現在の半分くらいの広さでいいと感じる。なのでメインシナリオでやるステージと周回前提のステージで広さを調整すればよいかと。あと本当に「いつか」でいいんだけど、周回してると飽きがくるので、アイテムや敵の配置とかに少しでもランダム性があると大変ありがたい。

・モブ警察を味方で使えるステージが結構あるが彼らを動かすのが面倒。こういうのはたまにで十分。

・レベルキャップ。
ダラダラレベル上げしながらトレハンするのが好きなのだが、レベルキャップが邪魔。無駄な制限は心から撤廃して欲しいが、それが無理だというならせめて選択させて欲しい。例えばオフラインの難易度イージー以下なら撤廃を選択可能、とか。別にレベルを上げまくって無双したところで誰にも迷惑を掛けない。ひりひりするような戦いがしたいぜ！みたい人もいるだろうけれども、途方もないくらい強くしてボスらを含めて一方的に蹂躙したり、単純にレベル上げが好きな人もいる。つまりそういうのを選択する権利が欲しい。

・シナリオ。
複雑な背景があるシナリオはなかなか興味深い。ただエピソードが小出し気味な上、頻繁に舞台が変わり、しばしば過去を回想するシーンが挿入されるため、長めの各ステージのプレイ時間と相まって話の全貌が掴みにくい。もう少しストーリーをギュッとまとめて出すなど分かりやすくする工夫が必要だろう。

何にせよ非常に良くできた作品。いいゲームが楽しめたことに感謝。
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

* 衣装:
私たちは小さな開発チームであり、グラフィック資源を作るのに明らかな限界があります。 私たちは月に 1 つのコスチュームをようやく開発することができました。 今、私たちがまた別のコスチュームを開発するためには、次回作のためのグラフィック資源を作る時間がなくなるので、今の状況を考えると、追加的なコスチュームは今後期待しにくいです。

* ステージの長さによる冗長さ:
あなたが言及したように、私たちが最も多くの指摘を受けたのがまさにこの部分です。 特にゲームの中盤まで、このような部分がよく見られます。 私たちが考えていた適当な大きさというのが実際と多くの違いがあることが確認できました。 今後の開発では、ミッション1つを完了するのに必要な時間を先に設定し、その時間に合わせて内容を作成する方式になるでしょう。

* レベルキャップ:
ゲームの初期の姿はあなたが言ったことに近かったです。 しかし、"ひりひりするような戦いがしたいぜ！" を望むゲーマーのニーズが圧倒的に多かったため、現在の姿に達しました。あなたが望むゲームのやり方は今でも不可能ではありません。 ただし、そのための別のゲームモードを追加するかどうかは、もう少し考慮する必要があります。

* シナリオ:
理想は大きかったが、現実はそうではない典型的な例がまさにこの場合です。私たちは今回のゲームだけでなく、これからのゲームにも影響を与える世界観を構築したかったのです。 そしてゲームの話も線形的な展開ではなく立体的な展開を見せたかったのです。 しかし、これらすべてを実現するには、私たちの物語構成能力が限りなく不足していました。 直観的な話の伝達方法を通じて、より大きな絵を見せる方法について、私たちがもっと勉強していきます。

いい評価ありがとうございます。
