author: {'steamid': '76561198823318851', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1219, 'last_played': 1687283334}
review: I really enjoy it, sometimes the battles do feel like they drag out slightly to long but overall still a very fun experience.
developer_response:
It is true that the battle at the beginning of the game feels relatively long. Gamers can feel that more strongly because they are still lacking colleagues and characters cannot use various characteristics. This is because we made a mistake in the initial design of the game. But please complete scenario missions a little more first. The game will develop faster and faster.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198323347713', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 10059, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8446, 'last_played': 1692354466}
review:
很喜欢这个游戏，目前第二个档刚通了本体。剧情节奏、游戏性和各种细节的设计都很合胃口^_^

借这个机会我也有几个有关游戏的问题想问下制作组：

1.游戏目前的剧情应该刚到开始的部分，之后制作组会考虑继续发行dlc（比如出个dlc3）还是续作？我个人会希望继续发行新的dlc而非续作，因为很舍不得自己养成的角色。同时如果后续采用续作的形式，会导致一些最后部分才加入的员工和职业失去展示自己的机会，比如dlc新加入的三位角色，以及一些现在都还未被更新到游戏里的职业（如猎人可以使用弓箭手的天赋，但游戏中目前并不存在弓箭手）。

2.马尔科在不同任务里似乎有着不同的稀有等级，在他刚出场时是英雄等级（银色），而之后的几次是史诗（金色），而只有前者可以被更新到敌人信息面板，是什么导致了这样的差异？之前刷了几次后者都没有解锁他的图鉴，而其他敌人都具有着名字与角色对应的唯一性，这让我有些困扰，您们有考虑将两种马尔科统一一下吗？

3.只有少数任务标注了可随选项获得新的天赋，如关卡旧日余香。而其他一些会随选项获得天赋或其他奖励的关卡在事件回顾界面并无标注，之后会考虑将其他关卡也进行对应标注吗？

感谢您的回复，祝您的游戏越做越好

补充一下，我刚确认了一下，马尔科似乎只有他的最后一次出场是金色的，之前都是银色的
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

* 目前正在开发的DLC全部更新后，【纷争终结者: 被遗弃的孩子们】的开发将正式结束。 将进行进一步的更新，但【剧情任务】不会再更新了。 没能通过这部作品传达的故事将通过下一部作品更加详细地描述。 当然，这还只是计划而已。 计划随时都有可能变更。

* 您说的部分是我们也没有预料到的。 我会马上确认你所说的事项。

* 我认为这是游戏制作人和玩家之间微妙的差异造成的现象。 我们仍然认为在游戏中要有发现什么的乐趣,但是也有很多玩家不同意这种想法。 游戏中的所有信息是否必须存在于游戏内还是个疑问。 因为我们在周围很容易找到不是这样的游戏。 我们要研究能否在游戏制作人的欲望和玩家的便利性之间找到合适的切入点。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198972712237', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 32380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20616, 'last_played': 1693440786}

We apologize for making what should have been a fun time unpleasant.

If you find the content difficult, we recommend lowering the difficulty level. If you're already offended by the lower difficulty level, or for some other specific reason, please let us know in the discussion below and we'll take it into account in our future improvements.

https://steamcommunity.com/app/470310/discussions/0/1621726179584045716/

We apologize again for this inconvenience after so many years of enjoyment!!!

We'll do our best to make your experience better!

author: {'steamid': '76561198003981721', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 999, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 999, 'last_played': 1643845462}
review: I feel kind of cheated by the marketing which has a character front and center who you don't even get until 8+ hours into the game. In fact, the game's pacing makes Final Fantasy games look quick and to-the-point by comparison. The tactical gameplay itself is fun, but everything surrounding it has been a disappointing slog.
developer_response:
I can be confident that there is no lie in the content of the game and the promotion of the game. However, I agree that Troubleshooter is not a game that allows you to quickly experience the core content of the game, as is the trend in games these days. However, it was not possible to forcefully develop the game to solve this problem. We will study ways to reflect recent game trends while maintaining our development philosophy.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199122419499', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4608, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4394, 'last_played': 1691809126}
review:
お勧めしません。
　絵が親しみやすく気軽にできるシミュレーションかなと思いましたがよくありませんでした。

以下よくない点
１　戦闘に時間がかかりすぎる。
　１回のミッションで３０分以上はざらにかかります。
　難易度が高いミッションであればあるほど敵の数が多い→敵のターンが多く時間がかかる。
　時間がかかるのが嫌になり、キャラを大胆に動かすと囲まれてしまい、却って時間がかかることも。

２　一人ひとりのストーリーが薄い
　最初主人公（アルバス）のストーリーがメインで進むかと思いきや最初だけであとは全く動きません。
　敵キャラの過去も描かれるのですが、視点を描くキャラが多すぎ、却って薄味となっています。
　敵キャラのひとりひとりのストーリーを描く暇があるんなら（最初のほうに倒される雑魚にもある）アルバス・シオン・アイリーンの主要三キャラに絞ってほしかった。

３いらない要素が多すぎる
　アイテム製作　野獣調教等もできるのですが、まったくやる必要ないです。ストーリーを進めてレベルを上げるほうが１００倍重要です。いりません。鑑定等もなぜあるのか不明です。

　総じていらない要素を詰め込みすぎ、かえって本質的な面白さを損なっている、というのが評価になります。
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

" 総じていらない要素を詰め込みすぎ、かえって本質的な面白さを損なっている、というのが評価になります。"

これが示唆するところが非常に大きいと思います。 ただし、これらの要素を取り除くには、多くの部分でゲームと関連する部分が少なくありません。 私たちは今の作品を通じて、このような部分がゲームでより実用的に使われるよう改善し、次の作品ではもう少し直観的で不必要な部分を大胆に除去したゲームを製作するために努力します。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198047915686', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 21440, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21342, 'last_played': 1692225870}
review:
This game has given me more hours of enjoyment per dollar spent than probably any game I've ever owned. The developers are really humble, sweet people and are still releasing free new content at 350+ hours of gameplay.

There's a number of great story lines, some enjoyable characters, and really intricate game mechanics that start off slow and build so you're not overwhelmed at the start. If you like turn-based shooters like Xcom or Shadowrun and also have enjoyed JRPGs, this might be the perfect game for you!
developer_response:
I think the last sentence of your assessment best expresses Troubleshooter. But it's still questionable whether Troubleshooter really expressed the advantages of the games you listed as one. But we will not ask you to modify the expression. We will try to make a game that matches the expression.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992557240', 'num_games_owned': 679, 'num_reviews': 170, 'playtime_forever': 11630, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2700, 'last_played': 1700865962}
review:
When this game first came out, I REALLY didn't like it. Exposition felt like it took you out of action for too long and the game felt unnecessarily grindy. Now, after letting this cook for 3 years, I'm glad to report that devs have made a stellar job in overall improvements of basically all aspects of the game. There are now countless quality-of-life improvements that make everything flow more naturally and even the lengthy cut scenes feel more integrated (and are skippable).

There is a staggering amount of content and depth on offer here! Story is nice and there is a lot of it, crafting is deep, character builds are endlessly flexible and there is a ton of replay value. I would even recommend this for the full price! For me who is after a fun, deep but fair turn-based tactical rpg, where Blackguards 1/2 and X-Com 2 failed, TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children delivered. This is the most fun I've had with a turn-based RPG for years!

Update 25.11.2023: Nominated this for "Labor of Love Award" for Steam Awards 2023!
developer_response:
We know how important the first impression of the other person is in a relationship. It's the same in games. In fact, the fact that you didn't make a good first impression when you first purchased the Troubleshooter is our lack of development skills and we would have accepted it if you had rated it badly for this.

Nevertheless, I would like to thank you for giving us another opportunity. We are relieved that the results of our slow but steady game improvement have made a good impression on you. 

But our update is not over yet. DLC's regular update is coming to an end, but we still have a lot of things we want to do through this game.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198401272251', 'num_games_owned': 93, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 3123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1124, 'last_played': 1692556522}
review: 好玩儿！打关卡很花时间，一关能打上半小时到一小时。角色很有意思，演出也好看，配装备和天赋很耗神（但有意思），打完再追评……
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我们准备的东西你好像很愉快地体验着，我们真的很开心。 考虑到以下事项玩游戏的话,可以更愉快地体验游戏。

1. 不要一开始就选择高难度。
- 完成一次的任务可以随时变更难度，重新尝试。

2. 请先完成剧情任务。
- 尽快把所有的同事都引进进来。 同事越多，战略选择就越多。

3. 设定适合自己的游戏速度。
- 请考虑在游戏选项中使用加速游戏速度的选项【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】。你可以从【选项】 → 【环境设置】 → 【游戏进行】中找到上述选项。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198044029815', 'num_games_owned': 270, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 11463, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5123, 'last_played': 1709327667}
review: I've always wanted to enjoy X-com, but the permadeath stressed me out. This game lets me scuff my way through a mission and not be punished for it.
developer_response:
Combining the tried and true combat system from XCOM with what we believe to be character development and telling the story of the game in one game is what drove us to create Troubleshooter. In doing so, the permadeath didn't fit with our game system and we wanted gamers to be able to experience Troubleshooter in a casual way. We're glad you seem to be enjoying it.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015851283', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 12526, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12526, 'last_played': 1635713702}

This game is ridiculously underpriced for the amount of content you get. Its very easy to spend hundreds of hours in it.

We still think Troubleshooter can be even better than it is now, and we're still working on ways to increase the value of the game, and when they're all in place, we think the game will be even more valuable, and you'll be a wise gamer for foreseeing it!

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198879210776', 'num_games_owned': 318, 'num_reviews': 169, 'playtime_forever': 4822, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4822, 'last_played': 1689742460}
review:
Its good.
Only 3 cons that I have is that: 

1. The later stages are a slog to get through (imagine 50+ enemies on a Xcom map) 

2. Crafting/Shops aren't worth dealing with unless you are trying to clear the game on the harder difficulties.

3. The way masteries are introduced and implemented. 

When you unlock masteries you only have a few choices to choose from that offer small buffs but later on the player has a stupid assortment of masteries (300+) to choose from with limited slots (early game 5ish, end game around 30). 

These masteries when paired with the correct combination unlock very strong perks that make a character's build unique however there is no indication how to unlock certain masteries or what perks are even available in the game. 

Later on it becomes evident that a good mastery build vs a bad one is what makes a character from doing one measly move per turn to solo clearing the whole map in a few turns.
developer_response:
No matter how good a system we implemented, if gamers don't enjoy it, it's like there's no system. Now, two of the three things you mentioned are like this, so we have to think carefully about not only the functionality of the game system, but also the ability to explain it to gamers.

However, there is a limitation that it is difficult to change many things hastily because many game contents are related to the current systems. We will keep this in mind and continue to improve the game.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053624722', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1688871318}

author: {'steamid': '76561198968634494', 'num_games_owned': 408, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 36143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 35528, 'last_played': 1712145744}
review:
如果是新玩家就不推荐购买了。
这个游戏的本体和DLC1、DLC2之间跨服极大，本体的平衡性还可以玩玩搭配，DLC1开始人物、宠物又来越离谱。
且要刷的内容太多太多，我是来玩战棋的，不是来玩刷子网游的！

人物天赋要刷情报解锁；
人物装备要刷；
做装备的材料要刷；
宠物要抓，抓了还要刷三本性，辛辛苦苦抓到一看不是三本性，扔了继续刷；
宠物天赋还要刷；
无人机等级、装备也要刷；
做无人机的材料也要刷。
再说一遍，我是来玩战棋的，不是来玩刷子网游的！

缝合了太多的东西，太多东西又给人一种只做了一半的感觉
官方不想着减赋，反而在DLC里玩起了堆数值。。。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我们正在尽最大努力,即使不把您说的要素做到最佳,也能享受游戏。

但是对于想要实现最优化的领域的玩家来说,充分理解随机、反复的事情是多么的不方便。为此，我们正在不断减少各种内容中的重复工作。

但是不管怎么说,我们的游戏的本质是通过RPG游戏看到故事的结局。 之后的内容元素是玩家自己选择的部分。因此,在改善内容内的反复要素方面,可能远远不能满足用户的要求。野兽的遗传因素在概念上无法改变的部分也是出于同样的原因。由于重视故事概念，限制了想要优化野兽的用户的反复行为。很抱歉这些部分对你这样的用户造成了很大的不满。

因为是小团队，所以很抱歉在内容开发过程中没能快速处理这些投诉。

谢谢您坦率的评论。

author: {'steamid': '76561198900111246', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6230, 'last_played': 1705315703}
review:
非常好的游戏，我认为所有的战棋类玩家都应该来试试（认真）

游戏的优缺点其他评论都说的很详细了，我来谈谈一个似乎还没什么人提过的地方，不知道制作组有没有考虑过调整一下位移技能在自动反应攻击里的权重（这里点名批评比安卡）
最开始的时候我只以为比安卡的“风踢”和阿尔伯特，凯莉的位移技能一样就是个快速入场技能（作为一个攻击技能它可没办法像另外两个一样很好脱离战场），直到我发觉它可以被队友反应触发——这在第一个dlc里开头艾莉莎和比安卡的逃脱关卡里给我带来了很大的麻烦
它无视地形的高机动力可以让比安卡各种闪！现！送！头！
如果比安卡是一个带嘲讽的坦克角色，我还可以接受它快速的支援作用，但是作为一个后排法师，因为前排被不痛不痒的打了一下所以一脚闪现到怪堆里踢死一个然后被周围的人群殴至死确实不是什么明智的设计，特别是作为一个中级技能它还有不俗的触发概率
实在不行加个自爆天赋让我给她装上当成导弹来用（？）
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

虽然有很多不足之处,但感谢大家愉快地享受。 我们会尽最大努力让大家继续享受愉快的内容！

额外地，您是说比安卡的"漩涡之踢"由"纽带关系的天赋"发动的部分破坏了整体的流向吗？ 如果您觉得这部分很不方便，我们会想办法改进。

因为是小团队，所以开发速度非常慢，但是会一直努力给大家带来更好的乐趣！

谢谢！ 祝您度过愉快的一周！

author: {'steamid': '76561197978330029', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 17086, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17073, 'last_played': 1690573648}

The poor quality of the translation is entirely our fault, and we'll continue to do our best to improve it.

Thank you so much for enjoying our game!

Have a good day!

author: {'steamid': '76561198859836398', 'num_games_owned': 126, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 859, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 472, 'last_played': 1706846319}
review:
Shoot street criminal point blank. Miss :(
First turn-based game I actually like, enjoyable story, music, and characters.
developer_response:
More stories and more colleagues are waiting for you. 

I recommend that you complete all the scenario missions at a low level of difficulty first. Then you can recruit more colleagues and use more diverse masteries to change your character powerfully. 

You can try again at any time after completing any kind of mission in the game. In this process, you can change the difficulty of the mission or select more people to participate in the mission. Therefore, it is not necessary to complete violent cases or normal cases from the beginning.

Enjoy the story first. Then use your strategy on the battlefield to your heart's content.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198124988101', 'num_games_owned': 131, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1296, 'last_played': 1711193228}
review: 希望有生之年能优化下建模，除了建模太丑以外，这款战棋的游戏性绝对值得一玩，不输于xcom。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

即使我们的游戏因为建模水平低而受到不好的评价，我们也无话可说。 建模的水平确实很差，因为这是玩家选择游戏的重要因素。 改进它需要大量的时间和资金，对于像我们这样小的独立游戏开发团队来说，这是一个不容易解决的问题。 但是，我们显然应该表现出更好的建模。 通过不断开发游戏，我们会找到解决问题的线索。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198973721705', 'num_games_owned': 94, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 5115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3305, 'last_played': 1692970645}
review:
游玩时长：游戏内容挺多，我光推主线，通关第一部分故事剧情就花了40多个小时。
剧情：个人感觉初期剧情内容比较尴尬，不是很自然。不过越往后写得越好，人物也逐渐鲜活起来。
玩法：战棋玩法。里面的角色天赋搭配是游戏核心亮点，不同的天赋组合战力差距真的挺大。
缺点：唯一懒得玩，也没搞懂的就是物品合成。材料数量和种类太多，也没有什么提示。所以我都懒得去合成物品和装备。
总体来说不错，值得入手。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

你根据自己充分的游戏经验，准确地提到了游戏的优缺点。 我们将以您的文章为参考，努力成为优势得到进一步发展、缺点得到改善的开发组。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198028296149', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 5255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4320, 'last_played': 1692000705}
review:
I love this game.

It seems Dandylion (maker of this game) is a small company and they put a lot of effort into it.
Game is super cheap, please buy it. Buy all the dlcs too!

The english translation is a bit weird sometimes but overall it's okay.
I'm french so I would love to help translating the game to french but that would be a lot of work (and korean => english => french isn't great)

I loved the character designs, there are a lot of beautiful artworks.
One thing I didn't really like is that you have some missions with a lot of generic soldiers to control. You can put them to auto but still it's a bit annoying.

I think a lot of reviews did that better than me but I just wanted to share some love for the game.

Thank you Dandylion!
developer_response:
You could have written a bad review of Troubleshooter just because we don't officially support French translation. But you left a good review of the game for the future of a small independent game development team.

Through future development, we will further expand the world view that you enjoyed while introducing a more diverse system. 

I sincerely hope that you will join us on our journey.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013037064', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 5445, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5119, 'last_played': 1695100064}
review:
A very fun; complex; & in-depth game that seems to have a lot to say. I really wish there were more eyes on this title.

The game play is honed in. The story makes you feel like you're watching a fun anime. Then through it all you keep finding more surprisingly fun elements buried inside. This game is exactly what it needs to be, exactly where it needs to be.
developer_response:
Many new independent game development teams appear today, and other independent game development teams disappear. As you say, the most important thing we need is the attention of gamers. But we're a game development team and what we have to appeal to gamers in the end is games. We will further improve the game so that you feel that your evaluation is not wrong after another gamer plays the game.

Thank you for this review.

일단 "진홍까마귀" DLC의 경우 시즌 패스 형태로 판매한 상태로 이번 8월말 늦어도 9월초에는 완료될 예정입니다.

이런 부분을 상점 페이지 외에 제공해드리지 못해 죄송합니다!

또한 이야기의 확장이 아니라 미완결된 느낌을 당신이 받았다는 것은 저희의 이야기 전달 능력이 부족하단 반증이라고 생각합니다. 미래의 개발에서는 이야기의 확장과 함께 분명한 끝맺음을 보여드릴 수 있도록 저희가 이야기 전달에 더욱 신경 쓸 것입니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다!

author: {'steamid': '76561198044832394', 'num_games_owned': 931, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 28610, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25986, 'last_played': 1690730322}
review:
It's an imperfect game, but it's such a good one, too.

Pacing is a little wonky up until you get your fourth party member, but gets much better afterwards.

Many of the systems are not very well-explained.  For example the food buff system is something you basically have to discover for yourself, character stats like defence and resistance are never explained, and while the very basics of masteries are introduced, the system is so complex that it's a bit like offering a three-minute tutorial to particle physics and then expecting someone to go out and become an expert in solid-state mechanics.

Still, what systems.  The mastery system is so extensive and deep that I'd bet most people have never fully explored all the possible interactions.  Crafting is more basic and functional, but still interesting.  Pets and drones offer further wrinkles and opportunities for builds.

Genuinely a piece of flawed genius to me.
While the translation is pretty shaky, the writing is not inherently bad, and had me laughing or worrying at different times.
developer_response:
You bought this game with your precious money. Therefore, you have the right to demand a perfect game from the moment you purchase the game. But we haven't lived up to your expectations and for this reason even if you leave us with a bad review, we have to accept it. However, you have allowed the development team to move forward once again through good review. We will try to make a good example of game management through updates.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125210634', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 9709, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9709, 'last_played': 1689594381}
review: 겜 무슨 원펀맨 게임으로 만들고 억까만 만드네 ㅋㅋㅋㅋ 몹만 겁나 우글거리고 겜 벨런스 조정 이따위로 하냐
developer_response:
즐거워야 할 시간을 불쾌하게 만들어 죄송합니다.

대부분 불합리하다고 느끼는 미션 대부분이 일반 난이도 기준 레벨에 맞는 노강화 상점 아이템만으로도 적절한 특성판과 전략만으로 20 ~ 30분내 해결되도록 난이도가 조절되어 있습니다.

만약 추가 난이도 설정이나 높은 난이도, 도전 모드를 사용하셔서 어려운 경우라면, 적절하게 재미를 느낄 수 있는 난이도로 낮추면 적의 숫자가 줄고 강력한 적이 줄어들어 원활한 진행이 가능하실 거라 생각합니다.

반면 난이도가 낮은 설정임에도 불구하고 많은 부분 힘든 상태라면, 저희 게임의 특성상 대부분 특성판에서 답을 찾으셔야 합니다.

예를 들어 밤 맵에 원거리 적들이 반응 공격을 많이 하는 스타일의 미션인 경우에는 밤인 경우, 적의 반응 공격을 무조건 회피하는 "어둠 사냥꾼"이라는 공용 추가 특성이 효과적입니다.

반면 다수의 적들이 빨리 제거되지 않는다면, 유대 관계, 반응 공격 위주의 협력 공격으로 한 번의 공격에 아군이 지원을 여러번 할 수 있는 형태로 적을 줄여 나가실 수 있습니다.

또한 여러 캐릭터 중 한 명의 캐릭터만 강력하게 키운 경우에는 각 캐릭터다마 특정 상황에 강력한 빌드들이 존재하여 다수의 적을 빠르게 제거하는 OP에 가까운 빌드등을 사용하셔도 무방합니다.

이 외에도 다양한 컨셉의 빌드들이 제공되고 있습니다.

다만 이러한 빌드를 찾아서 주어진 미션을 도전하는 방식을 좋아하는 분들도 계시지만 반대로 이러한 빌드를 찾아 개선하고 도전하는 것 자체가 불편하고 짜증나는 분들도 많다는 것을 잘 알고 있습니다.

그럼에도 불구하고 게임 내 제공된 적의 숫자는 해당 레벨 대 효과적으로 활용 가능한 캐릭터마다 4 ~ 8 개 정도의 다양한 빌드를 찾아야 수월해지도록 구성되어 있습니다. 결국 다양한 빌드를 통해 자신이 키우는 캐릭터를 다양하게 사용하는 경험을 제공하기 위해서는 장애물들이 계속 나오고 그것에 대한 고민을 던져야 했기 때문입니다.

이러한 방식이 많은 불쾌감을 드린 것 같습니다.

다만 이미 플레이하신 시간과 경험으로 보아 원하시는 스타일의 빌드를 구성하시면 어떤 미션이더라도 쉽게 클리어하실 것이라 믿어 의심치 않습니다.

후반 컨텐츠 디자인은 아군 플레이어 1명 당 적의 숫자가 4 ~ 5명정도로 세팅되어 있습니다. 아군이 12명인 경우, 적은 대략 50명 전후입니다.

반면 초반 적이 약한 애들이 많이 나올 경우에는 그것보다 더 많은 세팅이 존재합니다. 하지만 그 부분은 이미 클리어하셨으니 ㅠ

여튼 불쾌감을 드려 죄송합니다!

조금 더 즐거운 시간이길 바라며 저희는 꾸준한 개선을 하겠습니다!

그리고 원하시는 스타일의 특성 빌드를 빨리 찾도록 응원하겠습니다!

p.s 

방어 특성을 제대로 다시면 적에게 원펀맨 당하시지 않습니다. 대부분 원펀맨을 당하시는 이유가 살펴보면 유리대포로 만드신 경우가 많습니다. 정 안되면 충격장이나 방어적인 특성을 활용하시길 바라며, 대부분 방어적 특성을 세팅하면 왠만한 공격 다 버티도록 설계되어 있습니다. 물론 그럴경우 공격력을 잃으시게 됩니다. ㅠ

author: {'steamid': '76561198318365935', 'num_games_owned': 277, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 18642, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16295, 'last_played': 1697952772}
review:
想问开发组一个问题。我在旧电脑上玩了有272个小时了。换了新电脑后把steam的游戏存档数据转移到新电脑上去后，打开游戏只有建立新公司。旧电脑的本地Local里也并没有游戏存档。你们游戏的存档数据除了steam还有放在哪里吗？我如何才能继续玩之前的存档？我很喜欢这游戏，但真的没动力把刷了好久的内容重刷一遍

再次编辑：
感谢开发者的帮助，我才发现还真是使用的服务器不同导致的，我辛辛苦苦打出来的存档原来一直都在。说句实话，你们让我改变了之前一直觉得韩国开发不出有意思的游戏的心态。当初纷争终结者刚出的时候我就有在关注，但一直担心游戏质量问题而没有购买，现在只能说真的特别和我胃口，在我看来是不输于XCOM2的优秀作品，我会支持你们的。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果你使用在线模式进行游戏，请在开始游戏之前确认服务器。 你分别在中国服务器和亚洲服务器上拥有公司，在中国服务器上好像保存了你以前的游戏信息。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198140596123', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 6026, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3210, 'last_played': 1691173584}
review:
Ainda não terminei e recomendo, parece ser um jogo com uma campanha longa
A história e o mundo são ricos e interessantes, adorei a customização embora no inicio o sistema de pesquisar Maestrias me deixou um pouco confuso por conta da UI de pesquisa que não é tão clara.

O combate e as estratégias envolvidas durante uma missão são divertidas e as mudanças que as maestrias trazem trazem um bom impacto pro combate. (Acho extremamente divertido ver os Spoonist dando e levando counter repetidamente)
Um ponto que falta clareza do combate são os VHPD de supporte que são policiais que você pode controlar ou dar ações para eles, existe como você dar uma orientação fixa e a IA passa a controla-los, porém, achei que falta uma explicação melhor ou mais acessível dos detalhes do que cada comando faz.

As musicas são excelentes, adoro poder muda-las e até criar playlist in game que coloco par tocar enquanto fico por um bom tempo montando e experimentando as maestrias e builds dos personagens.

Recomendo muito, e vejo que os DEVS são muito ativos receptivos o que sempre é algo bom (vou continuar a review pois sei que ainda tem bastante sistemas e coisas que não vi)
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

I'm glad you like what we prepared. As you said, the UI of the game contains many functions, but it is hard to say that it is easy for gamers to use. Nevertheless, we are really grateful to you for not giving up and continuing to enjoy the game.

VHPD's AI remains at a very fundamental level. You may use more complex AI, but it soon increases the burden on the server, which can slow down the game's response. Also, many gamers wanted a way not to use VHPD as Albus's colleagues increased, so we prepared a way to get the VHPD unit to retreat from the mission. 

I think we can get better at the game. Therefore, our update will continue for the time being. The update will include various things and your review will have a big impact on the update.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199273553129', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 4619, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4164, 'last_played': 1707691251}
review: Jogo é muiiito bom, é tudo o que falam aí na seção de análise. Pra mim o único defeito é a variedade de músicas. Podia ter mais. Elas ficam cansativas bem rápido. Fora que na maior parte das vezes elas não conversam com o que tá acontecendo na estória ou combate. Acho que outro defeito tbm são as batalhas que vc tem que lutar com uma gang inteira, cara, você fica minutos esperando seu turno, coisa de louco. Vão ter análises aí que o cara tem 4000 horas de jogo, umas 1500 a 2000 foi ele indo no banheiro enquanto os mob mexem kkkkk Procure uma build q te permita fazer muita coisa com seu turno, pq tem luta que demora chegar seu turno viu. Pode comprar sem medo.
developer_response:

author: {'steamid': '76561198082115996', 'num_games_owned': 317, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 474, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 436, 'last_played': 1689340586}
review:
第一次接觸戰棋類遊戲

好玩！而且還常常更新，給製作組一個讚
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果我们准备的游戏内容能愉快地填满你的时间，那对我们来说也是很大的乐趣。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561197980630852', 'num_games_owned': 1189, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 3161, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1665, 'last_played': 1690248112}
review:
I'm sorry I slept on this game for so long!

It's a little slow out of the gate, but give it a few hours and you'll be treated to some of the best TRPG out there. The game doesn't hand hold. It's got some really deep systems and it throws you into the deep end with them.

Solidly recommend if you're into XCOM and the like.
developer_response:
XCOM is a work that has influenced us a lot, and it actually represents this genre. We will not stop developing the Troubleshooter until it can have its own identity, not just an imitation of XCOM.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198265949129', 'num_games_owned': 218, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 9856, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9834, 'last_played': 1689165661}
review:
终于通关了这个游戏，放弃了白金的想法，稍微聊下这个游戏的感受。
剧情：剧情一直是几年前几个月前的插叙倒叙手法，我忍了2章就全程skip了，剧情内容我不好说什么，这种叙述方式我忍不了。
地图：地图毫无意义的大而空，为了弥补地图空旷就不断的塞怪。
战斗：优点是能抓野兽，研发机器人，人物的天赋无比丰富，有海量的搭配；缺点是野兽托管是限员20个，仓库能放多少不清楚，但是每种最多4个。机器人耗费的材料太多了，实用层面不如野兽，成了可有可无的东西。人物天赋多是多，但是有些天赋不知道是什么，在哪里刷，只能通过其他大佬总结的表格了解。打开游戏的同时就要打开好几个表格，这是坐牢上班不是玩游戏。玩到最后都没什么成就感，敌人的性能从一开始到游戏结束都比我好，再加上他不停的堆怪，一直是处于不停读档的情况，一个小图快则半小时，慢则1个多小时的打算。
日常：游戏刚开始装备是找商人购买，但是装备价格贵，自己又没钱，刷任务的钱只能是皮毛，大头是通过管辖区获取。但是管辖区要到中后期才给你开几个。我中后期都不怎么需要钱了，你才来给我？这管辖区就是坨屎。
装备：材料耗费大户，我打到快结局一直分解装备都喂不起一套装备。一直穿射手区买的和精英怪掉落的红装，那装备系统实在不是我能搞得起的。这材料需求不大砍，就是个废物系统。还有鉴定刷词条这玩意。
总结：你闲的实在没什么游戏玩，又喜欢玩战旗游戏可以考虑，但是别开安全以外的难度就这么一直通到结局。别考虑其他什么的装备天赋，你越深入了解这个游戏，就会越坐牢。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

很抱歉我们准备的游戏系统给你带来了不好的体验。 你经历了很长时间的游戏，可以默默地放弃游戏，但是这样分享了我们很好的经验。 我们会以反省你的经验为契机，努力制作更好的游戏。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198066109691', 'num_games_owned': 145, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 3753, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3753, 'last_played': 1689151943}
review:
This is an enjoyable SRPG in many ways and I recommend it if you enjoy those. Plenty of other people have written about why the game is good, so I encourage you to read those reviews for a more comprehensive view of the game.

Instead I'd like to mention why I am putting the game down. While I loved the available customization, I was very sad to see how restrictive the class choices are. Each character is able to choose between two advanced character classes at level 15 - and those choices really do matter, heavily impacting your playstyle in a good way. But that is also where it stops; there are no more class advancements in the many levels after that point. This means that while you can improve your characters, they cannot be fundamentally altered. I can't make Albus (the protagonist) into a gun or a fist user. Nor can I make Anne (a support healer character) into a (very cute) sniper. 

I would have loved to be able to do role swaps like these because it makes characters feel a lot less rigid in terms of gameplay. When each character only has access to one, maybe two, types of weapons, it means that they are locked into a specific overall playstyle. That is something I personally dislike, especially given the fantastic customization the game otherwise offers.

Lastly: Even though I have focused on one negative point in this review, please let me give the developers a lot of praise. I loved the time I spent with the game. I think you did a great job with the character designs, and the music is always good with a few standout tracks. I'm greatly looking forward to whatever comes next from Dandylion!

P.S.: I really wish Irene got a dress or skirt costume! She already looks so good!
developer_response:
I'm sorry that we couldn't provide what you wanted due to the game's settings we thought about. When we set up a character, we design the character considering the weapons and actions that the character can best handle. So it was hard for us to imagine Anne shooting and Albus fighting close-up. But I think it would have been nice if we could introduce more characters. I wish I could have shown you how to team up for the next battlefield while having a lot of characters with more unique jobs and fighting styles, but I'm very sorry we couldn't do that.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198828828702', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 508, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1694612423}
review: 非常好玩的战棋游戏
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果我们准备的游戏内容能愉快地填满你的时间，那对我们来说也是很大的乐趣。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198235954196', 'num_games_owned': 116, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 5554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5545, 'last_played': 1690679412}
review: 游戏立绘不错，可惜建模稀烂，游戏剧情也是平铺直叙，没有分支，缺少高潮，要不是游戏结束播放一段结束动画，我甚至不知道我已经通关了，看游戏后续dlc就知道，这个游戏剧情压根就没做完，剧情党不建议入；玩法上算是中规中矩的策略战旗游戏，也缝合了一些刷刷刷要素，可惜光是这些并不能让我感到满意。游戏副本堆怪过于严重了，即使我把所有加速项都打开，每局也要30分钟到两小时，真可谓“量大管饱”，游戏全程也是完全战旗模式，也没有脱战状态下的优化，让人物能高速自由移动，到了一些需要采集或者超长距离的移动就令人非常恼火。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我们感到非常遗憾，【分争调整者】好像给你带来了整体不好的经验。 为了改善你所说的缺点，我们从游戏发行到现在一直应用大大小小的更新。 这些缺点不会在某个时刻消失。 但是即使考虑到这些缺点，开发组也会继续努力制作能够充分传达愉快体验的游戏。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198057240710', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2658, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 30, 'playtime_at_review': 1859, 'last_played': 1711743792}
review:
之前在找XCOM的同类型游戏，在B站看到很多人在推这游戏，说是神作，于是就趁着特惠买来试试。
简单的说下优缺点吧。
优点：
1，画面，整体画面还是比较舒服的，第一次玩的时候很有XCOM的感觉
2，音乐，游戏里的配乐和配音都不错，很热血的感觉
3，角色，游戏人物刻画的相当不错，对于我这种中二情节重的人来说，在角色设计和上比XCOM更优秀
ok，这三个就是这个游戏的优点。。。也就是说，相比较XCOM，他的角色更具代入感，每个人物都有自己的故事和剧情，不像XCOM，整个游戏都以第一视角的指挥官来呈现。
说完优点，那么就要来说说缺点了。
1，装备，繁琐的装备词条，但是针对装备的区别只有颜色和文字，可以说这装备给我感觉体验感非常差，就像一款文字游戏的装备显示一样。
2，天赋，天赋系统应该是这个游戏的主要培养点了，比起装备，天赋的作用其实更大，但是天赋看似自由组合，实际是固定组合，与装备系统一样，多样且繁琐的天赋词条，90%的天赋存在的意义只是为了合成高级词条，看着很杂很乱。
3，战斗模式，这是我最想吐槽的一个点，目前仅仅玩到第二章开头，基本上过一个地图要要30-45分钟，就目前快节奏的生活来说，真的没什么时间一天花5-6个小时去过7-8个图和人物，不仅对整个游戏的推进慢，任务获得的报酬也一般，第一次过某BOSS的时候打了一件红装，后面操作失误分解了，就准备在打一次，发现不是必掉的，但是过这张图起码要40分钟的时间，于是放弃了，每个场景地图设计都很大，而最诡异的是一个战旗游戏的地图迷雾居然是循环的，也就是已经探索过的地方，人不在了，迷雾会重启，很多地图敌人时散开的，导致经常要花时间去搜索敌人，这让我很不解，包括救援脱离的任务也是，你探索完一整张地图后，它告诉你救到的人要一个一个回到起点位置，操作实在繁琐
其余的多的就不说了，这个游戏在整个圈子火不起来，缺点是很明显的，而且这种缺点会劝退大部分玩家，XCOM你可以明显感觉到游戏的节奏紧凑，一张图基本10-15分钟过，能明显看到对团队培养的提升和改变，这些都是这个游戏不具备的，却也是站旗游戏最重要的地方，反而游戏本身的优点对于站旗游戏来说并不是什么总要的点了，不如做成JRPG或许会更出色
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

【分争调整者】受到了XCOM的影响。 因此，【分争调整者】的类型可以说是战棋。 但我们知道很多人并不单纯想要XCOM的模仿作品。 所以我们不得不更新其他游戏中找不到的元素。 

我们决定让游戏的故事和角色的成长成为游戏的特征。 同时结合了很多RPG的要素，结果有人称【分争调整者】为战棋，也有人称其为SRPG。

我们一直在努力使A的身份更加明确。 这个过程结束后，不知道【分争调整者】的体裁是战棋还是SRPG。 但是不管是什么，我们都会继续努力，使【分争调整者】这个品牌更加明确。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198209142280', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1688885345}
review:
劣化XCOM
これにつきる
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機の力を借りて作成されました。)

私たちのゲームがこのレビューのように評価されるのは本当に悲しいことです。力量が足りず、第一印象でXCOMのようなゲームと比較される部分で多くの反省をしています。

ただ、XCOMとは全く違う方向性を追求しており、第一印象を通過した多くの方がXCOMとは違うゲームだと言ってくれています。

いつか長い時間座ってSRPGのジャンルの感覚を楽しみたい方は、もう一度プレイしてくれることを期待しています。

その日まで、もっと楽しんでいただけるよう、着実に改善していきます。

私たちのゲームに興味を持っていただきありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198007927189', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 29423, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6075, 'last_played': 1709084874}
review:
Wow! This game was in my library for a long time, but I never got the energy to start playing it. I kept seeing positive comments and reviews about it on reddit and youtube so eventually I mastered the courage to dive in.

And boy am I glad I did. This game is AWESOME! If you like turn based tactics games like XCom, then you're going to LOOOVE this! This is Xcom on STEROIDS!

The fact there are all these characters with their unique classes and abilities and masteries and stories and intricate relationships, adds soo much flavour to the game and makes you more invested in the fights to progress the story.
The art style is also EXCELLENT imo and makes the immersion even better. Hats off to the devs.

But the thing that is really impressive about this game, is the amount of CONTENT. God damn there's a lot of content in this game! Even if you buy the game at full price, you're going to get your money's worth and then some. There's just so  much here I wont even start cause this review will end up being massive.

If anyone from Dandylion is reading this, you have made a faithful fan in me. I am going to be following you guys and supporting you in anything you do (I've been buying additional dlc just to show some support). You deserve it for the crazy amount of work you have done here. Mad respect and I cant wait to see what more you guys create. I absolutely love the characters and relationships and depth you've tried to add.

The only thing I could be critical of, is that the writing -the main plot specifically- feels at times a little contrived and amateurish, but then again, considering the scope, the amount of content, the massive world building they have done and the fact this is all coming from an indie game studio with only one game under their belt, then you have to admit that it's unrealistic to expect them to have incredible writing as well. Hell, I love the story even with it's minor flaws! :)

TLDR:
If you love turn based tactics games like XCOM, do yourself a huge favour and play this! And support the devs!
developer_response:
First of all, we start our monday mornings happily by reading your reviews!

We are so happy to hear that you've enjoyed our game despite it had sit in your library list for a long time. We really repect your challenge! Classes, masteries, stories and relationsahip are all for players' pleasures, so we are SO HAPPY you enjoyed.

Nevertheless, we recognize that our development capabilities are limited. As you pointed out, we will continue to work on getting the writing elements a little better.

We'll do our best to bring you more pleasures!

Have a good week!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198039363975', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 165, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 242, 'last_played': 1701666948}
review:
Amazing game specially since I Iove Jrpgs and Xcom but it seems the game is not working properly for me. it take absurd amount of time to load the game like 10 mins to enter another 10 mins to continue my save and another 10 mins of load time each time i start a missions...I have a fast SSD this should't happen. But besides that, the lag oh the lag is annoyingly constant specially in combat. I can run Cyberpunk max setting but not this game? is my rig the issue? idk The Save system is not working well either I just did a almost an 1 hours missions just for the game to not save when I log out.....its a shame because I am sure I will love this game but with all this problems is just annoying experience.

Edit: the Devs actually helped me  and now I can play the game with a better performance. still rough around some area specially in combat the lag still a bit annoying  but is better. I will wait a bit before continue the game I am sure the Devs will eventually improve the overall performance of the game in time
developer_response:
Sorry for the inconvenience. 

The situation you describe seems to be a very strange one that doesn't happen to most users. Could you help us to check your situation?

You can send us your log through "Option" > "Error Report"

If you send us a log, we'll try to find out what's causing the lag you're experiencing and get back to you. So when sending us your logs, please make sure to include the correct email address for us to respond to! 

We applied a friend to make sure we had the right information. If you accept the friend request, we can share this issue in more detail in a direct chat!

We'll do our best to solve your problem!

Thank you!

author: {'steamid': '76561199392806930', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 4234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2567, 'last_played': 1694610946}
review:
턴제 전략 게임은 제 취향이 아니어서 애초에 쳐다도 안 보거나 한 번 찍 먹 해보고 아니다 싶어 환불 무조건 했는데..
이 게임은 정말 시간 가는 줄도 모르고 계속 붙잡고 하고 있어요. 너무너무 재미있습니다 ㅠㅠ 갓겜! 최고!
developer_response:
취향이 아닌 장르 게임임에도 불구하고 즐겁게 즐겨주신다니 그저 감사할 뿐입니다!!

저희 역량이 많이 부족하지만 즐겁게 즐겨주시기만을 바라며 꾸준히 개선하고 발전시키고 있습니다. 그런 과정에 힘든 일도 많지만 이런 평가를 읽을 때 정말 많은 힘을 얻어갑니다!

무더운 여름 건강 잘 챙기시면서 즐거운 시간 가득하길 바라겠습니다!

진심으로 감사합니다!

author: {'steamid': '76561198849560012', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 28252, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26337, 'last_played': 1690480996}
review:
感觉我的时长足以证明一切。

一开始是冲着剧情和画风来的，毕竟封面的艾琳真的好可爱^q^加上我挺喜欢战棋类游戏，像是火纹什么的，就试了一试。结果非常惊喜。这个游戏有着自己较为完善且吸引人的世界观和人设，硬要说的话更像群像剧。不过因为我一开始代入了阿尔伯斯，到后面一直在“老板你不要工作了！！！多和你的同事聊聊天啊啊啊啊啊。”不过想到阿尔伯斯那么努力想要提高公司级别然后追查过往又没法说什么（泪）。所以制作组写剧情的时候能让大家更亲密一点吗，我经常有种虽然工作中他们彼此信赖，但是实际上他们互相并不了解的可惜的感觉。不过只是我的一点牢骚啦，剧情还是不错的。
玩法的话也非常有趣，尤其是天赋装配，真的很有趣（也很折磨）。尤其是有关系网后可以夹攻和掩护，感觉互相的信任更有了实质感。

总之，叽里呱啦说了一堆就是想说，游戏很好玩，喜欢策略类或者战棋类的朋友值得一试。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

当一个新的角色被引入时，游戏的故事就围绕着这个角色的故事展开，因此，每个角色的故事通常在一个章节中讲述，之后讲述更多的机会就更少了。 许多人觉得这很令人沮丧，觉得游戏的故事从来没有完整的感觉。我们同意，这就是为什么即使我们完成了 "纷争终结者: 被遗弃的孩子们" 的故事，"阿尔伯斯" 和 "瓦尔哈拉" 的故事将在我们的下一个游戏中继续。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198451705792', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 14403, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6962, 'last_played': 1690098298}
review:
剧情很好的一部战棋类游戏，在人物性格塑造和作战布置策略方面都设计的很好。

不足：新手引导不充分，尤其是在材料收集和装备制作方面，新手往往不知道如何打造装备和收集对应材料。部分UI和筛选功能依旧需要优化，比如在分解装备时只能手动选择，而不能按等级条件一键筛选。人物的职业和技能搭配较少，不能灵活搭配队伍，这个问题应该随着内容开发能完善。

优点：人物塑造方面是无可挑剔的，每个人物都个性鲜明。天赋的搭配种类繁多，不同的搭配与人物选择是能够提供多样性的玩法的。在战斗方面非常考验策略，良好的战略部署可以不伤分毫解决对面的敌人，当然部署不当也会让你的角色暴毙。整体而言，受不同天赋build和战略部署的影响，游戏的重复度并不是很高。

个人建议：请继续开发新的dlc，把故事讲完，并完善各种系统（技能，天赋等），千万不要烂尾啊。希望能够推出多人模式，让玩家去使用自己的角色与其他玩家培养的角色组队进行任务和挑战。

A battle board game with a good story telling, designed well in character shaping and combat layout strategies.

Cons: Insufficient guidance for beginners, especially in material collection and equipment crafting, beginners often do not know how to craft equipment and collect corresponding materials. Some UI and filtering functions still need to be improved, for example, no grade/level filtering criteria when salvaging equipment. The combination of characters' professions and skills is limited, and they cannot flexibly match with other team members. This issue should be improved with the development of content.

Pros: The character shaping aspect is impeccable, with each character having a distinct personality. There are various sets and effects of mastery, and different builds and characters can provide diverse gameplay. In terms of combat, it is a great test of strategy. A good strategic deployment can easily solve the opponent without any damage, but improper deployment can lead to a sudden death of your character. Overall, the repetitiveness of the game is not very high due to different mastery builds and strategic deployments.

Personal suggestion: Please continue to develop new DLCs, finish the story, and improve current systems (skills, talents, etc.), and don't cut off the game development. I expect to have a multiplayer mode where players can use their own characters to team up with characters built by other players for tasks and challenges.

Expecting your responses :)
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

不会发生把游戏留作未完成的事情。 即使 "纷争终结者: 被遗弃的孩子们" 完成了开发，瓦尔哈拉的故事也会通过后续作品继续扩大。 如果我们的游戏制作技术熟练，可以提供更好的UI来实现你所说的功能。 开发co-op随时都可以。 但是,如果在战棋类型的游戏中如何优化等待他人转身结束的苦恼，就很难实际展示相关功能。 虽然现在在DLC的更新中使用了所有开发资源，但是即使DLC的更新完成了，那也不会是游戏更新的结束。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198159935923', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 8799, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8799, 'last_played': 1687347577}
review:
我目前玩過最好玩的戰棋遊戲之一，原本以為XCOM已經是天花板了。
就算不喜歡這種類型的遊戲，可能也會玩過就喜歡了。
當然遊戲有一些缺點。

一，感覺裝備的驚喜不夠，但其他部分可以玩的內容跟變化其實挺豐富了，算是彌補了裝備內容不足的部分，如果能夠更方便的製作裝備（玩到50級沒做過幾件裝備... 這個製作裝備的功能沒有存在感）或有類似End Game後大秘境的副本，讓玩家可以用類似隨機產生的副本刷千變萬化的裝備，賦予角色其他的可能性，可以大幅度改善後期沒事做的窘境。

(例如：直接給裝備加上詞條，解決後期欄位不足的問題)　（例：給紫色劍客裝備加上狂戰士，等於防禦可以省掉一個欄位，可以在角色天賦中使用其他相關詞條，連動產生成套效果，高級的紅色裝備則可以考慮直接給成套詞條，但身上只限一件成套詞條裝備生效，例如直接給"九死一生"或"骨肉斬連"套裝效果。或附加隨機兩個單獨詞條，例如幸運、冒險家）。

二，到了中期後才出現的寵物跟機器人，感覺有點煩...　是兩個全新的系統，寵物還好，天賦模式跟人的相似，那個機器人又難做，感覺也沒寵物好用，刷都懶得刷，帶上工程師就只有放個誘餌，放個光環的效果，駭客功能難用成功率又低，有點可惜。

總結，這是一款好遊戲，即使不特價都很值得買，縱然不是非常完美，但絕對值得原價買的內容跟品質。
不知道製作團隊還有沒有其他遊戲的計畫? 或是這個遊戲的後續是不是還有其他的較大更新計畫?
希望將來還有機會玩你們家製作的遊戲，保持下去，加油，還有謝謝~
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

无论开发组准备多少系统,如果玩家没有体验到，那么该系统就等于没有。 在这种情况下，无论游戏的价格多么便宜，都会成为充满无用的系统的游戏。 不是每个玩家都在一个游戏上投入同样的时间。 但是为了不让废弃的系统存在，我们会尽快准备提高游戏内容使用性的更新。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198031313717', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 709, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 709, 'last_played': 1688369235}
review:
ゲームの
〇　初期戦闘自体はまあまあ面白いけど（XCOMスタイルのおかげ）、
但し：キャラ集めが３人以上の段階に入ると。
✖　進展が遅い。
✖　採集・材料集め（時間つぶし）の要素が重い
✖　街で不要なマップ移動要素が入り。歩きまわる、視点転換など意味のない操作要。
よって、XCOM 自体か、別の XCOMスタイルのゲーム（今は結構ある）を遊ぶ方が、よっぽと快適。
（尚、主要キャラの多くは KOF 風味。炎・雷・風などを投げて戦う。銃が有るなら銃を使えよ）
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

最近のゲームトレンドはゲーム進行に不必要なものを果敢に除去し、早い時間内にゲームの核心要素を楽しめるようゲーマーを配慮しています。 このようなトレンドに比べると、私たちは多くの点でこのようなトレンドとは逆の古いゲームスタイルを維持しています。 旧式だからといって、すべてが悪いとは思いません。 ただ、新しいトレンドを融合させようとする努力が私たちに足りなかったのではないかと私たちはゲームをもう一度検討します。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561199144049520', 'num_games_owned': 97, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1688288165}
review: 打击反馈很差，很难有行动的感觉，个人原因吧，游戏还是不错的
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

谢谢你的好意见。 我认为你指出的部分肯定有要修改的地方。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198034002855', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 5227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5227, 'last_played': 1684594240}
review:
お勧めするかしないかで言うと、すごく悩むけどお勧めじゃない
理由としては以下の通り

・ストーリーが完結しない（一応の決着は付く）
・戦闘がなっっっがい（面白いは面白い）
・システムが難解（そこまで難しくはない）

普通に面白いし、適当なビルドでも進められるし
戦闘が長いのはまあ、そういうゲームだと思えば良い

ただ一点ストーリーがちゃんと完結しないのだけが辛い
キャラめっちゃ立ってる（空気が何名かいるが）し
世界観自体は良いのに風呂敷を広げ過ぎて畳むの無理だろ…状態
大まかに3つぐらいのラインが並行して進んでいくので
それぞれが中途半端なところまでしか進まないのがマイナス
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

私たちはあなたの批判を謙虚に受け入れます。 しかし、【トラブルシューター】の世界観は、私たちのもう一つのDLCあるいは未来の作品を通じて拡張され続けるでしょう。 私たちの開発能力が不足しており、これを迅速に展開できなかったことは申し訳ありません。 これから続くアルバスとヴァルハラの話をずっと見守ってください。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198236461558', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 13578, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5700, 'last_played': 1694636890}
review:
[b]TL;DR[/b] excellent game. The translation as of this review is 9/10, meaning that while it's still imperfect here and there, you always get a clear picture of what is being said (everything worth remembering is written, VA is minimal and irrelevant to the plot or the mechanics). If you liked XCOM, you'll like this. [spoiler]In fact, as someone who played XCOM since Chrysalids had two legs, I dare say it's more strategic than XCOM, which is pretty streamlined for the "wider audience".[/spoiler] If you liked Fire Emblem, you'll like this.

At 95 hours, I'm maybe 2/3rds into the game, which for its price point is ridiculously good. For reference, you can complete XCOM1 at least twice in that time frame, probably 3 times.

[b]Gameplay-wise[/b] it's pretty deep. I'm not a true min-maxer but I enjoy creating efficient builds for each character. While gearing up your crew is not trivial, the juicy part in optimising them lies in their masteries, which can be combined to form sets for extra effects. Your enemies are built using the same system, which can be humbling when you face them, and inspirational when you're wondering how best to build each character. For instance, I built Albus, our protagonist, into a speedy tank, whose offensive output mostly comes from counterattacking in melee, turning him into a blender whenever enemy melee units swarm him. Another character I turned into a very fast mobile artillery platform whose basic attacks remove all buffs from everyone hit in its 3x3 AoE. It's a giggle.

[b]Story-wise[/b] it's very good, too. It's pretty simple and straightforward in broad strokes but the sheer humanity of it gets you hooked. The game has a heavy focus on personal relationships, shared pasts, and desired futures, and unlike most games these days, each character, from crew member to the shopkeeper, has their own personality and relationship with each character. Again, it's not rocket science, it's pure attention to detail and humanity, without trying to shove any kind of ideology down your throat, so much so that even 2/3rds into it I can't really call anyone a "villain" and even "antagonist" feels sketchy because thus far everyone is operating on entirely understandable motivations, without any forced drama or bullshit.

Personally, I think this game deserves more attention and praise as a very good strategy RPG.
developer_response:
I'm glad that you like the story and game method we prepared. We've been influenced a lot by XCOM and I think Fire Emblem is the most prominent game in the recent SRPG. It's a great honor for us if you thought of XCOM and Fire Emblem after experiencing our game.

But our worries also begin. Gamers want new games, not just imitations of XCOM and Fire Emblem. We need to make the brand Troubleshooter more firm. To do that, we need to create our own characteristics that we can't find in other games. We will continue to think and add content to solve these problems with the remaining updates.

Over time, we will do our best to improve the game so that the Troubleshooter can be a comparison when evaluating other games.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198878755605', 'num_games_owned': 110, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 6564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4191, 'last_played': 1696054386}
review:
本体已通关，玩爽了，第一次玩这种类型的回合制战棋游戏，体验还是相当不错的。剧情方面，本体的剧情还行，没有高血压剧情，甚至世界观还蛮大的，挖了很多坑，希望制作组能用心把故事写完，感觉好好经营有希望能做成一个大ip的。玩法方面也挺有趣，有些系统还挺复杂的，说实话没玩明白，但角色的技能还蛮不错的，上手较为容易。
总之，希望制作组能继续加油，也欢迎更多玩家来体验这款游戏！
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我们也想扩大瓦尔哈拉的世界观。虽然在这次游戏中没能说很多，但是那些肯定会通过我们的未来开发来讲述的。请关注我们未来的开发！

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561197973904865', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1687563756}
review:
Combat is fun enough, like XCOM 2 but with more depth. 

Loads and loads of gameplay mechanics, stats, and systems which are poorly explained and kind of firehosed at you throughout the first several hours. I found myself forgetting what things were, how to get them, and how to even access certain menus because the interface is pretty convoluted.

Translation is quite bad, voice acting is often kind of annoying, story didn't hook me at all in the first few hours. 

May be a good game, but not for me.
developer_response:
I'm sorry that the game we made didn't suit your taste. On the other hand, it was an opportunity to think about how to make gamers more immersed in the beginning of the game more effectively. We will do more research on game development so that we don't use this opportunity in vain.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198282653871', 'num_games_owned': 173, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 8303, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8213, 'last_played': 1690600833}
review:
这游戏我居然原来没评价过？人物养成的玩法顶级，宠物和战斗机器人的培养也挺有趣，战斗策略玩法也很有趣，剧情挺好（背景别深究），立绘顶级。只要对这类游戏SRPG的玩法不反感，基本打折了就可以无脑买。
这个游戏我觉得唯一麻烦的地方就是战斗节奏有点慢，很多战斗第一次玩大概要玩一两个小时，挺杀时间的。在线模式等掉率加倍的时间也有点需要缘分，虽然挺频繁的。这两年太忙了反而玩得少了，剧情一直没推下去了，挺喜欢吉赛尔和黑星的，单纯就是强。
而且制作组的态度极好，一直在努力更新和维护。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

感谢您在百忙之中抽出时间选择我们的游戏。 另外，很抱歉在您的有限时间内，我们没有完全传达游戏的乐趣。 如果你有一天再有时间的话，请一定再来拜访我们。 这段时间我们会不断改进游戏。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198079484396', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 1824, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1115, 'last_played': 1706555495}
developer_response:
When we started making Troubleshooter, we were greatly influenced by XCOM. At the same time, we had to present a unique element of Troubleshooter. Many gamers wanted a distinctive game, not just a copy game of XCOM. 

We have further highlighted the character's growth factors through the story, and this trend has led Troubleshooter to receive elements of the JRPG. It's probably because of our development direction that you think of Fire Emblem more than XCOM when you look at Troubleshooter.

It takes a certain amount of time for all team members to join the team because we follow the grammar of traditional JRPG. However, this part is still receiving a lot of criticism because I couldn't update this to match the current game trend. This part must be improved in our follow-up.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198303695178', 'num_games_owned': 64, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 12295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2722, 'last_played': 1707972750}
review: 我大概两年前入手了这款游戏，一开始玩的时候我觉得是XCOM，玩了大概几小时后就在仓库吃灰了。年初看到游戏一直在更新，便重新玩了起来，深入游戏后发现游戏并不是简简单单的策略战旗，里面包含了很多SRPG元素，由其是庞大的天赋系统。而获得天赋需要刷刷刷，所以比起许多线性流程的战旗游戏更有乐趣，但也更肝。制作组在日益快节奏的今天还能出坚持不断更新慢节奏的战旗游戏真的很不容易，虽然后面的人物没有解锁，但我已经补全了所有套装DLC，算是我作为一名战旗爱好者的一点支持吧。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

" 制作组在日益快节奏的今天还能出坚持不断更新慢节奏的战旗游戏真的很不容易 "

我在这方面真的很感动。正如你所说，【分争调整者】有很多不符合最近游戏趋势的地方。但是游戏的本质没有改变，所以我认为肯定有人想要像【分争调整者】一样的游戏。我认为，为了这些人，至少有一个游戏开发组比较好。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198172029303', 'num_games_owned': 97, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 4496, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4496, 'last_played': 1687805486}
review:
옛날에 사두고 묵혀두다가, 최근에 플레이 하고 평가 남깁니다.

게임성 좋습니다. SRPG의 장점 잘 살린 작품이 맞습니다. 나름의 독창적인 게임성도 있습니다.
다만 요즘 게임의 트렌드는 호흡이 짧다는 점입니다.
지루하고 진부하다고 느껴질 수 있는 JRPG의 단점을 답습했다는 것이 조금 안타깝습니다.
레벨링, 및 아이템 파밍, 게임맵 디자인.... 스토리 전개속도나 몰입도 등등...
의도한 특색이라면 어쩔 수 없겠지만 그래도 여전히 좋은 작품임에는 틀림 없습니다.

무엇보다도 이 게임이 나온지 꽤 되었는데 지속적인 업데이트는 긍정적인 부분이라 생각합니다.
국내에서 이런 게임에 도전할 수 있는 회사가 얼마나 될까요?
xcom시리즈 여러 전략DnD라이크 게임, 파이어엠블렘 시리즈, 택티스 시리즈 등 
장르의 특성상 메인이 되기 어려운 게임, 그러나 많은 팬이 있는 것도 사실.
트러블슈터도 성공한 게임이 되길 빌어봅니다.
developer_response:
많은 부분 현재 트렌드와 경쟁하여 좋은 작품을 만들 역량이 없다보니 차라리 엉덩이 붙이고 오랜 시간 플레이 하시는 분들의 취향에 맞춰 게임을 제작한 현실이 있습니다. ㅠ

제작자 평균 연령이 40이 넘다보니 트렌드를 쫓아가려해도 잘 이해하지 못하는 부분이 많은 아픈 부분도 있습니다.

그럼에도 불구하고 저희가 만들 수 있는 컨텐츠, 그리고 재미를 통해 조금이라도 게임을 찾아주신 분들에게 더 많은 재미를 드리려고 최선을 다하고 있습니다.

또한 부족한 부분은 꾸준히 개선하고 말씀하신 트렌드를 반영할 수 있도록 계속 눈과 귀를 열고 발전해나도록 하겠습니다!

저희 게임의 성공을 빌어주셔서 진심으로 감사합니다.

좋은 밤, 여름 되시길 바라겠습니다!

감사합니다!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198843482136', 'num_games_owned': 1908, 'num_reviews': 366, 'playtime_forever': 269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 269, 'last_played': 1687787734}
review:
《纷争终结者》：养成深渊，时间杀手，没想到这是战棋吧
[h1] 前言 [/h1]
“XCOM系列”应该是战棋游戏里的天花板之一了，而类似的游戏层出不穷，优秀者寥寥无几，《纷争终结者》就是其中的少数之一。独立游戏向来缺乏热度，一些优秀游戏就埋没于茫茫多的游戏海里，如果你也喜欢类xcom类型的游戏，《纷争终结者》就不容错过。

[h1] 游戏简介 [/h1]
游戏剧情中规中矩，主要讲述了英雄打击罪犯的故事，多条剧情线交织，CG数量颇多，横向对比其它战棋游戏，算是十分优秀的一类了。在游戏性方面，相比《xcom》，《纷争终结者》明显休闲很多，没有角色永久死亡这样严重的惩罚，因此在局内策略方面有些比不上，但这不意味着《纷争终结者》策略性不强，上百种天赋在一起，等着玩家去寻找合适的组合，策略性可一点也不少。

[h1] 优秀的养成系统 [/h1]
谈回合制战斗，地形和技能等足够优秀但没什么创新；谈剧情，缺少足够多的高燃或是感人至深的故事。真正让“纷争终结者”出彩的地方在于丰富的养成——看着自己钻研出来的套路打爆敌人，可谓是乐趣无穷。

养成里最耀眼的绝对是天赋系统，其它诸如装备系统等就略显平庸。商店页面介绍有800个以上的专门化的天赋和40个以上的附加天赋，反正我是真的测不出来这么多，不过光是体验过的搭配就很有趣。天赋分为个人天赋，额外天赋和职业天赋等。个人天赋是角色一开始就可选的，影响其发展方向。额外天赋就很丰富了，分为普通、攻击、防御、辅助和技能五个栏位，每个角色的栏位数量不同，因此最终的天赋搭配也不尽相同。回到前面所说的上百种天赋，你应该可以想象这个搭配有多丰富了。搭配所产出的联合效果会让玩家很有成就感，比如艾琳搭配几个关于英雄的天赋，就能无限维持正面状态，十分强力。还有同样优秀的职业天赋，后面可以搭配出反击必定命中这样厉害的效果——玩过“xcom”的想必都被贴脸miss折磨过吧。

[h1] 总结 [/h1]
关于天赋的介绍甚至还是很少的一部分，游戏内还有素材，强化，合成等更多内容，我愿称之为养成深渊。游戏偏向于慢热，肝肝肝的内容就有上百个小时，后期一局甚至要一个小时，又一款时间杀手实锤了。

[h1]————————————[/h1]
[h1]欢迎关注或加入鉴赏家：游话好说。我们是一群游戏爱好者，希望能评测来帮助大家认识更多好游戏，期待您的同行！[/h1]
[u]https://store.steampowered.com/curator/42228259[/u]
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我拜访了你留下的地址。 那里真的有很多游戏，而且【分争调整者】可以包含在那个目录中，我们开发组真的很开心。 另一方面，也担心【分争调整者】能否像您目录中的游戏一样提供那么漂亮的角色和画面。 我担心你的游戏列表中的【分争调整者】会不会成为缺点。 但是事情已经这样了，为了让【分争调整者】在你的游戏目录中更加耀眼，我们会继续改善【分争调整者】。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561197983763092', 'num_games_owned': 1299, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 1976, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1976, 'last_played': 1683041131}
review: Excellent game with a turn based x-com type combat system.  It has a pretty good story and characters but creating a build for your character is the main star of the show, there is a rediculous amount of abilities/upgrades in game that you can get from defeating enemies in missions (you can replay them to get ones you missed).  Some characters have gameplay mechanics that only they have (one character builds drones, one tames and uses animals) it's crazy how many updates the devs have put out for this game.  These updates are basically expansions, with new characters, stories and other stuff and they are all free.  All the paid dlc are cosmetic only aside from one (and it's cheap).  Fantastic value for the cost of entry if you enjoy this type of game.
developer_response:
It's obviously good news for the people who made it that an item has good merchantability for its price. This is true for games and it would be good news for gamers. If we think that the games we've created are in this category, we're happy to continue developing them.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198147270786', 'num_games_owned': 226, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 18096, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2530, 'last_played': 1690007419}
review:
Loving it. I actually bought it a few months ago and refunded it, at that time I was looking for some strategy game and hadn't played XCOM yet, the seemed-complex mechanism filter this game out of my radar. But now I am back after played through XCOM2 and found what is meaningful and saw how other players were sharing [h1] what a incredible DEV group they are[/h1] 
Just one tiny feedback here, to me it is a bit of regretful to miss collecting any box in a mission and I didn't want to go back to restart the whole mission just because that one box. Curious to hear if the DEV had thought of this situation before.
developer_response:
The Troubleshooter was actually heavily influenced by XCOM. But we're looking for a lot of changes to make the Troubleshooter not just a copy of XCOM, but a new brand. Please continue to watch our changes.

" to miss collecting any box in a mission and I didn't want to go back to restart the whole mission just because that one box "

I fully understand how you feel. Most of the time it has little effect on the game, but it's still a fact that it bothers players. We also have a lot of concerns between game elements and ease of play. But I haven't found the answer yet.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198134349990', 'num_games_owned': 243, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 973, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 954, 'last_played': 1687624262}
review: 개인적으로 맵 좁히고 RPG성 더 높였으면 좋았을 거라 생각 함
developer_response:
저희가 제작 당시 방향이 소수 vs 다수의 방향으로 게임 방향성으로 개발하다보니 현재와 같은 상황이 되었습니다.

맵이 크셔서 지루해지시는 부분은 결국 반복 작업과 속도와 많은 연관성이 있는 부분이니 "환경 설정"의 "게임 플레이" 에서  "아군 행동 빠르게 연출" / "아군 외 행동 빠르게 연출" 옵션 설정을 통해 익숙해진 동작들을 가속하여 게임을 빠르게 진행하실 수 있습니다.

이 외에도 다양한 익숙해진 정보를 간략화하여 게임 전체 속도를 빠르게하는 옵션이 "게임 플레이" 탭에 존재합니다.

말씀하신 부분을 직접적으로 만족시켜드리진 못하는 방향성이지만 다양한 경험이 최대한 불쾌감이 적어질 수 있도록 최선을 다해 개선하겠습니다!

찾아주셔서 감사합니다!

author: {'steamid': '76561197992973088', 'num_games_owned': 940, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1687405070}
review: game crashed my computer 4 times in the tutorial so i am done and refunding.
developer_response:
Sorry for rhe inconvenience!

We are so glad to hear you've already refunded it.

If you're interested in purchasing our game again in the future, so buy our game and it crashes again, please send us a log below and we'll do our best to resolve it.


[h3]Sending Log Files[/h3]

You can send us your log files automatically by using "ERROR REPORT" in game option. If you can't run the game client, you can send log files by running "LogTransporter.exe" manually. You can find them below path.

LIBRARY → HOME → Troubleshooter → Properties → LOCAL FILES → BROWSE LOCAL FILES... → Release → bin → LogTransporter.exe

Please run LogTransporter.exe. You can see two blanks and a check box. Write your email address in the above blank. The development will send reply to this address. the other one is description about error situation. If you have any extra information about the issue, please write anything about it.

You can send all your log files by checking the "Include all log files" check box. The development team strongly recommends you to check this. They are really helpful to find out the causes.

Thank you!

or

You can send your log through "Option" > "Error Report".

author: {'steamid': '76561198135141296', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 31989, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30510, 'last_played': 1701821547}
review:
Having played Troubleshooter for over 500 hours now, I feel I have a good grasp on what the game has to offer, and it's not hard to guess that I intend to recommend it.  However, I'm going to start with the biggest problem first, since while it appeals very strongly to a specific kind of gamer, many would be put off by its structure and more importantly, its pacing.

As many other reviews have pointed out, one of the most difficult challenges of getting into Troubleshooter is its very slow start.  To put it bluntly, everything about the early game is slow.  Missions are slow, leveling up is slow, getting new masteries is slow, unlocking new characters is slow.  Missions can very in length but on hard or above there are so many enemies that missions will likely take at least 45 minutes, possibly well over an hour, although to the game's credit it warns you about this.  The gameplay follows the X-COM format of having two action points per turn on a square grid, with moving taking one, and dashing and attacking taking two.  Turn-based combat is rarely fast, and Troubleshooter is no exception.  To make things worse, this is also when the best feature of the game, the Mastery System, is at its weakest.

The Mastery System is at the core of Troubleshooter, and it is the reason why troubleshooter stands out among its peers.  Essentially, masteries are mainly drops from enemies that provide specific benefits when equipped to a player character.  They can also be unlocking by leveling up character classes, or completing specific achievements.  These are inserted into character specific mastery boards, and only those which are equipped provide any benefit.  These can vary from reducing the cooldown on abilities, to increased damage, or improved defense or healing.  Furthermore, certain sets of (usually) four masteries can be equipped simultaneously to form a mastery set bonus, and these can be very powerful effects, typically being much more impactful than individual masteries.  Many masteries are used multiple times in different sets, adding an additional layer of strategy to creating mastery boards.  This brief description is however, underselling what is one of the best implemented systems for character customization I've ever come across.  It's shame then, that its first impression is so mediocre.

In the beginning of the game you won't have many slots unlocked for masteries, as more slots only become available at certain level requirements.  Additionally, the masteries from both basic and advanced character classes will only be partially unlocked, and these are some of the most powerful and interesting abilities in the game.  This means that in the early game not only suffers from having few masteries unlocked, but also few slots in which to place them.  The choice of mastery sets is even more restrictive, with the total available to the player being around a dozen for much of the early game.  To put that into perspective, with all DLC, there are currently over 800 masteries and over 500 mastery sets.  Even 500 hours later, I still don't have them all.

Unfortunately, none of this depth will be available to new players, and I could easily see someone put 15-20 hours into it, only to get bored.  I myself have taken several extended breaks from the game, due to feeling like I wasn't progressing quickly enough.  Even so, the sheer depth of the mechanics and the constant updates eventually drag me back to it, time and time again.  The Mastery System deserves special attention, so I will be expanding upon it here.

Masteries are all classified as one of Basic, Attack, Ability, Support and Defense.  They each slot into a sub-board of that specific type.  Each mastery has its own cost ranging from 0-4, and takes up one slot on the board.  In order to equip a mastery you must have at least one slot open of that type and the total cost of all equipped masteries must be equal to or below that total.  For example, if my attack board had one slot open and a total cost of 10/12, I would be able to add a two cost mastery for 12/12, but not a three cost one, since 13/12 would be forbidden.

Each character has their own set of abilities tied to their basic and advanced class.  There are 9 characters in the base game and 12 with all DLC, each with two advanced classes.  Some classes are shared between characters, like Martial Artist, Black Mage, or Battle Mage, while others like Great Swordsman, Barbarian or Superstar are unique to specific characters.  These class-locked masteries are generally more powerful then general masteries usable by everyone, which helps to give each character their own unique identity.  Even characters which share classes feel distinct thanks to their ESP type, fire, wind, earth, spirit, etc., and their individual mastery unique to them (which is not part of their mastery board).

The Mastery System's complexity is also a double-edged sword, and players will have to balance physical vs. ESP damage, hit chance, critical hit chance, speed, ability cool down and cast delay.  There is a lot to consider, saying nothing of gearing or ability selection.  Using guides is almost mandatory when starting out, especially given the relatively poor tutorial and introduction the the game's mechanics.  Players who truly want to min-max their characters and get the most out of the Mastery System will have to spend as much time, or even more time, out of combat then in combat and that's saying something.  If that sounds about as fun to you as playing with an Excel spreadsheet, this game probably isn't for you.

For me, the number of viable builds per class is the greatest achievement of Troubleshooter.  There are so many ways the create builds which play and feel very different to each other, even for the same class and character.  Certain classes are so flexible they can fulfill any role from glass-cannon to support-tank, though others, like Black Mage, are more limited in scope.  Even so, with the right masteries, gearing and abilities the options that you have for each team member is overwhelming, in both the positive and negative meanings of the word.

Normally the dev team would be a strange thing to mention in a review, beyond simply thanking them for their effort, but I feel the fact that Dandylion consists only 6 (SIX!) core devs is worth noting.  The amount of content and rate of updates, bug fixes and patches, already among the most frequent I've ever seen, becomes even more impressive.  Dandylion clearly love Troubleshooter and their endless dedication to it is incredible.  I've rarely seen a bug and never had the game crash while I was playing it, and for a game as complex as Troubleshooter that's a great achievement.

I have a few minor criticisms here and there, such as how the story is meandering and unfocused (though the cast is likable), how the 3D models look dated, how the UI isn't the best, some balance issues, or how the translation is somewhat lacking (but serviceable).  At the end of the day however, a game lives and dies on its core mechanics and Troubleshooter's are very, very good.

In conclusion, should you buy Troubleshooter?  If you are looking for a simple pick up and play experience, I can't recommend it.  But if you are willing to invest the time into it so that the mechanics reveal themselves in all their complexity, you'll find a lot to love.  There's always another mastery to unlock, another build to try, another challenge to overcome.  If you can get past the initial, grueling start you'll be rewarded with some of the best turn based combat you'll find anywhere and hundreds of hours of entertainment.  Best money I've ever spent.
developer_response:
First of all, sincerely thank you for your detailed review. And your description of Mastery system is more detailed and clearer than ours, so we realized to be shamed to our tutorials. We'll do our best to work on this as soon as we can.

Mastery system was a challenging for us as well, as it's not something we use often in other games. We'll do our best to develop this system so that it continues to be enjoyable.

Thank you so much for enjoying our game!! :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198072294905', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 8408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8408, 'last_played': 1687112254}
review:
Amazing support for the game and changes/optimisation even after ~6 years from the first demo. Not to mention story DLC - I value story DLC a lot in any game, since story for me is much more important than music/skins/OP weapons. And here story is nicely implemented, with some characters always on the background in the early chapters just to be revealed as playable/new characters.

Quite a lot of grinding though if you want to be the very best, but what can you do. It's rather optional and you do not have to do it to walk through the game, so all's good.

Personally I'd love NOT to choose which characters to bring on the mission when they exceed the limit you can bring, and have it like a nice slice of story with the "most possible story bits for this particular mission" characters everytime, but it's objectively a weird wish.
developer_response:
It's because of players like you who want to listen to us that we're able to continue to tell the troubleshooter's stories we haven't yet told in this game through addtional DLCs.

We're a small team, but we'll do our best to bring you more fun.

Have a great week! :D

author: {'steamid': '76561197999121414', 'num_games_owned': 2035, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 6809, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4910, 'last_played': 1698985671}
review:
Impeccable implementation of SRPG mechanics and progression. Everything else reeks of indie lack of polish, but it doesn't matter. The gameplay singlehandedly carries the bad localization, the generic enemy designs, the sort of average animations and whatever else isn't that great. The story might be good, honestly after 30 hours or so the localization bothered be so much I stopped reading it. The irritating part was the fact that the narrative seemed to be quite decent. There was enough to care about regarding the characters and their relationships, the enemies were serviceable. Nothing bad to say about it really, but the only thing worst than a poor translation, is a poor translation ruining an otherwise decent story. 

All that being said, you'll find around ten characters, a bunch of skills, hundreds of customizable passives and hundreds of combos between the aforementioned passives to play around, bonding system between your units, multiclass'ish systems. There is a monster catching mechanic dedicated to a single character. It's just so detailed. I am happy to not care about its shortcomings and so should you.
developer_response:
I'm sorry that the bad translation seems to have had a bad effect on your play, and I'm also sorry for you. A lot of people are coming up with a lot of ideas for better translation, and we're trying to reflect them as much as we can, but we're still feeling that it's never easy to reach a satisfactory level of translation. We will continue to work hard to make your favorite parts of our game shine more with good translation.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164205843', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 14758, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14758, 'last_played': 1686663418}
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

We are currently providing unofficial translations provided by the Russian translation team. They have a good relationship with the development team for a long time, and the development team is also applying their work results to the game as quickly as possible. However, there are still many parts that have not been translated, and I would like to thank you for choosing our game.

Troubleshooter is the first game we made and as you mentioned, there are many disadvantages to the game. We have been updating since the game was released to improve these shortcomings. These shortcomings are not going to be fixed all of a sudden. But as long as we keep the game updated, we'll do our best to make these things more user-friendly than they are now.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198276020509', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 10202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1993, 'last_played': 1690983618}

author: {'steamid': '76561198054532866', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3787, 'last_played': 1687015535}
review:
가성비를 떠나서 전체적으로 게임이 재밌음
SRPG 좋아한다면 추천함.
개인적으로 스토리는 그냥 그렇고 캐릭터의 매력이 좀 떨어지는 감이 있음

배경을 그냥 중세 판타지로 했으면 더 재밌었을거라고 생각됨
developer_response:
많은 부족한 부분에도 불구하고 즐겁게 즐겨주셔서 감사합니다!

저희가 중세 판타지 장르가 아닌 부분에 아쉬움을 드려 죄송합니다!

그럼에도 불구하고 최선을 다해 조금이라도 더 많은 즐거움을 드리도록 최선을 다하겠습니다.

늦은 밤 리뷰 남겨주셔서 감사합니다! :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198077965206', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1686559950}
review: The general dynamic of the game is all over the place, with none to little intuitiveness to the skill-system, even if the in-game experience is limited fun. Many of the characters are annoying, and the character dynamic is questionable, pandering obsequiousness to authority and fawning over female characters etc. Excessively brutal. Do not recommend wasting time on it.
developer_response:
We respect your personal opinion, but the elements you speak of do not exist in our game. We don't know where you're mistaken, but that's a malicious assessment perdectly.

However, since you may have felt that way, we recommend a refund to you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198435002394', 'num_games_owned': 197, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 559, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 481, 'last_played': 1686767347}
review: 我爱这款游戏：D
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果我们准备的游戏内容能愉快地填满你的时间，那对我们来说也是很大的乐趣。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198004487783', 'num_games_owned': 508, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 6626, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3474, 'last_played': 1687487639}
review: One of the best tactics games I've played, incredible amount of custimizibility and overall content.  My main gripe is how slow the start is, this is unironically a "It gets good 20 hours in" situation, since early game you have a very small roster and few masteries to flesh out your build.
developer_response:
When we designed the E of this game, we were obsessed with the past methods of JRPG and failed to interpret them modernly. The result, as you mentioned, is that the slow development at the beginning of the game has hampered gamers. We've corrected this many times, but there's a clear limit to fixing this shortcoming while maintaining the flow of the story. In order not to follow these shortcomings in our future development, we will surely reflect on our current lessons.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198849345615', 'num_games_owned': 143, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 5230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5145, 'last_played': 1701524110}
review:
시즌 1 끝마치고 쓰는 리뷰
장점
특성판 최적화하는 재미가 정말 좋았다. 캐릭터마다 역할이 다르고 직업간 채용 가능한 특성도 전부 다르니 사건마다 캐릭터들에게 최적화된 특성을 맞춰주는 재미가 있었음, 예를들어 거미줄 드론이 등장하는 스테이지에서는 아이린한테 줄타기 특성을 붙여준다던지.
사운드, 타격감, UI등 게임의 자잘한 부분이 다 좋았음. 특히 시온이 섬광추로 원킬낼때 그 타격감이 넘사벽이다.
물론 3D모델링 빼고
미친 분량 또한 장점으로 꼽을 수 있을 것 같다. 26000원에 본편만 85시간, 무료dlc까지 포함하면 이것보다 가격 대비 플레이타임이 많은 게임이 있을까? 싶은 생각이 듬.
단점
캐릭터 간의 밸런스가 아쉽다. 특히 레톤 임마는 젤 후반부에 들어와서는 제일 쓸모가 없다. 이정도면 거의 뭐 연막탄싸개임
너무 많은 적 숫자도 문제라고 생각한다. 미친 숫자의 적들이 밀려들어오는데 적들과 내 턴이 똑같이 돌아가니 딜러들(특히 시온이랑 헤이싱)에게 흔히 말하는 한방희열 조합이 강제되는 경향이 있음. 결국 힐러의 역할도 같이 떨어짐
이 단점을 더 부각시키는게 저격수의 등장.
잡몹한테 한방컷이 난다는 사실이 겜을 정말 피곤하게 만드는 요소

적의 수도 너무 많음
견제하기 위해서 소탕 특성, 한방희열 등이 존재하지만 충격장 하나에 모든게 무력화되고 5분동안 아무것도 안하고 지켜만 봐야하는 상황이 나올때가 있다
마지막으로 사수거리 조작 너무불편함

결론
내가 해본 한국산 겜중에서 가장 맘에들고 오래한겜
겜이 억까를 할때도 많지만 그걸 이겨내고 승리를 쟁취했을때 그 쾌감
특히 마지막 사건에서는 본대 다죽고 제인이랑 방패병 하나만 남기고 깼는데
제인이 마지막 저격수의 대가리를 박살낼떄의 그 쾌감을 평생 잊지못할거야
고맙습니다 댄디라이언! 고맙다 아이린! 네가 진정한 고기방ㅍ... 히어로야!
developer_response:
" 잡몹한테 한방컷이 난다는 사실이 겜을 정말 피곤하게 만드는 요소 "

자신의 캐릭터들로 전투를 완전히 자신의 흐름으로 돌아가게 만들었는데, 위의 요소 하나로 인해서 내 전략에 균열이 생기고 결과적으로 미션이 실패하게 되는 경우가 종종 발생하고 이로 인해서 나쁜 평가를 받은 적도 많습니다. 하지만 이런 것 또한 게임의 일부, 개선되어야 할 사항으로 지적해 주시면서 좋은 평가를 통해 한국의 작은 독립 게임 개발팀이 앞으로 나아갈 수 있도록 해주신 것에 대해서 깊은 감사의 말씀을 전합니다.

저희의 남은 업데이트와 미래의 개발과정에서도 꼳 함께 할 수 있기를 진심으로 바랍니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198981949172', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 286, 'last_played': 1686198710}
review: I will recommend it, but sadly it's not for me. The game is great, the battle system, masteries, character abilities, level up system , etc are great but HOW I HATE that cutish, innocent vibe and art style. Everyone smiling in every fu.. line of dialog. If you're ok with that then is a masterpiece.
developer_response:
We know very well that the style we're aiming for cannot be welcomed by all gamers. Troubleshooter is our first game and we're still building our own style. At the end of this process, we will continue to work hard to create a style that appeals to more people, including you.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053344001', 'num_games_owned': 210, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1585, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1367, 'last_played': 1686094177}
review: This game can easily be compared to X-Com. It's worth noting that unlike X-Com, your units are unique in this game. It's X-Com if X-Com were a Shounen anime. I like it, but it's definitely not for everyone. Lots of customization to be had and pretty fun overall.
developer_response:
XCOM is a game that actually represents this genre. We've had a lot of influence from that, too. Now we're developing games to establish our own brand of Troubleshooter. Please watch our future development.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198297975343', 'num_games_owned': 101, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 25961, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25958, 'last_played': 1706598261}

author: {'steamid': '76561198180289722', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 7274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3665, 'last_played': 1695479035}
review:
オプションで速度を上げてクリアまで60時間だったらしい。（DLC除く）
今からDLCやチャレンジモードがあるので、ボリュームはあると思う。
味方キャラもNPC含めて魅力的だったが、仲間にならないキャラが多数居るのが残念だった。
割引無し2500円で考えれば非常に素晴らしいと思う。

値段を考慮した上で何点と言われれば95点、素晴らしいゲームをありがとうと言いたい。

ここから素直に感じた悪い所。
他の方も書いてますが、敵の防御力？ダメージ減衰かわかりませんが、非常に倒しづらい前衛の敵がストレスを感じるほど邪魔でプレイを投げる切っ掛けになりえましたね。

飯食うのも、表示が終わるまでもっさり（10秒程度)でストレスでした。

製造関係は全体的に不便。
足りない素材を製造したいのに、ショートカットが無い？あったとしても分かりづらい為に不便でした。

シナリオは大部分は良いのだが、なんでここでエンディング？ってくらい打ち切りエンドっぽい。
敵役のストーリーが十分にありますが、敵役に魅力を感じないと苦痛にしか感じない。
序盤・中盤の敵勢力は読んでて面白かったが、後半の白虎関連は私には合わず（魅力を感じず）苦痛に感じた。
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

* 不便なアイテム製作システム
* 何かすっきりしない話の終わり

あなたが指摘したこの二つの短所についてすべて同意します。私たちがどんな未来の話を持っているとしても、ゲーム一つ一つは明確な完結性を持っていなければならないと思います。 しかし、私たちは私たちの能力を超えるあまりにも大きな下絵を描き、それを満たしていく速度はあまりにも遅いだけです。すでに多くの物語が展開されており、今これを変更することはできません。 私たちが地道にゲームを開発して、この絵を埋めていきたいと思います。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198884040091', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1430, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1391, 'last_played': 1686278891}

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。
