author: {'steamid': '76561198203123695', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2132, 'last_played': 1676707790}
review: 이제까지 여러겜 했지만 한국에서 이런 게임이 나올거라곤 생각 안해본 종류의 게임이고 완성도임. 레벨링부터 난이도 설계까지 생각 이상으로  깔끔함. 재미가 없냐? 하면 재미도 있음. 캐릭터들마다 서사가 있고 매력이 있음. 쉽게 잊혀지는 캐릭을 안씀. 가끔 예상치 못한 버그가 터지긴 하지만 그걸 감안해도 괜찮음. 2만6천원? 지금 나오는 게임들 생각하면 4만원해도 충분한 값어치를 하는 게임임.
developer_response:
너무 좋은 평가를 해주셔서 저희의 어깨가 무겁습니다. 많은 사람들이 한국의 SRPG 개발팀이라고 하면 떠올릴 수 있는 개발팀이 될 것입니다. 저희의 미래 개발을 계속 지켜봐 주세요. 

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007497106', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1135, 'last_played': 1677645009}
review:
X-Com pour maniaco-dépressifs

Quand tu vieillis, tu te dégrades imperceptiblement. Faire un Kickflip les yeux bandés devient le moyen le plus simple de découvrir le monde merveilleux de la chirurgie orthopédique, tu arrêtes d'acheter les romans en format poche prétenduement parce que t'es pas pauvre, mais en réalité tout le monde sait très bien que tu n'arrives plus à lire les petits caractères.

C'est la même chose avec les jeux vidéos. Quand t'es jeune, tu 360 no-scope les ennemis d'une main distraite sous le Call of Duty de l'époque, et un matin tu te réveille avec ton skin préféré qui est rendu un DLC "Héritage" (phoque off Activision, si c'est mon héritage, pourquoi je dois repayer pour l'avoir ?). Donc forcément, à un moment donné tu délaisses les shooters nerveux pour des jeux tour à tour plus compatibles avec ton état gériatrique.


Maintenant, si tu voulais jouer à Overwatch mais que tu as connu les premiers balbutiements de l'électricité et la création des premières routes pour automobiles, Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children est probablement le jeu pour toi. C'est un tour à tour qui ressemble beaucoup à X-Com mais qui est assez différent pour que ce soit le même feeling sans être le genre de bouillie pré-mâchée qu'on te force à ingurgiter dans ta maison de retraite : c'est bon, c'est chaud, mais t'as pas l'impression que ça a déjà passé dans la bouche d'un autre avant de t'être servi.


Le jeu est sympa, l'histoire bien qu'ultra prévisible dans son développement reste sympathique et le fait de voir ce que les autres joueurs ont choisi dans les choix multiples donne un petit plus : a bon, 99% des gens ont opté pour faire cette mission en passant par la porte arrière ? C'est probablement une très bonne idée d'être le gars qui va entrer par devant comme si de rien n'était. Les vieux, ça manque d'audace, c'est connu.


Petit bémol, on peut parfois foutrement se demander ce qu'il faut faire pour avancer dans le jeu à certaines étapes (après les trois premières missions par exemple, il y a un moment ou il faut ####### le ###### avec ####### pour accéder à la suite du jeu) et ça peut gaver un peu. Mais bon, le jeu est régulièrement mis à jour (des toutes petites mises à jour) et comme dit l'histoire est quand même sympa, donc c'est pas un mauvais investissement.


Seul défaut réel je dirais, tout est un peu poussif dans l'interface, on a toujours un peu l'impression d'avoir les doigts lestés de plomb pour passer d'un menu à l'autre, améliorer une compétence, avancer dans la carte ... tout est très proprement conçu, mais ça reste un brin ... lent ... comme un petit vieux qui aurait VRAIMENT dépassé sa date d'expiration. Ça va un peu à l'inverse de la philosophie Nintendo de "Vous devriez pouvoir être en train de jouer 4 secondes après avoir booté la console". Ici c'est plutôt "Vous devriez ressentir douloureusement le poids du temps qu'il vous reste à vivre passer".



Je le recommande néanmoins, parce que comme X-Com, c'est vraiment un bon jeu pour accompagner une âme patiente vers son dernier repos, une longue seconde de tour à la fois.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

The game trend these days requires fast access to the core content of the game and being able to experience everything in the game in one round. That time shouldn't be more than an hour. Typical examples are PUBG, CS: GO, LOL, DOTA, etc. Compared to these games, Troubleshooter is a really slow game. It may sound like a self-deprecating expression, but even if you eat something in the middle of the game, the game is still waiting for your order. This way is far from the latest game trend, but we definitely think there are people looking for games like this.

Our UI is designed to be functional-oriented. This might sound as if the development team had developed a philosophy. But no. To be honest, we haven't found a way to make the UI look comfortable and good. So we created a functional UI. Thanks to this, I was able to implement quite a lot of functions through UI, but as you mentioned, the response speed and convenience of UI were sacrificed a lot. This is one of the tasks that we need to solve through future updates and development.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996627654', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 541, 'last_played': 1685494447}
review: Tried to get into this, as I generally like turn-based strategy and I heard it even has multiplayer PvP with your own party once you finish the campaign.  However, the translation isn't great, and while I'd normally overlook that, it makes understanding the huge number of game systems impossible.  The final straw for me was about about 7 missions on normal, all of which had been trivially easy with "Perfect" ratings for everything, a random enemy unit just 1 shot kills my main hero from a distance and instantly ends the mission.  I guess it is "fair" since all of my units 1 shot kill the enemies 95% of the time, but it is terrible game design for a turn-based tactics game.
developer_response:
We fully understand your frustration, and we think it stems from the difference in genre. Our game is in the "strategy RPG" genre, not the "tactical" genre, so the possibilities are endless as you progress, and while the initial progression is easy, the different classes of enemies that appear afterward make it more "tactical". experience changes. Of course, at the end of game, you could the poweful team to be able to defeat all enemies easily with your efforts.

This is the biggest difference between our game, which has "RPG" elements, and games that provide basic rules and make "strategy" decisions from the start. We recommend increasing the "difficulty" to experience the strategic elements you want.

We don't think the developer's explanation is very convincing, so we recommend to  check many other reviews have made good points if you get the detail information for our game. Additionally our game is an RPG with a base playtime of 80 hours without repeat missions you can get lots of pleasures for a long playtime.

Anyway, all due to our development team's inability to create a strong initial immersion. We'll do our best to improve and make the game more immersive without this explanation.

Thank you for your review. :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198069618985', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1770, 'last_played': 1685877946}
review:
I like the game so far, its a mix of many games and I think its execution is great.

Some complaints I have is how the VHPD plays the wrong voicelines (e.g. they say Target. Eliminated., when the enemy is nowhere near dead). I also wish the developer would have a supporter DLC or something so I can give them money for more voice actors.

I also wish the AI that you set for the VHPD would be able to heal themselves, I forgot how to disable AI control and helplessly watched as my Suppressor who went into the middle of enemy territory get surrounded lmao

Understanding masteries was weird for me and I didn't utilize it for a few missions. I had to read up guides to get a sense of what I'm supposed to do with the mechanic.
developer_response:
We also hope to hire more voice actors. In addition, since we are providing English translation, I think it would be a icing on the cake if voice support is added. However, as you point out in the evaluation, the English translation is not perfect because the development team's native language is not English, and it is difficult for us to evaluate whether the voice actors' acting matches our intentions. This is usually done by a local publisher. But we are an independent game development team, so we don't have a separate publisher. Right now, only improving our game development skills is a shortcut to more voice support in the future.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198814605896', 'num_games_owned': 296, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 25075, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22411, 'last_played': 1698640954}
review:
给朋友都安利了一遍却至今没人入坑，我的心里一团火
或许是因为SRPG受众比较少，剧情体量大，系统也相对复杂导致很难上手
但玩下去就会发现绝对算得上同类型佳作了，冷门好游的活释义
无论是背景和剧情设定还是系统都堪称无替代，附加天赋系统特别好评，感觉整个养成的策略性都有一个大飞跃
凹天赋搞制作养宠物造机械，即使任务做完了也有很多内容，感觉根本忙不完
[spoiler]很喜欢炼狱挑战+高风险，太喜欢走错一步就暴毙的感觉了（bushi[/spoiler]
这个体量和丰富度至今居然仍然是80块，对于能接受SRPG的玩家绝对是物超所值了，别愣着了，买吧！

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
完结追评
随着深红乌鸦dlc的最终更新，家里的小治疗终于达到了毕业的真实，追回露娜指日可待了嗷！看着瓦尔哈拉未来传奇的合照我也很感慨，对我来说，这款游戏也是一位陪我从办公本过渡到了游戏本，在每一个小小的游戏荒里拯救我的，沉默的朋友。
虽然相对冷门，但纷争终结者绝对是我玩过的最优秀的SRPG之一，附加天赋套装到底是什么天才系统，玩一次就想夸一次，我对着屏幕琢磨各种天赋配装就能悄然度过两小时，每升一级就可以为那一个多出来的天赋点费劲巴拉却也乐此不疲地升级套装。人物练完可以玩无人机，无人机玩完可以玩野兽，装备永远不敢说毕业，耐玩度堪称恐怖。不仅是成长反馈多样，敌人的种类和特点之多也几乎是我见过的同类型游戏之最，这一点更加难得。
说到底，RPG游戏给玩家带来的最基本的快感就是成长，所以大多数口碑好的RPG，其成长带来的正反馈必然是多种多样连绵不绝的，但注意到敌人的重要性并将其做好的其实少之又少（八方旅人敌人的弱点系统也是一个很好的正面例子）。这一点纷争终结者不仅做到了，而且做得恰当：敌人主要分为人类、野兽和机械三个基本类型，在这之下又多加了种群特点，个体上再佐以职业和附加天赋类型的细分，很多RPG里最重要的等级和数值的差异反而是最没存在感的。明明凭借优秀的系统创造了这么多不同的敌人，却并不卖弄聪明，不盲目地为增加难度而推出大杂烩关卡，即使他们完全可以这么做。制作组很明白SRPG相比其他RPG需要的是什么：策略性。而同一关卡中的敌人同时具备种族的共性和职业的差异，这种共性和差异恰到好处地控制在注重战斗中所采取行动的策略性，也最大化战前准备的策略性的范畴之中。增高人物培养的上限（虽然本来就很高了），同时告别一招鲜吃遍天所带来的战斗同质化。是很清楚自己的定位，且擅长发挥自身长处的一款游戏。
背景设定新奇，只要敢选高难度，频繁出现的大场面战斗就可以是一盘步步为营，一旦冒进就可能满盘皆输的棋，近身与远程，冲锋与支援，移动与隐蔽，不同属性超能力的运用不停歇地上演在不同天气、不同光照、不同地形的棋盘上，属实是在方方面面抓到了“战棋”的神髓。对于每一个“棋盘”所做的不同设计，能感觉到制作组几乎在每一个能花心思的地方都在很用心地把SRPG的特点发挥成独一无二的优势。
之前我就在steam发过评测，盛赞游戏质量和体量都很过硬，没火起来或许只是因为上手门槛太高，系统复杂。制作组回复我，他们知道现在市场正被能让玩家快速掌握玩法核心的游戏占据，但他们认为制作受众不那么多的优秀游戏同样值得。从宏大的世界观和几乎每一个都倾注了心血去塑造的人物里，也能感受到制作组真的很爱，也希望有其他人来爱他们手中的这个世界。
纷争终结者并不是一部方方面面都成熟且优秀的作品，但它绝对是一部被爱着，也值得被爱的作品。在它长得惊人的游戏寿命里，好像也能看到充斥着的青涩的热情。
期待制作组的下一部作品，期待与No.1纷争终结者们的重逢。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

" 或许是因为SRPG受众比较少，剧情体量大，系统也相对复杂导致很难上手 "

我对你的分析完全有同感。最近,能够快速接近游戏核心内容的类型的游戏正在引领业界。 相比之下，SRPG为了真正体验游戏，进入门槛相对较高，因此很多体裁都比以前萎缩了很多。 但是人的喜好多种多样，如果我们能制作符合某人喜好的游戏，仅凭这一点就足以成为开发者的喜悦。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

review: 취향 많이 타겠지만 오랜만에 게임 불감증을 없애준 작품. 턴제 게임인데 적이 많아서 색다르다. 특성의 조합으로 자기만의 케릭을 성장시키는 재미가 있다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198825596696', 'num_games_owned': 116, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 21117, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10055, 'last_played': 1711212860}
review:
玩了挺久的才想起来评论一下 上次打开还是在魔女dlc刚跟新时候
技能搭配+养成都有策略性在里面，对于我来说你给我足够多的角色且个性鲜明都有不同的搭配/分支就是快乐的主要来源。
显然这个游戏在这方面做得非常好，剧情也一直在更新角色刻画足够丰满。
但是依然有一个致命缺点，炼狱挑战是动态难度（貌似？）在这个难度下敌方单位多的离谱（我截图里有https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2501521851）并且！敌方的闪避高达99%，我方的装备/技能设计里均无命中/闪避debuff相关,除了特定的宠物对拼数值没有任何有效的反制手段。明明叫“挑战模式”却完全体现不出来策略性。
以上，这是之前的问题，不知道现在有没有优化。此时此刻正在买新dlc准备再玩。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

你表现出来的情况不是好看的。 当然也有避免相关情况的方法,但是这样进行游戏的话,完成一个任务需要很长时间的缺点。 对于新引进的任务,正在减少敌人的数量,更加细致地调节个别敌人的能力。 我们正在研究如何减少敌人的数量，同时保持战斗的紧张感。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198260782097', 'num_games_owned': 63, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 14828, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13377, 'last_played': 1698498592}
review:
현재 모든 도전과제(250개) 달성완료

SRPG를 좋아하고 캐릭터물을 좋아한다면 정말정말 재밌는게임
그러나 개선할 사항이 굉장히 많다

몇걸음만 가도 발각에 경보에 맵의 모든 적이 맞이하러 오는 체포맵
바닥과 풀이 구분이 어렵고 높낮이가 괴상해서 화를 돋우는 야수사냥맵
지원공격 떡칠과 자동회피 떡칠 턴속도 지연으로
플레이 시간 대부분을 적턴 구경에 쓰는 구조로 구성되어 있다
적턴 스킵도 없고 시간 되돌리는 기능도 없어
아군이 죽었다면 그대로 진행하거나 임무를 포기하고
가까운 체크포인트로 로드하는 방법을 사용해야한다

개성있는 캐릭터들
어느 캐릭터나 제법 쓸만하게끔 되어있지만
한턴에 몇번씩 행동력을 회복하는 고성능 픽과
사전작업이 필요하거나 특수한 상황에서 정도만 활약하는 픽등
성능차이가 나는부분은 어쩔 수 없다고본다
매력적이지만 초회차 유저에겐 정신이 나갈것같은 특성시스템은
프리셋 추천 기능등으로 개선이 필요해보임

스토리적으로도 문제가 많은데
많은 캐릭터에 서사를 부여하려고 해서 전개가 굉장히 늘어진다
특히 스토리를 보여주는 방식이 최악인데,
사건 2주전,1주전,10주전,6주전,2시간전,30분전 같은식으로
장황하게 전개되는 부분은 정신나가기 딱 좋다

거기에 발할라엔 왜이리 꼰대가 많은건지
임대료 밀린적도 없는데 꼽주는 돈이나
내가 널 그렇게 가르쳤니 화법을 구사하는 지젤은 캐릭터성이니 그렇다쳐도
구해줬을 때 감사가 아니라 힐난하는 시민들의 편지가 절반이 넘는걸 보면
인류애가 감소하는 기분이 든다

여러 문제만 나열했지만
가격에 비해 굉장히 많은 분량과 즐길거리, 수집요소가 있으며
너무너무 재밌고 앞으로가 기대가 되는 게임.
developer_response:
" 몇걸음만 가도 발각에 경보에 맵의 모든 적이 맞이하러 오는 체포맵
바닥과 풀이 구분이 어렵고 높낮이가 괴상해서 화를 돋우는 야수사냥맵
지원공격 떡칠과 자동회피 떡칠 턴속도 지연으로
플레이 시간 대부분을 적턴 구경에 쓰는 구조로 구성되어 있다
적턴 스킵도 없고 시간 되돌리는 기능도 없어
아군이 죽었다면 그대로 진행하거나 임무를 포기하고
가까운 체크포인트로 로드하는 방법을 사용해야한다 "

" 많은 캐릭터에 서사를 부여하려고 해서 전개가 굉장히 늘어진다 "

사실...위의 이유로도 저희가 나쁜 평가를 받을 이유는 충분합니다. 그 어떤 좋은 점이 있다고 해도 위에 열거된 이유는...누군가에게는 도저히 받아들일 수 없는 요소일 수도 있다고 생각합니다. 그럼에도 불구하고 좋은 평가를 해주셔서 저희의 어깨가 매우 무겁습니다. 그러나 이런 무게를 견뎌 내는 것 또한 저희가 성장하는 과정의 일환이라고 생각합니다. 어느 순간 저희가 모든 것을 완벽하게 만들어 낼 수 없습니다. 그러나 서서히 나아지는 모습을 보여드리겠습니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198262920771', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 7319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7224, 'last_played': 1685373161}
review:
This game is clearly a labor of love. If you like X-Com and story-based RPGs, you'd enjoy this game! Gameplay wise, I find it even more expansive than X-Com and the masteries system was a [i]masterpiece[/i]. There are so many ways you could build the characters and it's so much fun trying out new sets and classes for different stages in the game.

The story and character were great too, and personally, as someone who grew up with K-pop/drama/culture, it's cute and refreshing to see a story told from that cultural lens, like how having a boss who is the same age/younger could be awkward. 10/10 would recommend. 수고했어요!
developer_response:
I could feel the understanding and familiarity of Korea from your review. I'm also worried that your good feelings may have influenced the game to have a good review. We will supplement and update the game to make it better than now so that your good feelings for Korea(include Troubleshooter) will not be damaged by the game we made. :D

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099833949', 'num_games_owned': 296, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 18988, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2694, 'last_played': 1693498372}
review: 挺喜欢这游戏的，就是脸模和立绘不像，如果模型可以更像立绘就更好了。游戏的系统挺不错的，也有能刷的部分，对比PSP的皇家骑士团（Tactics Ogre: Let Us Cling Together），圣女贞德（Jeanne DArc），也是各有各的特色，制作组加油！
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我们的角色建模水平真的不好。不像其他游戏那样真实，也缺乏属于我们的个性。对此，我们也苦恼了很多。为了通过我们的未来开发，向你展示比现在更好的角色建模，我们不会停止学习游戏开发。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561197970406584', 'num_games_owned': 905, 'num_reviews': 300, 'playtime_forever': 10225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9707, 'last_played': 1699812789}
review:
Probably the best X-COM-esque game I've played in a long time.

Good music, great art, excellent storytelling, mechanics that become deeper as you get farther into the game, developers that actively respond to critique and complaints, etc.

You're doing yourself a disservice by not playing this.

The only complaint I can have is that some of the shine wears off the balancing once you hit the second expansion, but as it's still actively being developed, that might well receive that needed polish by the time it's completed, and I would say that 150 hours of gameplay before I actually encountered a frustrating gameplay situation is impressive.
developer_response:
We are under greater pressure than ever when we develop a second expansion pack. The difficulty of expansion packs should be challenging and at the same time acceptable to gamers. We realize how difficult it is to satisfy both at the same time. Perhaps the disappointment you felt is that our development skills are still insufficient. We will look for ways to compensate for your disappointment through the remaining updates.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970689111', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 9682, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9682, 'last_played': 1656379768}
review: Every minute spent on this game was a joy.  A great tactical experience, really interesting choices in character setup, decent challenge, well written story... there is really not a lot to complain about with this game.  I may have liked to have the characters join at a more frequent pacing, but that is nitpicking. Highly recommended.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060059965', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3601, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3601, 'last_played': 1684775710}
review:
A must-play for SRPG fans. Lovable characters, incredible customisastion, and above-average story. Fights go between 30min to 1.5h, with maps being larger (in size and enemy count) than post-Awakening Fire Emblem without the tedium of Tactics Ogre ones. 

One gripe about the final fight in the main story (before DLC): [spoiler] Somewhat anti-climactic when the bosses were squishy and the only challenge was rushing to the other side of the map (which wasn't hard...). The optional fight with like 20 bicrons was a lot more challenging and memorable. [/spoiler]
developer_response:
Being loved from SRPG fans is really a good news for the development team. Game design for Troubleshooter was started from turn-based game but through the continuous update, the game now has been one of SRPG. We always wondered our effort for this can be delivered to gamers. But after reading your review, we could make sure that our development direction was not wrong. This is why we especially happy after read your review.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013953718', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 15203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10962, 'last_played': 1687941580}
review:
取り外し式のスキル構築でのキャラクター育成や装備のトレハン要素などやり込める部分が多く
XCOMと違って期限に追われたり死んでもキャラロストがない為落ち着いて遊べる等
基本的にはオススメ出来るんですが…

他のレビューでもある通り1ステージにかかる時間が本当に長い
詳しく書きますと倒しても倒しても終わらない程敵の数が多過ぎるのが一つ
更にこのゲームは攻撃されると自分のターン順が遅延していくシステムがあり
これもプレイ時間を長くする原因

もう一つはMAP一つ一つが広すぎて探索にも時間がかかる
移動がXCOM式なので長距離の行軍が面倒なのは言わずもがな
オートでここに集まれ的な指令もない

また、上記の合わせ技のせいで動作が重くなるプレイヤーに対する
ダイレクトアタックがおまけでついて来る始末であり
中盤以降とにかく一度の戦闘に詰め込み過ぎてると感じる
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

あなたが言及した欠点によって、あなたがゲームについて悪い評価を作成したとしても、私たちはそれを受け入れたでしょう。 【トラブルシューター】は確かに一度のゲーム単位を終えるために必要な時間が長い方です。 最近のゲームトレンドはゲームの核心コンテンツに素早くアクセスできるようにし、ユーザーが自分が望む時間だけそのコンテンツを楽しんでいつでもゲームを終了できるようにします。 これに比べて、【トラブルシューター】は時代遅れの方法だと言えます。

でも、時代遅れというのは悪いことだけではないと思います。 伝統的な方式のゲームを好む需要が依然として存在し、また伝統的な方式に現代のアプローチを融合すれば、新しい楽しさを作り出すことができると思います。

しかし、私たちがこのような方法をまともに具現できなかったのも事実です。 これは、完全に私たちのゲーム開発技術がまだ不十分だからです。 私たちの未来の開発を通じてこのような短所を解決できるように努力します。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198012104403', 'num_games_owned': 72, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 12167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11382, 'last_played': 1699790508}

author: {'steamid': '76561198028433235', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 17789, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17760, 'last_played': 1685582609}
review:
Troubleshooter is my favorite game in a long time. I put almost 300 hours into completing all of the achievements.

The UI could be a little more polished and common actions streamlined. The translation could be improved (which is why I am considering another playthrough making use of the Support Translation feature), and that might help new players get engaged in and relate to the story better. These critiques absolutely in no way take away from the stellar gameplay and amazing characters though.

Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children is a challenging and fun tactical RPG with more enjoyment than any of those $70 AAA games could provide. I can't wait to play whatever Dandylion releases next!
developer_response:
" that might help new players get engaged in and relate to the story better. "

This is the direction of improvement in the game we want the most. The game has been expanding its contents through updates for a long time. However, this may make the content and system of the game difficult for those who start playing for the first time. We will prepare an update to solve this difficulty. In order to complete the update successfully, I think better translation and easy-to-use UI should be secured first.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198889209568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 6106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6079, 'last_played': 1691444631}
review:
Pues... Me encanta! Una historia interesante, todos los personajes tienen algo único para tu equipo...

Pero la mejor siempre será Ray!

Un montón de contenido para jugar durante muchísimo rato.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

Thank you for giving us a good evaluation of our efforts. We still believe that Troubleshooter can be better than it is now. Therefore, we will continue to update the game. There could be more wonderful changes for Ray along the way.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198863768104', 'num_games_owned': 777, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 6778, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2241, 'last_played': 1685725708}
review:
游戏画风不太能接受，游戏性挺不错的，天赋和附加天赋好评，就是各种套路太细了，装备技能天赋羁绊等等叠加，考虑的东西太多，很费人心力，如果有类似玩家推荐这样一键设定，就能极大减少相关时间，充分体验游戏剧情。作为一款战棋游戏还是挺成熟的，该有的都有了，如果能加个自动视角就最好了。
——来自小黑盒用户剑气冲霄射斗牛的评价
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

与其他类型的游戏相比，SRPG类型的游戏为了好好体验游戏所需的学习曲线比较陡峭。我们会尽量平缓这条曲线，让更多的玩家更好地利用游戏的所有系统。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198219844284', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3853, 'last_played': 1706496556}
review:
일단 재미있고, 게임 스토리에 까다롭지 않은 사람이라 그런지 스토리는 마음에 들긴 한데 난이도 조절에 실패한 거 같아요.
과한 노가다를 원치 않아서 난이도를 스토리로 했는데도 적이 너무 많이 나와서 감당하기 힘들어요.
developer_response:
난이도를 물 흐르듯 자연스럽게 조절하는게 정말 쉽지 않은 것 같습니다. 가장 큰 이유는 저희의 부족한 게임 제작 능력이기도 하고요. 꾸준한 업데이트와 저희들의 개발력 제고를 통하여 언급하신 단점을 최대한 완화하기 위해 노력하겠습니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089964267', 'num_games_owned': 240, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 709, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 623, 'last_played': 1690873889}
review:
I don't play TRPGS, but I like turn-based games. I saw this and read the about section, liked what I saw and got it. The game has really good world building that's really in-depth. The gameplay is very unique, I can't quite find a game to compare it to, and it's got really good characters that make you want to play more. 

I also bought it because I'd like to see more Korean games ported to the West, and while this game has some really bad localisation and misspellings, it can be easily ignored due to the great narrative and over-arching plot that's being presented. 

Basically, if you're remotely interested in turn-based games & the story in the about section seems to interest you, grab it. It's good. I'm glad I bought this game.
developer_response:
" has some really bad localisation and misspellings "

In fact, even if you wrote us a bad review because of this one factor, we wouldn't have been able to argue anything. When we developed the game, we thought that translation was not important as long as the game was fun, but this was a mistake. No matter how interesting we prepared, poor translation used to block gamers from accessing it. Now we recognize the importance of this. It may be too late, but as long as our update continues, efforts for better localization will also be made.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071859410', 'num_games_owned': 258, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1807, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 3, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1712354735}
review: amazin
developer_response:
Nice to meet you!

I would like to give you a small tip to make the game more enjoyable.

First, complete the scenario missions first. More and more colleagues will gather around you.

You don't have to set the game's difficulty to hard from the beginning. All missions in the game, including scenario missions, can be re-challenged at any time, and at this time, you can set a more difficult difficulty.

Actively utilize the mastery set. It is the core system that makes your character strong.

You can set the pace of the mission fast. Reduce your wait time by adjusting the values of Ally Units Action Speed and Non-ally Units Action Speed in the game's settings.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199085131591', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1389, 'last_played': 1684798550}
review: とにかく1クエストが長すぎるし、防御と回避しまくりでゲームのテンポが悪すぎる。オプションでスピードを圧倒的に速いにしてるけど更に三段階ぐらい上がほしいぐらいには悪い。
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

ゲームのジャンル的特性からおっしゃった部分は仕方ない部分でもあります。 しかし、ゲームの速度を今より速くすることは、結局すべての中間過程をスキップするというのと同じ水準になると考えられます。 果たしてこれが正しいのかは疑問です。 ただし、開発チームがゲームをより快適に楽しめる方法を考えるのは良いことだと思います。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198965795888', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 9976, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7580, 'last_played': 1710435845}
review: 업뎃하고 나니까 갑자기 팅김현상이 너무 많아졌어요 ㅠㅠ
developer_response:
불편 드려서 죄송합니다. 정확한 원인 파악을 위해서 저희에게 로그 파일을 보내주실 수 있을까요? 로그 파일은 게임의 환경 설정에서 '오류 보고' 기능을 통해 간편하게 송부할 수 있고 문제의 증상을 자세히 적어주시면 저희가 더 빠르게 문제를 파악할 수 있습니다. 저희가 문제 해결에 도움을 드릴 수 있도록 꼭 보내주셨으면 좋겠습니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다!

author: {'steamid': '76561198075555356', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2312, 'last_played': 1684294450}
review: 整体不错，至于智障说的核心是xcom云云，智障嘛，不用在意。核心是刷，还很有趣，问题是属性少了点，比如说打54的大型任务炼狱，不用黑客一个个的偷，简直就是折磨，一个个偷其实也挺折磨的，一个优秀的slg，解法不应该单一。所以说，破格挡，破固定受伤的手段太少，而且防暴击只能靠格挡也有点扯淡，韧性不行吗？有防御扛物理，抗性防超能，但是没有破格挡的属性，只靠天赋那点玩意，过当然能过，但是slg的核心是解题，不是公式，如果高难只能靠公式过关，不能百花齐放各有各的解法的话，其实挺失败的。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

谢谢你的好意见。 虽然同意应该有多种方法来削弱格挡，但我认为不能因此而让格挡有名无实。 为了找到合适的妥协点,需要听取意见和讨论。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198980776217', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 870, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 699, 'last_played': 1684334491}
review:

謝謝。

author: {'steamid': '76561198081587489', 'num_games_owned': 629, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 7915, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5040, 'last_played': 1685454169}
review:
[h1] ひとさじにいわく、ご飯はお腹がすいた者が食べるものだと言う。[/h1]
本編クリア時点でのレビューです。一言でいうと一番好きなターン制シミュレーションゲーム。
少しでも手に取ってくれる人が増え、続編の可能性が高まることを期待してレビュー。続編出してくれ！！！俺たちを満腹の地へ連れて行ってくれ！！！

[h1] ストーリーが良い [/h1]
風壁地区という陰謀渦巻くクッソ治安悪い地域を舞台に新人トラブルシューター会社、警察、暴力団1～3、カルト宗教、移民などなど多くの勢力から、これまた多くの人物が登場し、群像劇と化しています。
「君が胸に抱いたスプーンはなんだ？」といった珍妙な会話から、事件現場の凄惨なやり取り、無力感に苦しむヒーロー、旧友との決別など心動く物語が沢山。
[strike] 先が気になりすぎてミッションでガンガン突き進んだらスナイパーにボコボコにされるのは日常茶飯事。[/strike]

クリア時点では[spoiler]一旦地域の問題が解決した雰囲気になっていますが、まだ燻ってる火種はあるし、別地域へ移動しただけの問題もあるし、解決してない伏線大量だし、会社のメンバーが抱える問題も・・・という状態なので、[/spoiler]まさにシーズン1が完了といった形。続編頼む！！！

[h1] システム周りについて [/h1]
戦闘システムは他の人が触れてるので略。
ちなみに私はターン制よりRTSが好き、XcomやFEは途中で飽きてクリア経験あるSLGはディスガイアや戦ヴァルくらい、ハクスラは好きといったタイプですが、めちゃんこ楽しめてます。
ターン制が特に好きでなくても、ハクスラやキャラビルドが好きなら楽しめます。

ビルドは装備やアビリティの他に、特性というものをセットして作り上げていく形。
これがまた秀逸で、たとえば社畜正義漢の主人公は先の先・後の先・後の後と言わんばかりに相手の動きに反応して切りまくる正統派剣士から、風の超能力によってあらゆる攻撃を受け流して耐えるタンク、[spoiler]相手に血を流させることで[/spoiler][spoiler]命中率上がるわ[/spoiler][spoiler]ダメージ上がるわ[/spoiler][spoiler]回復するわ[/spoiler][spoiler]ターン踏み倒すわ[/spoiler][spoiler]味方にも斬りかかるわの[/spoiler][spoiler]サイコ通り魔[/spoiler]にもなります。
他キャラも同じように様々なビルドが出来てボリューム沢山。特性の一覧を眺めているだけで気づけば数時間経過してます。

ちなみに社員の人間だけでなく、ペットやドローンのビルドもあります。が、2ケタ時間程度のプレイではほぼ手を付けられていないのでノーコメント。なんてボリュームだ。
装備関連はもちろん接頭語のシステムありーのクラフトありーの。良接頭語レジェンダリー装備のトレハンはこれから実施予定。なんてボリュームだ。

[h1] マイナス点もちょこっと [/h1]
やや不満なのが序盤。ストーリーはまだ盛り上がらず、ビルドの余地はほぼなく（というかシステムがまだ理解できない時期）、主人公より警察等のゲスト戦力のほうが強く、戦闘も1ターンに1人倒せるかどうかで爽快感が無く、民間人のエスコートは足が遅くてターン経過待ちが長い。
私はインストールして3～5時間ほどプレイしてアンインストールを2回繰り返しました。3回目の正直でついに序盤を超えてクリアへ。[strike] elonaかな？[/strike]

買い物で利用する街の移動も不満。オンライン要素を入れようとしていた時の名残かもしれませんが、MMORPG風の街は普通に面倒。
クラフトやサブミッションで何度も往復するので、拠点にあるお店みたいに1画面にまとめるか、テキストメニューにするかして欲しい。

敵や警察のターンが長いという問題もありますが、これはユニットが多いターン制ゲームではみんな抱えてる問題なのでしょうがない。続編でRTSになってくれたら解決&俺得ですが、それ以上にユーザーが減ってしまいそう。

[h1] おわり [/h1]
というわけで序盤に難ありですが、それを乗り越えれば激熱ストーリー&キャラビルド沼が待っている最高のゲームです。
ハクスラ好きは是非。

[strike] ところで続編は、クリア後のつよつよ主人公たちで始まるんでしょうか。新規が入れないしよわよわ主人公でビルドし直しだと思うけど、どう辻褄合わせするんだろう [/strike]
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

" 私はインストールして3～5時間ほどプレイしてアンインストールを2回繰り返しました。3回目の正直でついに序盤を超えてクリアへ。"

この部分は本当に大きな問題だと思います。 さらに衝撃的なのは、今これがすでに数回の修正を経た結果だということです。 人々はますます速い進行を見せるゲームを望んでおり、Troubleshooterとは正反対の姿を見せています。 最近のトレンドに合わせてゲームを開発しなければならないわけではありませんが、だからといってこれを完全に無視することは難しいです。今はゲームが完成段階に入っており、ゲームの前の部分の話を変更するのは難しいです。 ただ、不必要な部分を最大限除去してゲームの第一印象が今より良くなるよう開発チームが引き続きその部分を改善していきます。

" 買い物で利用する街の移動も不満。オンライン要素を入れようとしていた時の名残かもしれませんが、MMORPG風の街は普通に面倒。 "

あなたの予想が正しいです。 Troubleshooterは最初にオンラインゲームとして作られる予定でした。 しかし発売直後、私たちは多くの方々がSingle playをもっと好むということを知り、すべてのシステムを再びSingle playに合わせて変更しました。 シューター通りは確かにそのような要素の中でオンラインの感じを最もよく表す要素だと思います。 ただ、多くの人が集まってお互いにインタラクションをしてこそ、その場所が活気づくのに、まだこの程度の水準に達していません。

" 敵や警察のターンが長いという問題もありますが、これはユニットが多いターン制ゲームではみんな抱えてる問題なのでしょうがない。続編でRTSになってくれたら解決俺得ですが、それ以上にユーザーが減ってしまいそう。"

これは本当に簡単ではない問題だと思います。 私たちはすでにSRPGあるいはTBSを専門的に作ることに決めたので、私たちがRTSを作ることはないでしょう。 しかし、どうすればこのジャンルのゲームを今よりもスピード感を出して楽しめるようにできるかという悩みに対する答えは今も見つかっていません。 これは、私たちがゲーム開発を止める日までに悩むべき問題になりそうです。

読みやすく、開発者や将来のゲーマーに役立つ評価を作成していただきありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198015617323', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 713, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 632, 'last_played': 1684507359}
review: 기대이상으로 재밌는데 그래픽이 구진감은 있긴함
developer_response:
그래픽에 대해서 좋게 표현해 주셔서 감사합니다...사실대로 말씀드리자면...'구진감'이 아니라...정말로 '구진것'이 맞을겁니다. 저희의 '일단 만들고 보자' 라는 마음때문에 일어난 일이지요. 같은 실수를 반복하지 않도록 미래의 개발에서는 지금의 경험을 십분 활용하겠습니다!

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073640954', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 17579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14697, 'last_played': 1698173767}
review:
An unnoticed gem that exceeds your expectations by a mile.
A game that is made with love and dedication.
In this particular case the game is not one of *cough* x-com *cough* clones, but a giant adventure
with so many improvements and ideas that it makes the mentioned game a lackluster shadow of this project.
Think of it as a comparrison between Path of Exile and D2. It took all the best, improved the questionable and brought 10x times more of it's own.

An absolute must have experience for those who enjoys turn based TRPGs.
developer_response:
The first and second lines of your review are a bit much for us, but rather than reject them, we'll try to make the game better so that more people can agree with you.

As you mentioned, we are heavily influenced by *cough* XCOM *cough*, but we are going to make the colors of the game more obvious so that Troubleshooter is not just a copycat of XCOM, but a new brand.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199135965594', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1683727650}
review: 核心是XCOM的模仿作品，漫画的外衣，还行吧，战斗简单，动漫迷可以考虑，画质细节经不起推敲，系统UI字体很糟糕，战场捡物品频率较高，影响策略体验，这也是难度不高的原因之一（XCOM2的频率比较合适，有几率敌人一局掉落一件）正能量的氛围营造还不错，就是俗称的中二正义什么的
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

游戏经过更新后增加了很多系统,我们只忠实于告知这些系统的存在,对如何展现出好看的一面一无所知。 无论我们准备多少，如果用户没有正确认知，就等于没有。 我们不会停止努力改善这种现象。

啊，请考虑在游戏选项中使用加速游戏速度的选项【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】。你可以从【选项】 → 【环境设置】 → 【游戏进行】中找到上述选项。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561199237446485', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 8666, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2430, 'last_played': 1700651328}
review:

developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

author: {'steamid': '76561197989015218', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 2846, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2717, 'last_played': 1685632344}
review:
Not even halfway through the game and everything in here is amazing.

The best comparison would be a mix of XCOM + Final Fantasy Tactics and it's working out quite well!

The devs are very active and still pushing frequent updates 3 years later.

The game isn't, [i] by default, [/i] as difficult as XCOM [b] but! [/b] There are multiple difficulty settings including optional challenges you can select which can drastically increase the difficulty of the game.

So far, I'd give the game an 8.5/10. My only issues so far being the UI being confusing when it comes to researching masteries and somewhat frequent grammatical errors in the english translation.. [strike] which I can't really complain about as I am not the best at it myself. [/strike]

All that said, lovely game and definitely recommended if you're looking for a tactical, turn-based RPG game.
developer_response:
" XCOM + Final Fantasy Tactics "

If a game could do both of those things well, it would be a truly great game, and we hope to be able to do that, but we know it's not an easy road. But I think it's definitely worth the challenge, and we'll be working to get closer to that goal with future development.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199234949981', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 24996, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24994, 'last_played': 1690404386}
review: This game scratch that x-com itch. Martial arts/shooter turn-base SRPG. This game is deep and long. Comic book style story telling...you'll feel for every character on your team. I love how the past is reveal, little by little. Bring on Part 2!!!
developer_response:
Troubleshooter is obviously heavily influenced by XCOM, so if Troubleshooter can be a good alternative to XCOM, that's really good news for the development team. But we're not going to stop there, we're going to make more parts to establish the Troubleshooter brand.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073471720', 'num_games_owned': 250, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 6639, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4772, 'last_played': 1685752783}
review:
Llevo 80 horas jugando y no le encuentro fin. :D

Se le compara injustamente con X-com. Pero la realidad es que es un juego completamente diferente y muy original, ya que en vez de tener una estrategia general y simplemente adaptarse a lo que vaya ocurriendo, Troubleshooter ofrece una enorme cantidad de estrategias diferentes con las variadas clases de personajes y sus especializaciones, cada personaje tiene 2 sub-clases que cambian radicalmente la forma en que se juegan de tal modo que Sion puede ser un hechicero a distancia o peleador a corto alcance. Anne puede ser un personaje de apoyo por completo o una hechicera de tierra... o ambos. Hasta ahora sólo tengo 7 personajes, que da un total de 14 sub-clases, cada una ofreciendo modos únicos de utilizar el personaje... y tengo la sensación de que todavía quedan otros 7 personajes
A esto le puedes sumar todo el mundo de las maestrías que ayudan a pulir tu estrategia general. Por ejemplo, Sion hechicero con la maestría "one shot, one kill" se vuelve una máquina imparable de asesinato, pero que pueden matar de un crítico. Anne con las maestrías de bruja blanca y shaman se convierte en un revoltijo de mejoras a los compañeros relativamente cercanos.
Y las maestrías es sólo un sistema de varios, equipamiento, su creación y mejora, sistema de bonding, por los mercaderes se puede intuir un sistema de mascotas y muchas otras cosas.
Lo único que no me gusta es que a veces es necesario pasarse los mismos niveles unas cuantas veces para conseguir materiales y maestrías. Aunque desde luego siempre se puede aumentar la dificultad y jugarlo en modo reto para cambiar la experiencia.

En cuanto a la dificultad: Recae en la cantidad de enemigos y en la magnitud del mapa. Personalmente me encuentro dividiendo a mi equipo en pequeñas sub-unidades para abarcar más territorio, aunque generalmente eso causa que alerte a más enemigos... muchos enemigos. Hasta ahora el mapa con más enemigos que he jugado tenía alrededor de 80 enemigos. Los mapas y las batallas realmente se sienten como escaramuzas a gran escala, casi como una guerra en la calle.

La historia personalmente me gusta mucho, es bastante interesante y especial. Por ejemplo, me encantan los dilemas por los que atraviesa Irene, la propia presión que se impone a si misma Anne. Y en general la historia de todos los personajes y de todo el universode Troubleshooter me encanta.
Por otro lado, creo que está muy fragmentada la historia, puedes tener varias escenas acerca de un personaje y de repente todo el trasfondo que se vivió en su capítulo desaparece y nunca se vuelve a mencionar, como si nada hubiera pasado. 

La música y visualmente me agradan, creo que encajan bien.

Finalmente, y creo que es lo más importante. Es un juego que realmente es amado por sus desarrolladores, se nota rápidamente en cosas como la cantidad de contenido que hay en el juego, que han agregado un DLC con 2 personajes extra (por si tenía pocos) completamente gratis porque creen que sin esos personajes y sus historias el juego está incompleto. Y fue justo todo este cariño y esfuerzo de los desarrolladores que me hizo comprar el juego. Recomiendo el juego porque el juego en verdad me ha gustado mucho y creo que es un buen juego, pero también lo recomiendo porque aprecio mucho el trabajo, amor y honestidad de los desarrolladores por Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children. <3
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

Troubleshooter is heavily influenced by XCOM. In return, we had to make Troubleshooter's colors more obvious. We chose the game's story and mastery system as a way to achieve this.

We didn't want the game's story to just be a bridesmaid to the combat. We defined the game's story as the trigger for everything, and combat as the gamer's direct participation in the game's story. A lot of backstory is introduced to explain why each character has started their fight, and this builds up to a larger world. Of course, it also had the side effect of increasing the number of things we had to explain, but we'll talk about those in future developments.

The mastery system is the most important aspect of combat, and we think it's where you can best reflect the results of your character's growth. We still want to expand on this system, and in the process, we'll be overhauling it to reduce the repetitive elements you mentioned and allow more people to find their fighting style faster.

We're not done updating Troubleshooter yet, and we'll be working even harder to make sure the remaining updates meet your expectations.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064028072', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1808, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 750, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1711772252}
review: Nice characters environment color tone during the games ,this is a good turn base game if allow save anytime, you can't save diuring the game when you accident click the wrong command. no backward after move.
developer_response:
Troubleshooter was designed targeting an online SRPG. So every data is stored in the server's database so there's no way you backward a turn. But we recognize that many players want a campaign mode more and current development is focusing story mode. Though we have no way to backward your turn but we provide an option called "Auto Checkpoint". Though this is not exactly what you want, but I believe this can be help your game play.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029752947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 547, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1710572495}

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

author: {'steamid': '76561198351668590', 'num_games_owned': 268, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 9165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9165, 'last_played': 1671819734}
review:
정말 잘 만든 게임. 
하지만 게임에 익숙해지는 데 까지 정말 많은 시간이 걸린다.
developer_response:
맞는 말씀이십니다. SRPG 게임이 다른 게임 장르보다 진입 장벽이 상대적으로 높은 편인데 게임이 발매되고 난 후에 여러 차례 업데이트를 거치다 보니 그 장벽이 더 높아진 느낌입니다. 컨텐츠의 추가외에 이를 더 쉽고 단계적으로 소개할 수 있는 방법을 연구해 보겠습니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198124331419', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3779, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1695, 'last_played': 1711229836}
review:
Fun, varied combat styles. Lots to play around with in terms of gearing and ability stats. Reminds me of Fire Emblem, but there's no time limit to how long you can spend leveling and experimenting, which is perfect for me. I don't feel rushed and I can tweak things often without penalty.
So far the story is pretty good. You can choose to do story quests whenever you're ready. Very K-Drama style and campy, but balanced well by some good serious or emotional moments. The characters are good enough, with simple motivations and goals.
I haven't made too much progress into the relationship meter aspects, so I'm not sure if that's good or bad, but it's another bar to watch go up over time. 
I got it as a gift, but I'd say it's definitely worth the price.
developer_response:
It's also good news for us that Troubleshooter reminded you of a good game. However, Troubleshooter is a new franchise and its presence and completeness dare not be compared to Fire Emblem. We will continue to improve the game so that more gamers can relate to your assessment while making our own color clearer.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198811250342', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 24311, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12317, 'last_played': 1710765555}

author: {'steamid': '76561198408723577', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 73175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66817, 'last_played': 1703603631}
review: 그래픽도 점점 안좋네요 꺠끗하지않음 업데이트도 종종하면 꺠끗하겠으나 없는것같고 스토리만 끝나면 게임안할것같아
developer_response:
깨끗하지 않다는 표현, 업데이트가 깨끗하지 않다는 말씀이 어떤 의미인지 알 수가 없습니다. 현재 그래픽의 어떤 점에서 불만이 생기시는 건가요?

그리고 저희 업데이트는 현재 매달 업데이트를 통해 지속적으로 이어가고 있습니다.
더 빠른 업데이트를 원하셨다면 저희 팀 역량 문제이기에 죄송할 뿐입니다.

표현이 애매하여 본 리뷰의 뜻을 잘 이해하지 못하겠으나 현재 온라인으로 확인할 플레이 타임이 매우 작으셔서 오프라인으로 플레이 중인가 하는 생각이 듭니다.

어떤 문제든 저희가 해결해드릴테니 명확한 설명 부탁드립니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129598952', 'num_games_owned': 494, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3682, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3020, 'last_played': 1707842658}
review: Please, cut the whole story and dialogues, it's a nightmare, being forced to skip all this bullshit, especially when the rest of the game is fantastic.
developer_response:
I know what function you want. However, it's really not easy to implement that function because we can't predict the team's condition when the structure of the game has crossed a certain part. However, as the second half of the game is getting longer, we will continue to work on ways to make the first half of the game more concise and faster.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020175380', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 485, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 485, 'last_played': 1680674391}
review:
Si te gusto Vandal Hearts, Final Fantasy Tactics, Tactics Ogre, Fire Emblem, X-Com, Phoenix Point, etc etc..
Imaginate este juego como una serie de anime, con escenarios a resolver al estilo de los RPG tacticos anteriormente mencionados, contra grandes cantidades de enemigos y pudiendo optimizar cada uno de tus personajes segun tu forma de juego, cada uno con sus propias clases bien diferenciadas como tipicos personajes de Shonen con poderes..

El nivel de desarrollo y personalizacion de cada personaje es complicado, pero luego de pasarse un buen tiempo armando combos de pasivas, ver el resultado es sencillamente genial.

Para poner algunos ejemplos faciles que se puedan entender.
se pueden equipar pasivas (o equipar ciertos items) que permiten pasar por areas dañinas (corrosion, hielo, fuego, etc..) y hay ciertos personajes que pueden crearlas. mas especificamente, un personaje puede lanzar areas de hielo y corrosion, y de hacerlo encima de un aliado con dicha pasiva, no solo no lo afecta, sino que como crea una nube, le da la bonificacion como si estuviera en una nube de humo, obteniendo esquiva.
Asi tambien con esas nubes, se las puede atravezar para obtener ambos debuff (el de hielo y el de corrosion) y tener una pasiva que convierte los debuffs en buffs al finalizar el turno para obtener 2 buffs.

todos los personajes pueden equipar una pasiva que les permite recuperar un punto de accion al eliminar a un enemigo, asi como tambien al mismo tiempo, poder bajar el tiempo de enfriamiento de las habilidades por cada enemigo eliminado, lo que podria permitir a personajes con ataques melee, poder hacer cadena de asesinatos.. eso sumado a ciertas pasivas que dan buffs por kills..

un personaje del estilo "sniper" puede tener una mascota en el campo, estas pueden ser diversas y tener diversos propositos, a dichas mascotas se las puede equipar con pasivas tambien, pudiendo convertir una mascota en un blanco casi imposible de golpear con ataques de rango y tambien convirtiendolo en una nube de humo que acompaña a su amo (el sniper) dandole dicho buff al estar cerca, como tambien otro buff por una pasiva llamada Carisma..

las formas pueden ser miles.. quiza llegado el punto, lo mas interesante del juego sea eso, jugar con las diferentes clases y armados de personaje, que para colmo cada personaje es completamente diferente a los demas y a su vez muchos se complementan, y este juego de eso tiene para rato, definitivamente de las mejores compras de los ultimos años.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

Thank you for comparing Troubleshooter with great games. I don't think Troubleshooter is up to par with these great games yet. But as we continue to improve the game and develop better sequels based on this experience, I believe that the Troubleshooter series will be mentioned in the review of other games.

Troubleshooter is a game that will be the basis for all the games we will make in the future. That is why we want to implement more now. This is because I believe that the current experience will soon produce better results in the future. The mastery is the most important system among them. The growth of the character and the joy of battle all come from this. You'll need a little time until you get used to this system for the first time, but the fun of the game will double as soon as you understand this perfectly. And I think you're already making good use of this system.

The game is now nearing its end, and updates will continue to be made to make existing systems even more useful, rather than introducing any more new ones. Please look forward to our updates in the future.

Thank you for this review.

We're glad you enjoyed our game. Your review make it worthwhile for us to develop this game continuously. 

We'll do our best to give more pleasure!

Have a great weekend!

author: {'steamid': '76561198050187102', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 6673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2700, 'last_played': 1685155486}
review:
What's to like: Lots of depth and customization. Fun game play with nice difficulty curve. Definitely has the basics right. However, story can be disjointed and drag. Most of the characters are the typical tropes. Uneven translation.

Edit: In case I wasn't clear, Troubleshooter is a great game. It's great where it counts, and the room for improvement is on the less important factors.
developer_response: Thank you for supporting the development team through good review despite the fact that the advantages and disadvantages are on the same level. We will improve the game so that the number of advantages is definitely more than the number of disadvantages.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982882308', 'num_games_owned': 1102, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 3609, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 339, 'last_played': 1703741096}
review:
Do you like Anime? Cant get enough of Xcom? Already beaten FE Three Houses with all the houses? 

Then Troubleshooter should be your next stop! Got all that rich character of a FE, the solid structure and strategy of an Xcom, and a healthy dose of classic over the top anime story.

As a plus it runs well on Steam Deck, though my personal setup is to use the trackpads as mouse input on top of the controller input as there is A LOT to learn and tool tips are easier to get at with a cursor.

edited to expand my thoughts.
developer_response:
" Anime Xcom "

I think this expression is most easily agreed upon by those who are new to Troubleshooter. But I believe that the more you experience the game, the more you will find the color of Troubleshooter.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123293662', 'num_games_owned': 532, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 4500, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4500, 'last_played': 1682972353}
review:
Troubleshooter is a very good Tactical RPG that is arguably worth double its asking price for what's on offer here. If you like turn-based tactics games such as XCOM or Fire Emblem and don't mind some dumb anime tropes, it's an easy recommend. To briefly go through the main positives:

-Incredible amount of gameplay depth. After 75 hours, I still haven't even unlocked half of the masteries (passive and active abilities you can use to customise your characters) in the game and have barely touched some of the game's other systems such as Giselle's pet capturing or Kylie's drone building. If you like to experiment and try out many different strategies and builds, you'll love this game.

-Likeable, (mostly) well-written cast of characters. The story is told through an ensemble cast and frequently switches to the perspective of the villains who are in some cases, just as developed as the main characters.

-The cutscene and character art is very good.

-Ridiculous amount of content. It took me 75 hours to beat the main game which is composed of six chapters, and the first DLC is free and adds another chapter as well as two new characters. In this time, I haven't even unlocked half the masteries, half the achievements and I rushed quite a bit towards the end so I didn't do a lot of side content like the Violent Cases.

-The developers are great and more than deserving of your money. They update the game quite regularly, respond to every review and as mentioned before, released the first DLC for free. It's clear they care about the game and their community a lot.

If that all sounds appealing to you, the game is more than worth buying at full price.

That said, I do have some gripes with the game which are worth mentioning:

-The English translation is the most obvious one which almost everyone has mentioned already so I won't go over it in too much detail here. It's not awful. I, at least, had no trouble understanding the tutorials for the game's systems and you can always tell what's happening in the story. But there is definitely a lot of awkward dialogue that could be significantly improved.

-I thought the class system was almost pointless and very basic compared to the other game systems. You can level every character's class to max in a handful of missions and unlock all their abilities easily. The classes don't really feel distinct from each other at all and I pretty much forgot about them once everyone was maxed out.

-The balancing and difficulty can be pretty inconsistent from my experiences playing mostly on Hard/Challenge Mode. One mission can be 15 minutes and almost effortless while the next could be a 2 hour+ slogfest which pit your team of 15 or so units against 70+ enemies.

-I thought the story was okay overall, but the pacing is all over the place and a lot of it ended up feeling like filler. The ending is also incredibly anticlimatic and resolved very few of the plot threads that were being built up. I get that this is the first game in a series and these will likely be addressed in the next game(s), but it just feels really unsatisfying. I think the main problem I have is a lack of stakes. Almost nobody dies, and this applies to both the heroes and the villains. You'll defeat a boss only for them to reappear in a cutscene three missions later, apparently free and unharmed no matter the context of their previous defeat. And they'll keep doing this and coming back over and over until the end. 'Fake' drama is stirred up only to ultimately result in nothing of value lost and the protagonists none the worse for wear, with it being completely forgotten about immediately afterwards. The biggest example of this is a mission late in the game where a trap is set for the protagonists that ends with [spoiler]one of them getting sniped in the head[/spoiler]. The cutscene makes a big show of how serious and dramatic this is and even acts like [spoiler]they died[/spoiler]... only for [spoiler]the character to be completely fine and ready to go straight back to work in the next cutscene[/spoiler]. This is brought up once more in a flashback in the last few missions but apart from that is literally never talked about again.

-The anime style is nice but comes with its fair share of tropes and dumb stuff that harm the believability of the world a bit. One of the main villains is a 14 year old girl that runs around dismembering people with a chainsaw and the characters talk about how awful it is that a child is being forced to fight like this. Meanwhile, you also have a 14 year old girl on your team who you take on dangerous missions where her life is constantly threatened by gun and sword wielding gangsters, killer robots and a plethora of dangerous beasts, all while paying her pennies. It's perfectly legal though... so long as you don't buy her a beer. Now THAT would be immoral. Also, there are cartoon furby monsters and dragons outside the district who sometimes even talk.

Overall though, these issues didn't harm my enjoyment much and it's still a great game that's more than worth its asking price.
developer_response:
* Translation:
While developing the game, I criticized myself a lot in the past for criticizing the translation of other games. We thought the translation was only secondary if the contents of the game were okay. But it was a big mistake. Clumsy translation was a huge barrier that made gamers give up before they even started playing. Fortunately, a lot of people pointed this out and gave me a better translation, so I was able to reach my current level of translation. As you mentioned, there is still a clumsy translation in the game. As long as our update continues, the translation of the game will also continue to be updated.

* I pretty much forgot about them once everyone was maxed out.
This is a very important issue for us. The most important thing that we consider when we create all the characters and jobs is to set them up so that they don't overlap with other characters or jobs. But the fact that you didn't feel that way means that our planning skills are very poor. We will check this part again.

* I get that this is the first game in a series and these will likely be addressed in the next game(s), but it just feels really unsatisfying.
There are many background settings related to characters in the game. All of these exist to describe one character and are not covered in detail after that. I think we can expand this and create a lot of stories. However, due to our limited development capabilities, it is difficult to complete all of these stories in Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children. But through our future development, we will expand the story of Troubleshooter and Valhalla.

* The anime style
I know some settings can make gamer unpleasant. However, this part is a strong reflection of the individual's subjective aspects, and if we produce a game considering all of the individual's tastes, we will have to develop the game with our hands and feet tied. But we are not people who do our own art that no one acknowledges. We are the ones who produce games that many people enjoy. Therefore, we will study ways to appeal to the public more naturally while keeping our individuality alive.

Thank you for teaching the development team a lot through a long article.

Again, thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994503897', 'num_games_owned': 822, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 3019, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1103, 'last_played': 1701816362}
review: I've seen this game compared to X-Com a lot. It does have a similar layout in battles with the turn-based elements, percentages, and mission types but under the hood there are some refreshingly different things about this game beyond the obvious difference in theme and setting. Masteries are excellent, as well as the systems in place for classes, gathering and crafting items, and upgrades. The unit variety is quite good, and there's a lot of content to aim for when playing. All-in-all, I see this game as a very firm Recommend for me - if you like turn-based strategy with a bit of a visual novel vibe, this game is a solid pickup and you can't beat the price.
developer_response:
As you mentioned, Troubleshooter was affected a lot by XCOM. And now we're trying to put a clearer color on the Troubleshooter. I'm glad that our efforts have appealed to you a little bit. We will continue to work hard to create games that meet the expectations of people from us.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199040515633', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 104511, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 36, 'playtime_at_review': 77211, 'last_played': 1712234765}
review:
閲覧ありがとうございます。
最初にＰＶを見ていただいて、絵柄とターン制SRPGに抵抗が無ければ、定価で買っても損はない作品です。
以下レビューです。

★お勧めポイント
○途中からでも難易度変更ができる
途中からでも難易度が変更できるのでノーマルで難しいと思ったらイージーに。簡単だと思ったらハードにもできます。
難しくて途中で詰むということはまず無いので、SRPG初心者の方でも安心してプレイできます。
物語は今の所、一本道ストーリーです（現在進行形で物語はアップデートされてます。課金DLC）
※オフラインモードにはチート機能がついてますが、そのセーブデータではオンラインモードで遊ぶ事ができなくなるので注意してください。

○豊富なメインストーリーとサブクエスト
メインストーリーのバトルパートだけでも５０戦以上。サブクエストやフリーバトルも含めれば１００戦以上あります。
更にアドベンチャーパートでは1枚絵が多く採用されており、差分込みとはいえ３００枚以上とボリュームたっぷりです。

○戦闘スタイルの自由なカスタマイズ
このゲームには特性ボード（キャラクターの能力アップや新アビリティが習得できるスキルツリーみたいなもの）という概念があり
その特性ボード内に収まる範囲で、好きな特性を付け替えする事でキャラクターを強化することができます。
そして、その特性の数は現在８００種類を超えてます！！！（追加ＤＬＣ込み）
職業専用の特性もあるので全てから選べるわけではありませんが、この特性ボードを利用することで
ステージによっては対種族用の特性ボードを作って攻略したり、癖の強い特性（ＨＰ○％未満で発動等）を沢山入れてギミックを楽しむ等。
キャラクター性能を自由にカスタマイズすることができるので、遊びの幅がグッと広がります。

○ペットとドローン
ストーリー途中からペットを手懐けて仲間にしたり、ドローンを製作する事で戦闘中に召喚（呼び出し）できるようになります。
どちらも最終進化まで育てれば強力なユニットになって戦闘をサポートしてくれるので、ステージ攻略が楽になります。
またペットの中にはレジェンド級という存在もいて、強敵ですが手懐ける事が出来れば高火力高耐久でちょっとした無双プレイも楽しめます。
※ペットとドローンにも特性ボードがあってカスタマイズできます。

○やりこみ要素
装備
装備はハクスラで、コモン・レア・レジェンドなどの等級があり、更に鑑定をすることで★１～★５といったランクがついて、能力もそれに合わせてアップします。
ドロップ率をアップする装備や特性もあるので、装備入手に関してはそこまでシビアではありませんが、★５を狙う場合は鑑定運が絡みます。
狙った★５が出た時は脳汁がぶしゃぁっと出ます。

特性
特性の習得には職業レベルアップ・同じ敵を何度も倒して情報量を最高まで上げる・ストーリーの選択肢・実績の解除等で入手できます。
上に書いた通り、現在は８００種類（追加ＤＬＣ込み）を超えている為、全て手に入れようとするとかなり時間がかかります。
ただ、全て入手しなくても全クリアーに支障は無いので安心してください。
※オフラインの場合、チート機能を使えば全て一瞬で手に入ります。

チャレンジモードでハイリスク・ハイリターン
各ステージを最高難易度でプレイできるモード。
敵の数が増え性能もアップしていて、生半可に挑むと全滅します。
敵の位置や攻撃パターンを把握するのは勿論のこと、味方には強力な装備や特性ボードが必須になってきます。
物足りなくなってきたら、途中から挑戦してみるのも良いかもしれません。

○その他
ＤＬＣについて
アートブック・サウンドトラック・コスチューム・追加エピソード等色々ありますが
まずは本ソフトを単品で買って、プレイしてみてください。
プレイしていく中で、物語をもっと詳しく知りたくなった・好きなＢＧＭがある・推しキャラができた・遊び足り無い。
となっていけば、他の購入を検討されると良いと思います。

PvPについて
メインストーリー終盤でPvPが解禁されます。
自分が愛着持って育ててきたキャラクター・ペット・ドローン。厳選してきた装備。考えられる戦術とPvP用特性ボードのお披露目。
今までとは違った世界を体験できます。
※オフラインモードではプレイできません。

○最後に
自分がどんなゲームにハマるか、レビューを見ても結局プレイしてみない事には分かりません。
ただ伝えたいのは、このゲームは私にとって１０００時間以上遊ぶ価値のある魅力的なゲームだという事です。
最後まで閲覧していただきありがとうございました。
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

あなたのプレイ時間の前で私が何を言っても、あなたの経験に及びません。もし今この文を読んでいるあなたが【トラブルシューター】を購入するのをためらっているなら、私は全面的にあなたがこの方の文を信頼するようお勧めします。

実際、ゲームにはメリットと同じくらいデメリットも明らかに存在します。 【トラブルシューター】は私たちの最初の作品であり、それほど完璧なゲームではありません。 ただ、この4年間のアップデートを通じて、私たちだけの色をより確固たるものにしていると思います。もしあなたと私たちの色が同じなら、【トラブルシューター】はきっとあなたにとってかなり良いゲームになるでしょう。

ゲームの購入方法からゲームを楽しく経験する方法をすべて網羅してくださったことについて、あなたに特に感謝したいと思います。 あなたのこの大切な文章を通じて、より多くの日本ゲーマーが『シューター通り』で一緒にいる姿を想像することができました。 そうなる日まで、私たちもゲーム開発技術の高揚に向けた修練をやめません。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198064727277', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 11366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6551, 'last_played': 1698432428}
review: Bro even though there is alot of jank in it and the early game drags on a bit man you just can feel all the love that devs have for this game and makes it so easy to look over the problems with the amazing character and setting writing with so many gameplay story integrations if you like SRPGs at all give it a try. Also just even if you don't finish the game it is really cheap for the amount of content in it easily worth the 25 bucks.
developer_response:
There are definitely drawbacks to Troubleshooter. Nevertheless, I would like to express my deep appreciation for your good review to move the development team forward. We may not be able to eliminate all the shortcomings. However, we will continue to update to eliminate as many shortcomings as possible.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198389143707', 'num_games_owned': 554, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 1003, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1003, 'last_played': 1669867525}

author: {'steamid': '76561198380975532', 'num_games_owned': 198, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 25617, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22785, 'last_played': 1690292546}
review: 时长显示近400小时，大部分时间是游戏开着人离开了，但是DLC主线都通关了，由于游戏较小众找攻略很难，年纪大了也不太爱动脑，学习成本高的游戏基本不会去玩，以至于到现在都不知道怎么抓龙抓白帽子黑眼罩，还比如打55红刀也不知道刷哪个图，照抄天赋也都是相对于过期的天赋，还有DLC不是介绍可以解锁60级吗，为什么我58级就MAX了？不过还是真心喜欢这款游戏，这一个月的时间基本就是玩他了，有朋友能推荐个完整点的攻略或答疑解惑的文档或视频吗？
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

* 为什么我58级就MAX了？
→ 因为DLC的更新还没有完成。 在DLC更新完成时，最大等级限制将比现在进一步扩大。

* 有朋友能推荐个完整点的攻略或答疑解惑的文档或视频吗？
→ 从这里可以看出，有很多中国玩家。 希望你也能有一个一起玩游戏的好朋友。 请积极利用游戏的帮助！

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198089979382', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 5104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3202, 'last_played': 1710502263}

author: {'steamid': '76561198359248685', 'num_games_owned': 78, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 12448, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7646, 'last_played': 1698906980}
review: 游戏的内容足够丰富量大管饱，地图互动，战略性都是上乘。喜欢战棋的玩家真的能拒绝这款游戏吗，虽然也有一些类似合成繁琐，人物建模有些粗糙的问题，即使这样也是一款相当好玩的游戏了，希望后面能多优化优化合成这方面，美化下角色就更好了，多出点DLC。另外也能感觉出来开发组对中国玩家态度也挺好的，真希望更多热爱战棋的玩家关注到这个游戏。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

【分争调整者】的类型是战棋。 我们得得到A游戏玩家的认可，才能继续我们的未来开发。 在【分争调整者】能够得到包括您在内的更多战棋的认可之前，我们不会停止游戏开发！

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198369698277', 'num_games_owned': 94, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 4867, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4827, 'last_played': 1684024722}
review: Absolutely love this game. I definitely feel as if this game is underappreciated as heck and I really enjoy getting to play a variety of characters with different skills while also progressing through the story. I'm a turn/strategy-based game lover myself, but I don't really hear this game being talked about much in this category as much as other games like persona for example, however I feel like this game still holds a good value for itself overall. I'm also very intrigued by the story for some odd reason, despite some of the weird parts of the story that may make it quite surprising for new players. Anyways, I'd really recommend trying this game out!
developer_response:
Troubleshooter is the first game we made. Now, rather than being talked about by many people, a word of encouragement from you is more precious to us. When we continue to improve our game development skills and produce better results as a result, we want to enjoy the game being talked about by more people. :D

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198813920458', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 11482, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3279, 'last_played': 1692536767}
review:
간만에 느긋~하게 붙잡고 할만한 게임 하나가 생겨서 기쁘네요.
일단 잼있습니다. 개인적인 의견이지만 충분히 할 만 합니다.

다른분들의 평가글들을 보니까 글(대사)의 품질문제 라든가 인게임 모델링
이 아쉽다 는 의견들이 많은데 ... 동의합니다.
단 게임 대사들은 플레이 시간이 늘어날수록 적응을 해 가서 그러는지 그럭
저럭 괜찮은것 같습니다.
그래픽은 여전히 좀 아쉽지만요.

동료들이 하나 둘 합류하고 특성에 대한 이해도가 높아질 수록 점점 게임이 
매력있게 느껴집니다.
그때까지 잘 버티면서 여유를 갖고 느긋~~ 하게 즐기는 쪽을 선호하시는 분
들은 잘 맞을것 같습니다.

저도 게임 개발을 해봐서 아는데 ... 인디팀이 게임 하나를 완성해서 서비스 
까지 갔다는것 자체가 대단한 일입니다. 
출시는 커녕 완성도 못하고 엎어지는 일이 다반사기 때문에 더 대단해 보이네요.
developer_response:
그래픽이 많이 부족한 것은 사실입니다. AAA급 게임들처럼 정말 화려하고 수준 높은 그래픽을 선보이던가, 다른곳에서 찾아볼 수 없는 개성있는 스타일을 보여주던가 해야 했는데...저희의 그래픽은 뭐랄까요....그냥 알아만 보면 된다...의 수준에 가깝습니다. 2000년 초반 수준의 그래픽이라는 평가도 종종 받습니다. 그리고 여기에 반론을 하기 어려운 것도 사실입니다. 

그래픽 부분은 무엇보다 인력과 자원이 많이 필요한 부분이고 하필 이 두 가지는 저희 같은 독립 게임 개발팀이 가질 수 없는 것들입니다. 하지만 이것은 저희의 사정일 뿐, 변명이 될 수 없다고 생각합니다. 내부적으로도 저희의 미래 개발에서 선결되어야 할, 선결은 아니더라도 최소한 지금보다는 나은 수준으로 만들어야 하는 과제라고 인식하고 있습니다.

개발팀을 격려해 주시고 트러블슈터를 추천해 주신 점, 이 자리를 통해 감사드립니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051408644', 'num_games_owned': 524, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 12311, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11942, 'last_played': 1704256181}
review:
Troubleshooter is a SRPG from Korean devs which is feels underrated for the features this game has. there's alot of things to do in Troubleshooter (TS) for SRPG fans like XCOM and FFT would love here.

The gameplay itself is pretty standard SRPG gameplay which you control units on a map sectioned with grids while you fight increasingly harder enemies. The difficulty here is pretty steep if this is your first SRPG game, and if you don't know what to do, you might stuck at a certain point. but for SRPG fans like me, this has the right amount of difficulty, with a bit personal frustation in developer choices.

this game offers 2 play mode, online and offline, with online benefits you like community buff and interact with other player in hub like MMO, like trade things and stuff but I guess you'll not doing it with strangers. Online mode can't be played when server is maintenance mode like MMO, and you have choice to transfer save to offline mode, but offline save can't be uploaded to online ver, so offline mode is just sad mode but you can cheat there for build crafting and others. Online mode will upload your decisions to server like MMO.

TS unique and in depth system is called Masteries. this rabbit hole can cost you hours of setting up and for people who likes minmaxing/making builds, this system is really fun. think of it like Materia System of FF7, or in FFT is like abilities/passives you can set for characters. Masteries unlocks with alot of ways like doing achievements, killing enemies, doing certain plot points, etc. and each class has some unique mastery they can equip and with a certain combination of Masteries equips, you can get benefits of Mastery Sets which grant you even more bonus to already equipped Masteries, and you'll need to discover this on your journey (unless you see the wiki). this system alone sold me to the game.

TS drip feed the content slowly, abit too slow at start, but as you progress you'll unlock more rabbit holes which is Beast Taming and Drone Crafting, it is another minmaxing you can manage for the endgame, and it has it's own unique Masteries too.

TS Story is pretty serviceable. It's good enough but the game tells too much informations you might or might not care at all. it's fine to tell something like enemies lore, but to tell such details isn't needed, even more so with so many "years ago" "xxx months ago" which I believe most will not even remember or care cuz it's not relevant enough to our main characters.

One complain I have, call me a bit spoiled but an ability to reload at checkpoint in middle of battle is not available to you until you get defeated, and also there's some penalty to load at the checkpoint. I know when the run is busted and I'd like to redo things at checkpoint, and I don't want to restart the whole mission by abandoning it, (because some missions can took you half an hour to complete) so I just let my characters suicide, and it's really annoying and waste of time. I don't mind some penalty doing reload on checkpoint, just so I have the consideration to not doing it, but most of the time I really want it to be a feature.

So, for SRPG fans, Troubleshooter is a must try for it's gameplay as it manages to sate my hunger for SRPG and raking me this much hours and I love my journey in it.
developer_response:
You have organized the representative contents of the Troubleshooter game well and I am sure this article will be a good guide for those who are hesitant to buy the game.

Story and mastery are the core systems of the game.

Stories are an important tool that leads to everything in the game. As the story progresses, new colleagues emerge and you find out why they're joining the battle. In addition, new enemies appear, and through antagonism with them, fellowship deepens. As we focus on individual events, the dark plans of the upper class of Valhalla are revealed.

Mastery is another key system in the game. Character growth means how much and how appropriately you can handle this. Depending on how it is combined, the character's role in the battle can be completely different. It may take a lot of time to get the perfect ability you want. But you'll see your character dominate the battlefield after that process.

Troubleshooter is a game that will be the basis for every game that the development team will produce in the future. So we're going to implement as much as we can through this game and we're going to deepen that in the future. I hope to share the journey with you and all of you.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164774142', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 9052, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9052, 'last_played': 1681430997}
review:
약간 오글거리는 턴제 JRPG 느낌
작품에 대한 애정이 많이 느껴져서 좋아요
developer_response:
" 약간 오글거리는 턴제 JRPG "

'약간 오글' 이라고 표현해 주셨지만 이로 인해 많은 비판을 받은 것도 사실입니다. 특색 있는 이야기라는 것이 '오글거림'을 동반하지는 않는데, 저희의 이야기 전달 능력이 부족하여 적당한 지점을 찾지 못한 부분이 분명 존재합니다. 전문적인 작가가 없는 조그만 개발팀이지만 앞으로의 이야기에서 좀 더 대중성을 반영할 수 있는 글 쓰기를 보여드릴 수 있도록 노력하겠습니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990315998', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 10448, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9284, 'last_played': 1684989579}
review:
This game is surprisingly great. I say surprisingly because, from what I can tell, the dev team is rather small and I hadn't heard much about the game. But it's rapidly become one of my favorite games of recent years. As many others have said, it's sort of XCOM meets JRPG (despite it being Korean, not Japanese). It works really, really well. While XCOM allows you to get invested in your team, they're ultimately more or less interchangeable and faceless. The characters in this game are the opposite. They have distinct personalities, compelling backstories (the translation is admittedly rough, making the fact that the story is interesting and compelling despite that all the more impressive), and very distinct abilities and playstyles.

That being said, this does differ from XCOM in that there's not a failure state to the larger game. Your team members can't actually die in the field (though it is plenty easy to lose missions on higher difficulties and/or with sloppy play). So it's much more about the tactical combat within a mission rather than a stressful campaign, if that's what you're looking for.

The number of mechanics and elements to the game is pretty bewildering (in both a good and bad way). Again, the sheer depth and breadth is surprising given the relatively small studio. That being said, it can be very intimidating at first. You'll most likely need to consult guides early on just to understand all the systems and, while they become fairly intuitive over time, you'll still need to refer back to them to look up masteries, their combinations, their drop locations, etc. And that's just about building your (human) characters. Training beasts or crafting drones add whole new systems to delve into (or maybe get bogged down in). There's certainly not a shortage of things to do, though if you want to focus on the main story with some side missions you can safely ignore beasts, drones, crafting, and a lot of other systems that are fun to mess with but ultimately unnecessary.

Speaking of focusing on story, have no fears of grinding being necessary. Especially on lower difficulties you can proceed through the main missions without needing to stop to grind materials, experience, item drops, or anything else. I've done my fair share of grinding, but more because I really enjoy the gameplay and want to extend it by searching out rare enemies, drops, etc. Furthermore, the side missions, which you might first assume lack relevant story and are just filler (a bunch of random enemies on a recycled map) are anything but. Even without associated quests, it's worth playing through each as they flesh out the characters and main story.

Bringing this to a close, you definitely owe it to yourself to check out this game if you're at all a fan of XCOM or other Tactical or Strategic RPGs. My main criticisms are the rough translation and complexity of some of the systems (which is compounded by the rough translation, as ability descriptions can be simultaneously exceedingly verbose and still unclear); the complexity of the systems in turn leads to fairly complex UI (outside of battle - in battle UI is clear and straightforward) though for the most part the UI handles the complexity well. It would be amazing to see more polish for this game and a greater cadence of content releases (it's clear there are many stories left to tell and characters left to add), but even as-is I highly recommend it. There's a ton of amazing content especially given the base price.
developer_response:
" it's sort of XCOM meets JRPG "

Your judgment is correct. When we started designing the Troubleshooter, it must have been the XCOM series that was most affected. We borrowed the combat system implemented by XCOM, which was settled in the Troubleshooter with great stability. But this required another tradeoff. We had to appeal to gamers that Troubleshooter would be a new brand, not just a copy of XCOM.

Since then, we've started adding a lot of things to the game and the story of the game is one of them. We wanted the story not to be a boring gateway to go through for the next battle, but to lead every event. It required a lot of writing and background pictures, but we thought it was well worth it.

As the story got longer, many things could be connected. And it served as a powerful catalyst for the combination of RPG elements into the game. There are many elements in the game, but everything is optional except for missions related to the story of the game. We've set aside the essentials of the game for gamers who want to conquer everything in the game so that anyone can experience it without any burden.

If other gamers who have seen your evaluation experience Troubleshooter in the same way as you, it will be a great pleasure for us.
