author: {'steamid': '76561198000825957', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 17747, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4665, 'last_played': 1695549867}
review:
Amazing game with a high level of polish. I'm really impressed with the amount of time and work that must have been put into this game. So many options, so many missions, so many ways to customize your team, it can be overwhelming! I get sucked into these kinds of games, feeds my compulsive nature! If you are like me, be prepared to spend countless hours in battles, crafting gear, and swaping masteries!

The game did crash on my once in 80 hours of play time. It crashed in the middle of a long battle, so I was pissed... Then I reloaded the game, it continued at the exact same turn in battle that I left off on, no further issues!!!!!
developer_response:
Thank you for enjoying our game despite its many shortcomings. And we'll do our best to give you more contents you enjoyed in our game.

About the crash, if you have any unusual experiences while playing, please do not hesitate to feel free to send us your logs via "Option > Error Report". We'll do our best to solve your problem!

Thank you! Have a good day!

author: {'steamid': '76561198314249893', 'num_games_owned': 282, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 4635, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1153, 'last_played': 1680261534}
review:
很好玩 几年前被训练书劝退差点错过好游戏 玩家尝试天赋组合居然还要消耗训练书资源 完全不能理解 倒不是训练书数量不够的问题 就是恶心人 反倒是天赋制作额外消耗训练书的话还差不多

author: {'steamid': '76561198070186663', 'num_games_owned': 268, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 7025, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6046, 'last_played': 1710717482}
review: Subjectively its a 10/10 for me, its a fun mixture of fire emblem and xcom with a lot of min-maxing and has a lot of content to get through. objectively I would put it as an 8/10 the story was a little tiring to get through at times. author: {'steamid': '76561199094360389', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 483, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1679666496}
review: 已经吸引到我了，加油
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果我们准备的游戏内容能愉快地填满你的时间，那对我们来说也是很大的乐趣。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561197993474719', 'num_games_owned': 180, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 26190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21306, 'last_played': 1699575055}
review:
XCOM for ultra weebs. In the best possible way.

If you like squad tactic games YOU WILL LOVE this one. Just give it 10 hours and it really starts to shine.

It is a bit more brawly than other tactic games. Your frontliners tank the damage and keep enemy melee units at bay, your healers keep them alive and your mages lay waste over the battlefield while the snipers try and take out high priority targets.

Also no perma death or consequences for failed missions. You can abandon and restart any mission at any time the only thing you lose is the time you put in the mission so far. Also most of the missions do not have time limits. All in all very forgiving game until the super hard endgame missions.

But what elevates this game above and beyond everything else in the genre is the character customization. It's one of these weird Asian game skill systems that you can't even begin to describe in a way that makes sense for the average western player - you just have to experience it by yourself. However, once you got a hang of it, it allows for the most diverse and satisfying character development you can imagine. It's basically a little mini game in it's own. And you can respecc as much as you want (between missions).

Do you still more selling points? Diablo-esque random loot. Built-in optional Pokemon sub-game. Confusing story that makes no sense (way better than games that take their own story too serious). Also the devs respond to literally every single review <3
developer_response:
Your evaluation and experience of the game is of course subjective. But when many people agree with it, it becomes increasingly objective. We will improve the game further so that your review can be more objective than now, so that many people agree with you.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061297495', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 10572, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10572, 'last_played': 1679058470}
review:
This game franchise has potential, but I ultimately quit once I got to the DLC.  I ended up skipping all of the story scenes, this is quite literally one of the worst stories I have ever experienced in any medium.  What sucks though, is if you skip the cutscenes before a mission, sometimes you need to make a choice.  Would the game actually display the question leading to the choice?  Only if you don't skip the whole thing.  So you either have to fast forward through a bunch of absolutely terrible writing, or blindly make a decision.  Spoonism?  I don't care if the game developers are Korean, that has got to be the stupidest idea for a cult ever.

Positives:  Character building.  It gets very in depth and was what kept me going for so long.  I really wanted to keep leveling up, discovering new masteries and mastery sets, and unlocking new characters.  There was some variety in the mission types as well, to at least keep things mildly fresh.

Negatives:  Story and writing.  Covered this already.  Once again, taking into consideration that this is a foreign developer, some of the translations are just wrong, and the explanations for skills and game mechanics is poor at best.  Once you get to the DLC, things ramp up exponentially with no warning or real way to mitigate.  When an enemy hits you and 6+ masteries trigger, it's a wtf moment.

Very hopeful that this team will make a second game that is much more polished.  Despite the negative review, I do feel that I got my moneys worth for the base game.  The DLC ended up being a waste of money.
developer_response:
Troubleshooter was most criticized for being boring at the beginning of the game. However, on the contrary, it has received positive reviews from most people past the beginning of the game. 

You are definitely the latter. Therefore, your review is sending a stern warning to the development team. In addition to adding new content, the development team will carefully review the supplementary measures for the part you mentioned.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111021126', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 2701, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1679496893}

author: {'steamid': '76561198123558829', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 16776, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5145, 'last_played': 1680893196}
review:
no. just, no



(note to The Developer(s): WHEN ONE TYPES IN ALL CAPITAL LETTERS, that's what the internets call "shouting". moving on...)

this game is obviously a work of love, as indicated by the Developer(s)'s response to my not-at-all-important review:
only a couple hrs into the game one can tell that much time, energy, dedication & possibly personal funds were spent on this project.

since i've been solicited for suggestions, i'd tell The Developer(s) to:
- review prior comments about the overly-convoluted Mastery System & all of its' woes: start there

- consider a separate, 2nd save file/state which isn't constantly overwritten. AT LEAST WHEN PLAYING ON NORMAL & BELOW. that way, we can explore what the game has to offer & experiment, instead of being punished for exploring & experimenting. this is a video game afterall- not real life

- consider figuring out why my cursor always randomly flies towards the opposite edge of the map at least 15 times every level, it's beyond very annoying

- when starting a level, consider an option to allow the player to skip the story w/out the player missing out on the mission objectives


4 suggestions should suffice, if not go'head & let me know


TLDR: just because a consumer doesn't recc. suggestions for a product doesn't mean the product won't be enjoyed by others- & The Developer(s) of said product should relax, knowing that their product will be enjoyed by others
developer_response:
If you tell us why you shouted "just, no", we will immediately study how to improve it. We are very sorry that much of your time with Troubleshooter over the past two weeks seems to have left a bad impression on you.

Thank you for this review.

=========== 2023.3.22 ==============

First all, thank you for your updated review. Mastery system is a game-frame issue, and we're going to put a lot of thought into how to improve it.

On the other hand, the part about providing multiple save files was a result for the online mode. So, during missions, we'll do our best to give a way that you can manually set checkpoints as much as possible and let them manage the checkpoint list, but I think it would be very difficult in lobbies.

The issue with the mouse pointing in one direction at certain points was fixed in a bugfix in late February. If you're still experiencing it after that point, there may be a bug we haven't identified. We'll continue to look for it.

Finally, all stories can still be skipped with the ESC key. Mission objectives can be found in the menu that you activate by pressing 'ESC'. Please let us know if you're not seeing the mission objective in this area and we'll try to improve it.

Thank you for your honest feedback so we can make this game even better!!

Have a good day! :Albus:

author: {'steamid': '76561198001732857', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 492, 'last_played': 1708263217}
review: Criminally underrated xcom/persona-esque tactical RPG
developer_response:
More stories and more colleagues are waiting for you. 

I recommend that you complete all the scenario missions at a low level of difficulty first. Then you can recruit more colleagues and use more diverse masteries to change your character powerfully. 

You can try again at any time after completing any kind of mission in the game. In this process, you can change the difficulty of the mission or select more people to participate in the mission. Therefore, it is not necessary to complete violent cases or normal cases from the beginning.

Enjoy the story first. Then use your strategy on the battlefield to your heart's content.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000255399', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1678842708}
review: Extremely well done tactical RPG. The skill tree and some of the mechanics are very complex, at least at first, but the game feels satisfying and fair. Looking forward into diving into more of it.
developer_response:
Troubleshooter is a game that will be the basis for all the games we're going to create. So we want to do more with this game than we do now. I wish I could be with you on that journey.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009995383', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 6707, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3394, 'last_played': 1691937323}
review:
Ein kleines Juwel im X-Com Style. 
Das Crafting bzw. Mastery System ist nicht so meines, ich finde es irgendwie unnötig kompliziert.
Story ist für mich interessant, un die Artworks sind wirklich hübsch/gut gelungen.

Das schöne ist, dass das Spiel von den Devs auch gepflegt wird und somit freue ich mich schon, wenn die Serie weitergeht. :)
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

First of all, I'm sorry for not providing a translation for the Germany. Nevertheless, I appreciate that you enjoyed the Troubleshooter. 

I agree that our crafting system is not kind to everyone and it needs much modification. Not everything will get better in a day and night. But I won't give up and think about a better way.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020051628', 'num_games_owned': 798, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 1887, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1364, 'last_played': 1678671932}
review: One of the absolute best Strategy RPGs on Steam. If you are into genre titles like Final Fantasy Tactics, XCom, Tactics Ogre, Disgaea, etc, then this is absolutely for you. The story and setting are interesting, and the game is much more polished than I expected it to be. The developers are actively updating the game regularly and seem to really love this project. For $25 you'll be very hard pressed to find a Strategy RPG whose quality can compete with Troubleshooters.
developer_response:
Games above are, without question, absolutely great games. If Troubleshooter brought you back to those games, that in itself is a great honor to the development team. I realize that Troubleshooter can't be compared to those games yet, but being recognized in the same genre as those games gives us a boost moving forward. We're not going to stop, we're going to make it to the end of this road.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065741805', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 8323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8149, 'last_played': 1697259933}
review:
갠적으로 해봤던 국산겜중 가장 재밌는듯
진입장벽이 좀 있긴한데.. 깊이가 있는게임들은 그럴수밖에 없는 부분이라 뭐..
근데 제일 아쉬운건 동료 합류 속도가 너무 느리다. 레벨1부터 함께했으면 어땠을까 싶기도 하다. 스토리때매 힘들겠지만..
스토리는 원래 스킵충인데 이건 스킵안하고 그냥저냥 잼게 본거같음
캐릭터들도 각자 개성이 있어서 재미가 있음
이런류jrpg 게임은 표지만 보면 재밌을지 감이 안와서 망설이게 되는데 이건 턴제 좋아하면 후회안할듯
developer_response:
동료 합류 속도가 너무 느리다...맞는 말씀입니다. 이로 인한 전력 누수를 보강하기 위해 VHPD를 도입했지만 이 또한 좋은 평가를 받고 있지 못하고 있습니다. 차라리 처음부터 최소 4인 체제로 게임을 시작하는 방식은 어땠을까 하는 생각도 합니다. 그럼에도 불구하고 트러블슈터의 이야기를 끝까지 들어주신 것에 대해서 감사드립니다. 남은 이야기를 잘 끝마치고 단점을 보완한 새로운 이야기를 시작할 수 있도록 계속 노력하겠습니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198293862212', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 15110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15110, 'last_played': 1672056148}
review:
很好玩，量大管饱，刷天赋、刷装备、培养宠物玩得不亦乐乎。
成就超多，炼狱难度的挑战模式很有挑战性。
天赋搭配比较耗时费脑，强力天赋还得参考攻略。
场景比较大，敌人比较多，完整打完一局耗时比较长，好在打完小boss可以战略撤退。
无人机太弱，上场触敌易躺。
剧情上挖的很多坑不知何时能填完，期待后续更新。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

游戏里还有很多没有脍炙人口的故事。 另外,为了讲述这样的故事,需要更多的登场人物,但我们的开发力量还不足以全部解决这些问题。 但是我们不会放弃游戏的开发。 通过另一个DLC或后续作品,我们将继续讲述阿尔伯斯和朋友们的故事。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198078692771', 'num_games_owned': 120, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 37640, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33653, 'last_played': 1702414555}
review:
소규모 개발팀이 엄청난 애정으로 오랫동안 개발해 온 국산 SRPG 게임이다.
재미는 확실하고 평가도 이미 매우 긍정적이므로, 이에 대해선 딱히 할 말이 없다.

다만 파고들기 요소는 강점이자, 약점인 것 같다.
게임의 깊은 부분까지 파고 들기 위해서는 시간이 진짜 너무 많이 들어서
조금씩 플레이하는 직장인이 100% 즐기기가 많이 힘들다.

개인적인 생각으로는 (깊을 뿐만 아니라, 넓기까지 하다.) 파고들기 요소의 넓이라도 좀 좁히면 나을 것 같다. 인터페이스나 동선도 간략하고 좀 더 단순해지면 더 좋을 것 같다.

UI 역시 개인적으로 직관적인 이해가 힘든 모호한 부분이 꽤 있았다. (오랜 시간 후에 알게 됨.)

"뜯고 씹고 맛보기 좋은 SRPG를 추구한다"는 제작사의 모토와는 다른 의견이긴 하나
그럼에도 불구하고 차기작은 좀 더 담백하면 훨씬 좋을 것 같다는 생각이 든다.

모든 개인의 성향을 맞출 수 없고, 아무리 고티 게임이라도 단점이 없지는 않다.
작은 팀에서 애정을 가지고 이런 패키지 싱글 게임을 만들어 주어서 무척 감사하다.
developer_response:
저희의 이야기 전달 방법에 호불호가 많은 편인데, 이렇게 즐겁게 즐겨주신 분들이 계실 때마다 안도의 한숨을 내 쉽니다.

저희가 하고 싶은 이야기를 더 많이 더 즐겁게 플레이 하실 수 있도록 최선을 다하겠습니다!

용기를 주시는 리뷰 감사합니다!

즐거운 한 주 되세요!

author: {'steamid': '76561198839440500', 'num_games_owned': 76, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 17693, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4059, 'last_played': 1687701169}

author: {'steamid': '76561197989560483', 'num_games_owned': 87, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 10541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7189, 'last_played': 1681820174}
review:
마지막 플레이가 2020 5월인데 이 때 기준으론 거의 엔드스펙까지 맞췄었다고 생각합니다. 당시에도 생각했는데 진짜 너무 추천하는 게임입니다. 초반에 진짜 개루즈한 부분 있긴 한데(백호 본진 치러 가는 부분? 여기가 내 성장은 너무 애매하고 상대는 강한데다 숫자도 많아서 진짜 답답해 죽는 클라이맥스인데 한 턴 한 턴 넘길 때 암걸림) 그거만 어떻게 넘기면 너무재밌습니다.

 가격대비 볼륨도 긍정적인 의미로 말도 안 된다고 생각하고요 본편만 해도 100시간은 기본으로 즐길 수 있습니다. 저는 여기저기서 정보 찾아보고 치밀하게 계획적으로 파밍하면서 했는데도 100시간 넘어가고서야 당시 엔드맵을 큰 문제없이 깰 엔드스펙 맞췄었습니다. 게임 난이도가 절대 쉬운 편은 아니라서 재료 파밍 제외하면 어느정도의 긴장감은 가지고 해야하는데 저는 좋았습니다.

많은 분들이 써주셨지만 클래스도 캐릭터당 2종류는 되는데다 특성이 엄청나게 많고 조합가짓수도 많아서 나중가면 이거 어떻게 조합할까 생각하는 게 게임의 재미입니다 

다시 해야지 해야지 생각은 하는데 이제와서 다시 할라니까 너무 많이 바뀐 거 같아서 시간이 여유로울 때 해야겠네요

그리고 각설하고 이 게임 최고의 장점은 사후지원입니다 제작사가 게임을 진짜 사랑하고 열정을 가지고 개발한다는 게 눈에 보여요 어떤 게임이든 이렇게 피드백하고 패치할 수만 있으면 실패할 수 없다고 생각합니다
developer_response:
즐겁게 즐겨주신 것을 넘어 저희의 부족함을 메우는 과정을 긍정적으로 봐주셔서 진심으로 감사합니다! 

다시 플레이 하실 때 더 많은 즐거움이 가득하도록 꾸준히 채워 놓고 있겠습니다! 

저희 팀에게 큰 힘을 내는 말을 해주셔서 감사합니다!

즐거운 주말 보내세요! :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198030271396', 'num_games_owned': 331, 'num_reviews': 235, 'playtime_forever': 3499, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3412, 'last_played': 1678374591}
review:
Un bon jeu, généreux tant dans la durée que dans le gameplay mais qui peut parfois s'avérer longuet lors de certaines missions. L'optimisation des builds et la recherche du meilleur matériel est évidemment au cœur du mécanisme vidéoludique avec une variation très intéressante sur le crafting des compétences. 

Sans grande prise de tête, c'est un excellent titre qui joue plus la carte du scénario et de la détente que du stress imposé  par la course contre la montre.
developer_response:
No one in the development team knows the French so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

We're so glad you seem to have enjoyed our game. We'll do our best to give you more pleasures you have enjoyed.

At the same time, we sincerely thank you for playing like this even when I couldn't support French localization properly.

Have a great day! :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198065324478', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 2683, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2193, 'last_played': 1678601807}
review:
把制作材料精简一下吧，真的有必有弄那么多的材料吗？做个武器装备得先做材料，做材料得先抽材料，UI又密密麻麻挤在一块，还排列的巨阴间，有些材料竟然不同种类混合在一起，比如先是几个A种材料排在一起，然后又有几个B种类材料插进来，跟着又是几个A材料，再然后再排几个C材料，最后放几个B材料，还整的五颜六色，我人都麻了，做个装备找材料给我找的眼花，结果把几个做好的材料给拆了，心态爆炸。

这游戏啥都好，就是制作系统太阴间。

有中评我打中评，可惜没中评，制作系统弄的我实在恶心，不想给打好评，只能给差评了。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

即使包装得再好，也很难说现在的制作系统使用起来方便，有用。 开发组也知道这件事。 应该准备像我们的欲望一样使用方便的UI，但好像没有。 今后一段时间我会对这个问题深思熟虑的。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198115272916', 'num_games_owned': 589, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 13646, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9634, 'last_played': 1678751725}
review:
An almost perfect game that shines far above the competition. 
Here are some highlights of the good and the bad.

[h1] The Good [/h1]

[b] Content [/b] 
160 hours as of now and the game still has not yet been beat. (Granted some of that is idle time). 
Missions can last you anywhere from 30 minutes to an hour depending on how you go about doing them. The earlier missions are not that long though. 

[b] Character Builds [/b] 
Tons of options here. Just look at the guides that the game has, there are a ton of things you can do. 

[b] Story & Art [/b] 
The story is pretty good. There are a few awkward phrases likely due to translation, but, it does not detract from the overall experience. There is a ton of artwork for every story scene, all of which is beautiful. 

[h1] The Not So Good [/h1]

[b] Actual Gameplay [/b] 
The cover system is broken. Some objects provide cover but some do not. Enemies can also shoot through objects. Are there snipers on a building with a train that should make firing not possible? They will just shoot through the train and still hit you. 
This is not as frustrating as it sounds as you are always able to deal with those enemies despite this. (You can shoot through the train to fire back after all). 


That is about it. As stated, this is an almost perfect game.
developer_response:
There is one downside you mentioned, but it can also be a fatal downside to strategy games. No matter how many good things are in the game, I think it will be a direct cause of quitting the game if their strategy collapses and eventually loses the mission due to the disadvantages that go against the common sense of gamers. 

We will continue to improve things that gamers think unreasonably through future updates. I hope you will join us on that journey. And please feel free to let us know your opinion on any unreasonable points. We are ready to hear your opinion.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970683114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 16487, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16487, 'last_played': 1678053657}
review:
The game is a tactical RPG, something like Xcom. The difficulty is high and complex, you have to read an introduction guide or a walktrough to get into every element. It is a micromanagement's heaven. If you like to build characters with different skills and gears till everything matches, then this is a good choice for you. The first fights will be easy without any micromanagement and later the level of difficulty will rise and you have to match skills from character to character. For me it is e really enjoyable game because I like to craft and gear up my characters till everything is on max efficiency.

ps: It is the first game I could remember by heart every name of the main characters, so it must be a really exciting and funny story :-)
developer_response:
" to craft and gear up my characters till everything is on max efficiency. "

We wanted to satisfy gamers who liked the story of the game and gamers who liked the perfect battle they planned through the growth of their characters. You belong to the latter and we are pleased that Troubleshooter has been a good experience for you. We will not stop developing games to show progress in future updates and future developments.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198211845432', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1677076115}

author: {'steamid': '76561198268005223', 'num_games_owned': 168, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1370, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 681, 'last_played': 1706453125}
review:
第一次写评测，真的很喜欢这个游戏，dlc也都买了，支持一波制作组，希望能出更多的内容。

目前用steamdeck玩的，游玩没有问题，但是按键操作，字体大小和整体优化还有待提高，希望制作组可以继续完善。

另外希望选择皮肤的立绘可以替换平时对话的立绘，出更多皮肤。

author: {'steamid': '76561198010792011', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 4438, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3909, 'last_played': 1679239325}
review:
Great game

The best part of this game for me is the complexity and diversity of customisation you can have on your heroes.
Each character has around 25 different statistics (from HP, to attack damage, dodge chance, fire/water resistance etc etc ..)
You can customize the equipment, classes, abilities, synergies between allies and masteries. 
Masteries are passive bonuses you can give to your hero, there are HUNDREADS of them so you can really build the character as you want.

The combat system is a turn-based T-RPG, you can take cover, shoot ennemies, use magic, heal yourself, throw various grenades, terrain has different kind of effects, it's simple but efficient.

The scenario is told in a visual novel style and beautifully illustrated by super-cool artworks. All characters have great design, similar to what you can find in manwha/manga.

For me this game has two weak points :
_ the UI, it's really hard to quickly understand which equipment can be equipped by which champion. Items can have several colors, a certain number of stars .. I found it quite messy
_ speaking of mess, the other issue with this game is its story. It is not bad but .. frustating. There are many characters and many different factions. You can feel everything is connected somehow but the story goes in so many directions that you get lost quickly and it's really hard to connect the dots afterwards.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

We will improve Troubleshooter more than now so that it can be a great alternative for those who like both of the things you mentioned.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198415048469', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 16195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16195, 'last_played': 1678026670}
review:
Great game. Highly recommend it. Devs are really ambitious and constantly working to improve the game and add new features. If you like to tinker with character abilities and perks, this will be a lot of fun. With the add-ons it can get a bit "PoE"-like because there will be a difficulty spike (for the hardcore-fans, I guess), but if you are not too proud, you can play on normal or easy difficulty :-)

Edit: Since I got an immediate and needlessly humble response by the dev team, I would like to add this. Many reviews compare this game to titles like X-COM. I've played that game and while I would not claim that Troubleshooter has "dethroned" it (as some others have written), I found it to be a much more enjoyable game. That is because of the setting, the cast, the writing and because it improves on several things that bugged me or felt missing from X-COM and games similar to it.
The latest features make me look forward to future titles or add-ons that seem obvious (at least to me), like "create your own troubleshooter" or a map tool for scenarios to share or just challenge yourself. For now, I am really enjoying the story of the game.
Thanks :-)
developer_response:
We're a small independent game development team that just released its first game. We'll have ambitions for game development someday, but now we're having a busy day just by improving the shortcomings of games that are revealed every day. However, I have no doubt that these experiences will one day be a time to bring you a better game.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198371598950', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 3766, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1143, 'last_played': 1701132492}
review:
Dandylion is, as far as I know, a small development studio. But that hasn't stopped them from making a big game that's well worth the price they're asking for it.

To begin with, the studio is Korean and so some of the translations (at least in English) can be a little odd as a consequence. But don't let that put you off of playing; they're putting in pretty serious work on cleaning up and clarifying the text--mostly with input from their players--and I've personally only encountered a few points (mostly in item and ability descriptions) where I wasn't able to understand what was meant.

Aside from steady translation improvements, the studio is also working hard to tighten up the game itself, based on player reports. Barely a week goes by without a small update or patch being released to cover the latest round of fixes and improvements. You might think from this that the game is unfinished or a buggy mess, but that's absolutely NOT the case. The devs just seem to prefer frequent incremental updating over larger but more sporadic updates.

As to the gameplay itself, I really hate to make the obvious comparisons to XCOM, but that's apparently the default standard to measure against for games of this type. That said, however, Troubleshooter adds a pretty strong RPG element to its version of the formula. Your team can unlock specialty advancement paths for each member that will emphasize one or another aspect of their initial skill sets, and there's plenty of items and abilities to further tweak their respective builds.

If there's one complaint I have about the gameplay, it's with the controller. While Dandylion has enabled controllers in the game, and is making improvements on how they perform, Troubleshooter is definitely built as a KB+M game. So you'll need to hit the settings and tinker around to get things to your liking. That said, however, this is also a game that's ideal for playing with a Steam Controller (if you're fortunate enough to own one) or a Deck's expanded control layout

(With regards to the Deck, while I do have the game installed, I haven't yet actually gotten around to playing it there. So I can't comment on its Deck performance.) 

And a final note, for people who look at the system requirements and maybe don't have a system that can meet them, is that the game is available for play on Nvidia's GeforceNOW streaming service. I don't know if I was the only player requesting this feature or not, but I did ask a few times about it and Dandylion eventually came through! So feel free to enjoy Troubleshooter on your potato rig, your tablet or phone, or even a GFN-enabled TV!
developer_response:
As you mentioned, XCOM is now one of the games that really represents this genre. In addition, I think the comparison with XCOM is natural because Troubleshooter's combat system is inspired a lot by XCOM. Because we are aware of this, we are still updating to establish the brand Troubleshooter. Fortunately, we are very encouraged because you seem to have recognized the difference in the game. Thank you for saying something encouraging to the small independent game development team.

Thank you for saying something encouraging to the small independent game development team.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198132151587', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 11103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7366, 'last_played': 1696985194}
review:
게임이 아니라 작품이라고 불러드릴게요.
이 정도로 열정과 정성을 가지고 자사의 게임을 케어하는 개발사는 요즘 정말 드물죠.

다만 트러블슈터 2에서는 스토리가 좀 더 좋았으면 합니다. 글쓰기 포트폴리오를 가지고 있는 작가 지망생 등의 자문이나 프로젝트 참여 등, 발전시킬 방법은 정말 다양합니다. 플롯의 박진감, 카리스마 있는 악역, 헤쳐나가기 불가능한 역경 등이 있어야 게임성과 맞물려서 한층 더 재미있는 명작이 될 것 같습니다. 해외 커뮤니티에서도 다 좋은데 스토리가 2% 부족하다는 말이 있어요. (스푼교라던지...)

이번 작품의 긍정적인 리뷰들을 발판 삼아 차기작은 더욱 더 성공하셔서 떼돈버세요!!
developer_response:
게임의 이야기, 특히나 트러블슈터처럼 싱글 게임에게는 더 없이 중요한 요소임이 분명합니다. 저희가 처음 게임을 개발하다보니 '우리는 독립 게임 개발팀이다. 외부의 도움 없이, 오로지 우리만의 힘으로 해야 한다!' 라는 생각이 너무 강했었나 봅니다. 사실 저런 생각만이 독립 게임팀의 모토는 아닌데 말이지요. 말씀해 주신 것처럼 다양한 소스를 통해서 도움을 얻을 수 있는 방법에 대해서 고민하겠습니다. 분명히 우리의 차기작을 위한 좋은 디딤돌이 될 것이라고 생각합니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005607237', 'num_games_owned': 296, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 5436, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2444, 'last_played': 1679774429}
review:
Un très bon tactical à la Xcom.

C'est un jeu coréen il me semble et cela a son importance, dans la manière dont vous allez découvrir le jeu.

Ok on joue avec des ado... genre 14 - 20 ans en tout cas au début, mais mêmes les derniers personnages ne sont pas bien vieux.
Nos ados ont des super pouvoirs, mais pas de ouf non plus... ils peuvent quand même se prendre des rafales de mitrailleuse sans broncher ^^
et on joue à la xcom soit 2 actions par perso et par tour, attaque ou déplacement court et attaque ou déplacement long.
Les map sonts jolies et nombreuses, certaine très grandes et détaillées, j'en suis à 40h au moment ou je vous écris et je n'ai pas de sentiment de lassitude.

Alors pourquoi ca se passe bien comme cela ?

Car le jeu est surprenant.

et le plus surprenant c'est la gestion des compétences. C'est la 1ere fois que je joue a un jeu qui gère les compétences de ses personnages joueurs de cette manières.
les compétences se lootent... en tuant les ennemis, puis se stockent et peuvent être équipées dans un tableau avec des catégories, support, attaque, défense etc. On peut aussi les découvrir en faisant des actions ou en augmentant de niveau dans une classe.
Les compétences se craftent, une fois découverte, on va utiliser plusieurs compétences pour en fabriquer de plus puissantes. C'est exactement comme un système de craft de materiels mais pour des compétences. 
Et dans ce tableau, la 6e catégorie de compétences sont les combos qui se découvrent au fur et à mesure ou vous remplissez les tableau de compétences de vos personnages.
Ce système est brillant.

L'autre grande caractéristique de ce jeu est sa lenteur (mais sans que l'on s'ennuie), comme dit au dessus j'en suis à 40h et au level 25, (je crois que c'est 50 max) et  de mes personnages avec 1 ou 2 classes débloqués et 20 à 30% des compétences obtenues.
Je n'ai pas encore découvert la moitié des personnages jouables, je n'ai pas accès à des pans entiers du jeu, comme l'usage des drones ou des animaux, je ne peux contrôler que 2 zones sur une 20aine, j'ai l'impression d'être au début de l'histoire... wtf.

Et ce n'est pas une question de patience, je ne le suis pas, car ca m'éclate.

Donc une très bonne surprise pour qui veut s'investir un peu, car à mon avis il y a surement plus d'une centaine d'heure pour finir le jeu une 1ere fois.

Je ne vous ai pas parlé de : 
l'équipement, armes, armures etc qu'on loot et qu'on peut fabriquer (oui il y a aussi un système de craft d'équipement complet) comme dans un hack n slash
des effets bonus / malus en combat très nombreux, 
des auras qui s'activent manuellement ou quand il se passe quelque chose.
des liens entre les personnages
de la gestion des zones
de la gestion de son entreprise
du choix des missions
de la fatigue et des repas qui donnes des bonus
des missions en mode histoire ou on joue des méchants, des animaux, des policiers pour nous raconter d'autres points de vue.
Du système de choix dans les missions, ou les dialogues avec des fois un impact tres fort sur l'histoire ou les missions qu'on av jouer ou pas.
Du systèmes de jeu en ligne qui nous montre les choix des autres joueurs (en %) qui nous donne des bonus quand tous les joueurs accomplissent des objectifs en jouant (on joue seul mais nos actions impactent l'univers du jeu) On peut aussi choisir de jouer hors ligne.
Des communautés, on peut échanger des objets, se rencontrer dans une endroit publique du jeu ou tout est possible d'y être fait.

Ajout : il y a une petite traduction beta en fr au démarrage qui aide pas mal. Le tuto, les compétences et les options sont aussi majoritairement traduites.
...

Bon jeu
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

We're very happy that you seem to be experiencing all the games we've prepared and using them to your advantage in your battle. In particular, the mastery system is the most important game element for us. You seem to have a perfect grasp of it and are also making good use of it. 

We have been criticized a lot for the slow progress of the game. A lot has improved since its launch, and it has actually worked, but many people have pointed out that the speed of random progress still needs to be improved. It is true that the way Troubleshooter plays games is different from the recent trend of games. These days, games need to be able to access the core content of the game in a short time and experience everything in the game in 30 minutes. Of course, Troubleshooter can never have that kind of game style because it has different genres from those games. However, efforts were needed to minimize the shortcomings, and I think we overlooked them too much.

We haven't finished updating the game yet. Please watch how we maximize our strengths and make up for our weaknesses.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030026501', 'num_games_owned': 561, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 11206, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 813, 'last_played': 1690029605}
review:
X-Com style turn-based strategy, meets Persona style relationship building, along with a huge narrative and interesting characters.  Troubleshooter is a unique game.  Nothing quite describes it perfectly, but that is the best way to put it.  It is a ton of fun to play, with unique mechanics, destructible objects, terrain effects, morale effects and more. This game offers multiplayer, which is absolutely wild.  I would definitely recommend this for strategy fans and RPG fans alike.

**Edited** I had previously said that you needed an internet connection to play, which is incorrect.  You can play in offline mode for a fully offline experience, my issue was unrelated!  Thanks to the devs for a quick response.  So, no excuse not to get this game.
developer_response:
If you need Internet access even in offline mode, it cannot be called offline mode. If you select Offline mode, the local server runs on the gamer's local computer, eliminating the need for an external Internet connection. Did you have trouble running the game because you ran offline mode and you needed Internet access? Then let us know immediately! It's a problem and we're ready to listen to you.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198373713730', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 13925, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6221, 'last_played': 1685475798}
review:
Review of the Base content of the game on hardest difficulty without additional modifiers.
SUMMARY:
This is an incredibly fun TRPG with deep character build customisation mechanics and the level design is varied from start to finish, causing unique game-play scenarios that can only be experienced in that map. The story however is 90% stuck in the past and 10% focusing on the future and although the past details catches up to the present, details are missed on present ambitions and reasoning behind why scenes are taking place. Also the final chapter is the shortest and gives the player only the tiniest of hints that this is the conclusion of the main story.

Stand out details:
MOST of the playable characters have a rich past and noticeable development, they are self aware of what they can and cant do on and off the battlefield. 
BUILD Customisation is overwhelming at first but the game actually guides you with the class specific traits you can equip. This doesn't mean you are limited to only one viable strategy for one class, allowing you tailor     the character to handle specific scenarios if so desired.
ARTWORK created to tell the story is fantastic, there is a lot of detail in each image aiding in portraying what the text is conveying to the player. Without this level of quality i would probably not recommend this game because it would just be a generic tactics game. 
GAMEPLAY takes 1 and half hours max for each mission and the early game of each is only as long as getting into a fight with the enemy. Mid game is the most fun, taking 95% of time taken to complete the mission and the end game of a mission is just mop up of final enemies and grab missed optional loot on the map. 

Letdowns:
IRENE is the biggest let down of the game for me. She is the coolest character you get introduced to at the start but at the end of the story she is still known as the person with an anti-criminal fetish and nothing else.
CRAFTING has no tutorial but works similar to GW2 crafting. I think the mechanic is mostly pointless for the base game because most of my characters used blue rare gear that are 10+ levels below my own characters till the end. You are forced to spend Vill to get the materials required for lvl 40 armour because the enemy that drops the materials for it does not exist until after you complete the base game. 
SIDE quests only exist to give items and bring the player to levels not experienced in the main story.
VOICE over is bare bones but this is not a letdown due to how resource intensive it is, just something i wanted to mention.
developer_response:
To give you the feeling that the story of the game is suddenly over is a proof that we lack the ability to construct the story. The story of the game continues through the second DLC, and although the story of Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children will end soon, the story of the characters and the world in this story will continue to be extended through the sequel. We still want to tell you more stories.

Ah, Irene's story can get to know her inside little by little through the latest scenario missions. From that, you can see that she is no longer an anti-criminal character.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198334569034', 'num_games_owned': 745, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1677741948}
review:
[h1]GİRİŞ[/h1]

Çokta büyük umutlar ile almamıştım ancak yine de hayal kırıklığına uğratmayı başardılar, tebriklerrrr

[h1]ARTILARI[/h1]

+Sanat tasarımı

+Karakter tasarımı 

+Xcom2'yi kopyalamayı iyi bir şekikde başarmış(Xcom2'yi yapanlar bile bunu başaramadı)

+Optimizasyonu iyi

+Grafikleri yeterli

[h1]EKSİLERİ[/h1]

-Oyun hızlıca tekrara düşüyor(bölümlerin büyük çoğunluğu kopyala yapıştır)

-Ana karakterimiz Steam sayfasında gözümüze soktukları kızıl kafalı kız değil(oyunun kapağı bile bu kız)

-Kötü hikaye

-Fillerlar ile dolu olması

-Karakterlerler ve diyalogları kötü

-Bir yandan kendini çok ciddiye alırken, diğer yandan ise hiçbir şekilde ciddiye almıyor

[h1]PUANLAMA[/h1]

[h1]66/100[/h1]

100: Mükemmel(Kusursuz)

99-90: Harika(Kusursuz Değil ama yakın)

89-80: Çok iyi

79-75: İyi

74-70: Ortalama Üstü

69-65: Ortalama

64-60: Ortalama Altı

59-55: Kötü

54-50: Çok Kötü

49<: Oynanmaz

[h1]SON SÖZ[/h1]

şimdilik oynamayı bıraktım belki ileride devam edip bitiririm, Xcom klonu olarak işini en iyi yapan yapımlardan biri olsa da yine de bahsettiğim sorunlar sebebiyle oynamaya devam edemedim
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

We would have accepted the score by blaming ourselves even if we left your assessment as it was and gave it below average. Nevertheless, at the end of the review, I would like to thank you for your generosity to help the small independent game development team in the East continue to move forward. 

Our capabilities have clear limits. But we're going to implement a lot with this game now and we're going to prepare a better follow-up based on this. I look forward to your continued company on our journey.

Thank you for this review.

We've also experienced a lot of TBS. But it was always a pity that the story ended when the character grew up. So we wanted to create a game where we could experience more of the story of the game and the growth of the character. And I'm glad that you seem to like our attempt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198379268776', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 11325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11325, 'last_played': 1677653904}
review:
This game is fantastic on the battlefield. The writing and story is incomprehensible. It's just very very bad. I had no idea I was playing the final level because the game gives no indication. 

This games systems with good writing would be amazing.
developer_response:
" good writing "

Troubleshooter is our first game and we overlooked the importance of "good writing". Since I realized the importance of this, I've tried to improve it as much as possible through updates, but it's true that there are still some shortcomings. We will continue to improve this as long as our update continues.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038391555', 'num_games_owned': 112, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 762, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 762, 'last_played': 1677624567}
review:
キャラは絵を含めてまあまあ良い。
ストーリーそれなりに重視しているのだろう。
しかしシミュレーションゲームとしてはまるでダメ。主な理由としては
・遮蔽物が単なる命中率回避補正だけの存在で、射線が完全に塞がっていても関係なく攻撃してくる。極端に言えば窓も何もない鋼鉄の部屋の中にいる標的を外から壁越しに狙い撃つような状態。
・こちら側の視界がやたら狭く敵の位置が見えない、でも敵側は位置座標でこちらを把握している。それがどう影響するのか？壁や柱の陰に敵がいるとすぐに画面から消える。だから攻撃するには見える位置に移動しなくてはならない。その結果遮蔽物の無い位置から攻撃せざるを得ないこともよくある。でも敵側は問題なく攻撃が可能。
・毎回毎回、最初から配置されていたのか、それともスクリプト沸きしているのかもわからない敵がいきなり現れて順番に割り込み一方的に攻撃をしてくる。敵の数が常にこちらよりかなり多いことも相まって、そういう状況に対する不満も大きい。
・普通のゲームなら高所から低所を狙う場合、命中率が上昇するものだが、このゲームは普通じゃない。階段の上に陣取った→下に敵が複数いる、範囲攻撃しよう→命中率30%未満！？推奨レベルより５以上高くてもこんな感じ。
・命中率がやたら悪い。これに関しては命中補正の付いている装備がなかなか出ないことが原因。おま環かもしれないが。素の命中率が悪いので命中補正が付いてないと装備するのに躊躇してしまう。
・ゲームの初っ端から倒すと爆発して周囲にダメージ+炎上Dotを与えてくる敵が多い。そして主人公は近接ファイター。爆発に巻き込まれて救助対象が死ぬことも。
・一部の強敵のクソチート能力。一撃で普通に５００～６００ダメは食らう(こちらのＨＰはその時点で精々７００台）のに、その敵の射程内で雑魚を倒すと報復攻撃をしてくる。回数に制限がない、或いは無いに等しい(自軍ターンで倒せる敵の数は当然限られているので）。しかも射程がクソ広い。

値段は安いし頑張ってアプデも多く頑張って作っているのがよくわかるが、敵ばかり優遇というかプレイヤー側をとにかく不利にしようという思考がゲームをつまらなくしている。
とはいえ突き詰めていくとプレイヤー側のユニットもかなり強力になるようなのだが、そこに至るまでに嫌になって投げる人の方が多いのではないだろうか。
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

他のすべてはさておき、ゲーム内のルールと使用できる装備、使用できる能力は味方と敵の両方に同じように適用されます。ゲームの後半に登場する一部の強力な敵は、独自の装備と技術を使用します。 こうなった理由は、多くの方々がもっと強力な敵と戦いたいと希望したからです。

他のジャンルのゲームとは異なり、ゲームを有利に導いていくための準備が多く必要なのは事実です。 しかし、考えてみると敵の数が味方を圧倒するということは、その程度になってこそ敵が味方と立ち向かうことができるからです。

しかし、この過程が線形的に行われ、ゲーマーがその過程をよく納得できるようにしたのかは、私たちもまだ確信していない部分です。 あなたの評価を通じて、私たちがまだこの過程を柔軟に作れていないことに改めて気づいています。 私たちはこの部分についてさらに研究し、改善します。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198053121858', 'num_games_owned': 53, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 4813, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 250, 'last_played': 1695998186}
review: 不错的SLG，除了剧情有点低幼，剩下都不错~
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果我们准备的游戏内容能愉快地填满你的时间，那对我们来说也是很大的乐趣。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198023772031', 'num_games_owned': 2043, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 20059, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12004, 'last_played': 1678680941}
review: Honestly, I don't even remember how I found this game, if it was just a recommendation after XCOM, or an off-hand mention in a Reddit thread, but boy am I glad I did. How on earth a game like this remains relatively obscure despite being better than most others in its category is odd. If you've any fondness for SRPGs I cannot recommend at least trying this enough.
developer_response:
Meeting new people with gamers is always a pleasure for us. And if the gamer likes XCOM and SRPG, it's a blessing for us. We will do our best to increase the contact point with you through the update.

Thank you for this review.

能把你的问题更详细地告诉我们吗？ 把你的日志文件发给我们，我们可以更详细地分析问题。

1. 重启电脑并启动 Steam
2. 在游戏的库页面中，选择[管理] > [属性]。
3. 选择[本地文件]选项卡，点击[ 浏览本地文件 ]按钮。
4. 打开文件夹时，请移动到 Release > bin后运行 logTransport.exe。

开发组一定要帮你解决问题。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561199122197490', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 5852, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1074, 'last_played': 1706749128}
review: game is very amazing
developer_response:
More stories and more colleagues are waiting for you. 

I recommend that you complete all the scenario missions at a low level of difficulty first. Then you can recruit more colleagues and use more diverse masteries to change your character powerfully. 

You can try again at any time after completing any kind of mission in the game. In this process, you can change the difficulty of the mission or select more people to participate in the mission. Therefore, it is not necessary to complete violent cases or normal cases from the beginning.

Enjoy the story first. Then use your strategy on the battlefield to your heart's content.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059544276', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 5752, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4789, 'last_played': 1682898998}
review:
My favorite JRPG on Steam. The story is simple, yet compelling. Characters are endearing and well-written. Art is beautiful to look at. Gameplay and mechanics are very layered and detailed.

The only major negative is all the waiting. Most missions are 100 enemies vs 10 allies...so you spend 75% of the mission waiting for your turn.
developer_response:
Waiting for your turn for a certain period of time in JRPG games is inevitable. However, it is the ability of the game development team to optimize this time so that it is not boring. We're going to think more deeply about this part.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198848302914', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 7196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3805, 'last_played': 1678837120}
review:
[h1] 완충제 없는 위태로운 완성품, 하지만 가성비는 끝내줘요  [/h1]



창세기전 시리즈로 SRPG를 시작하여
슈로대 시리즈에서 수면 플레이 스킬을 익혀 그나마 디아3을 버텼고 (슈로대 엔딩 본 시리즈x)
디비니티 2에서 튜토 지역 나가려 한시간을 헤매다 빡종했으며
엑스컴에서 99% 확률에 미스-감나빗이라는 전대미문의 불합리함을 접한 이후
역시 내가 마조는 아니구나 라며 머릿속에서 SRPG를 지웠었는데
오래 전에 사놨던게 아까워서 켜봤다가 60시간 썰렸음.

뭔가 복잡미묘한 맛이라 설명이 길어질 것 같아 총평을 미리 하자면,
'잘 만든 장점을 극대화 하기 위해 동반하면 안될 단점을 안고 있는 게임'


*개인적인 의견이지만, 가급적이면 나무위키를 참고하지 않을 것을 권장함. 
  굳이 본다면 딱 추가 특성 페이지만 참조하는 것이 좋음.
  특성 보려고 들어갔다가 게임 최종부의 불합리함+추천 조합을 보고 나선 뭔가 게임할 의욕이 급감하게 됌.



1. 장점

(전략적 재미라는 선택에 올바른 집중, 특성 시스템)
캐릭터 별 2개의 직업과 특성판 조합을 통해 최소 3개 이상의 플레이 스타일을 선택할 수 있어서
고도크한 히어로 아이린 혼자 북파 공작원으로 보내고 나머지는 동쪽과 서쪽의 오랑캐를 토벌한다던지,
중앙으로 개돌해서 아이린이랑 알버스를 카운터 샌드백으로 세워두고 혼돈의 아포칼립스를 즐긴다던지
인페스트 앤을 던져놓고 강건너 불구경하는 카부토 플레이를 한다던지 [strike] 지금부터 서로 죽여라 [/strike]
언제든 특성을 재조합해 다양한 전략을 구사함으로써 보다 다채로운 플레이를 경험하게 해줌

거기다 엑스컴이나 다키스트 던전처럼 캐릭터가 완전히 죽는다던지,
패배시 패널티가 뼈 아프다던지의 하드코어함도 없는 편.
[b]아, 패널티가 없진 않음. 거진 1시간을 공들인 임무가 터지면 멘탈도 같이 터짐. [/b]

(가성비)
5만원을 상회하는 풀프라이스의 슈로대 비교했을 때
2만원대인 트러블 슈터가 모자란 것은 단 하나, [b]윙건담이 없다는 것뿐.[/b]
가격대비 훌륭한 그래픽, 수백장의 퀄리티 좋은 일러스트는 물론이고
스토리만으로 50시간을 넘기는 게임은 AAA급에서도 흔치 않음.

개발자들이 애정으로 만들어, 많은 사람들이 즐겼으면 하는 바람에
합리적인 가격보다 좀 더 낮은 가격으로 책정한 것이라고 생각함.
[strike]아니더라도 맞다고 해[/strike] 

(빠른 피드백과 잦은 업데이트)
사놓고 몇년 묵혀뒀음에도 스팀 접속할 때마다 업데이트 목록에서 방을 빼지 않은 성실함을
플레이를 하면서도 여실히 느낄 수 있음.
[b]나무위키에도 업뎃되지 않은 따끈따끈한 추가특성을 마주했을 때의 기분이란...[/b]
3N의 횡포나 시공에 빨려 들어가는 B사에 꺼져가던 게임에 대한 애정이
이런 열정있는 개발사로 인해 기어코 살아남.
이후 어떤 차기작을 개발해도 대충은 안만들겠구나, 라는 기대를 갖게 됌.


액션 RPG로 비유하자면 
엑스컴은 다크 소울, 트러블 슈터는 데메크 같은 느낌.
[b]익숙해지면 몹을 어떤 방법으로 조져야 잘 조졌다는 느낌이 들까-에서 데메크를 떠올렸음. [/b]

하지만 데메크에 비유하기엔 정반대 극에 위치한 단점이 존재함.



%하술할 단점이 너무 많아서 길게 서술하는 것이 아니라
  정말 게임 자체에 애정이 듬뿍 느껴져서 너무 아쉬운 마음에 길어짐을 감안할 것.



2. 단점

(스토리)
지극히 개인적인 생각이지만 스토리텔링이나 캐릭터가 그렇게 매력적이진 않음.
대재앙, 근미래 이능력자가 범죄자들을 잡는 서브컬쳐계 세계관과
라노벨 작법의 캐릭터는 호불호가 심할 수 밖에 없는데,
불호인 사람들에겐 좋게 봐도 무난한 정도.
무난한 정도인데 왜 단점으로 서술하냐? 
후술할 큰 단점을 위한 밑밥임.
[b]이 게임에서 스토리는, 무엇보다 '완충제' 역할을 해줘야 함.[/b]



[b](공존해서는 안될, 전략적 재미와 한판의 헤비한 플레이)[/b] 
후반부로 갈수록 임무 하나를 클리어하는 것에 소요되는 시간이 너무 길어짐

물론 상자를 패스한다던지, 저난이도에서 메인 미션만 깨는 선택지도 존재하지만
상자를 패스하자니 나같이 맵에 뭐하나 남겨두면 정신병이 도지는, 유비 게임의 노예 같은 인간에겐 용납되지 않는 일이고
[b]저난이도에서 메인 미션만 빠르게 클리어하면 조합의 재미가 의미 없어지고, 그렇다고 스토리가 압도적이지도 않음.[/b]

SRPG는 장르 특성상 
액션만 오져도 반은 먹고 들어가는 액션 RPG나 
파밍or가챠만 재밌어도 흥행이 보장되는 MMORPG 보다 [strike]뻑킹 디아블로, 뻑킹 리니지[/strike]
스토리, 전략, 캐릭터, 시스템 등 보다 많은 선택지 중
어느 포인트를 주로 잡을지 선택과 집중이 필요한 장르인데, 

트러블 슈터가 선택한 '조합을 통한 전략적 재미-특성 선택'을 온전히 즐기기 위해서는
그것에 동반되면 안될 단점인 '한판 당 지나치게 긴 플레이'가 동반된다는 것이 문제

조합을 통한 전략적 재미에 필요한 요소 & 피로감을 줄여주는 캐쥬얼함
이 공식을 역행함으로써 압도적인 장점이 될 수 있는 요소를, 장점이 아닐지도 모른다는 의문을 갖게 만듬.

SRPG에서 캐쥬얼함을 논한다는 것이 넌센스지만,
대부분의 SRPG는 자신들이 선택한 장점을 위해 헤비한 플레이를 피해갈 꼼수나 방편을 마련해둠.

슈로대는 누구나 가슴 속에 하나쯤 품고 있는 [strike]삼천원[/strike] 로봇으로 뽕맛 느끼는 재미를 위해
부조리한 물량과 스펙의 적들을 상대할 압도적인 OP 기체가 시리즈마다 1~3기는 있음.
(그마저도 부조리한 경우도 있는데...그냥 애정으로 하는게 맞음. 밸런스, 스토리 전부 내다 버림.)

창세기전은 전투를 스토리 진행의 보조적인 수단으로 두기 위해 초반부터 OP 기술인 천지파열무가,
불합리하다 느껴지는 적의 물량이 등장할 때쯤 치트키 아수라 파천무가 등장함.

엑스컴은 적들의 물량을 늘리는 대신 보다 역겨운 스펙, 능력의 유닛들로 난이도를 높임
[strike] 그리고 감나빗이란 나비효과로 인간의 내면에 자리잡은 마조히즘을 일깨움 [/strike]

트러블 슈터가 선택한 전략적 재미에 그나마 가장 부합되는 것이 엑스컴인데,
정작 다른 요소에 중점을 둔 게임들처럼 난이도 설계를 함으로써 헤비한 플레이를 피할 수가 없게 됌.
그러다보니 후반부로 갈수록 '적들을 어떻게 조져야 잘 조질 수 있을까?'라는 전략의 재미가 아닌
'조질 수 있을까?'라는 전략의 고착으로 이어져서 결국 본래의 재미를 상실함으로써
후반으로 갈수록 자가잠식 하게 될 수 밖에 없는 구조가 되는 것.

상술한 스토리가 무난함에도 단점이라 평한 이유가 여기에 있음.
그렇게 고착화된 특성으로라도 엔딩까지 갈만큼 흡입력을 가진 스토리가 완충제 역할을 해줬어야 하는데
그 정도는 또 아닌지라 고착화된 특성을 접하고부턴 게임을 플레이할 의욕이 떨어지게 됌.

물론, 대책으로 스토리를 업데이트하며 새로운 적들과 캐릭을 등장시키고
DLC는 모든 캐릭을 전투에 참여시키는 형태로 어떻게든 새로운 전략을 짜게끔 의도하고 있지만
결국 업데이트 될 때마다 업데이트 되는 고착화된 특성 트리를 생성하며 유저와 개발자 쌍방의 피로도를 누적시킬 뿐,
근본적인 대책이 되지는 않음.

차라리 떡장갑, 아스트랄한 데미지의 물량 공세를 줄이고
독장판 등에만 데미지가 들어가거나 턴마다 2~4칸 이동하며 캐릭 옆에서 자폭하는 등의
특수몹 종류를 늘리고 미션마다 조합을 달리한다던지
매주 다른 맵, 다른 배치의 보스 레이드를 내놓아 매주 다른 조합을 실험하게 만드는
고착된 플레이가 고이는 것을 막기 위한 보다 나은 대책 마련이 필요함.

-결론-
전략적 재미에 중점을 뒀지만 후반부로 갈수록 쓸만한 전략의 선택지는 좁아지고 
그걸 나무위키 등에서 정보라도 얻으면 바로 게임의 재미가 반감되는 문제까지 더해져
뭐 하나만 삐끗해도 바로 밸런스가 무너져 버리는 위태로운, 완충제 없는 완성품의 인상을 받음.


가격 대비 훌륭한 볼륨과 즐길거리로 결코 돈이 아깝지 않은 좋은 게임이지만
동일 장르의 다른 게임들보다 진입 장벽이 높고
후반으로 갈수록 가장 큰 재미의 본질이 흐려지기에 마냥 추천하기도 애매함.
혹여 구매했다면 초반에 말했듯 나무위키는 특성 조합 정도만 참고하고
캐릭터 설명 쪽에서 추천 테크 같은 것은 안보는걸 추천.

%빠른 피드백을 받으며

이렇게 빠르게 피드백을 주는데 어찌 역따봉을 박음..
무엇보다 애정을 들인만큼 재밌는 게임이고, 깊게 파고들 요소가 있기에 
휴직기에 거진 하루 8시간 넘게 플레이 했는데
템파밍, 특성 조합 연구, 빌드 조합 등 너무 많은 컨텐츠가 위태롭게 서로를 지지해서
하나만 삐끗해도 전체적인 플레이 의욕이 무너진다-라는 말을 하고 싶었음.
그 하나가 삐끗했을때 그것을 무마해줄 완충제로써 스토리의 중요성을 말한 것.
글을 쓰는 사람으로써 이 부분이 좀 더 아쉬운 부분도 컸음.
ㅡ
어제와 오늘이 그랬듯 내일 이후로도 쭉 이런 점들을 수정하고
발전시키면서 더 나은 게임을 만들어 가실 거라 의심치 않습니다.
보다 많은 사람들이 더 부담없이 접함으로써 트러블 슈터 뿐만이 아니라
더 좋은 게임들을 많이 제작해주시길 바라는 마음에 응원보다 비판의 형태가 되었지만
진심으로 응원하는 마음에 남긴 리뷰라는 것을 알아주셨으면 좋겠네요^^
댄디 라이온, 꼭 성공할 겁니다.
developer_response:
' 슈로대는 누구나 하나쯤 가슴 속에 하나쯤 품고 있는 삼천원 로봇으로 뽕맛 느끼는 재미를 위해 부조리한 물량과 스펙의 적들을 상대할 압도적인 OP 기체가 시리즈마다 1~3기는 있음. '

→ 동의합니다. 개인적으로는 '슈로대 알파 외전' 에서는 YF-19 의 기동성을 마개조해서 적진에 던져 놓고 적들의 탄환 및 기력을 뽑아놓고 기본 공격으로 양념을 한 후에 본진으로 마무리 하던 방법을 자주 사용했습니다. 이것이 뭔가 비정상적인 방법은 아니었지만 덕분에 다른 기체(자타공인 성능 나쁜 기체)를 나만의 방식으로 성장시킬 수 있는 기회를 주었던 발판이기도 했습니다. 이런 부분이 트러블슈터에는 없다고 봐도 무방합니다. 그렇기 때문에 '최적의 빌드' 공식이 만들어지게 되었습니다. 물론 나만의 특성 빌드를 사용할 수 있지만 급격하게 전투 효율이 낮아진다는 측면에서 도전을 머뭇거리게 하는 것도 사실입니다. 저희는 이것에 대한 대안으로, 특성 빌드의 자유도는 열어놓되, 다양한 상황과 적을 통해서 게이머들이 스스로 다양한 빌드를 사용할 수 있도록 유도할 계획입니다. 

' 그렇게 고착화된 특성으로라도 엔딩까지 갈만큼 흡입력을 가진 스토리가 완충제 역할을 해줬어야 하는데 그 정도는 또 아닌지라 '

→ 어디에서도 본 적 없는 이야기 정도는 아니더라도 플레이어로 하여금 게임을 이어가도록 만들 '흡입력' 이 가장 중요한데 이 부분을 어떻게 해야 충족시킬 수 있는지 지금으로서는 알기가 너무 어렵습니다. 게다가 이 부분은 개인의 주관 및 취향이 강하게 반영되는 부분이라 '보편적이면서도 개성있는' 이라는 난제를 해결하는데는 적지 않은 시간이 필요하리라 생각합니다. 

언급하신 게임의 단점들로 인해서 나쁜 평가를 받아도 저희는 할 말이 없었을 것입니다. 그럼에도 불구하고 좋은 평가를 통해 개발팀에게 용기를 주셔서 감사합니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198358098222', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 144, 'playtime_forever': 4836, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4836, 'last_played': 1704570124}
review:
If you appreciate a good tactical RPG much like Shadowrun or X-Com, then this is a game that you shouldn't skip. Also, the amount of love and dedication that the developers put into this game (attentive to the gamers, constantly updating the game) is something that you don't see often, and for that this is without doubt a very recommendable title!

Now, my opinion is a bit bias because I'm not actually a big fan of TRPGs, and I usually get more into games because of the story and in that aspect I think the game delivers a very confusing story.
I'm not talking about the plot in itself: We have our main protagonist, that is a troubleshooter, just starting up his own company, recruiting people and doing missions. I'm talking about the story as a whole. It's starts getting more interesting (with some political themes involved) but you keep going from mission to mission and there's moments where you'd end up forgetting what was going on in the first place... why? Because one mission can take you hours, and you kind go from objective, to objective, to objective (missions can be extremely long).
You have various difficulty settings which is cool, but there's also a lot of grinding (especially in the DLCs). In terms of system information, I thought that it was too much! Like, at the beginning you're bombarded with a ton of info about a lot of things.
That's why I keep saying, it's a good game, recommendable, but I think it's more for people that are already into TRPGs than your average joe that just wants to get into it.
developer_response:
Many updates have been applied to the game so far, and the game system is much richer than when the game was released. But I don't think that being rich doesn't mean being complicated. No matter how rich the game is, if users don't use it properly, it's like nothing. Your point is therefore very valid. We will also study ways to overcome this situation.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198185023402', 'num_games_owned': 55, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2159, 'last_played': 1670669938}
review:
アイリーンさんの繊細さと大胆さが大好きです笑笑
いいゲームをありがとうございます。
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

author: {'steamid': '76561198041507680', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 3179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3179, 'last_played': 1677314723}
review:
6.5/10 - recommended but buy it on sale if you want to pass time 
- it's a forgettable game - 56 hours in and I still don't know what's going on 
- Of those 56 hours, i'd say 15-20 of those hours are actual gameplay (battle). The rest of the hours would be made up of cutscenes, customising mastery combos/builds, in town activities, crafting, eating meals (for buffs), updating gear etc.(Characters are level 36-39)
- Most annoying Boss Mission to date - game introduces you to Sharky in the early game, you engage him for battle, he runs through the crowd of allied forces on the field, 1 shots your main character and you fail the mission - not sure if this is a bug or i'm just very unlucky - it's the only mission i've failed. 
- Once you build a "tank auto counter/attacker" build the game is no longer a challenge. Every enemy that walks by you is automatically attacked (9/10 of them are 1 shot), Enemies that survive the encounter who then attack you will either have their attacks blocked or dodgeed. Your character auto counter/retaliate with a guarantee crit everytime which is 2-4k damage, killing them instantly trash mob OR Boss.
- Enemy/ally ratio is wack in some missions, 40-50 enemies vs 5 on the screen. Just make yourself a coffee or something because it feels like 3-4 min to cycle through them all.
I could go on but i'm over it and ultimately I am just not going to finish this game.
developer_response:
We would have been convinced even if you evaluated Troubleshooter badly due to the shortcomings mentioned in your assessment. Nevertheless, I would like to thank you for giving us a good evaluation and for giving us the power to continue developing the game. Even if you don't do Troubleshooter anymore, we will continue to update. I hope to see you again in our other works someday.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198330514411', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 14552, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 604, 'last_played': 1688992872}
review:
第一次写下评论。在搜索SLG游戏的过程中发现了这款游戏，吸引我的是评论里制作组回复着无论是推荐还是不推荐的几乎所有玩家的意见、建议、感想的频率，这种态度简直不可思议。没想到之后自己也体验了一把这样的待遇。

实际游玩到七八个小时的时候，游戏就一直处于“初始化”状态而无法进入。我毫不迟疑的向制作组发送了LOG文件，并简述了问题情况。不出意外的是，仅仅一天后就收到了制作组邮件回复，推测是杀毒软件或者防火墙的问题。然后意识到，这个问题正出现在我重装系统之后，于是我修改了防火墙设置，立刻就解决了。

这样的制作组——无论其开发的游戏的优劣——都值得所有玩家的尊敬，更何况游戏本身质量也过硬。

感谢制作组，希望、也确信你们会开发出其他优秀的作品，届时一定支持。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

很高兴我们的一点帮助对你有所帮助。 最重要的是,你能继续玩Troubleshooter游戏是最高兴的。

我们是小队。 由6人组成的各领域只存在1人的独立游戏开发组。 我们没有像大型开发团队那样卖很多游戏，所以所有购买我们游戏的玩家都很珍贵。 这种心态我们会在游戏开发过程中一直保持下去。 如果我们忘记了现在的心情，请随时指责我们，提醒我们。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198276634938', 'num_games_owned': 10153, 'num_reviews': 1500, 'playtime_forever': 7870, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7868, 'last_played': 1702532132}
review:
看我另一个游戏的时长就知道，我是XCOM的死忠玩家，从末日浩劫到余震、余晖，到换东家之后的新作。
但玩了纷争终结者（这个翻译名很挫）50个小时之后，我感觉这是我更期待的战棋游戏类型。
A、不要大众脸，要特定英雄，Xcom的大众脸真的很影响代入感。
B、要专情不要滥情。陪着心爱的角色一起成长。
虽然有选择也有遗憾，但都是自己亲手做出来的。不用培养五十个满级角色，每个类型都有。
C、这游戏的命中率比Xcom好的不知哪儿去！
70%的命中率居然大部分都中了，这你敢信？感觉世界都不一样了，Xcom 95%贴脸miss难道不是真理吗？
当然，相应的，这个游戏也就删除了SL机制……
仁者见仁罢，战棋类游戏不能SL真的觉得缺点儿什么，打不出完美战果。

虚假的战棋游戏玩家：从头杀到尾，手雷狙击嗑药超能力，能用的全给他用上，顺利过关就是胜利！
真正的战棋游戏玩家：这步我走短了，距离警戒线还差一个格子，不行我得读盘重来……
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

很高兴在这里又遇到一位XCOM的粉丝。 现在战棋类的游戏没有以前那么多了。 虽然XCOM和Divinity Original Sin实际上代表了该体裁,但我认为与过去的鼎盛时期相比，在数量和质量上都落后。 在这种情况下，我们将继续努力建立新的品牌【分争调整者】，为您提供新的A替代品。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561197976640084', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 20579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17037, 'last_played': 1701480915}
review:
If you are a fan of tactics games and have not given Troubleshooter a chance, you are doing yourself a massive disservice. I don't know what I was expecting from this game, but it has blown any expectations I may have had into orbit and I cannot get enough Troubleshooter: it's the whole package. I'm not achievement driven and have never before had the desire to 100% a game, but I actually want to 100% this game and squeeze everything I possibly can out of it because it's that good.

One thing I definitely didn't expect was for the story to be as good as it is. Without going into detail: Troubleshooter gracefully tackles some really complex ethical and moral topics, involving society, ambition, religion, immigration, friendship, family, and revenge without seeming heavy handed, or as though the developers are force-feeding your their opinions on the subject. It's thought provoking in a great way, and is the type of story that sticks with you after you've put the game down: the type that you're a fuller human being for having experienced. The character writing is excellent, and each character has depth and substance, and I couldn't help but feel for them as I followed them along on their individual struggles. The translation is a bit rough at times but it adds to the charm and I generally understood the message that was being conveyed 99% of the time, and is far from a valid cause for criticism imo.

The systems in this game are top notch and fluidly reinforce one another in such a satisfying way. The mastery system might be the best skill-tree progression system I have ever seen in a video game period, and is one that allows for near endless options for character builds and team compositions. It's not well explained and might seem overwhelming at first but once you familiarize yourself with the mechanics, making and theorycrafting mastery boards becomes downright addicting. A few systems seem redundant and unnecessary (looking at you, Motivation), but for the most part everything feels airtight and really fun. Combat in these titles are only as good as their systems allow, and Troubleshooter's systems allow for some really amazing, exciting combat.

Fair warning: this game is really long. But if you're anything like me, it isn't nearly long enough, and even after dropping a cool ~300 hours into it, I still want more. 

Also the devs are amazingly wholesome and the game is getting constant regular updates and changes.
developer_response:
If your daily life is filled with a little bit of fun with Troubleshooter, it's like the best medal for a game developer. Troubleshooter is the first game we've created and it's been released in many ways inadequate. But a lot of people have bought the game, believing in our future, and we're still updating it to meet those expectations. And it seems that the updates so far have provided an opportunity to get such good reviews from you.

The story of the game is one of the most important factors. We thought the battle was being over-emphasized in many games. Of course, combat is important, but we wanted to change that everything acts as a facade for combat. The trend of games these days is to make the key elements of the game accessible in a short period of time and to enjoy them from start to finish in a short period of time. Compared to this trend, the method we tried was the complete opposite approach.

But we thought that there must be people who like this way. And we met you. We still have a lot to talk about. We're going to continue this story through another DLC or a sequel. I'm glad to be with you on that journey.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062090569', 'num_games_owned': 85, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 61823, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49002, 'last_played': 1705877525}
review: So much to play with. It can be hard if you don't have a good grip on it. Soundtrack and the visual design is nice and the characters and the world are full with depth and charm. You can customize the mastery board (passive perks that apply in combat) in so many different and effective ways that making and testing them is half the fun. I love this in every single way and somewhat regret buying this on sale, honestly it is worth more than they sell for.
developer_response:
I'm very happy that the results we made seem to be recorded as an interesting game in your game history. We hope to be with you for the rest of the update period. :D

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198828215049', 'num_games_owned': 80, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 7588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6044, 'last_played': 1688560109}
review:
好好好，很久没玩过这么好玩的战棋游戏了。
丰富的游戏机制，独特的美术风格，庞大的背景设定，看得出来制作组有不小的野心。
但是因为内容过多，存在一定的上手难度，新手教程和没有差不多，而且前期角色种类少，每天就看着阿尔伯斯带着无敌的警察（？）冲冲冲，前期一个人不看攻略自己摸索属实坐牢，给我这个战棋只玩过恋爱游戏《火焰纹章·风花雪月》玩家带来了一些硬核战棋的震撼。不过随着后期角色的入队，可组合的天赋和可使用的职业也变得更丰富，剧情也开始慢慢展开，游戏的趣味性有了质的飞越。
接下来简单说说一些小细节。
1、可否加入一些关于职业的教学关，使用预设好天赋和装备的职业，让玩家能对职业的定位和功能有初步的判断和印象。虽然体验了100h的游戏，但仍然有部分职业的特点、功能和使用方法是我所不了解的。而且因为不了解新职业的特点，部分玩家在初次选择职业时，会优先选择一些自己熟悉的职业，导致最后虽然可供使用的角色变多了，但角色们用的还是同样的职业，甚至是同样的天赋。如果可以的话，希望能在转职之类的界面加入可以选择游玩的，能够发挥职业特色和优势的教学关。
2、游戏的美术风格和剧情设定十分独特，并且可圈可点，《纷争终结者》的角色设定都十分独特，每个人都有着独属于自己的性格和背景。而我也想了解更多关于角色的故事，虽然角色们都就职于同一个纷争终结者公司旗下，但是目前的剧情比起角色之间的互动，更注重单人剧情的介绍，或者和某个特定角色的故事（比如比安卡和艾丽莎），其他的则是一笔带过，无法感受到公司成员之间的凝聚力。如果可以的话，能否提供一些不同人物之间的小互动或者日常故事，随着角色之间的好感上升而慢慢解锁，类似于《火焰纹章》的支援对话，或者《八方旅人》的特殊对话，以此来丰富公司成员的羁绊和个人的性格设定。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

" 让玩家能对职业的定位和功能有初步的判断和印象。"

我也体验过一些提供这些功能的游戏。那些游戏大部分都是在线MMORPG。成长一个角色需要很长时间，为了成长新的角色需要很多时间和费用，所以在开始某个角色之前，可以提前体验那个角色能做的事情。如果分争调整者是那种游戏，我们也会慎重考虑实现其功能。 但是分争调整者不可能让角色朝着错误的方向成长。 只是还需要一点时间而已。 没有必要为角色的未来而苦恼。 只要开始游戏就可以了。

" 以此来丰富公司成员的羁绊和个人的性格设定 "

这是开发组想要的东西之一。 到目前为止,游戏的故事结构是，如果新角色登场，以该角色的故事为中心，游戏的整体故事就会随之而来。但是正如你所提到的，以新角色为中心展开的故事虽然暴露了该角色的矛盾，但是这个角色和现有角色的关系还没有充分说明。我们将通过新的DLC或下一部作品继续讨论这一部分。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198111841020', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 8768, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4871, 'last_played': 1678394116}
review:
чудова іграшка. Акцент робиться на історії, тож очікуйте багато діалогів та розкриття світу. Я б навіть сказав, що історії тут забагато, після 80 годин гри я відчуваю що дійшов тільки до середини гри. Спочатку вона здається натягнутою, але поступово обростає деталями та стає дуже правдоподібною.

Система бою досить цікава, усі персонажі потребують різних підходів. Прокачка дуже глибока декілька систем перетинаються та з дослідженням ігрових механік є сенс перезбирати персонажів щоб краще пасували до стилю гри.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

We are very happy that you seem to like the way we made the game. The reason why you can enjoy the story of the game is probably because Russian translation is supported. We are lucky enough to meet a Russian translation team and they are using their talents to translate our games. I think you and we were able to meet because of them. Thank you again to you and the Russian translation team.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081531434', 'num_games_owned': 202, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 10775, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5935, 'last_played': 1700488275}
review:
Troubleshooter is in a weird spot where I cannot really recommend it to my friends, because every one of them who plays Xcom hates anime games with passion.

From the three base layers (strategy, tactic and story), strategy one is probably the best. You get to tinker around with a bunch of little augments that stack with one another, form sets and often completely alter how a character is played.
Tactic is a bit lacking, especially by the end -- enemies come in swarms and your choices generally boil down to mopping them up or getting one-shot if you fail to do so.
Lastly, the story is fine, most characters are fleshed out well and some even have some sort of development as the game progresses. Unfortunately, it takes a bunch of time before every single mission and is slowed down even more by constant flashbacks. You can skip it in one button, but if you do, you then have no idea what is happening and who are you even fighting.

Overall, solid 4/5 and totally worth the price for the 70-100 hours of fun you're getting even if you aren't going to stick around for the end-game content.
developer_response:
In this genre of game, there is an outstanding visionary named XCOM. And this game actually represents this genre. The beginning of Troubleshooter is definitely a derivative game of XCOM. However, we are trying to establish a brand called Troubleshooter through various factors.

I don't think we can make a game that suits everyone's taste. However, it is our goal that Troubleshooter presents another TBS alternative based on the combat rules established by XCOM.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021230545', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 10129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7771, 'last_played': 1677415318}
review:
얼엑으로 구입했습니다. 
(2년 반만에 다시 접속하면서 시작하기에 앞서 리뷰를 남깁니다.)

[엑스컴이 주는 재미를 기대한다면 비추천 합니다. 결론적으로 엑스컴과는 그 궤가 전혀 다른 게임 입니다.]

이 게임은 캐릭터가 가진 스킬들(명칭이 기억나지 않네요)과 수많은 특성(역시 명칭이...)들을 조합해서 나오는 시너지를 몹들이 가진 특성들을 고려하여 시뮬레이션한 결과를 확인하는 게임이고, 알려진 여러 메타 혹은 조합을 맞추기 위해서 다양한 컨텐츠를 이용해서 파밍을 해야하며, 일정부분 파밍을 완료했을때 나타나는 말도안되는 학살을 통해서 성장의 쾌감을 느끼는 재미가 남다릅니다.

SRPG의 형태에서 육성의 재미와 조합을 연구하는 재미(또는 따라가는 재미), 캐릭터들이 가진 준수한 스토리는 게임에 몰입하기 충분하다고 생각합니다.

택오, 파판택부터 현재의 삼각전략, 로스트 아이돌론스 등 SRPG를 정말 좋아하는 올드유저의 입장에서 SRPG에 대한 허들이 상당히 높은 편이고, 실제로 로스트 아이돌론스는 상당한 아쉬움을 담아 리뷰를 남겼지만 제가 앞서 남긴 로스트아이돌론스의 부정적 리뷰의 배경에는 사실 트러블슈터에서 대부분 구현하고 있는 요소들의 부재에서 온것이라 말씀드립니다.


제가 생각하는 웰메이드 SRPG가 가져야 하는 기본적인 소양은 

1. 몹과 나의 상황에 대한 이해를 요구,
2. 맵을 비롯한 환경에 대한 이해를 요구,

위와 같은 기본적 플레이그라운드에서 상대의 약점을 집요하게 노리는 몹과 나의 싸움, 전장의 마찰을 강화시키는 불확실성(FOW,  RNG 등)을 이겨내며 얻어내는 뇌지컬의 만족과 성장을 위한 노가다의 만족을 느낄 수 있어야 하며, 더불어 캐릭터가 주는 납득할 수 있는 서사까지 있다면 그 자체가 웰메이드 SRPG라고 생각합니다.

트러블슈터의 장점은 제가 앞서 지루하게 나열한 요소들을 충분하게 만족시키고 있다고 생각합니다.

트러블슈터는 잘 만든 SRPG 입니다.


[2020년도에는 게임패드에 진동을 지원하지 않았는데, 이제 지원하나요?]
developer_response:
현재의 저희 게임 컨텐츠를 바라보면서, 얼리억세스 시절 아무것도 없던 황량한 저희 게임을 좋게 봐주시고 플레이 해주셔서 진심으로 감사를 드립니다. 덕분에 현재의 저희 게임이 이렇게 꾸준히 업데이트를 지속할 수 있습니다.

택오, 파판택, 삼각전략, 로스트 아이돌론스 전부 다 저희가 비교할 만한 작품이 아닌 멋진 작품들입니다. 그런 작품들과 비교해주시고 저희만의 장점을 좋게 봐주셔서 그저 기쁠 뿐입니다.

꾸준히 다양한 몬스터와 환경을 통해 더 많은 즐거움을 드리도록 최선을 다하겠습니다.

게임 패드 진동 부분은 저희가 사용하는 엔진에서 바로 접근하기 힘들다 보니 ( 저희 역량 부족 입니다.) 아직까지 지원하지 못하고 있습니다. 장기적으로 다양한 몰입 기능에 대해 꾸준히 검토하여 더 나은 모습을 갖출 수 있도록 노력하겠습니다.

좋은 한 주 되세요!

author: {'steamid': '76561198981455292', 'num_games_owned': 78, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 5314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1413, 'last_played': 1682404958}
review: 很良心，很好玩的游戏。听说开发组要出新作？我的评价是搞快点。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我很了解你想要的功能。 最近发行的规模较大的开发组制作的游戏非常忠实地支持其功能。 我们也一直羡慕这种功能。 

我们是总人数为6人的小独立游戏开发组。 因为一个人负责游戏的各个领域，所以目前不可能创建你想要的功能。

但是我相信，如果我们努力开发游戏，总有一天我们团队的规模也会扩大，并且能够实现您和我们所希望的功能总有一天会到来。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198079664113', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 7065, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5293, 'last_played': 1677883025}
review:
So, so bought this game because a friend recommended it to me. I never heard of Troubleshooters before, never saw it on Steam, nothing. And Strategy RPG´s are on of my most favourite Gernres, so...i don´t know what went wrong there >.< In my humble Opinion, this game is one of the best Strategy RPG´s on Steam. For me personally, it´s on the same Level as Divinity Original Sin 2, which is my favourite Video Game of all time. 

This Game is like a giant Playground full of possibilities to individualize for Team Just the way you want it! The Mastery System allows you to highly personalize each and every Character, give them new skills, tweak their stats, give them abilities that completly change the way they fight. Seriously, it´s SO DAMN FUN to just try out new ways to make your team wreck the enemy forces. So Gameplay is, when you like those things, like a dream come true!

The Story is super nice, too. I tend to not play Strategy Games for Story, but i am really surprised how good, detailed and honestly interesting The Story is! The game takes time to explain background infos, world building, and character Infos. And i love it ^.^ The World and the characters feel real, authentic. Every Chapter, you feel what is happening, you feel Albus (The Protagonist) problems from Chapter to Chapter. It´s not just a Story, it just feels like a living, everchanging World. And the Way this Game does it is quite rare nowadays. It doesn´t feel hasted, it feels so damn right, well thought and authentic, i love it ^.^

So would i recommend Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children? If you like Strategy RPG´s, HELL YEAH i would! It´s a no brainer, really. Even if you haven´t played SRPG´s before, i thing this would be a great start into the Genre! It starts slow, easy, but gets harder slowly and steady. I´m currently at the end of chapter 4, and it reeaaaaaaly gets challenging, but never too hard, unfair or anything like that! It´s a strategy Game, so sometimes it helps to approach a mission differently, and it actually worked quite often for me :3 And that fact alone shows how perfect the balance of that game is! 

Oh and the Music is just freaking awesome! Just open Youtube and search for the OST ^,^

But there is one thing i would wish was possible. I would wish for a possibility to learn Enemy Skills, either through learning them with a special skill, or by farming their masteries, and learning them with the help of a mastery Set. I reeeeaaaaally hope that will be possible in the future, it would make a already super fun system even better for me personally ^.^ For example, being able to teach Albus Dimension Slash, a skill from Ryo Ryuzaki, it would be super awesome ^.^
developer_response:
First, I would like to thank your friend for recommending Troubleshooter and you for buying and playing the game after hearing the advice. No matter how close a friend is, I don't think the game (including music or movies) that he or she recommends often leads to the action of actually experiencing it after listening to it once. But thanks to someone like you who trusts your friend and is active in everything, a small game development team like us can continue to develop games today.

Divinity Original Sin 2 is a really great game. I think it's a game that divides the TBS genre with the XCOM series. We believe that there will always be a day when we can make games like that, and we are honing our game development skills. 

Although Troubleshooter is now one of Steam's many games, we will not stop developing games until the brand of Troubleshooter is solidified.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994620584', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1582755689}
review:
Отношения с этой игрой у меня строились сложно, попробовал я эту игру несколько лет назад, и меня не впечатлило увиденное, сейчас игра вполне себе способна доставить удовольствие, хотя перевод всё ещё неполный. Отличный саундтрек, приятные герои и сюжет, забавная боёвка, если поставить сложность "кошмар". Есть всего 1 минус - игра заканчивается до завершения основного сюжета, нет ощущения завершённости, многие яркие персонажи даже не попадают в отряд. Возможно, в длс игру завершат, но, чувствую, тут задел на следующую часть, которую я очень надеюсь увидеть. А, да, ещё и не все навыки переведены, что затрудняет создание работоспособного билда, неприятно и приходится переводить самостоятельно, но жить можно.

Так что берём игру на распродаже, любители пошаговых анимешных тактик и наслаждаемся, оно того стоит.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

There are many characters in the game and they all have a reason for fighting and a background surrounding them. As you mentioned, there are other characters and groups other than Albus and his colleagues who are deeply involved in the story. We also want to share their stories with you. We will show you these stories through another DLC or next game.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198156048289', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 14009, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8908, 'last_played': 1698282753}
