author: {'steamid': '76561198007381696', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 10590, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9174, 'last_played': 1701026032}
review:
TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children - это первая игра в серии корейских SRPG в единой прописанной вселенной и мире под названием TROUBLESHOOTER. Мир игры во многом схож по развитию с нашим (даже чуть более продвинутый), но ключевым отличием мира TROUBLESHOOTER можно назвать существование в нем эсперов (людей со сверхестественными способностями) и мутантов (всякого продвинутого в развитии зверья).

События игры происходят в автономной области под названием Вальгалла, находящейся между тремя крупными державами - Атерская Империя на западе, Караский Союз на севере и Восточный Альянс на востоке. Изначально Вальгалла была частью Атерской Империи, но во время Мировой войны, что отгремела пару десятков лет назад, Вальгалла смогла выбить себе независимость, а спустя годы стала вообще важным звеном для всех трех стран - например, как дипломатический посредник между тремя странами.
К сожалению, не все радужно в датском королевстве, так как в автономной области процветает преступность - от каких-то мелких бандитских группировок до крупных преступных организаций. Дошло до того, что с бесконечным наплывом преступности не смогло справится правительство ни силами полиции, ни другими способами. Последним способом борьбы с таким положением дел стало введение системы TROUBLESHOOTER, в рамках которой гражданские (особенно эсперы) - после сдачи необходимых экзаменов, получения требуемых допусков и прохождения практики - могли получить особый статус специалиста по разрешению проблем или, если хотите, решателя (troubleshooter, то есть этакого "решалы") и вообще при желании собираться в этакие вспомогательные дружинные отряды, которые созданы для того, чтоб как наводить порядок (на месте происшествия, например, они также могут брать на себя командование полицейскими), так и помогать простому люду в разрешении других дел в случаях нехватки и невозможности участия в оных сил полиции.
Сам сюжет игры стартует от лица Альбуса - новоиспеченного решателя, только что прошедшего все этапы подготовки и готового приступить к работе. В отличии от большинства свежих решателей, которые обычно присоединяются к уже сформированным командам, Альбус пошел более сложным путем - решил создать свою компанию с нуля. Так как многие районы Вальгаллы уже опылены другим компаниями и командами, то Альбус отправлятся в юго-восточный - почти пограничный - район Вальгаллы под названием "Ветреная Стена", где особо и нет других дружинников, и следовательно там так или иначе навыки Альбуса найдут себе место без лишней конкуренции и возможности для развития (также туда он поехал по личной причине, а не только ради удобства). Однако буквально почти сразу по приезду Альбус оказывается сразу втянут в теракт, который становится лишь отправной точкой для дальнейшего необычно высокого пика преступности для района, подобный рост которому наблюдался здесь лишь десяток лет назад. Собственно Альбусу и предстоит теперь помогать с этим разбираться, а для этого еще, если получится, и набрать народа к себе в команду.

Сюжет игры одновременно оказывается прост и непрост. В основе своей он элементарен - бандиты бушуют (А зачем бушуют? А затем, что бандиты) и мы с ними разбираемся, и в целом это вся сюжетка. Но с другой стороны здесь множество фракций и персонажей с разными интересами и целями, которые могут быть не так очевидны или быть неоднозначны. Кроме того, информацию выдают очень постепенно и частично, иногда еще скачут хронологически туда-сюда, показывают одни и те же события с разных углов, и только в конце игры, как говорится, пазл собирается.
Интересной фишкой сюжета еще можно отметить то, что большой упор в оном дается злодеям (и другим персонажам), так как события часто показывают с их стороны (и иногда за некоторых даже дадут сыграть). Может даже показаться, что тут им до определенного времени посвящают больше времени чем основным персонажам - они-то часто прибывают просто убрать за последствиями, и в этом их вся роль.
В плане самих персонажей здесь также как и с сюжетом - и просто, и непросто. Некоторые из героев менее интересные и более стандартные, а кто-то поинтереснее. Хотя иногда и подкидывают о них новую информацию, которая меняет немного представление о персонаже. Тот же Альбус во многом показан как типичный добрый ГГ, который всем помогает и со всеми дружит, но в конце игры дают намек, что он может быть на самом деле вполне расчетливым и хитрым. Взаимоотношения между персонажами тоже разнятся и у некоторых даже будут свои терки (это будет даже отражаться в геймплейном плане, так как в игре у персонажей есть шкала взаимоотношений с различными персонажами, определенный уровень которых открывает какую-нибудь дополнительную возможность - например, персонаж может прикрыть напарника и ударить по врагу перед его атакой или нанести дополнительный удар, если удар напарника не прибил до конца противника).
По итогу я бы назвал сюжет игры хорошим, если бы не тот момент, что у нас здесь лишь первая часть из серии игр, и следовательно сюжет незакончен.

В геймплейном плане игра предлагает сплав механик X-com (и подобных тактических игр) и SRPG. От X-com тут система с двумя действиями на ход (когда есть возможность переместить юнита один раз и выполнить какое-то действие или только сходить, но подальше, или только выполнить какое-то действие), система с укрытиями и наконец сам внешний вид геймплея. От SRPG же здесь прокачка, статы и упор на билды персонажей. Наличие персонажей-рукопашников тоже можно больше отнести к SRPG, так как в тех же X-com'ах больше упор на стрельбу.
Сами миссии в игре практически все интересные и ситуации в них и задачи часто подкидывают разные, а правила часто меняют (так как встречаются разные фракции и враги [иногда несколько фракций на одной карте, которые еще и между собой могут драться], а у них есть свои собственные фишки, которые меняют то, как будет вестись бой). Многие ситуации обязательно при этом будут жечь под тобой стул на протяжении некоторого (иногда длительного) времени - по продолжительности миссии могут длиться от десяти минут до двух часов в зависимости от сложности миссии. Чаще всего будут миссии на 30-50 минут, а миссии на 1,5-2 часа - это обычно побочные и особо сложные (но интересные) миссии. У игрока часто также есть возможность выбора - от простого выбора, с какого угла карты команда начнет миссию, до выбора в ходе сюжета (иногда со стороны вражеской стороны), который может внести дополнительный хаос на миссию или усложнить/упростить что-нибудь для игрока.
Из хорошего в игре еще та самая настройка персонажей. В ходе игры при победе над врагами, а также при определенных действиях (например, сделать в бою что-то несколько раз) и выборах в сюжете будут выпадать различные перки (называются в игре "мастерствами"). Перков этих несколько сотен и под разные нужды, так что простор для фантазии есть. У каждого из персонажей есть панель с настройкой: определенное количество слотов под эти перки (количество слотов и доступность некоторых перков еще зависит от класса персонажа - у каждого из персонажей по три класса со своими особенностями, которые можно в любой момент переключить) в пяти категориях (базовое, поддержка, атака, защита, способность). И самим этим категориям, и всей панели настройки, назначен максимальный "вес" (перки могут отнимать от 1 до 4 единиц), так что помимо количества слотов надо еще учитывать и его (но некоторые перки могут увеличить количество слотов и "вес" в определенной категории). Наконец, определенные комбинации перков также активируют свои сеты, которые либо усилят перки внутри сета либо добавят еще что-нибудь полезное сверху. Копаться в настройке персонажей - это отдельное занятие, которое в засимости от успехов может пренести различные и интересные результаты, а для спокойного продвижения по игре так и обязательное.

Соотношение геймплея и сюжета, к слову, если кого-то беспокоит, конечно, значительно больше в сторону геймплея, и он, как по мне, в целом хорош (хоть и в нюансах всегда можно найти к чему придраться).
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

We were inspired a lot by XCOM. And now we're trying to create a new brand called Troubleshooter by adding our own elements. I'm very glad that our efforts are in line with your taste.

Although we have been influenced a lot by XCOM, we value the story of the game and the growth of the character more. So we're actively reflecting the elements of RPG into the game. I think our attempt made you feel that Troubleshooter is close to SRPG. We still don't know what the outcome of our attempt will be. However, it is certainly difficult to create turn-based and RPG as a genre, but I think it is worth the challenge.

Thank you for this review.

ถ้าใครที่กำลังหาเกมแนว Xcom แต่ภาพกราฟฟิคสไตล์อนิเมะและเนื้อที่ดีผมก็แนะนำเกมนี้ครับ TROUBLESHOOTER อาจจะตอบโจทย์คุณได้

author: {'steamid': '76561198047533665', 'num_games_owned': 200, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1676347479}
review:
Please, please, PLEASE, consider a complete overhaul for the UI. I've played 2 hours so far and the UI makes the whole gameplay awkward.

[b]Also, please consider this advice the holy grail for every game developer out there:[/b]
[h3]The more you expand in game mechanics, the more should you invest in the UI to make it confortable and easy for the player.[/h3]

[b]Just some examples of problems I've found with only my 2 hours of gameplay:[/b]
1. Unresponsive UI with the controller.
2. Glitched selection border (the yellow border that highlights some options/menus) that persists even after closing said menu.
3. Text overflowing their corresponding text box, resulting in missing/uncomplete text.
4. A tooltip is shown when hovering some abilities, others don't show any tooltip at all.

And that's just to name a few problems...
I'm truly willing to change my review if I ever see an update for the UI, after all, I want to give this game an opportunity as it is unique in some other aspects.
developer_response:
" The more you expand in game mechanics, the more should you invest in the UI to make it confortable and easy for the player. "

I completely agree with this opinion of yours. So far, we have a lot of difficulties in improving the convenience of the UI. But since this convenience is a more difficult item to objectify than anything else, I always wonder if it will lead to better convenience even if we modify it. In the midst of this, features had to be added continuously, and as a result, our UI was rich in functionality but never good usability.

We can't easily guarantee that we'll be able to make a major innovation in UI. Because it can be a promise that you can't keep soon. But at least I will start reviewing the parts you mentioned.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198202396506', 'num_games_owned': 107, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 5723, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5723, 'last_played': 1675536520}
review:
Это выглядит,как интересная и захватывающая игра,но на деле ей едва ли является.
-Отсутствие нормального связного глобального сюжета,вместо которого нам очень маленькими едва связанными кусочками,многие из которых бесполезны даже для задания общего настроения или просто не к месту[spoiler](Нет,я не буду  скорбить по Джоэллу,я его видел 5 минут,если не меньше.)(И на двух безымянных болванов из Аллей,которых расстреляли через 10 секунд после их появления,мне тоже наплевать.)[/spoiler],дают жизнь и приключения полицая-фрилансера,вкупе со сборником аниме-клише вместо персонажей с классическим ОЯШем добрый-мальчик-спасу-всех в роли ГГ.
-Чрезмерная растянутость как количества миссий(немало),так и самих миссий.Идея убивать по 100 врагов за миссию кажется весёлой только до того момента,как эта сотня врагов начинает ходить,после этого начинаешь жалеть о том,что не умеешь ускорять время.Или о том,что разработчики почему-то не предусмотрели такую возможность.Мало кого не начнёт тошнить с одинаковых анимаций вражеских пинков,когда они занимают 95% времени миссии

Особенно эта растянутость бесит,когда приходится искать 1-2 врагов на огромнейшей карте с непонятным ландшафтом,в котором фиг разберёшься без божьей помощи,из-за чего почти дойдя до негодяя,вы выясняете,что не можете залезть к нему/cпуститься,и приходится делать ещё добрый(злой) десяток ходов
-Бесполезная система крафта и гринда материалов для,опять же,растягивания геймплея.Сюда же можно отнести и [spoiler] дроны [/spoiler],к моменту появления которых игрок задолбался настолько,что просто не тратит на это время и силы

-Отвратительная оптимизация,из-за которой не только игра иногда подвисает при очередном эффекте,но и миссии загружаются по добрых 5 минут.
Каждый раз.
Особенно под конец,когда миссии и игровые поля становятся всё больше и больше.

Впрочем,если вы не знаете,что делать со своей жизнью,и хотите просто потратить добрые 2 недели за компом,ни о чём не думая,эта игра-ваш выбор.

[quote=ГФЖиДОС]Было весело. Не возвращайся.[/quote]
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

You were able to write bad reviews and swear because of the bad game experience you experienced. You rated Troubleshooter badly, but you didn't swear at the game and told the development team more honestly than anyone else about what the game needed to improve in the future. We will distinguish the parts you mentioned into short-term improvements and long-term improvements and make sure to remember not to repeat the same mistakes in future game development.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091314506', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 11805, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11684, 'last_played': 1700091872}
review:
Определенно игра достойная внимания. 
Во-первых, довольно интересные игромеханики. Сочетая разнообразные способности персонажей, можно выстраивать мноходовые комбинации (таких масштабных я пока не встречал в других пошаговых играх). Достаточно гибкая система развития позволяет довольно разнообразно развивать каждого из персонажей. Также хорошо реализована система бондинга, что позволяет на уровне самих механик игры показать стиль взаимоотношений между персонажами. 
Во-вторых, сами персонажи - они прописаны, реагируют на происходящие события в соответствии со своей логикой, взаимодействуют друг с другом. С ними приятно было познакомиться. 
И в третьих, арты. Очень приятно нарисованы, радуют глаз, раскрывают происходящие ситуации. 

Упомяну и о спорных моментах, которые могут оттолкнуть. Визуал самих боев бывает довольно мутный - слишком много препятствий, камера скачет. Основной недочет, на мой взгляд, заключается в сюжете. Он по-анимешному запутанный, что было бы неплохо, если бы он затем распутался. Но нет, довольно внезапно на нас выпрыгивает конец сюжета, хотя казалось бы - особенно ни что не предвещало. И вот мы уже смотрим эпилог с хорошими и трогательными моментами, но при этом с массой недоговоренностей - типа вот это мы оставим за кадром.  И впечатление от этого не как от аниме с открытой концовкой первого сезона, чтобы мы ждали продолжение, а как от несколько ленивой работы сценаристов - мы закрутили разные линии, а раскрутить их не в состоянии, поэтому они так и останутся висеть ружьями, которые не выстрелят.

Тем не менее, игра достойна внимания, а ее персонажи - знакомства с ними.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the language of your country so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

I'm sorry I couldn't tell you more stories. Many people want the story of the game to expand further, and the development team agrees. Troubleshooter is a game that will be the foundation of every game that the development team will create in the future. Therefore, the stories that are not known now will be introduced through another DLC or next work. 

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081317497', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 27010, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27010, 'last_played': 1675363477}
review:
This game presents a variety of tactical challenges and lets you customize your dudes with abilities you get from the enemies you defeat. For every broken ability that your opponents use to frustrate you, there is usually at least one dude in your team who can make use of it to frustrate your opponents too.

The story missions are arranged in such a way that just when you become comfortable with fighting a specific enemy faction, a different faction with completely different tactics shows up to mix things up.
developer_response:
" there is usually at least one dude in your team who can make use of it to frustrate your opponents too. "

This is really the situation we wanted. We wanted to make our strengths and weaknesses clear rather than making individuals perfect characters. And the shortcomings can be offset by other team members. Our biggest goal was to make these individuals come together and get through the difficulties. In the future, we will continue to update in a way that shows these characteristics well.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045906778', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 5955, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5577, 'last_played': 1676621841}
review:
게임 자체는 재밌다. 난이도도 높은편이라 도전욕구를 불태우게 만든다.
근대 스토리가......아니 떡밥 실컷 살포하고 회수하는게 없다.
DLC장사하려고 하는건가? 아니면 정식 후속편을 만들예정인건가...?
너무 찜찜하다.
developer_response:
부족한 점이 많음에도 즐겁게 즐겨주셔서 감사합니다!

저희 개발팀이 존속되는 한 개발팀은 지속적으로 "트러블슈터" 세계관에 기반한 게임을 만들려고 합니다. 개발 역량에 비해 너무나도 큰 포부이지만 이 작품을 시작으로 이어지는 DLC,  후속작 모두 이 세계관에서 활동하는 사람들의 이야기를 담으려고 합니다.

올해 여름까지는 "진홍까마귀" DLC 제작에 전념하고 이후 장기적으로 후속작인 "트러블슈터: 추방된 아이들"을 제작할 예정입니다. 작은 개발팀이다보니 컨텐츠 업데이트 속도가 많이 늦지만 최선을 다해 더 많은 이야기들이 계속 이어질 수 있도록 최선을 다하겠습니다!


다시 한번 부족한 게임, 즐겁게 즐겨 주셔서 감사힙니다!

좋은 하루 되세요!

스토리 플레이 이후에도 즐겁게 즐겨 주신다니 그저 감사할 뿐입니다.

꾸준히 개선하고, 더 많은 즐거움을 게임 내 녹여내도록 최선을 다하겠습니다!

author: {'steamid': '76561198851412461', 'num_games_owned': 264, 'num_reviews': 154, 'playtime_forever': 6861, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6861, 'last_played': 1676088527}
review:
幅広いキャラのビルドが魅力のやりこみゲー
キャラにどのパッシブを持たせるかで、ついつい時間を無駄にしてしまう深みがあるゲームです
やろうと思えば、装備も含めて全デバフ対策とかもできちゃうのが楽しい

ただそれには、敵を倒してパッシブスキルを集めたり、武具開発＆強化の素材収集を集めないと
いけないので、究極を追求してしまうと何十時間あっても足りない沼

主人公を除き、仲間にはそれぞれ特徴的な個性があるので、誰が弱いということもなく、好きな奴を使って遊べます
まあ終盤は全員集合だけど
人間以外に動物とドローンも仲間にでき、こいつらも育成しないといけないので大変だがこれまた面白い

やりこみSLGとしては最高級の出来でしょう

ただシナリオはいまいち
いまいちというか、仲間になりそうな奴が仲間にならなかったり、ラスボスっぽいヤツとの決着がなかったり、
思わせぶりなキャラが再登場しなかったり、疑問がいっぱい

あとこのゲーム、序盤はつまらないです
主人公が何でも屋なので、敵を倒すだけのミッションだけではなく、市民救出や電子柵の修理だの
クリア条件が特殊な物が序盤だけ多く、これがまたつまらないのなんの
ただユーザーからの不満が多かったからか、中盤以降のミッションは敵を殲滅するだけになります。やったね

値段からは考えられない圧倒的なボリューム、やり込み要素、SLGが好きな人にならお勧めできます

最後にこのゲーム、文章は日本語化してますがボイスは韓国語のままなので、
だいたいのミッションでいるモブ警官たちの目標なんたらニダ！がいっぱい聞けて面白いです
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

私たちが初めて【トラブルシューター】を設計した時、【トラブルシューター】のジャンルはSLGでした。 ところで、私たちはここにキャラクターの話とキャラクターの成長、装備収集要素を加えたかったのです。 それで私たちはRPGの要素を積極的にゲームに反映しています。

この過程で反復的な要素も多く導入されました。 しかし、私たちはこれを強制したくはありません。 私たちはゲームの話だけを経験したい人のためのゲーム進行方式を必須的に準備し、ゲームのすべてを完全に征服したい人のための選択的なものを追加的に準備する方式を取っています。

ゲームの話でまだ話せていない話が本当に多いです。 現在開発中のDLCを通じても、このような話をすべて紹介することは難しいと思います。 しかし、開発チームが今後製作するすべてのゲームは、今の人物、事件、背景と緊密な関係を持つでしょう。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198031864968', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 4713, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4713, 'last_played': 1676102943}
review:
A great game with an absolutely terrible, abysmal translation. If this game had a better TL and more varied map design besides pick up cargo and kill everybody (with huge maps, that usually involve chasing singular enemies that are hidden in far corners) then I think it'd be one of my favorites.

Still, there's a lot of good. There are a ton of builds playstyles to mess with, customization is through the worth, a lot of difficulty options, little bit of crafting, beast taming, and more goodness splashed in. It's fun. 

What spoils this game for me is the sheer amount of story cutscenes and rules text translated TERRIBLY. Every character has the same voice, the writing is awkward and stiff... it reads like barely edited machine translation if I'm being honest. After 80 hours of the story going in circles and nothing really happening besides poor characters being introduced, and struggling to understand various gang leaders motivations or why the setting is the way at all because of how poor the english writing is, I find it hard to continue. It doesn't help that the game feels a bit repetitive at this point, with all the missions being the same variants of each other and the maps being re used. 

That being said, if you're someone that loves to tinker with RPG mechanics, you'll probably have some fun with this game. I'm not disappointed I got it, but I am sad that there's a lot of wasted potential. But, so it goes.
developer_response:
Troubleshooter is the first game we made. Our idea was simple. I thought that translation would not be a big problem if the content of the game was interesting. But this was a really big mistake. 

Gamers had to encounter translation as soon as the game started, and the bad experience of the translation forced the game to be denied everything. No matter how much content was prepared in the game, if a gamer disappointed with the translation gave up the game, it would soon become like nothing.

We realized this belatedly and are still working on improving translation. No matter how hard we try, we will not reach the level of translation of professional translators. But I will try to make a better translation than now.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198984499623', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 1381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1088, 'last_played': 1682608948}

author: {'steamid': '76561198091350792', 'num_games_owned': 189, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 9972, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9972, 'last_played': 1669175823}
review:
优秀的走格子RPG，冷门小众的精致游戏，值得一玩。

大量精美插图，人设讨喜，但是3D建模真的挺丑的，世界观完善，并且在游戏中不停的从细微之处补充世界观，玩到后期感觉自己都慢慢融入了这个世界，剧情也还不错，很喜欢这个小队里的每一个人，看上去像个大反派的角色也有很多自己的故事。

再说说玩法，首先战斗加速真的推荐打开，不然好慢好慢，打一场动不动半小时以上甚至一个小时，敌人小怪巨多，到了敌人回合经常等个大半天。BD相当多，养成非常丰富，后期比较肝，BGM还不错。

关键是制作组还一直在更新，价格良心，买的时候没想到这么好玩，一不小心就玩了100多个小时。

总之，非常推荐大家尝试一下。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

感谢您通过游戏的评价，对我们游戏的优点和今后体验该游戏的人给予很好的忠告。为了能让新玩家体验到【分争调整者】，也能体验到和你一样的体验，我们以后也会继续改善游戏。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198007554804', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 6384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 718, 'last_played': 1693448348}
review: great game, highly recommend
developer_response:
Nice to meet you!

I would like to give you a small tip to make the game more enjoyable.

First, complete the scenario missions first. More and more colleagues will gather around you.

You don't have to set the game's difficulty to hard from the beginning. All missions in the game, including scenario missions, can be re-challenged at any time, and at this time, you can set a more difficult difficulty.

Actively utilize the mastery set. It is the core system that makes your character strong.

You can set the pace of the mission fast. Reduce your wait time by adjusting the values of Ally Units Action Speed and Non-ally Units Action Speed in the game's settings.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007891622', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1256, 'last_played': 1675951165}
review:
Leider wird das Spiel dem Ruf nicht gerecht. Es gibt keine Komplexität in den Missionen, welche nur daraus bestehen langsam  vor zu gehen um ja nicht alle Gegner zu triggern und von Deckung zu Deckung zu springen. Die eigentliche Taktik kommt außerhalb der Kämpfe, wo man sich überpowerte builds zusammenschrauben muss in nicht guten Menüs. 
Die Aufmachung ist sehr kindisch und die Dialoge langweilig und nervend. Der Stil ist aber natürlich eine Geschmacksfrage.

Außerhalb der Kämpfe hat das Spiel einige interessante Ideen, die retten aber für mich nicht die langweiligen Missionen. Es ist sogar angedacht die Missionen mehrmals zu spielen.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the German so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

Troubleshooter is an SRPG game based on run-based. There are basic tactics in the game, but it is set to be more important to defeat enemies quickly in a short time, and it is advantageous in every way to play like that. We will continue to update, but it is difficult to change the core combat system of the game mentioned above. Rather, we will strengthen our characteristics further. We will continue to improve the game to show you a better performance whenever you think of Troubleshooter after some time. I hope to see you again in the game someday.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075825685', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 6322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3429, 'last_played': 1684943891}
review:
What this game offers that is unique (as opposed to hurr durr anime xcom):

- Choices matter. Your choices will turn an ambush scenario into a pre-emptive strike scenario. Your choices will allow you to play as the villainous leaders instead of the main hero cast. Your choices will allow you to play as the grunts "Spoonists" for the map. Your choices will allow you to pick and choose which of 2 villains butting heads with each other to play as in a 1 v 1 fight.

- Townsfolk in this game will be involved personally in your missions, meaning, you get to play with them too, or throw hands with them in a duel

- Very in depth story line. No seriously, very in depth, so much so, that every single map stage in the game has flavor text and lore regarding it's history in relation to Valhalla. You can actually say there is TOO much flavor text.

- You can play as the un-named soldiers, and dictate how many of them to bring along, and which corner of the map you want them on.

- You have to pay your employee's wages. Cut wages mean lowered morale and stats. Bonus pay means bigger morale and boosted stats (wow that actually nuts, why does xcom not have this?)
developer_response:
XCOM practically represents this genre and we continue to study what makes Troubleshooter feel different from XCOM. Much of what you mentioned came from that very concern. Now, the development team is building Troubleshooter an SRPG based on turn-based. This is because we decided that this is a good structure to show our favorite narrative, various items, and many colleagues. 

Our update is not over yet. I hope to see you again in the game soon.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064831822', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1702028328}
review: 죄송합니다 실수로 esc눌럿다가 스테이지 끝나길래 화딱지나서 환불요청했습니다. 죄송합니다 후..............
developer_response:
즐거워여 할 시간에 불쾌감을 드려 저희야말로 죄송합니다! :)

ESC로 스킵되는 컨텐츠들은 추후 미션 다시하는 컨텐츠나 이벤트 다시보기로 다시 플레이하거나 보실 수 있습니다.

그리고 환불을 할 경우에 리뷰는 남지만 전체 평가 카운트에도 영향을 안 미치는 데다가 저 역시 게이머로서 즐겁게 플레이하지 않는 게임에 투자된 돈이 아깝다고 생각합니다! 그러니 도의적인 부담감 같은 건 가지지 않으셔도 되세요!!

언젠가 다시금 구입해서 플레이 하고 싶으실 때까지 저희는 계속 개선하고 더 좋은 경험을 드리도록 최선을 다하겠습니다!

즐거운 하루 되세요! :D

author: {'steamid': '76561199153661964', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5531, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5531, 'last_played': 1656071145}

developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

" 群像剧情 "

没错！我们追求的故事进行方式就是这个。 我们将进一步研究这种方式,创造一个大家都满意的故事。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198135476931', 'num_games_owned': 169, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 6724, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2644, 'last_played': 1699376552}
review:
앞서 해보기 부터 열심히 시작 했는데 그때만 하더라도 할게 없어서 접었지만
꾸준한 업데이트로 오랬만에 한번 해봐야지 라고 생각하고 다운받고 했지만 너무 많이 바꿔서 하나도 모르겠다
하지만 전투는 잼있당 이런저런 스킬트리로 또 다른 재미를 볼 수 있는게 이 겜에 장점
developer_response:
저희 게임 분량이 매우 적었던 앞서 해보기 시절부터 저희 게임을 찾아주시고 구입해주셨기에 현재의 모습이 존재할 수 있었습니다.

오랜만에 게임을 잡아도 다시 익숙해지기 쉽도록 인터페이스와 기능들의 정렬 등 여러 부분에서 꾸준히 개선하도록 하겠습니다!

또한 한 번 손 놓은 게임을 다시 찾기 힘든데 이렇게 다시 찾아와 주셔서 리뷰를 남겨주셔서 진심으로 감사합니다.

미세 먼지가 심합니다. 건강 조심하시고 즐거운 하루 되세요!

author: {'steamid': '76561198977915378', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 16040, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15074, 'last_played': 1698231968}
review: 存档机制急需优化，SL野兽过于浪费时间，被势必归正冰蛙冻住之后桑支援射击带走老师几十次，读档居然在游戏开始，还没有手动存档按键
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我们觉得我们追求的战斗方式不符合你的喜好，我们感到很遗憾。 但是有很多人喜欢现在的战斗方式。 我们到现在为止和他们交流，发展成现在的战斗方式。 你提到的都是这种战斗方式的关键因素，所以有很多事情是难以随意改变的。 这只是你和我们的喜好差异。 谁的口味都没有错。 因为取向没有对错。 

我们还在更新游戏。 如果你有时间的话，请随时再来找我们。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198167276724', 'num_games_owned': 123, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 10970, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 66, 'playtime_at_review': 4984, 'last_played': 1712251461}
review:
SRPGの傑作

既に他の方が評価されているように、XCOM＋タクティクスオウガ＋ハクスラと
美味しい所を詰め込みまくって破綻していない絶妙なバランス

海外製だが日本語テキストはほぼ問題なく、
アニメ風のキャラなどから国産ゲームと錯覚するくらいすぐ馴染んだ

ただオンライン要素は別にいらないと思う
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

私たちが作ったゲームがあなたに名作と言われるゲームを思い出させたなら、私たちにとってはそれ自体で大きな光栄です。ただし、私たちがそれらのゲームのレベルにはるかに及ばないことは正確に把握しています。 彼らにもっと近づける唯一の方法は、着実に更新する必要があることもよく知っています。 いつか他のSRPGに言及する時、良い例の一つに【トラブルシューター】が含まれるよう開発チームが最善を尽くして実力をゲーム開発の実力を積むでしょう。

オンラインモードについては、私たちも多くのことを考えています。 今これを除去することはできませんが、私たちが後続作を製作するならば、これを維持するかについて一番先に悩むと思います。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561197988703767', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 170, 'last_played': 1675748533}
review:
I've seen gacha games that are less likely to drown you in confusing, spreadsheet-style management sims.

Game took forever to get started, but couldn't spare any time for tutorialization, choosing instead to emphasize a large swath of drivel dialogue with characters that I'm sure would be more interesting if I wasn't so bored by that point.

Also, the cover system is weird, since most of your characters are melee. Very confused about what this game is trying to accomplish in terms of gameplay feel.
developer_response:
Unfortunately, we don't know what you saw and thought it was gatcha, but there is no such system. Your previous experience may not be fragmented, but we don't understand why you misunderstood. However, seeing the misunderstanding from first point, we can understand that similar misunderstandings also occur in the later review.

From our personal point of view, it is understood that your taste is a style in which you feel that the good experience of other games you have played before is right and everything.

But there's fun that you don't think of. The cover of XCOM's long-range battles is a very narrow  and concentrated system. Our cover system may be used more or less than XCOM as the character grows. It's a more valuable intention than XCOM in terms of scalability and it's no wonder you don't understand it because it's something you've never experienced.

We'll not explain this anymore because other positive reviews explain this aspect a lot, and because it is only an excuse for a developer to explain this aspect.
We'll improve it further so that we can easily and clearly convey different experiences to those who have solidified their previous experiences like you.

In summary, what you think you wrote in the review doesn't exist. It's just that we're immature and made you misunderstand. In that respect, we sincerely apologize once again as an inexperienced development team.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996186210', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 404, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1676426247}
review:
씹덕 엑스컴이라 보면 될거같은데, 2시간 플레이한 결과 뭔가 종합적으로 아쉽네요.

1. 분위기
엑스컴류 절망스러운 분위기를 기대하고 게임을 사면 반드시 후회할 것.
스토리와 분위기는 전혀 다른 장르의 게임이되, 
플레이 방식이나 분류가 같다고만 보면 재밌게 즐길 수 있어 보여요.

 그런 면에서는 오히려 엑스컴보다 취향이 맞아 훨씬 재밌게 즐길 사람도 있을듯 싶습니다.

2. 그래픽
만화식 그래픽인데, 이것도 취향이 많이 갈릴 것 같습니다.
사이퍼즈 느낌. 캐릭터 품질만 따지면 최신 그래픽은 아닙니다. 그건 좀 아쉬움.

3. 편의성
활용하고 즐길 기능이 꽤 많은 게임입니다. 
각 기능에 따라 튜토리얼이 파트에 맞춰 좌라락 나오는데, 대충 보고 넘어가거나 일단 스킵하는 사람이 많습니다.
하지만 기능이 너무 많아서 이를 다시 찾아보고 싶은 경우가 있을 테니, 각 시스템 별로 간략한 튜토리얼 정리창을 다시 볼 수 있게 해주면 간단히 해결될 것 같아요.

4. 난이도
엑스컴 생각하면 될 것 같습니다. 아직 플탐이 길지 않아서 정확히 모르겠지만, 안일하게 하면 터집니다.

5. 캐릭터성 / 몰입도
제가 볼땐 아직까지는 굉장히 낮은 편입니다. 제 취향일 뿐일수도 있지만... 아직까지는 주관적으로는 그렇습니다.
캐릭터 일러스트만 보면 땡기는데, 막상 인게임에서 말하는거나 스킬, 행동이 매력적으로는 보이지 않습니다.
만약 엑스컴같은 캐릭터성을 기대한다면 더욱 실망할 것 같습니다.
때문에 몰입도/중독성이 떨어지네요. 총 플탐이 2시간밖에 안됐는데 게임 껐다 킨게 세번째입니다.

그러나 웹툰이나 씹덕겜류 캐릭터성을 좋아한다면 취향이 맞을지도?
일단 저는 당장 주인공부터 별로..

6. 스토리 / 연출
플탐이 짧아 아직까지는 잘 모르겠습니다만, 배경은 매력적인데 끌리는 스토리를 유도해내는 연출력이 조금 아쉬운 정도입니다.

7. 종합
뭔가 단점만 써놓았지만, 그래도 '추천합니다' . 
일단 엑스컴류 게임을 좋아하는 사람에게는 취향이 맞는다면 이만한 갓겜이 없을 것 같네요.
여러 캐릭터별 기능과 특성수치를 넣은 것도 꽤 좋아보입니다.

대부분은 제 취향에 따른 불호라서, 읽어보시고 " 이게 왜 단점이지? " 싶은 점이 있으시면 바로 구매해도 후회 안하실 것 같습니다.
developer_response:
많은 부분 불만족한 부분이 계심에도 불구하고 긍정적으로 평가해주셔서 감사합니다.

저희 게임이 현재 트렌드인 빠르고 자극적이며 명확한 플레이를 추구하거나 XCOM처엄 30시간 내 실패에 대한 패널티를 압박하는 전략 게임이 아니다보니, 그런 면을 기대한 분들에게는 많은 실망과 "왜 도대체 평가가 좋은 거야?" 라는 의문을 던지기에 초반 평가가 좋은 편이 아닙니다. 실제로 초반 2시간 내 평가는 70% 대로 저희 역시 저희 게임의 최대 약점이라고 생각합니다. 

다만 그런 저 평가를 뚫고 총괄 평가로 이어지면 94%의 매우 긍정적이 되는 이유는 저희 게임이 XCOM이나 최근 로그라이크와 같은 게임이 주는 재미와 정반대의 재미인 장편 RPG의 재미를 추구한 결과라고 생각합니다.

저희 게임은 일단 플레이 타임이 시나리오 모드만 노가다 없이 적정 난이도로 쭉 플레이하시면 DLC 포함 플레이 타임이 80 ~ 00 시간 정도가 걸립니다.

10시간, 30시간 안에 시나리오 관련 모든 게임을 끝내는 로그라이크, 플래포머, 액션게임, XCOM과 같은 전략 게임들은 시나리오를 그 안에 끝내야 하기 때문에 최대한 자극적이고 강렬한 부분으로 끝내는 구성을 하게 됩니다.

반면 장편 RPG 장르들은 이야기의 구성을 스텝업하게 되며 그에 맞춰 성장과 재미도 후반에 이르러야 큰 즐거움을 주게 되는 구성을 가지고 있습니다.

물론 이런 부분은 장르적 특성이고 저희가 바라보는 방향일 뿐, 저희가 미숙한 팀이기에 많은 부분 이러한 재미를 느끼기 전에 이탈하시는 분들이 많다는 것을 잘 알고 있습니다.

그럼에도 불구하고 집에서 며칠 푹 쉬고 싶을 때, 반복적인 짧은 게임을 지속적으로 반복하며 뇌를 자극하는 것 보다 꾸준히 않아서 하나의 이야기를 계속 이어나가며 성장시켜 계속 새로운 경험이 늘어나는 RPG 장르를 만들고 싶었기에 현재의 "트러블슈터"가 탄생하게 되었습니다.

그런 면에서 현재의 저희 게임은 긍정적으로 추천하신 부분과 달리 많은 실망을 드릴 수 있다는 것을 잘 알고 있습니다. 하지만 어느 순간 유행과 무관하게 진득감치 엉덩이 붙이고 쭉 트러블슈터의 이야기들을 찾아보고 즐기고 싶을 때 즐거운 경험을 주는 게임으로서 지속적으로 개선하고 개발하겠습니다!

이렇게 장황한 답글을 달게된 이유는 진심으로 감사드리기 때문입니다.

현재 시대에 자신의 취향과 맞지 않는 게임을 추천하는 것이란 매우 어려운 시대이기 때문입니다. 즐길 것이 많고 짧은 시간에 더 자극적인 것이 넘쳐나는 시대이기 때문입니다.

그런 면에도 불구하고 저희 게임을 추천해주셔서 진심으로 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105079892', 'num_games_owned': 149, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 9994, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1678031508}

author: {'steamid': '76561198014894280', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 16072, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1142, 'last_played': 1680834799}
review: I love this anime XCom game, characters are not cannon fodder, they all have their own stories and personalities and they are really good at dodging enemy attacks.  I love the art, already purchased digital artbook, would buy a physical copy if it exist.
developer_response:

We can't afford to produce a physical art book at the moment, but if we get the chance to produce it and introduce it to you one day, we'll definitely leave it in this review.

Have a good week! :D

author: {'steamid': '76561199260604660', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1687087567}
review:
oba？小时候就开始玩战斗棋盘游戏，没有玩过这款游戏操作这么别扭的。小时候就爱看韩剧，这款游戏的剧情没有任何吸引力。完全反常的游戏菜单，既然分为两个层面。两个层面的交换又需要很长的加载时间。那条简陋的射手座街道好像是多余的存在。
战斗中的花哨演出方式，不明所以，选择敌人的方式居然不是用鼠标控制的。
韩国音乐曾经在中国如此风靡，这款游戏的音乐却是如此的中规中矩。挑不出毛病又完全没有一个曲子好听。
鼠标左键不是控制移动而是右键，攻击范围的预览还需要v按键来调节。
游戏内的建模与立绘，好像是整容前后的对比照片。
分解装备的全部分解选项，居然是分解我背包的所有装备。而不是我提前点击的装备。导致我失误分解了好装备！
慢游戏的节奏是很符合回合战棋游戏的设定，但是我玩了很久都还仅仅只是三名成员。
但是我很喜欢，打装备，慢节奏的游戏方式。
在慢慢的适应这款游戏，只是玩着太生气了！
因为有一个叫做夜叉的机械狗模样的怪物，居然能两次行动。好几次逃出我的反击攻击miss。逃跑导致我的游戏失败，太生气了！
游戏的命中率系统如此的吸引人，却没有存档的方式来逃避。生气思密达！
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

如果我们准备的游戏内容能愉快地填满你的时间，那对我们来说也是很大的乐趣。

关于你如何更愉快地体验【分争调整者】，我可以给你一个诀窍吗？

先完成【剧情任务】，让更多的同事加入你的团队。有了强大的战友，你就有了更多的战斗机会，这就意味着你很快就能在战斗中获胜。

刚开始游戏的难度不要设置得高。 各种任务只要完成一次，随时都可以再挑战。 而且以后再挑战的时候，你可以选择的装备和同事的范围会更大。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198314193335', 'num_games_owned': 427, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 2898, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2080, 'last_played': 1675696733}
review: 二次元风格XCOM，好玩但是很肝
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

author: {'steamid': '76561198063506003', 'num_games_owned': 787, 'num_reviews': 140, 'playtime_forever': 15190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 663, 'last_played': 1700170662}
review:
Actualizo tras terminar el juego "base" (sin DLCs)
Terminar el juego base en dificultad normal y modo normal me ha llevado algo más de 100 horas, y se me han pasado volando.

De entrada es inevitable pensar que estamos ante un "X-Com".

No está en español, y la traducción en inglés (el juego es coreano, al parecer) digamos que no es perfecta (pero tampoco causa grandes problemas o malentendidos, especialmente importante a la hora de entender las habilidades)

Sin embargo al poco de empezar descubres que tiene unas mecánicas y sistemas mucho más sofisticados, quizá innovadores, y en general mejores que los de X-Com, al menos, si te gusta optimizar, hacer min-maxing y jugar con elementos propios de un juego de rol, como stats, habilidades, equipo con diferentes atributos y calidades (tipo "Diablo") etc.

Las misiones también son más dinámicas. Suele haber eventos o elementos diferentes en cada misión, mas allá del ya consabido escenario "procedural" con un objetivo predefinido que suele repetirse cada poco. El precio a pagar es, precisamente, que no existen escenarios procedurales, sino escenarios predefinidos. No obstante el modo cada vez que realizamos una misión podemos optar por el modo normal o el modo "Challenge", que aleatoriza ciertos elementos, como las habilidades que pueden tener los enemigos de dicha misión.

La progresión tipo RPG también es un aliciente. El nivel de personalización y de "builds" de cada personaje es inmenso. Intento explicarlo resumidamente:

Por un lado tenemos las clases de personaje: una clase inicial y 2 clases "avanzadas", que podemos escoger tras llegar a cierto nivel en la clase inicial. Ir consiguiendo niveles de clase (se van ganando igual que los niveles de personaje, venciendo enemigos y completando misiones) irá desbloqueando habilidades nuevas. Además cada clase tiene unos stats base diferentes, por ejemplo, un "mago" puede convertirse en "archimago" aumentando mas la potencia de sus magias, o en "mago de batalla" ganando mas poder físico y resistencia.

Las clases avanzadas no se excluyen, podemos cambiar de una a otra, y mantener las habilidades aprendidas de cada una. En ese sentido lo "óptimo" sería subir ambas clases para obtener todas las habilidades, y luego quedarnos con las que mejores stats base nos dé para nuestra idea de build.

Luego tenemos las habilidades en sí: ataques, magias, etc. Como en muchos ARPGs, tenemos mas habilidades que "huecos" para equiparlas, así que elegir con cuidado que habilidades equipar y cuales dejar fuera es importante.

Maestrias: Son la principal herramienta para personalizar al personaje. Hay montones de ellas. Son pequeñas "habilidades pasivas" que podemos "equipar" en cada personaje. Cosas como la habilidad de contraatacar automaticamente, aumentos de stats (HP, armadura, ataque...) posibilidad de resucitar durante la misión, añadir daño elemental... combinar bien estas maestrías es deterinante y pueden producir combos y sinergias muy importantes. El número de ellas que podemos equipar depende de varios factores, principalmente del nivel de nuestro personaje y su clase. Como referencia, de media un personaje podrá llevar unas 25-30 maestrías.


En cuanto a la historia: 

Sorprendentemente buena y bien hilada, aunque el final del juego base deja casi todo en el aire y parece un prólogo de algo mucho mayor que está por venir. No se queda en un cliffhanger ni nada así, pero está claro que la idea es continuarlo (no por nada hay 2 DLCs, uno de ellos gratuito) pero sospecho que la trama va para largo.

Al principio, la historia no parece nada excepcional, pero según avanza y las historias de los personajes se van enlazando y vamos viendo fragmentos del pasado (flashbacks) vas viendo una red de relaciones de personajes y eventos entrelazados. Destacar que todo resulta coherente y cohesivo, sin dar la sensación (como suele ocurrir por ejemplo con muchas series) de haber improvisado sobre la marcha para intentar enredar la historia y hacerla mas compleja inventándose relaciones o eventos "a posteriori".

Mencionar también ciertos contenidos "extra" del juego. Por ejemplo, los "encargos" de los NPC, que nos daran "sub-misiones" que cumplir dentro de las misiones que hagamos (o repitiendo alguna que ya hayamos hecho) como tener que recoger "cajas" esparcidas durante el escenario durante la misión, rescatar a algún civil escondido, o matar algún monstruo opcional concreto.

A eso hay que sumarle la parte "pokémon". Llegado cierto punto obtendremos un personaje con la habilidad de domar a la mayoría de enemigos tipo "bestia", cada cual con sus stats y habilidades únicas, y al igual que los personajes, tendrá rasgos únicos y un alto grado de personalización.

Y mencionar la construcción de drones de combate por piezas, para construir drones personalizados para llevar a cabo diferentes funciones (normalmente ofensivas)

Por último: el juego cuenta con un amplio sistema de crafteo. El típico de acumular "chatarra" bien a base de drop o desmantelando equipo, y luego usar esa "chatarra" como componentes para crear equipo u objetos nuevos o mejorar los existentes. Según crafteamos objetos descubriremos nuevas recetas.

En resumen, un "RPG tátctico" muy (MUJY) completo, aunque la trama parece que va por capítulos (en cualquier caso, como digo, el juego base ya son 100 horas)

Por ultimo hablar de la rejugabilidad, que es mucha. Para empezar todas las misiones pueden jugarse en modo "Challenge" (que es independiente de la dificultad elegida), que sube el nivel de los enemigos al de tu personaje mas altos y aleatoriza las habilidades enemigas, por no hablar de capturar mas bestias, conseguir mas y mejor equipo, jugar dificultades mayores (aparte del "modo Challenge) o subir de nivel y optimizar builds. Intentar hacer el equipo perfectopara superar todas las misiones en dificultades superiores sin duda da para otras 100 horas o mas.

Desde luego ha sido una sorpresa de juego, y me sorprende que no sea mas conocido.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the Spanish so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

As you said, the first impression of Troubleshooter is very similar to XCOM. We have borrowed XCOM's core combat system, so this is a natural phenomenon. But we want Troubleshooter to be a new brand, not a copycat of XCOM. I think the only way to achieve this is to constantly populate the game with new content through updates. Please keep an eye on our updates in the future!

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999405280', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1684373160}
review:
I don't usually write reviews for games but this one deserves my praise and honestly way more recognition.

Let me start off by saying I'm glad I stumbled on this game the way I did. I had bought and had full intention of playing Marvel's Midnight Sun's, which I did, but then this game was recommended to me and for whatever reason caught my eye. I love it.

I've barely put any time into it but I don't see myself stepping away anytime soon. The fact that it plays well enough on the steam deck is even better. Everything about this game just feels like a passion project with developers behind it who actually care, and it shows throughout.

I will very much enjoy my future time spent with this charming and amazing game, as I hope plenty more will too. The devs truly deserve it for giving us a game made with such care. You guys are awesome.
developer_response: It's already been three years since the game was released. But don't worry. We are still updating this game. It's not just a fix for the problem, but we're actually adding new characters and missions. The beginning of every game we're going to create is this game, so we're going to put more into this game. Thank you for being with us on our journey.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967668005', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 36319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36105, 'last_played': 1706992830}
review:
Это та самая игра , о которой и правда можно сказать:"Здесь есть что-то для каждого".
XCOM в аниме стилистике(о чём ещё можно мечтать?), прекрасный сюжет который может пробить на слезу , отлично проработанные персонажи , ГИБКАЯ настройка уровня сложности , и многое другое...
Вы можете пройти основной сюжет и DLC за ~70 часов , потратить сотни часов в погоне за лучшими характеристиками на экипировке , а в погоне за 100% счётчик часов перевалит за 1000+.
Иногда после очередного фарма рейда вы сядете в баре , включив "Finish My Work" , и со слезами на глаза подумаете:"Ещё одна прекрасная история подошла к концу..." , но грустить рано...ваши характеристики на эпикировке всё ещё не идеальны , и самое время сменить билд!
Эта игра за свою скромную стоимоть стоит СИЛЬНО выше всех ААА проектов.Забавно наблюдать за тем , как игры от инди разработчиков которые могли вложить в них только свою душу , затягивают сильнее , и проносят больше удовольствия чем тем , в разработку которых вложили сотни миллионов $.
Dandylion могу пожелать финансовых успехов , и любви фанатов.
P.S : Надеюсь игру продолжат развивать , и добавлять DLC с новым контентом.♥♥♥

Although we cannot provide translation ourselves, we will focus on producing better game content. I'll do everything I can to make your fun time longer.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105715968', 'num_games_owned': 323, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 6426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2855, 'last_played': 1676903417}
review:
Ein klasse Taktikspiel, für einen schmalen Taler bekommt man eine Menge Inhalt.
Man muss eine Menge Geduld mitbringen(Gespräche) aber im Gegenzug kann man jede Klasse individualsiren! Dein Schwertkämpfer soll zaubern können? Spezialisier ihn auf magischen Schaden! Deine Heilerin soll Leute im Nahkampf vermöbeln? Bring die Geduld mit und spendiere ihr Nahkampfschaden! Du solltest Englisch können, der Entwickler ist ein Studio aus Korea, das leider noch nicht den Taler für professionelle Übersetzer hat aber sich echt bemüht uns im "Westen" ein klasse Erlebnis zu bieten. Die Entwickler haben ein offenes Ohr im Forum und es gibt sehr hilfreiche Guides für Anfänger.
developer_response:
I'm so sorry but no one in the development team knows the German so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

First of all, I would like to apologize for not providing German translation. Nevertheless, I really thank you for choosing Troubleshooter and recommending games. We will continue to update in the future. If you make Troubleshooter a good game like that, I believe that someday you will have a chance to meet a good publisher and provide a German translation.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198214702707', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5698, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4002, 'last_played': 1687691838}
review:
상황판에 나오는 난이도가 
약간어려움 - 어려움 - 매우어려움 - 압도적으로 어려움 밖에 없는데 
보통이란 난이도는 왜 만들어놨는지 이해가 안갑니다...

처음하는 srpg라서 그런지 난이도를 쉬움으로 해도 너무 어렵네요

적들 숫자좀 줄여주세요 좀...
developer_response:
상황판의 난이도는 현재 회사가 해당 권장 레벨로 도전할 경우에 이 미션의 난이도에 대한 표현입니다. 과거 쉬움이나 보통으로 표기된 미션이 클리어하지 못하실 경우에 차라리 쉬움이나 보통으로 표기하지 말하는 의견이 있어서 대부분 조금 어렵다는 표시로 표기하였습니다.

이 부분에 대한 정보의 직관성을 개선할 수 있도록 방법을 찾아보도록 하겠습니다!

오프라인 모드의 경우, 쉬움 난이도 아래 '스토리' 난이도가 존재합니다. 이 난이도가 온라인 모드에 없는 이유는 다른 난이도 플레이 유저에 비해 많은 혜택이 주어지는 난이도이기 때문에 어쩔 수 없이 '오프라인' 모드에만 제공하고 있습니다.

난이도에 관해서는 조금 더 쉽게 접근할 수 있는 난이도를 고민해보겠습니다. 

여러모로 부족한 모습에 즐겁게 즐기지 못하는 부분을 꾸준히 개선하여 조금이라도 더 나은 경험을 하실 수 있도록 최선을 다하겠습니다!

좋은 한 주 되세요!

감사합니다!

author: {'steamid': '76561198263080432', 'num_games_owned': 176, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 837, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 837, 'last_played': 1669456164}
review:
先说游戏性。能感觉到制作用心庞大的天赋系统各式武器道具技能搭配。但是我玩了十来个小时就再也玩不下去了。就是因为这些系统设计的过于繁琐。各种要素都影响战斗数值但只看单一的要素对战斗的影响非常有限导致需要把精力花费在各种搭配上。让我感觉是什么都想要但是什么都没做精致。完全可以把有限的时间精力资金着重在某一个或两个系统上。还有就是战争迷雾跑图的问题，找不到敌人需要满地图跑。
再说剧情。可以说压根没有，就是主角天天打工招队友（我玩了十来个小时给我的感觉就是这样）无趣的很。各个角色也缺乏更多的内容剧情补足。应该是制作组想以本作为起点做一系列庞大的作品来构建世界观，但是放在单一的一部作品上又显得多余了。
说白了就是制作组太想用一部作品表达自己所有的想法了。现在都是爆米花游戏时代，除了老牌大作出续作了能让人慢慢品。玩小厂小作就是图一乐呵图一时的爽没那精力钻研。
最后回合制战棋类游戏的天花板我认为是日本的《火焰纹章》系列，完全可以借鉴。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

" 现在都是爆米花游戏时代，除了老牌大作出续作了能让人慢慢品。 "

我完全同意你这句话。 无论是游戏、电影还是小说，最好是享受符合自己喜好的东西。 但是我认为你提到的那些作品也有和我们一样的作品,所以可以比较，很有意义。 就像存在多种文化一样,我认为也应该存在多种形式的游戏。 不管什么时候，如果你有时间的话，一定要重新享受我们的游戏。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561197962131251', 'num_games_owned': 357, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 11092, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6726, 'last_played': 1678120882}
review: I'll keep this short: If you like XCOM-style turn based tactics, then buying Troubleshooters is an absolute must! I would go as far as to say that this is the one game I actually regretted buying on a sale, because it deserves to be bought at full price. Incidentally, it is also the only game I ever bought the digital art book for, just as a small "thank you" to the devs.
developer_response:
We will not stop developing games so that your support leads to better updates and follow-ups.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042644909', 'num_games_owned': 643, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 779, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1675856568}
review: Kinda neat
developer_response:
Nice to meet you!

I would like to give you a small tip to make the game more enjoyable.

First, complete the scenario missions first. More and more colleagues will gather around you.

You don't have to set the game's difficulty to hard from the beginning. All missions in the game, including scenario missions, can be re-challenged at any time, and at this time, you can set a more difficult difficulty.

Actively utilize the mastery set. It is the core system that makes your character strong.

You can set the pace of the mission fast. Reduce your wait time by adjusting the values of Ally Units Action Speed and Non-ally Units Action Speed in the game's settings.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055794643', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 11072, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 861, 'last_played': 1677398400}
review: If you enjoyed XCOM or Final Fantasy Tactics, this game will make you realize how much better they could have been.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087604051', 'num_games_owned': 443, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1675458318}
review: I usually dont like turn-based games, but this one gets it right. It's fun and not that expensive. If you buy it, you will not regret it.
developer_response:
Nice to meet you!

I would like to give you a small tip to make the game more enjoyable.

First, complete the scenario missions first. More and more colleagues will gather around you.

You don't have to set the game's difficulty to hard from the beginning. All missions in the game, including scenario missions, can be re-challenged at any time, and at this time, you can set a more difficult difficulty.

Actively utilize the mastery set. It is the core system that makes your character strong.

You can set the pace of the mission fast. Reduce your wait time by adjusting the values of Ally Units Action Speed and Non-ally Units Action Speed in the game's settings.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198104726192', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 3894, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1947, 'last_played': 1675762526}
review:
Magic moments in a srpg for 20 bucks with graphics from 2012 and an everything but perfect english translation?!
Troubleshooter: "Hold my spoon!!!" 
For real, if you think less about xcom and more about fire emblem meets persona and got the motiviation to play a game which takes a lot of time and patience but is totally rewarding in its own way: Buy this!!! And dont judge it after an hour, give it 10-20h ;) And bare in mind that the game comes from a very small team which is working on it for years and is still updating it, so yes, it has flaws, but it has so much more heart and soul (and works better than a lot of bigger titles I played recently).
developer_response:
The first sentence of your assessment tells us so much. The part that we need to improve is too clear. But it's a really hard part to solve for a small development team. Not all of this will get better at any moment. However, as long as our update continues, efforts to improve this will continue.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199138941742', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 13942, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13942, 'last_played': 1669728600}
review:
Troublehooter is kind of an easy game to recommend. For the price of 20 moneys you get a very long game with interesting character building and a lot of side activity to keep you busy, if you so wish. For fans of tactical JRPGs it's easy to recommend. Those looking for a balanced or an interesting tactical game in itself might want to look elsewhere. There is good small-scale (in JRPG scale) story-telling with good art and good music.


At the heart of the game is this system of passive abilities called the mastery board. When you beat up baddies, level up or use some skills some number of times, you will discover these passive abilities that you can then equip on your characters. Each character also has a class, which comes with its own special abilities and also determines the types of abilities the characters can equip.

The boards can hold a few dozen abilities and fiddling around with these boards is the primary way of evolving the characters, though they do also level up and find better equipment. The mastery system is very interesting as a character-building system, but also, unless you play on a very easy difficulty, you probably NEED to fiddle around with it at some point, emptying the whole board and building again from scratch. And that can take some time and be a bit daunting at first.


The game also has a story. It's frankly quite convoluted and when it's finally revealed what the point of all even was, it doesn't make any sense at all. But, for once for a JRPG, it's not about the Universe Entity who has finally broken free of their age-old prison and come to eat Earth whole, nor is it about the War to Engulf the Continent. It's a political type of thing, and there are many sub-stories inside as well. It is not really focused on the characters that much. Or, if I had to choose a character focus, I'd say it's actually focused more on the baddies.

The story is told through stills and the missions themselves, and I have to admit I really like the kind of storytelling the game has. It manages to not be cheesy or cringy as in most JRGPs, it's quite down-to-earth oftentimes, like characters reminiscing. It's also very go-with-the-flow type of thing, in that often you really have no clue how the scene is supposed to tie in to the bigger story. It's very disjointed, but it feels like there's a secret cohesion and the cutscenes are stylish.


So the game is long, has many good-looking still arts and a very good character-building system, so what gives?

Well, there is no balance whatsoever to the game. It's perhaps not surprising that being able to load 30 abilities on a character results in the system not being very balanced.

But for example the critical hit system is completely broken as well. In Troubleshooter both the critical chance and bonus critical damage can be increased with those passive abilities. The end result is that you mostly just deal critical hits all the time, and you deal, say, 2000-5000 damage with a critical hit and one-shot everyone. But if an enemy blocks (% chance of half damage) the attack, they take only a few hundred damage.

Then, on the flipside, once you complete the game and start the free DLC, you will get absolutely decimated by the regular enemies, because they were balanced for the people that broke the systems. This is no exaggeration; in the DLC every regular enemy is about on par with boss-type enemy from the base game. Now, at THAT point going back to the drawing board with your ability boards is a lot of fun, of course, but... It shouldn't take 100 hours to get there, right, to be forced to actually think about the builds. And then you maybe figure out some killer-combo after some grinding perhaps, and wipe the floor with those losers again.

Extremely rarely did I find any middle ground. Either you get slaughtered or slaughter everyone. The base game is challenging occasionally only because you cannot be bothered to reorganize your abilities at every opportunity, and the DLC can be challenging if you didn't grind enough.


As an endnote, the translation is bad. It didn't get in the way, but often especially the skill descriptions were hilariously convoluted. "When used during the battle, this ability makes the following to come about to happen."
developer_response:
As you mentioned, mastery system is the core system of the game. And it's the most important factor in character growth. It may take a lot of time to adjust mastery board between missions. This process may be boring for someone, but if the outcome of the adjustment is a real benefit in battle, gamers think the adjustment will wait even longer. This soon provides an incentive to raise the level of the characters, which in turn creates a cycle of finding equipment that fits the level of the character. Establishing and expanding this virtuous cycle is also a key element of Troubleshooter.

We were most wary of other elements of the game except combat being the only ones to make the battle shine. Especially, I hated when my characters felt like battle consumables. In order to break this point, players had to be fully empathized with the characters. So we adopted the way that the new character leads the whole story of the game. I'm glad you don't hate this way.

" Those looking for a balanced or an interesting tactical game in itself might want to look elsewhere. "

Troubleshooter is a JRPG game. But it's obviously based on a turn-based system. So a balance and a interesting tactics are basically things that need to be guaranteed before I mention mastery system and story. We will once again check whether we have been too preoccupied with the latter and neglected the basics.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120040191', 'num_games_owned': 226, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 694, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 406, 'last_played': 1678586780}
review:
看評論買的

不後悔 好讚
developer_response:
( 這篇文章是在翻譯機的幫助下寫成的。)

如果我們準備的遊戲內容能愉快地填滿你的時間，那對我們來說也是很大的樂趣。

關於你如何更愉快地體驗【分爭調整者】，我可以給你一個訣竅嗎？

先完成【劇情任務】，讓更多的同事加入你的團隊。有了強大的戰友，你就有了更多的戰鬥機會，這就意味著你很快就能在戰鬥中獲勝。

剛開始遊戲的難度不要設置得高。各種任務只要完成一次，隨時都可以再挑戰。而且以後再挑戰的時候，你可以選擇的裝備和同事的範圍會更大。

啊，遊戲正式開始之前，請確認環境設置中的各種選項。包括加快遊戲速度的功能(【快進隊友行動】，【快進隊友外的行動】)，提供利用多種設置舒適享受遊戲的方法。

感謝您的評論。

謝謝。

author: {'steamid': '76561197962919016', 'num_games_owned': 1204, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 322, 'last_played': 1675377553}
review:
Two things that make me sad:

1. it deserve so much more attention than it got since release
2. it is not translated into my mother tongue (german) what makes it quite hard to continue playing it
developer_response:
We are very sorry and sorry for not being able to support more languages. Unfortunately, we do not have the ability to pay for German translation. We are a small, six-member independent game development team and we maintain the team with minimal maintenance costs. Therefore, translating the game through a professional German translator is equivalent to our team's two-month maintenance fee. We cannot maintain the team and translate German at the same time. For now, we're going to focus more on updating the game, which is the best thing we can do. If we continue to improve the game, I believe there will be a good opportunity someday.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043471764', 'num_games_owned': 415, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 17911, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16285, 'last_played': 1676637714}
review:
[b]It has been a long time since I got so much into a game and I can easily give it a 9/10. I just finished the main story, soon will be checking the extras and am already hoping Season 2 comes soon[/b]
[hr][/hr]

[h1]TL;DR Version[/h1]
[list]
    [*]Do not compare this game to XCOM reboot;
    [*]Nice, pleasing art and design choices;
    [*]Customizable difficulty options to suit your style;
    [*]Awesome devs;
    [*]Irene;
    [*]A straightforward plot meant to be fun but with a backlore that may be confusing;
    [*]Gave me nostalgia of my times, as a kid, testing builds in Final Fantasy Tactics; the customisable mastery system is really fun
    [*]Do [b]not compare it to XCOM[/b] reboot just because it have a similar grid system. Comparing it with Shadowrun is closer in genre and tone, and comparing it to FFT is closer on customisation;
    [*]Be scared of Ray's smile.
[/list]
[hr][/hr]

[h1]Wall of Text[/h1]
If I'm to point the main strength of the game in my opinion is the customisable difficulty. I am playing the game on hard + challenge mode (there's an option kind of hard to see that automatically turns challenge mode on for every mission), with 4 difficulty tweaks that I found interesting (for example, one that enables bonding traits on enemies and another one that limits your character level). Because I play RPGs of this kind since I was a kid (I still remember experimenting with builds in Final Fantasy Tactics and Vanguard Bandits), Hard+Challenge sits in a very comfortable position for me. Your mileage may vary, it can feel harder or easier depending on your playstyle. I really recommend enabling the option to limit the character level while you're trying to find the best difficulty setting for you; the last thing you want while trying to figure out how hard you want the game to be is to get overleveled by accident.

Speaking of comparisons, yes. Do not compare this game with XCOM reboot just because it have the 2 action grid system. The two games that comes to my mind is Final Fantasy Tactics and Shadowrun. Do NOT compare it to XCOM reboot.

The story is straightforward, meant to be fun - not complex. There's enough for you to wonder what's going on but not too much to get in the way of the gameplay. The Wall District is full of troubles, go shoot it!
I'll be honest tho, I got lost in the lore. I'm not a native English speaker and the game is originally written in Korean, so there's two language barriers here. Of course, I can just join discussions in the community, but I felt like it lacked a "summary" or "codex" for you to reference.

I have to praise the character design and background, and the artwork accompanying it. It may be just my own impression based on my own bubble, since I'm not familiar with Korean art, but there's an uniqueness on it that pleases me; Special mention to the loading screens and the story panels.
[hr][/hr]

Overall, I really loved this game and I'm about to jump in to the extras. I hope Season 2 comes soon and that the profits are enough for it to be a longrunning franchise.

Thanks for this wholesome game!
developer_response:
XCOM is one of the games that actually represents this genre. And the combat system they're introducing has a lot of support. And we borrowed this system. Borrowing the core system of the famous game allowed us to construct a stable combat system, but we also got the nickname XCOM's subclass. 

Since then, we've thought that the only way to make Troubleshooter a new brand, not a subordinate to XCOM, is to show more of our own elements through updates. I'm so glad that our attempts have made a good impression on you.

We continue to introduce elements of RPG into Troubleshooter. This was our decision to strengthen the narrative of the game and highlight the growth of characters and the acquisition of items as more important factors. Whether we can combine the style of XCOM with the elements of FFT is still unknown. But this is definitely a challenge, and as we get closer to this goal, I think the brand Troubleshooter will also leave a good impression on many people.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014502639', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 14526, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 694, 'last_played': 1705228520}
review: 很好玩!時間一下就過去了..(有毒性?) 喜歡玩XCOM類型的玩家應該都會喜歡:> 目前覺得美中不足的地方就是沒有日本配音QwQ
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

日本的配音演员演技非常出色，很好地表现了角色的特色。 所以我们也很想启用日本配音演员。 但是他们的演技非常出色,雇佣他们的费用真的很贵。 开发组一个月的维持费可以录制一个角色。 （我们队是由6人组成的小游戏开发组。） 在【分争调整者】真正出名和大型游戏发行商对我们的游戏感兴趣之前，这似乎是不可能的。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198116167287', 'num_games_owned': 378, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 7569, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1681471856}
review: TROUBLESHOOTER is a great game. Fans of the XCOM and turn-based strategy games will feel right at home with this game. Although some of the mechanics in this game might be confusing at first but it won't take that long for you to understand them. You may even be surprised by the amount of content that the developers have thrown at you.
developer_response:
The first impression of Troubleshooter may look very similar to XCOM. But I'm going to make you a bet the more you play the game, the more different you'll find from XCOM. Also, those elements will allow you to become more immersed in the game. Please enjoy the game slowly until the end!

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198203928509', 'num_games_owned': 128, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 143, 'last_played': 1675335035}
review:
看了很多评论，我觉得确实需要谅解游戏开发组很小，能力有限，不过我觉得开发组也犯了新手常见的错误，整个游戏里什么东西都想加，又没有安排好各种系统出现的节奏，天赋、装备、关卡等等相关的系统一下子全出来，再加上ui过于廉价和杂乱，卡通风格的美术进一步加强了这种混乱的局面，很劝退人。
剧情我看有人说挺好的，我个人感受不来，感觉是很普通的动漫或者偶像剧的节奏，角色脸谱化严重，而且一开始角色出场的数量太多，根本记不住那么多人，不停的有劣质建模的即时演算动画，不如直接搞立绘ppt，可能还好点。
战斗无法评价，前期就是我秒杀敌人，而秒杀往往代表这是个非常重养成的游戏，很可能从某一关开始数值急剧膨胀，就像紫龙的几个换皮回合制手游。
但是这制作组就6个人，要啥自行车，鼓励一下吧。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

感谢您理解开发组的情况。

正如你所说，我们犯了很多游戏开发新手的错误。 而且为了挽回这种局面，游戏发售后一直延续到现在的游戏更新。但是游戏中仍然存在很多不足之处。 这些部分不会在任何一瞬间都得到改善。 有些东西可能直到游戏更新结束都改不了。 但是为了具备更好的游戏开发能力，我们将进一步改进现在的游戏。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561199091725859', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1675520331}
review:
玩这还行，喜欢幽浮的可以玩，但是这个游戏战斗插对话，人数多，打起来很繁琐，而且韩语听着真难受啊，一会一个思密达太出戏了


欸欸欸，卧槽，春节公告，我评价一个你妈死了，他们进了评论区那句话变成♥♥♥♥♥♥♥了？
又回去玩了xcom，赶紧这游戏确实不如xcom，天赋之类的太繁琐，二刺螈式的剧情太慢，韩语太别扭
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我们队是小, 我们的国籍是韩国,所以最容易配音的是韩语。如果今后能成长更多的开发团队,我会考虑多种语言的配音。

语言的变化可能是因为 Steam Logic 将您的话识别为亵渎或损坏的文本并自动转换它们。

我理解不正确，但我想你写的是你母亲去世了，所以我表示哀悼。无论是在韩国还是在中国，妈妈的存在都会非常珍贵。 不得不眼睁睁地看着你母亲死去，你一定很难过。 我真诚地希望许多美好的事情会发生。你妈妈肯定在天空中也希望你活得开心。

很抱歉用不熟悉的语言让你感到不快。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198991825893', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1791, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 286, 'last_played': 1690528861}
review: GOOD
developer_response:
More stories and more colleagues are waiting for you. 

I recommend that you complete all the scenario missions at a low level of difficulty first. Then you can recruit more colleagues and use more diverse masteries to change your character powerfully. 

You can try again at any time after completing any kind of mission in the game. In this process, you can change the difficulty of the mission or select more people to participate in the mission. Therefore, it is not necessary to complete violent cases or normal cases from the beginning.

Enjoy the story first. Then use your strategy on the battlefield to your heart's content.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199373260494', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1676478214}
review: 我在steamdeck上玩的 教学关就卡住了，视野无法调整 看不到人物，只能看到地面，而且比较卡顿 我都调到最低画质了
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

看不到人物，只能看到地面的现象，可能是由于相机的高度或相机的放大/缩小设置造成的。进入游戏的环境设置后，查看 "镜头高度向上"、"镜头高度向下" 设置的按键和"镜头放大/缩小" 设置的按键，然后更改相机高度和相机放大/缩小设置。

很遗憾，但我们游戏的优化还没有达到令人满意的水平，所以它在 Steamdeck 上没有达到令人满意的帧数。 只要我们不断更新游戏，我们就不会放弃优化游戏。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198076861170', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 3044, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1281, 'last_played': 1709334091}
review:
I haven't seen anything about the game yet and I already recommend it !
I can't wait to continue for dozens (if not hundreds) of hours >^<

Glad I could discover it and hope devs are proud of their game !

At 20~ hours of gameplay I like the story so far, characters are appealing quickly and the gameplay is really great. I like the korean way to make vn stories in game (library of ruina is my fav game and had the same feeling about game's charm) and I'm eager to know more about your world and your characters c: 

One negative aspect I've seen so far (because I know you're still working on your game) is about mastery boards ; it seems a little messy to have several boards (need to re-craft masteries again -maybe intented for this one tho-, can't see which masteries are equipped on the current mastery board...) but overall I've nothing to complain about for now and the work seems to be done with love and passion so.. hope you'll do well and keep up the good work, devs o/ 

(will prolly update with more details -if not too lazy -w-)
developer_response:
Nice to meet you!

I would like to give you a small tip to make the game more enjoyable.

First, complete the scenario missions first. More and more colleagues will gather around you.

You don't have to set the game's difficulty to hard from the beginning. All missions in the game, including scenario missions, can be re-challenged at any time, and at this time, you can set a more difficult difficulty.

Actively utilize the mastery set. It is the core system that makes your character strong.

You can set the pace of the mission fast. Reduce your wait time by adjusting the values of Ally Units Action Speed and Non-ally Units Action Speed in the game's settings.

Maybe by the time you've recruited all your allies and want to dominate the battlefield in earnest, you might change your mind about the mastery board. XD

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085065858', 'num_games_owned': 124, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 11325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11325, 'last_played': 1674906259}
review: 这款游戏非常让我喜欢，很期待对游戏中的故事内容的后续有进一步的讲述。另外既然这款游戏中设计了如此丰富的角色养成内容，那么能不能增加一些肉鸽类爬塔元素来让我们炼成的强力角色有更多的用武之地呢？目前来看后期的很多顶级装备和天赋刷完了也就就结束了，没有超级难的关卡来让我们充分使用这些能力，实在令人失望
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

从你玩游戏的时间长短和你提出的更具挑战性的要求来看，你似乎对这类游戏非常熟悉并且已经完全掌握了。我们仍在更新 DLC，未来的更新将包括新的"大型事件". 虽然很难实现你想要的"肉鸽类爬塔元素"，但我们会努力向你展示更具挑战性的任务。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198065927106', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 465, 'last_played': 1675298186}
review:
I have never posted a negative review, and don't feel great doing so. However, I feel the need to push back a bit on the nearly overwhelming support and continuous XCOM comparisons. 

For me a tactics game must be challenging first. They are essentially complicated puzzles to me, and I simply get no joy from the experience when the process doesn't challenge me. I played this game for 8 hours on hard difficulty with no experience and was not once genuinely challenged. I'm honestly amazed at the XCOM comparisons. I understand the mechanics look and behave the same way in combat, but at no point was I genuinely engaged or forced to think critically. 

There was a particular mission labeled *SUPER HARD* for my character level. Braindead. Could have beaten it totally drunk. I think I failed a mission once and it was due to a random crit one shot of an essential character, and I genuinely did not notice what consequence was associated with that failure.

I am not boasting in any way, either. I have played like ~1000 hours of the newer XCOMs and I was really excited about the discourse around this game. I spent money I probably shouldn't have, and played for a few hours after getting the feeling that it wasn't for me. It just never got better. I just want to save someone else who prioritizes difficulty in these games from following the effusive praise. 

IDK if this game is committed to an extremely long tutorial phase or what, but if you know your way around ironman XCOM this game has nothing in it that will challenge you at all in the first 8 hours. How long am I supposed to play before the supposedly otherworldly complexity is actually necessary to accomplish anything? The design seems to center on flooding every tediously long map with a ton of enemies who do no damage and die instantly, then every once in awhile when you're asleep at the wheel some leader character will one shot your anime hero and you have to restart (don't worry though, all this costs you is time!).
developer_response:
The direction we are pursuing is not a strategy game, but an turn-based RPG game. Therefore, there would have been a lot of disappointment if you looked at the strategic elements of XCOM based on hard penalty system about failure(such as ironman)and played our game.

Anyway, if you want to increase the difficulty level in our games, there are various difficulty options and additional difficulty options. So if you turn them all on, you can proceed to the difficult mode than now. However, once people have a negative feeling about game, it is difficult to change player's mind even if there are already other improvement contents.

There are so many players like you who have played reboot XCOM for hundreds or thousands of hours in our game players. Most of them review positively. :D They're having fun, so maybe if you enjoy it until the end, the ever-changing growth and playability will entertain you.

Since our games are based on nearly 100 hours of RPG games, it would be natural to feel loose than short strategic game tempo such as XCOM, where all the ending in 30 hours is shown. For XCOM, 10 hours is the middle of the game, but our game is just the beginning.

It's just a taste. So if you want to play for a long time, if you want to follow one story for a long time and experience the different builds and strategies that XCOM doesn't offer, we strongly  recommend you if you have about 100 hours to spare.

And we're sorry that we couldn't attract you to your play-time due to our lack of competence.

Have a great day!

author: {'steamid': '76561197968011575', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 969, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 785, 'last_played': 1675645793}

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984156162', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 195, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1675196133}
review:
No. This one didn't get with me. It was overclitched, bland and I didn't get into the atmosphere of it at all. I like a lot of T-RPGS and games like XCom but this one didn't interest me. I played the tutorial and first two missions and was kind of under-awed by it. It think there are lot of hyper-inflated hype reviews on this game.

I didn't like the story or the characters (maybe it's aimed at a younger demographic like teen or something?) and the art-style I didn't like. It's possible it improves at lot after the first hour of play, but I'm not willing to risk the refund window on this one.

Even at 50% discount, I'm going to refund this one.
developer_response:
We think it's more of a difference in taste than an exaggerated review. Most of positive review are from people who have played for a long time. :D

If our game is not your cup of tea, the refund is the best way. We always recommend refunds! :)

Refunded review don't count the overall review. So it's a great choice for developers!

Have a nice day!

author: {'steamid': '76561198258865522', 'num_games_owned': 363, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 3893, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3893, 'last_played': 1674987465}

author: {'steamid': '76561198997700011', 'num_games_owned': 49, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 5859, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4568, 'last_played': 1676021543}
review:
Good:
+ art, kudos to who makes the art
+ you can replay all missions include story mission to get achievement you miss 
+ taming beast system
+ all characters have a nice backstory
+ story is simple but the plot is interesting
+ free dlc add 2 characters as well as new story

Mixed: 
- quite a bit complicated if you play this game for first time since there a lot info that you need understand, so you need see a lot guide in community
- for offline no manual save, only checkpoint

suggestion if you want play this game: 
play in super fast mode since there a lot big maps, so you don't need a hours to finish single mission

score: 9.2
