author: {'steamid': '76561198038034482', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1931, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1931, 'last_played': 1671317273}
review:
Tactical type RPGs are my favorite genre and I just could not get into this game, really tried to but couldn't finish. I don't really understand the glowing reviews.

1- The story isn't just bad, it's painfully bad, makes no sense and manages to be neither actually funny or capable of being taken seriously
2- The dialogue is worse than the story
3- The graphics are abysmal, looks like a game that was released 15 years ago. It's not the art style, it's how boring and plain the application of it is in the 3d environment, the drawn art is fine
4- Classic example of let's add strategic depth by just throwing a million options in and explaining them poorly, that's not depth because most of it is meaningless fluff
5- Despite the needless amount of options of how to customize your characters you'll play every battle exactly the same because everyone basically does the same thing
6- Some of the most boring and uninspired attack animations I've seen
developer_response:
The development team is also very sorry that your precious time is filled with bad experiences due to the game we made. We'll think of what you've pointed out as good nutrition. And we're not going to stop developing games to produce good results on top of good nutrition.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198894933659', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 12348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10708, 'last_played': 1697566069}
review:
这款游戏从购买开始十五天，我玩了一百八十小时（真的上头）还好后来学校期末考试延期，不然我可能就要挂科了（悲）

最早接触战棋游戏，应该是三国志曹操传和各类mod，以及火焰纹章系列。
毫不夸张的说，战棋游戏是我最喜欢的一种品类的游戏。每年有空闲的时候，我都会把一些小时候通关过的战棋再次拾起来进行攻略。因为除了前些年的XCOM2，风花雪月，神界原罪2，很少有总体质量优质的战棋游戏。

21年的时候我有在商店中看过这款游戏，当时我以为只是粗制滥造的小众游戏，没有在意。今年十一月中的时候，因为战棋游戏荒。我抱着试试看的心态购买了troubleshooter。好家伙，简直一发不可收拾，刚开始看到建模的时候，我觉得不够精细，浅玩了几关，我就被这款游戏的剧情，玩法深深的吸引住了。

这款游戏的叙事方式很有意思，虽然后面很多有种为了补设定而进行插叙，但是在前期会给人很棒的观看体验（至少我本人非常喜欢）。整体剧情在围绕主角展开的同时，也对各个角色进行了很细致的描写（更像群像剧一样，每个人物都很饱满）尤其是每次结束主线关卡后，办公室的聊天。让人了解每一个人性格的同时，又为之后剧情埋下伏笔。

我对剧情感受最深的地方，莫过于乔尔警员的死，一开始玩这个游戏我是不在乎警察是否战斗不能。乔尔倒下时众人的无助，乔尔认为纷争终结者不可信任时，彷佛在控诉我也如剧中角色一样不在乎警员性命，从这之后，我每场战斗才追求无人撤退通关。

再说说玩法，十分的有新意，开辟了新的战棋分支。尤其是天赋组合，搭配起来让人欲罢不能可玩性和深度在战棋游戏中算是佼佼者。

难度方面我个人觉得困难不是太难，游戏中可以随时调节难度对新手非常的友好，还有几个可以额外增加难度的选项。可是我在快通关的时候才发现（气死我了）。难度我觉得主要就是见面杀了，第一次碰见新敌人情报不足，不知道对面的天赋，有的时候会让我走出错误的一步。哦对了，希望可以再添加一些射手街的角色任务，我还挺喜欢这些日常小剧情的，主要是能加好感嘿嘿。

人物的立绘和其中的插画非常好看，美中不足的是建模略微有点不行，我的小天使安那个脸有点大妈脸。。。。跪求制作组可以稍稍修饰一下角色的建模/(ㄒoㄒ)/~~

剧情的缺点就是铺的太大，但是因为制作组产能有限，所以很多坑还没填，希望有生之年能把剧情的坑填完。提一嘴游戏内容也是铺的太大，没填完坑，比如我到现在还没看见转职描述中的弓出现过。

全款买下的游戏，但是我觉得物超所值，虽然dlc还在更新，但我相信制作组可以把dlc做好，虽然不是今年发售的，但是这款游戏已经是我的年度最佳了。希望制作组加油！这游戏真的好玩，虽然后期刷刷刷有点枯燥，但是完全不妨碍它整体的游戏节奏，我已经安利给周围许多朋友了。

我真的都替制作组急，游戏质量很棒的同时，却没有大火。希望制作组能不忘初心，继续给我们极佳的游戏体验

PS：希望二代还是阿尔伯特和伙伴们的故事，我太喜欢他们这个团体了，哦，还有，为什么射手街安可以喝鸡尾酒？这算失误么？还是说鸡尾酒不算酒精饮品？这个是我一直有的疑惑。

再次PS：希望游戏设计师别再重视格挡了，打完主线刚进dlc真的折磨(╯▔皿▔)╯，截然不同的游戏环境，真是满满的恶意啊，看到那两个小丑胖子我现在就恶心
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

比起其他任何消息，后来学校期末考试延期真是万幸。 如果我们妨碍了你的学业，即使游戏获得了好评，我们也不会感到舒服。:D

你提到的游戏(三国志曹操传，火焰纹章，XCOM2，风花雪月，神界原罪2) 是开发组开发这个游戏时，开发组内真的经常提到的游戏。 如果分争调整者让你想起那些游戏，那对开发组来说也是荣幸，但担心分争调整者会抹黑那些游戏的名声。我们只是想在前辈游戏们打好的道路上开辟一条新的道路。 我不认为我们能超越这些游戏。

" 当时我以为只是粗制滥造的小众游戏 "

你对分争调整者的第一感觉绝对不会错。 游戏的外表并不能说好。我们承认这是我们明确的界限，因此决定投入更多的开发资源进行游戏的策划。 我们这样的努力好像符合你的喜好。

" 跪求制作组可以稍稍修饰一下角色的建模 "

这不是你托付的事。 这是开发组应该向你道歉和感谢的事情。 我们应该为你展示不好的建模而道歉，并感谢您忍受这一切并坚持游戏。从某个瞬间开始，我们的建模水平不会突然提高。 但是，在今后的游戏开发中，展示比现在更好的建模的目标将比其他开发更重要。建模是我们今后要制作的所有游戏的基础。 新的游戏中，现在出现的人物会直接或间接出现。 到时候我们会尽最大努力让你感受到我们进步的建模。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198099500180', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 5219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5219, 'last_played': 1671263214}
review: 希望能尽快把主线做完，卡特最后到底咋样了，莱顿怎么说，吉赛尔要逮捕啥······感觉主线挖的坑太多了，不填完都不想玩新角色的dlc，有点戛然而止的感觉。游戏天赋设计特别棒，重点表扬；人物塑造得比较好，但是就是没什么重大的冲突和进展；一些建议：防守战太少了，总是去进攻，很疲惫，对队形得要求也不高；以及缺乏比较坚挺得boss，还没玩几下就无敌了，辛苦养成的角色基本不吃鳖，有点可惜，没啥成就感。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我很清楚游戏的故事中还有很多地方没有解释清楚。 这些故事将通过今后的更新或另一部DLC或下一部作品讲述。 【分争调整者】是我们未来要制作的所有游戏的基础。 我们要制作的任何游戏都会包括【分争调整者】中未完成的故事。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198013355274', 'num_games_owned': 311, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 9293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3313, 'last_played': 1672459588}
review:
好！（一个字就够了）。
玩到目前感觉美中不足的就是网上资料不全啊，是不是后续更新了很多天赋组合，网上都查不到，一个一个试又太麻烦，有时候就差一个激活组合死活找不到真的要发疯啊啊啊啊。

author: {'steamid': '76561198101658520', 'num_games_owned': 68, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 802, 'last_played': 1688416727}
review: 刚玩游戏不错  不过无法自主存盘让人很不爽
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

正如你所说，游戏中不存在自主存盘功能。 这是我们在游戏中引入在线功能而产生的缺点。 我们引入了【检查点】功能作为替代方案，并支持通过调整【检查点】运行的间隔来使其与自主存盘相似。

在游戏的【环境设置】中选择【游戏进行】后，在详细菜单中寻找自动检查点。 然后请更改E的值。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198015336720', 'num_games_owned': 822, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 6737, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6576, 'last_played': 1692486278}
review:
so been playing base game offline, then replay online and then paid the DLC (support the dev)

the base game has so much content and alot of layers of game and system on top of it, value purchase for those who love this tactical rpg game genre. 

very recommend, if you like anime(korean manhwa style) xcom with deep skill customization and multiple layers of gameplay system (e.g. crafting, beast taming/building a machine , class and skill set customization and etc etc).

plot wise is more gangster/triad story and some character development stories of your troubleshooter company.

and of course there is Luna.
developer_response:
You've experienced everything about Troubleshooter and also supported the development team. You have also moved the development team forward again with a good review.

We will repay you for all these good things that we have received from you through future updates. If you update like that, I believe that one day I will tell you about Luna. :D

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198299403424', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1821, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1821, 'last_played': 1669461950}
review: 游戏感觉没啥大问题，也挺良心的。但是感觉制作组是不是缺少编剧这个职位，感觉剧情过于平淡或者是缺乏冲突，整体玩下来感觉战斗还行，天赋养成也很棒，但是剧情淡得如白开水一般，人物形象基本也没啥让记忆的点，最后玩下去就变成重复的战斗了。目前看来，剧情已经不可能有大面积的改动了，看在制作组诚意的份上还是给个好评吧，这故事的确让没有看下去的动力了。不过话说你们韩剧不是挺能编的么，怎么你们不能把故事写得精彩一点，反正你这个也是图画剧情，也没配音，感觉花不了太多成本吧，希望制作组能够看到。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

因为我们的能力不足，所以给韩剧留下了不好的印象，我们也没有脸面。我们是6个人组成的小独立游戏开发组。 团队中没有像韩剧一样长期专门写故事的作家。 因此，我们的故事无法跟上韩剧的水平。 但是，即使故事的传达能力有所不足，我们也会继续努力通过游戏要素挽回这个缺点。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198067526803', 'num_games_owned': 82, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 13004, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 11769, 'last_played': 1712151618}
review: 这些年最喜欢的战棋之一，只能说，游戏的可玩性是远远大于其知名度的，我也是在一个很小的视频UP主处得到的游戏信息，玩了200小时后仍有兴趣（虽然大神们都说，玩这游戏要500小时起步），期待开发组的后续更新，也期待更多玩家来支持。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我们仍然认为阿尔伯斯和瓦尔哈拉的世界会比现在更广阔。 而且正在通过更新逐渐实现。 我期待着这段旅程与你同在。 我相信，这样周围喜欢【分争调整者】的人就会更多。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198027467125', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 3728, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 401, 'last_played': 1675530066}
review:
遊戲節奏有點慢, 開始遊戲及進入各項劇情的讀取時間都非常長.
連關遊戲也要等非常長時間.

伙伴加入時間也太慢, 沒有大量時間的人不宜入手.

主線故事非常平淡, 沒有投入感, 也沒什麼追看性.
反派就是舊動畫那些邪惡組織, 不管什麼就是要搞亂世界.
主角則是典型的老好人角色, 非常沈悶.
developer_response:
( 這篇文章是在翻譯機的幫助下寫成的。)

您寶貴的時間似乎留下了不好的經驗,我們也很心痛。遊戲的類型特點確實導致遊戲進度慢。我們也非常清楚這一點，為了克服這些，正在增加各種裝置。最具代表性的就是【快進隊友行動】和【快進隊友外的行動】。使用這個可以極端地提高戰鬥速度。請利用這個快速完成【劇情任務】。你的同事會越來越多，遊戲會進行得更快。

感謝您的評論。

謝謝。

author: {'steamid': '76561198326777796', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 20441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 630, 'last_played': 1700075635}
review:
+

Edit after dev response. Thank you for the hints! I am veteran of xcom2 so I am enjoying the game on hard difficulty.
The game is amazing, I like the story despite typically I am interested in combat only.
developer_response:
More stories and more colleagues are waiting for you. 

I recommend that you complete all the scenario missions at a low level of difficulty first. Then you can recruit more colleagues and use more diverse masteries to change your character powerfully. 

You can try again at any time after completing any kind of mission in the game. In this process, you can change the difficulty of the mission or select more people to participate in the mission. Therefore, it is not necessary to complete violent cases or normal cases from the beginning.

Enjoy the story first. Then use your strategy on the battlefield to your heart's content.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198828701970', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2189, 'last_played': 1704712030}
review:
This is my first review, I usually don't leave review and purchase single player game, but I really want to show my support to Dandylion for making such a great game and appreciate their dedication. Troubleshooter is probably one of the best SRPG, if not the best with such extensive system and mechanics which complements the game so well. 

Most important of all, I am totally captivated by the story, and how each one of them (the characters) plays a role in this massive plot. Albus and his companions have souls in them. Although I do see how other players mentioned certain flaws to improve on, but I know the developers have the our best interest in heart. I am willing to wait and see how the complex story unfold. :D

P.S. If there's one thing I want to rant, why is Albus' company remains in Iron? They should get proper recognition by now XD
developer_response:
Just by purchasing Troubleshooter, it's like you've already fully supported by the development team. Nevertheless, I sincerely thank the development team for allowing us to move forward once again with such a good evaluation.

We still think that the world view of Albus and Valhalla could expand further in the future. If so, I believe that one day, their activity areas could go beyond Iron and become East Alliance, Ater, and Karas.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198357559633', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 11002, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10974, 'last_played': 1678889843}
review: 是我最喜欢的战棋游戏之一，真的非常有趣，很多部分有一些肝，不过这个不是问题。无论是角色塑造还是故事图片讲的很好，加油

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198176920409', 'num_games_owned': 503, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 396, 'last_played': 1688258722}
review: 是个好游戏，玩得停不下来，但是问题在于，机翻太影响看剧情了！能不能精修一下啊！
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

很抱歉给您看了不好的翻译质量。 我们不是用机器翻译的。 只是因为我们是小独立游戏开发组，所以我们赚了一个月,生活在下个月。 虽然想委托著名的翻译家翻译，但如果这样就无法维持开发组。

但是值得感谢的是，有几个中国游戏玩家正在修改我们的翻译，我们正在努力尽快将其应用到游戏中。 虽然这是一项耗时的工作，但只要我们继续更新游戏，翻译也会得到改善。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

A is a game that we also enjoyed playing. We learned from the game how to transform existing resources and how to use them to provide a new way of playing games. We will continue to develop games that meet these expectations.

author: {'steamid': '76561198847053629', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 8243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6837, 'last_played': 1686706037}
review:
가성비 최고의 게임입니다.

스토리 라인을 정성스럽게 잘 구성한 노력이 느껴집니다.

잘 짜여진 스토리 보면서 천천히 즐길수 있는 명작입니다. 

특정 특성에 집착해서 노가다 하지 않아도 좋은 특성조합들로
충분히 즐길수 있어서 재밌게 하고 있습니다.

마지막으로 운영자 분들이 패치도 자주하고 열심히 관리하려는 모습이 보여서 
더욱 애정이 가는 게임이네요. ^^
developer_response:
평가에서 좋은 요소라고 언급한 부분들이 사실 처음부터 그랬던 것은 아닙니다. 이로 인해 많은 부정적인 평가를 받았고, 우리는 우리의 방식을 유지하면서 최대한 단점을 개선하려고 노력했습니다. 이런 노력들이 조금씩 효과를 보이고 있는것 같아서 정말 기쁘게 생각합니다. 또한 저희가 옳은 방향으로 가고 있다는 것을 알려주신 것에 대해서도 감사의 말씀 드립니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060840645', 'num_games_owned': 342, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 4793, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4753, 'last_played': 1704898188}
review:
游戏的剧情和人物刻画的非常好，游戏没有纯粹意义上的坏人，反派的形象也刻画的很生动，不是单纯的脸谱。
天赋系统+职业的搭配是游戏的核心玩法，熟悉XCOM的玩家会很快上手，入手简单精通难，而且非常肝。
游戏经常打折，持续更新，很良心，喜欢XCOM类游戏的玩家100%推荐。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我们在游戏中最看重的是故事和角色的成长。 而且想在XCOM得到验证的战斗系统中添加我们的要素，用游戏表现出来。 我们这样的尝试您喜欢，开发组真的很高兴。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198093549292', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2005, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1701, 'last_played': 1676420815}
review: 모델링 그래픽과 초반 좆소시절만 잘 넘기면 srpg좋아하는사람은 정말 좋아할듯
developer_response:
말씀하신 두가지 사항은 우리가 후속작을 만든다면 모든 개발자의 모니터에 붙여놔야 할, 반드시 개선해야 할 사항임에 틀림없습니다. 그럼에도 불구하고 저희가 계속 앞으로 나아갈 수 있도록 좋은 평가를 주셔서 감사합니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198834443825', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 13570, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 930, 'last_played': 1674573049}
review: 这游戏有点难度，装备系统和天赋系统太繁琐了，单机游戏为什么要这样重复刷，很难吸引新人花大把时间玩下去，而且更新太慢。还有地图为什么要设计人物会挡住路？剧情为什么老用倒叙，偶尔用下效果不错，但总是用显得编剧能力低下！
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

任何游戏都不允许随意操作数据。 我不知道你说的 "修改" 具体是什么样的。 只是开发组也充分认同你的心意，所以我们准备了可以在游戏中使用的 "离线专用秘籍"。 请在游戏的 "帮助" 中搜索 "离线专用秘籍"。 它对你以你想要的方式进行游戏有很大的帮助。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198124410464', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 2378, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 454, 'last_played': 1698166631}
review: Best tactical game!
developer_response:
More stories and more colleagues are waiting for you. 

I recommend that you complete all the scenario missions at a low level of difficulty first. Then you can recruit more colleagues and use more diverse masteries to change your character powerfully. 

You can try again at any time after completing any kind of mission in the game. In this process, you can change the difficulty of the mission or select more people to participate in the mission. Therefore, it is not necessary to complete violent cases or normal cases from the beginning.

Enjoy the story first. Then use your strategy on the battlefield to your heart's content.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198440385448', 'num_games_owned': 130, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 6041, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3574, 'last_played': 1671194799}
review:
我从来没有见过那么牛逼的制作组，我游戏出现了问题，在评论区半小时给了我回复，然后马上解决了问题，发了公告修复，我的天，我吹爆，哪里还能找到这样的游戏？更何况这是一个2020年出的老游戏了，太良心了，国内的制作人真的好好学习一下，这就是差距。你们后续出什么游戏我都一定购买！原价！

我应该已经发送log文件了，我搜索了很多都没找到解决方法，拜托你们了，非常感谢。太可惜了，这么好的游戏讲道理应该大火才对，希望你们可以继续加油，我相信你们可以大获成功！

救救我 救救我 我进游戏 点继续游戏 进到酒吧界面就卡住了 然后闪退，steam检测游戏完整性试过了，没有用，怎么办，救救我，我还要肝呢
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

目前我们很难准确掌握你的问题。 请遵循以下步骤。

首先，请完全退出Steam后重新开始。 然后请确认游戏是否开始更新。 

如果游戏没有更新，一直出现你所提到的问题，请向我们发送你的日志文件。

如何向开发组发送日志文件 :
1. 
您可通过游戏中的选项轻松将您的log文件发送给我们。

实行游戏 → 环境设置 → 错误报告

2.
您也可以手动发送日志文件。

1. 重启电脑并启动 Steam
2. 在游戏的库页面中，选择[管理] > [属性]。
3. 选择[本地文件]选项卡，点击[ 浏览本地文件 ]按钮。
4. 打开文件夹时，请移动到 Release > bin后运行logTransport.exe。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198022974432', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 20053, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11816, 'last_played': 1671752007}
review:
[h1] This game is wonderful [/h1] 

At the time of review, the game is showing overwhelmingly positive for recent reviews and absolutely deserves it. Before you buy, here are some things for you to consider:


[b] These Devs are clearly passionate [/b] 

They're still adding content to the game nearly 3 years later! The paid cosmetic DLC is there, but the first major update "White Lion and Black Witch" was free. I'm actually glad they charged some money for the 2nd one ("Crimson Crow"), and bought that the first sale I saw.


[b] The redhead girl is not the main character [/b] 

This one for me was not a deal breaker, just a little weird. The red head with the panda shirt, Irene. You know, the literal cover girl for the game? The one on every piece of art work you'd have seen? The self proclaimed "hero"? Yeah, not the main character. Not even the first character to recruit to your team. The main character is mild mannered and polite Albus - reminiscent of your standard fair protagonist from a slice of life Anime rather than a brutal crime fighting turn based tactical JRPG. 


[b] There is grinding [/b] 

Not a deal breaker for me, I enjoy playing the game and repeatable missions. Grinding isn't even required to complete the story of the game if you really don't want to do it. However, if you want access to all customisation options in the game and to make your characters as powerful as possible, you will be grinding.


[b] There are a LOT of systems in play [/b] 

It was honestly almost a little overwhelming just how many systems are in play here. To name a few, there's an item crafting system, a skill/talent customisation system "masteries", drone crafting and mastery system, beast capturing and masteries for them too. Just the mastery system for just human playable characters alone is a massive undertaking to understand as a new player. While there may not be many in game resources to help you understand it, the game does a good job of introducing these elements to you slowly. You have plenty of room as you are learning to try things and see what works. There are some great guides here on steam to help you if you need them.


[b] There is a LOT to do in this game [/b] 

As mentioned above with multiple systems at play, that means there is a lot to do in this game. You will get incredible value out of this game if you do a price versus hours played comparison. 


[b] No English VA [/b] 

For many of you this is either a non-issue or even a plus. But do note that the voice acting is entirely Korean with English subtitles. This can also make some minor story elements a little confusing or leave you wondering. The translation is pretty good, but not perfect. They seem to have translated all the words and sentances but context and social norms are obviously going to be very different for Western audiences.

[b] Final Thoughts [/b] 

This game is easily one of my favourites and easy to recommend. Worth it at full price, an absolute steal on any sort of a sale.
developer_response:
" The redhead girl is not the main character "

That's right. At first, we also used images of Albus. But unexpectedly, people loved Irene's first impression (four villains). I've been using the image since then. The main character of the game is still Albus. Although his presence is a little lacking, there will be more stories to make up for this in the future.

" There is grinding "

When we first developed Troubleshooter, we tried to turn it into a turn-based game. But we wanted to enrich the story of the character and the game rather than the battle. And we've started to introduce elements of RPG, and as a result, we're making this game into SRPG. In this process, the grinding was introduced and we knew that it would be very boring for someone. So we're going to leave this as optional as possible. If you want to enjoy the story of the game, you don't need it. But for someone, it could be a tool to satisfy their desire to dominate the battlefield.

" There are a LOT of systems in play "

We will continue to expand Valhalla's world further through our next work or another DLC (still undecided). This game is the cornerstone of everything we're going to make. Therefore, we want to show as many things as possible through this game. And I think that as these things get better and more changed, we will establish our identity.

" No English VA "

We can put up a blueprint for many of the things we're going to make in the future and promise gamers, but we don't dare say a few things. One of them is this. We are a small independent game development team of six people and individual people are specialized in game development technology, but there are no humanities and foreign language experts on the team. And we can't afford to hire these professional people. Therefore, the work related to this is left to the outside team thoroughly, and it is difficult to judge the good or bad results of this. If our team becomes famous, the publisher will take care of it. Unfortunately, however, there are no publishers who are interested in us yet.

" These Devs are clearly passionate "

This is the driving force behind us to update the game so far. It's really helpful for the development team that you look at our little effort in a good way.

Thank you for this review.

review:
2022-12-7
除了建模粗糙了点，其他都挺好，最重要的是，能感觉到制作组的诚意，支持！

2023-9-2
80小时后的游戏时长后，我终于通关了，真是一款好游戏。今天再次查看商店页面时，发现制作组把本作称为“第一章”。看到这个词我真是非常兴奋呀，这么说是会有续作吗！出了必买。

developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

" 建模粗糙了点 "

我们对此真的苦恼了很多。 我们是一个由6个人组成的小独立游戏开发组。 事实上,我们不可能创造出大型开发组制造的建模水平。 那么我认为剩下的方法只能是展现我们独特的风格。 我们不会停止对此的研究。

author: {'steamid': '76561198862806548', 'num_games_owned': 70, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 17775, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5183, 'last_played': 1688689483}
review:
这游戏的优点太多了，新意和特色极多，建议入手。但我只想聊聊把我80多小时的玩家劝退的缺点。
首先是极其复杂的装备制造系统。打造一件后期装备需要4种材料，每种基础材料有4到5个等级，每个等级需要2种材料。就是说，打造一件后期装备最多可能要跳40个合成界面，还要再算上花时间满地图跑记材料买材料。然后第二件装备，再合成每个等级的每种材料，再跑图买材料。刷野兽掉的材料我觉得好玩而且符合逻辑，但是多个等级的元素材料真的没有必要。
浪费我合成装备的大量时间，明明可以用来打地图配天赋。为什么不能多个自动合成功能，或者干脆把每种元素材料变成只有一个等级的能量数值，简单明了。玩到最后什么都还觉得好玩，但是合成装备到烦的不想玩了。
接着第二个缺点，啊？不存在的，这游戏还能有别的缺点？
就这样，希望官方能看到吧。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

你可以留下不好的评价去玩其他游戏，但是您花费宝贵的时间告诉了开发组需要改善的地方。比起别的什么，我们更感谢你的那份心意。制作系统是游戏的重要系统之一，已经增加了很多项目，以后还会增加。 在这个过程中，我们也会考虑如何改善你所提到的问题。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

感谢您的评论。

author: {'steamid': '76561198381816175', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 36205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1214, 'last_played': 1699887148}
review:
不知道大家有没有玩过老游戏《西风狂诗曲》，玩过的话就容易明白了，同为韩国制作的战棋游戏，本作可以看做《西》的进化版，优缺点都是一并继承的。优点是人物美型（绝对是优点，但也很韩系），战棋策略性有一定挑战度（相比《SRW》那种游戏），可扩展的部分精密度高（连房租都给你算进去了，韩国打工人真的很实在）；而缺点也是《西》以来一直的感受：自虐，游戏的繁复性很高，规则很多，需要你自己去试错，而且一般不能重来，剧情展开也有种被制作人牵着鼻子走的感觉，玩了20小时+，居然女主还没加入，一直靠俩好基友推图，人设虽美，但韩式杀马特感也很足，一群看上去就很社会的大哥大姐偶尔让你用一下吊吊胃口，有些图的难度是真的很高，因为敌人的数量已经达到了当前级别不合理的程度，且你也很少有一举逆转的特技，而死亡的惩罚又往往很高，所以真的很自虐。为啥写那么多吐槽还是推荐？因为真的很喜欢有脑子的战棋游戏，如果不是这游戏唤起了我对《西风狂诗曲》的阴影，大概也写不了那么多。。

感谢开发组这么用心的留言回复，比第一次留言已经多玩了10倍的时间（216小时），越到后面还是可以感受到制作组更多的用心，比如职业、野兽天赋搭配的多样性，虽然很耗时间去摸索，但大大增强了可玩性，昨天已经购买了DLC，希望制作组继续加油，继续完善这个游戏，真的很喜欢！
多玩了200小时以后，还是有一些建议想提给制作组，第一，装备制作时，所需材料也应该增加直接点击后的检索功能，就像天赋一样，点击材料名称后可以直接进入这个材料的制作页面，而不是每次都翻动十几页的页面去搜索这个材料；第二，材料页面、可制作装备页面是否可以一定程度的简化？每次都有大海捞针的感觉，特别是后期，前期的一些装备不需要再显示，是否可以实现视觉上的优化，而不是每次都出来那么多内容。
这么用心的制作组，作为玩家非常感动，希望你们也可以感受到我们对这款游戏的喜爱，加油！
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

没想到在我们游戏的评价中看到了《西风狂诗曲》这个词。《西风狂诗曲》是在韩国谈论这种类型的游戏时经常提到的游戏之一。这意味着这款游戏是我们开发游戏时获得灵感的众多游戏之一。

" 繁复性很高，规则很多，需要你自己去试错，而且一般不能重来 "

我们在开发分争调整者的同时，开始借用RPG的元素。 因为他们认为通过这些最能体现游戏的故事和角色的成长。 但是在这个过程中，我们犯下了直接接受传统JRPG要素的错误。 游戏的类型明显不同,但只进行了最低限度的改良并原封不动地适用,这好像给了你这样的经验。

我们不会忘记并记住这些经验,一定要在今后的开发和未来的下一部作品中反映出来。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198354641500', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 1787, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 909, 'last_played': 1706971229}
review:
我没通关，以后也不一定玩，但是我仍然愿意给个好评
首先是制作组的态度真的很好，更新次数多且质量高，而且留言都有在用心回复，这点我强烈建议国内的厂商学一学，看看人家的态度，再看看看你们做的那一堆EA臭狗屎
其次是游戏的各方面，无论是人设、天赋系统以及其他的各个部分，我都能感觉到制作组确实是用心想把这个游戏做到好的
但是这个游戏仍然有一些难以接受的缺陷，站在我个人的角度上是很需要改进或者说为什么这个游戏容易劝退的部分
一是肝度真的好恐怖，继承了韩游一脉相承的特点，人物需要肝，天赋需要刷，宠物竟然也需要弄这一套，这个肝度直接把休闲玩家吓走一大批，而且似乎游戏内除了刷好像并没有其他的获得的办法或者说是我没玩到？其实天赋要是用金币抽的话我觉得应该能轻松不少
二是地图好大，但是我觉得是无意义的大，很多时候跑来跑去再加上人物动作慢等多种因素就很消磨时间，而且人数也实在是太多啦！很多敌人就是单纯的换皮，既然是换皮还不如少弄几个，看多了我都审美疲劳了
暂时能感觉到的只有这些，如果制作组想要出皮肤扩展包的话我比较建议出一些人物的泳装，泳装做的精致的话也能吸引不少人来玩这个游戏
最后，祝制作组越做越好，希望能吸取这个游戏的教训，取其精华去其糟粕后做出下一款更精美的游戏，支持你们
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

最近的游戏趋势是游戏玩家可以在短时间内尽情享受游戏的一切。 相比之下，分争调整者的发展方向相反。 游戏的乐趣需要投入不少时间,任务前后也包含一些不必要的动作。

" 肝度真的好恐怖 "

" 地图好大，但是我觉得是无意义的大 "

我认为你提到的这两个缺点也指出了Troubleshooter的这一方面。 即使坚持我们的方式,也可以根据现在的游戏制作方式灵活地开发游戏。 但是我们的游戏开发经验不足,这只能被指责为缺点。

在我们未来的发展中，我们会尽量改善这些缺点。 非常希望到时候能在游戏中再次见到你。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198067454312', 'num_games_owned': 342, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 10448, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3605, 'last_played': 1697452789}
review:
Troubleshooter is without a doubt one of the best turn-based strategy games.

It's basically nu-XCOM with 10 times the complexity and a South Korean anime-esque coat of paint. Even if you dislike anime and the people of the Republic of Korea, it's still about five times better than the modern XCOM games. There's just an incredible amount of content, customizability, strategic decision making, builds, synergies, unit compositions etc. that rival any $60 game.

Not just that. It's also a lot smoother and faster to play than XCOM2 is. After a few hours of play you'll be hitting hotkeys and processing turns at a pace XCOM wishes it had. All despite the added complexity. If anything it really highlights how incompetently XCOM2 was designed. Troubleshooter is clearly designed as a PC game with a KB+M centric UI and all the settings a PC game should have, unlike the new XCOMs which felt designed for consoles.

The cutscenes are in a VN style, and the art is great. I've heard the translation used to be rough, but the entire game has been retranslated into English and it's fine now. The writing's pretty anime, but if you don't like it you can just fast forward through all of it easily and focus on the gameplay. The game has all the "auto advance", "skip", "dialogue log" etc. features of a VN.

The game gets regular updates including balance patches almost weekly, and free new content is regularly added. A new DLC expansion was recently released and a sequel is in development, but that's only after years of free DLC. The expansion simply adds an extra chapter to those who've already finished the main campaign, so by that time you will have made up your mind on whether you want it.

You can play the game online or offline. By playing online you gain access to PvP and some small extra features, but the entire game is playable offline. An online save can be converted offline at any time, but you can't take an offline save online to prevent abuse. I played online as I have a stable connection, and have encountered no problems with it. I recommend playing on harder difficulties even on your first playthrough.
developer_response:
First of all, thank you for saying the small development team's efforts well. 

When we first released the game on early-access, the contents of the game were really lacking. For now, you may not believe it, but the five Scenario missions and characters were only Albus and Sion. We didn't have the funds to maintain the development team and released the game as collateral for the future. Nevertheless, many gamers have given a lot of support to Korea's small independent game development team, and as a result, we have continued to develop games so far.

We still think Troubleshooter can expand further in the future. And I believe that this game that we're building right now will be the basis of all of that. Through the sequel or another DLC that we're going to create, we're going to further strengthen Troubleshooter's view of the world.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073580851', 'num_games_owned': 212, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 16338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14023, 'last_played': 1707347141}
review:
Il n'est pas dans mes habitudes de rédiger des reviews Steam, mais là, il faut quand même que je vous recommande ce jeu INCROYABLEMENT sous-apprécié. Pour résumer, vous avez ici un mélange de tactical à la X-COM et de visual novel ! Désolé pour toutes les comparaisons au titre de Firaxis, TROUBLESHOOTER mérite bien mieux, mais c'est par X-COM que je suis arrivé aux tactical, et il y a la même vibe de gameplay...

Commençons quand même par les (-) :
- pour ainsi dire, [b]pas de VF[/b]. Personnellement, ça ne me dérange pas plus que ça, mais je sais que ça peut rebuter. La trad anglaise est parfois perturbante, mais reste très compréhensible et ne nous sort que rarement de l'ambiance du jeu (et quelques accidents de trad sont normaux au vu de la TRÈS grande quantité de texte narratif)
- [b]la narration est hachée[/b]. Vous savez, comme ces séries avec des flashbacks dans tous les sens, des "10 ans plus tôt" -> "il y a 3 mois" -> "deux semaines plus tard" -> "deux ans auparavant"... Encore une fois, c'est mineur par rapport aux (+) qu'on verra plus tard, mais ça rend certains passages narratifs très lourds.

Points neutres, positifs pour moi mais qui peuvent être (-) pour d'autres :
- [b]pas mal de farming[/b] quand vous commencez à arriver en mid - late game, un peu plus tôt si vous jouez en Difficile. En effet, l'essentiel de la progression de vos personnages et de la construction de vos builds est basé sur du loot / craft : vous lootez des compétences, des équipements et des consommables, et si vous n'avez pas ce qu'il vous faut, il faudra le craft. Si vous n'aimez pas cet élément de farming, vous avez déjà de belles heures de jeu devant vous en mode normal, mais si vous voulez accéder à tout le contenu, il faudra en passer par là.
- [b]esthétique anime / manhwa[/b] et partie [b]visual novel[/b] : on aime ou pas l'esthétique, vous pouvez la voir sur les screenshots, moi j'aime beaucoup ! Les phases de gameplay tactique sont séparées par une narration sur fond de jolies illustrations (visual novel, en somme) ce qui donne un rythme particulier au jeu : vous ne serez pas toujours sur la brèche comme dans un X-COM.
- à propos de chill : [b]pas de permadeath[/b], ce qui est lié au fait que les personnages ont une histoire construite, la permadeath rendrait le jeu impossible (et il n'a pas besoin de ça pour être difficile !). Gros point positif pour moi, mais je sais que certains peuvent avoir besoin du shot d'adrénaline du risque de perdre ses personnages.

Les NOMBREUX (+) maintenant :
- un [b]système de progression très complet et varié[/b] : les consommables et équipements sont variés. Vous avez plusieurs centaines de compétences, qui se débloquent au fur et à mesure puisque vous les lootez sur les ennemis. Vous progressez au même rythme que les ennemis puisque vous pouvez loot leurs compétences et équipements... Cet ennemi est trop fort et vous avez galéré à le tuer? Vous pouvez aller voir dans la base de données quel est son build, le copier entièrement ou en partie, vous inspirer de ses synergies pour construire un nouveau build... Juste trop agréable !
Ah, et je vous parlais tout-à-l'heure de farming qui peut être lourd pour certains : la variété des gameplays d'un personnage à l'autre ET pour un même personnage compense largement ce problème.
- un [b]bon équilibre entre liberté de build et guidage du joueur[/b] : d'un côté, le nombre de masteries (les compétences) donne une grande liberté, presque vertigineuse ; de l'autre, le système de mastery sets nous aiguille vers certaines synergies particulières en fonction du personnage et de sa classe.
- [b]une histoire bien ficelée[/b] : malgré mon (-) de tout-à-l'heure, l'histoire est vraiment incroyable. Pas de manichéisme ici, on joue (presque) tous les points de vue. Une dystopie pas si dystopique que ça, les sujets sont traités de manière mature.
- [b]des personnages attachants[/b] : les personnages que vous verrez, amis ou ennemis, ont un caractère / des objectifs bien définis, leurs émotions sont très bien rendues par les illustrations, on se prend très facilement à réagir aux dialogues !
- [b]les animations en jeu[/b] : coups d'épée ou de marteau, combos de coups de pied, sorts de foudre, de glace ou de feu... Toutes les animations rendent bien et participent à l'immersion dans ce magnifique jeu.
Les types d'ennemis sont encore pus variés que les personnages qu'on joue. Certes, certaines illus sont réutilisées en changeant des couleurs entre différents ennemis de même type, mais je n'arrive pas à leur en vouloir : je sais que c'est parce que l'équipe de dev est réduite, et le boulot est tellement monstrueux sur le nombre d'ennemis que je ne peux pas mettre de (-)
- [b]l'OST[/b] : des musiques variées, très agréables, qui vont bien avec le mood du jeu. Tellement quali que c'est la première OST que j'ai achetée sur Steam
- [b]LE PRIX[/b] : vraiment, 23 balles pour un tel contenu, c'est donné.
- [b]des devs TRÈS présents[/b] : mises à jour à peu près hebdomadaires d'équilibrage et de bug fix (la 116ème vient de sortir !!!), deux DLC (dont un gratuit !) ajoutant beaucoup de contenu... Les devs sont tellement présents que j'ai reformulé ma review car je suis certain que quelqu'un de l'équipe de dev va venir y répondre en la passant à Google Trad :D (coucou, devs !)


TL,DR : si comme moi, les tactical comme X-COM vous ont laissé un goût amer de manque de côté RPG, que vous aimez l'esthétique, le farming et le visual novel : foncez, vous allez passer d'incroyables moments ! Merci Dandylion !
developer_response:
Above all, thank you for writing a detailed review of the game. However, since I don't know French at all, I used Google Translator. But there were still many sentences that I couldn't understand. This is my obvious limitation, so I ask for your understanding.

* I'm sorry but I don't know what's the VF

" et quelques accidents de trad sont normaux au vu de la TRÈS grande quantité de texte narratif " 

This is a particularly important issue in games where the story is an important factor. Therefore, despite the many other advantages, we received bad reviews for this. Thank you for your generosity in this matter. Improvements to translation will continue as long as we maintain game updates.

" la narration est hachée. "

This is another example of our lack of game development experience. This is often used in movies and dramas. We also borrowed that method, but we couldn't improve it to match the genre of the game, so I think you felt that way. We will continue to study ways to deliver the narrative of the game in a more effective and fun way.

" En effet, l'essentiel de la progression de vos personnages et de la construction de vos builds est basé sur du loot / craft "

This is always a sensitive issue. We had to satisfy both users who wanted to enjoy the story of the game and users who wanted more challenging difficulty. You've already surpassed the former level and now you seem to be in the latter position. And you now know how to make a character powerful and you want to dominate the battlefield based on it. For those gamers, this is true. But we want to make this even more selective. Basically, we will organize the game so that everyone can enjoy the story of the game and optionally enjoy the growth of characters and the collection of items.

" à propos de chill "

As you mentioned, the story of the game is led by each character. Like XCOM, we are not a single group, but the story and relationship of individual characters are very important. Therefore, it will be difficult for us to introduce perma-death into the game in the future.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107053461', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 9372, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8769, 'last_played': 1677503688}
review: Turn based strategy game that works great with a coup of coffee and your preferred Spotify playlist. Maps and AI are both very good. Recommending playing this game with allays challenging mode option enabled
developer_response:
For gamers who are new to Turn-bsed game, I recommend that you complete Scenatio Missions quickly at a low level of difficulty. author: {'steamid': '76561198091113232', 'num_games_owned': 218, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 18454, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12422, 'last_played': 1697910700}
review:
Been knowing this title for years but at first i think this was another cheapshot copycat of XCOM so i skipped this. Then one day, just desperately looking for some Tatical RPG i was willing to try this out after considered some reviews then oh boy i was hooked in fast and deep.

About the positives, its the world setting, the characters, the deep combat system, crafting, you can even catch and train beasts like pokemon or build a drone army,... many reviews already point these out.

Regarding what i don't like much or i think could use some improve, mostly just nitpicking:

- Story telling in some chapter: i already knew what happened there is no need to show the whole past sequences time and time again kinda kill the mood and feel drag out, like the alley sequence i watched that like 4 or 5 times spanning across chapters, it was unnecessary if you gonna link to that part just briefly mention it no need to show the sequence again. Though it is better in the latter part and DLC, there are far less rewatching past sequences.

- The artworks use for portrait the story are inconsistent (not include Ramjist's paintings), some are beautifully detailed drawn but some are kinda rush lack of detail with many stick figure like in the back ground, Ex: the artwork portray the shopping street are detailed draw even with many background characters then come artworks draw stick figures for background characters, i even saw a cross shape in the faces. Most people will have no problem with this but for me it ruin the feel here cause you guys are telling stories, show the world setting through artwork. Hope you will consider updating the artworks to their best possible quality. 

- Crimson Crow DLC: read through the dlc description page but there are no mention of the few weeks episode release, so i wasn't aware of this and was expecting a full content when buying. Should be more clear in the description store page, have a estimated date of next episode release (i cant find it in the discussion threads) because this is a charged content.

- The dialogues skipping: it was fine for short line conversation but for a long multiple line it feel too fast i have to bring up the log to re read frequently, i already adjust to slow speed. When manually skip sometimes it skip two dialogues at once make me missing lines, i don't know its the game problem or due to server lag.

- Lack of hard support character, only one in your party with heal, clear debuff, buff shield. Others are just half heal half damage with utilities, no shield buff or clear debuff (well u can count ninja misty as a debuff clearer but her play style do not keep her near the party to buff in time). Especially in the late game where enemies have multiple debuff and very large battles it is hard to have just one hard support running around. Could use some more support characters here, there is a superstar/dancer class in the game so maybe a club dancer or a karaoke singer doing buff dance/sing next pls :) a spear character who can default attack 2 or 3 tiles away would be cool too :)

- Show the enemies type we are gonna face in the mission control panel to adjust character skill/class properly, like it is pointless & waste of resource when using hacker in the map with just human/beast no robot. I don't know until i played it once, could be helpful if i know beforehand which enemies type in this particular map.

- Translation seem unfinished, some dialogues are awkward, some skill/mastery description are hard to understand the actual mean of use and there are masteries still have korean text in it. 

Still this is definitely one of the best Tactical RPG game i have ever play. I like the large battle this game offer, why u have to choose which one in your party when you can play them all right, pretty epic, oh yeah and beside that i also have my pokemons and drone minions to ride along with. I am looking forward to more story DLC content or Troubleshooter 2.
developer_response:
" at first i think this was another cheapshot copycat of XCOM "

I fully understand you. From the time we decided to borrow from XCOM a combat system that was verified by many people, we thought we could not be free from this view.

" it was unnecessary if you gonna link to that part just briefly mention it no need to show the sequence again. "

We think of the story of the game as the most important thing. We're trying to show as much as possible in the form of a visual novel, and it seems that some of the stories are overstated. This is caused by our lack of experience in game development. We will continue to think about effective ways to deliver stories.

" some are kinda rush lack of detail with many stick figure like in the back ground "

I'm sorry but would you please describe the meaning of 'stick figure' and 'cross shape'? I'm not good at English(I'm Korean.) and I think these are pointing out some bad thing but I can't figure out what they exactly are.

" i wasn't aware of this and was expecting a full content when buying. Should be more clear in the description store page "

I'm sorry to confuse you. We also wanted to make an accurate update schedule and provide it as a table. However, we learned from the last three years' updates that development is bound to have many variables and that these variables often change the update schedule. I thought it would be better to share development schedules through announcements more often so that users don't wait long than meaningless schedules.

" Lack of hard support character "

It's very important how many attacks you can carry out in your order in this battle. This was our intention to make the battle go faster. This has led to a situation in which support units are significantly less utilized than attack units. However, we will introduce more diverse ways of fighting than now, and there is a possibility that the existing character will become a heart support character in accordance with this change of situation.

" there are masteries still have korean text in it "

This is a bug. Please let me know. I'll fix it as soon as possible.

Thank you for this review.

review: 我想问一下这游戏怎么把装备安上。。我都打了好几场战斗了。按提示按右键把装备卸下去了 然后安不上新的。。而且仓库是解锁了但是没办法放东西。。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

仓库继续完成剧情任务就可以使用了。 首先，完成 '113号外围道路' 后，沙佛莱宁可以与商人进行货物交易，因此可以出售不需要的货物。这样背包有剩余空间的话，可以正常佩戴单品。设备在沙佛莱宁中从"员工情报"（快捷键:R）中选择角色，然后在右侧的"装备"栏中选择要安装的设备部位，显示"物品列表"。 在那里确认要安装的设备等级，可使用的角色等后，用鼠标左键点击即可安装。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198004787004', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 3421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3421, 'last_played': 1667645747}
review:
나는 오늘도..특성을 위해 악당놈들을 
패고 패고 또 패고 노력했다...하지만 
확률적으로 너무 안나와서 포기 할때가
너무 많다... 하지만 게임성 자체는 
엑스컴을 해봤다면 쉽게 다가 올것이며
여러 특성으로 자신만에 캐릭터를 만들어
원하는 포지션을 만들어 싸울수 있어서
좋은 게임
developer_response: 평가에서 어느 부분에 대해서 힘이 들었고 어느 부분에서 즐거움을 느끼셨는지 잘 알 수 있었습니다. 특성의 게임 핵심 시스템이고 이것의 활용 여부가 게임에 대한 경험을 결정한다고 생각합니다. 그렇기 때문에 저희도 특성에 대한 접근성을 지속적으로 낮추기 위해 노력하고 있습니다. 이 노력을 더욱 세심하게 할 수 있도록 저희의 업데이트 방향을 다시 한번 검토해보겠습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198159959074', 'num_games_owned': 280, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 14549, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11157, 'last_played': 1701988969}
review:
[h1][b]This game is incredible. Like, genuinely a piece of art.[/b][/h1]
Even with the huge amount of positive reviews, I was sceptical heading into this. I’ve never been big on XCom (I start to get burnt out roughly 50% of the way into the campaigns and just end up rushing to the finish) and being made by a small team made me hesitant. But since pretty much every single review of this game I read said it was one of their favourite games, I ended up giving it a go. And now it’s one of my favourite games as well.

While it may seem like just an anime XCom clone, and the tactical gameplay is similar, [b]it’s so much more than that. [/b]

There are so many systems and mechanics at play that spice up the tactical gameplay without ever getting overwhelming. There are RPG mechanics like skills, gear, classes; there are custom pet and robot companions, team relationships, crafting and gear upgrading, side quests, massive storylines and just so, so much more. I genuinely have no idea how a team this small managed to create something so complex. Even just the skill system (called masteries) can completely change how the same character plays and feels. The gameplay is really fun, especially if you figure out a really good build, and you can also endlessly replay every single mission and side quest, so you can try all these different combinations out without fear of wasting your points or missing out on something.

The world the game is set in is also just so fascinating and in depth. It not only shows us the world of the heroes, but also that of the baddies and what lead them down that line. Not every villain was born a monster, and this game shows that off very well. There’s a lot of nuance to most characters – even if they start out kind of one-note, through the game you learn more about them, what drives them, what made them change etc. And that even goes for the monster-type enemies you face!

I would also like to compliment the art. The game honestly feels like a visual novel at times, with how much dialogue and backstory there is, and the background art lives up to that notion as well, being genuinely pretty to look at.

Now there is one thing that gets mentioned a lot and that’s the translation. This game was made by a Korean team, and you can feel it in the English. There’s often not anything specifically wrong with the language used, but it just feels off and non-native. I personally thought it kind of added to the charm of the game, but it can make some mechanics and story notes very hard to understand. Also, this is something that is always being improved, the devs are very willing to listen to any language suggestions, and  I've personally had a fix get implemented (there are even special developer-made Steam threads for this purpose).

Besides the translations and one or two really frustrating missions (like the one where you start with Leton and Carter or the one with Alisa and Bianca vs 50 enemies), I really can’t fault this game for much. I guess the 3d models could be a bit more detailed (going from the detailed art to the models in-game can be a bit jarring at times), but even that doesn’t really matter. I’m really, really looking forward to the coming DLC and Season 2 or whatever these devs have got in store in the future, because this game is a masterpiece.
developer_response:
We are so happy to hear that our game is one of your favourite games as well. Furthermore, we are grateful to the players who have written many positive reviews. Thanks to their review, we have the honor to read your review and reply to you. And another player will find our game after seeing your review in the near future. Therefore, sincerely, thank you again for writing this detailed review.

As we are small team, there must have been a lot of shortcomings, but we are truly happy that you like our game mechanism, world, and art style.

The translation is our most painful point. Due to many texts, honestly development is underway without much cost related to translation. This is entirely our fault. We'll do our best to improve this translation quality when we have extra funds to maintain development power.

And we'll also do our best to bring you more pleasure to the next season as well as the DLC content we are currently producing.

Thank you!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198153587796', 'num_games_owned': 348, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 10740, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6756, 'last_played': 1689521285}
review:
游戏很早买的，但当时提不起兴致来玩。前几周偶然看到游戏更新后重新捡起来玩，结果意外的着迷，自己琢磨天赋搭配是真的蛮有意思，制作组一直保持更新也让我感到蛮意外的，不过还是有几点我个人认为可以改进。
1.在线模式里的那个持续3小时的经验天赋加成时常让我有一种赶时间刷任务的焦虑感，出现了这个加成后我往往会慢慢失去调整天赋和装备的耐心，总让我觉得在加成时间里不去刷本就亏了。有这个奖励固然能激起我刷本的欲望，但是浪费这个时间而去调整天赋终究会让我感觉不太舒服，尽管这个加成可能并没有那么重要，却会让我心里有个疙瘩。
2.很多人都在提的事，如果有日语配音的话我就觉得这游戏非常不错了，不过看了看其他评论，可能制作组确实在添加新语言配音上有自己的难处，不强求了。
3.很喜欢吉赛尔，速速给我出吉赛尔的新衣服。
developer_response:
我知道购买后过一段时间再玩是多么困难的事情。尽管如此，还是再次感谢大家对我们的游戏感兴趣。

1. 经验值奖金期间发生后,为了不留下遗憾,我们会考虑维持的方法。
2. 以后资金充裕的时候,一定不会忘记,会考虑日语配音的。
3. "吉赛尔"新衣服的新衣服将于明年1月更新。我会尽量缩短那个时间。

虽然我们的力量很不足，但是绝对不会放弃，会尽最大努力给大家带来更多的快乐！

祝你度过幸福的一周！

author: {'steamid': '76561197989882902', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3981, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 844, 'last_played': 1672179394}
review:
Un très bon jeu dans le style des  X-Com mais en plus poussé et dans un univers original. Le scénario est plaisant et l'évolution des personnages de l'équipe est intéressante (en particulier le système de classes, le crafting et la recherche de capacités).

developer_response:
No one in the development team knows the French so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

We've been inspired a lot by XCOM and reinterpreted it in our own way and added a number of factors that will make the game unique in the process. We're really glad you seem to have enjoyed all this.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095608760', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 28749, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9434, 'last_played': 1705678057}
review:
Edit: This game is great! Don't get lost in the negatives, most of which are taste based.

This games takes the core tactical mechanics of the XCom games, specifically XCom 2 and uses them to drive a super powered anime game with insane huge battles and an unbelievably rich levelling up 'mastery' system. There's also a story. 

Good

Gradual introduction and development of the character abilities
Multiple ways to build and rebuild each character
Really varied abilities and fun discovery of what they all are 
Power fantasy fights with characters who are hugely powerful from the early mid game (but you can still lose)
It has many fun tactical battles 

Meh

Very long and slow introduction of new characters and even systems
Anime 'aesthetic' not just the art but also the alarmingly young and barely trained protagonists
Little hand holding for what systems are even in place. This increases the discovery element but can be frustrating and you can miss parts
Some huge maps with 100+ enemies that can take a couple of hours. And then you don't click on the right spot, cos the briefing is opaque and you have to repeat it. 
You often control your team plus some cops, about 10-15 characters which I find less fun than just my handful of Troubleshooters. It's not terrible and eventually you'll get beyond it. 
Crafting is pretty hard to figure out and seems rather tedious but at low levels (at least 35 / 52) can be sidelined. (now at 50 it’s OK? Opaque inevitably).
Obscure Korean indy game so online resources are limited. This does mean you have more fun with discovery but there are anti experimentation systems in place (it costs in game resources)
Not AAA. The graphics are a little flat and some of the animation is a bit janky (hopping up stairs). The translation is also a bit quirky sometimes. On the other hand it's ridiculously cheap for what you get. I bought the cosmetic stuff even and accidentally the other not gameplay stuff :)

Some systems are not well integrated with one another. Eg. There's a pay system but you pay peanuts and can always pay a bonus. Some things to explore like meals are clearly missed by some players and there's very little to gain by hiding the system. (Compare to Pillars of Eternity 2 which tells you all the recipes but gates ingredients).

Endgame seems to lack variety
Music is OK at best I. think this is mostly my taste rather than it being bad. 

Bad

My only real dislike is that the story and the missions are independent
of one another. 
The story is told to you, you do not experience it.  I think this is a “jrpg” thing but I've next to no time in “jrpgs”.
It is told in a weird bitty retrospective way
Nothing you do in mission ultimately affects the narrative or the reverse, no narrative choices impact the missions you do. (Eg in XCom you have to capture  aliens to research them and defend locations to avoid losing them. Strategic choices gradually feed back into the tactical battles). To be pedantic it’s not quite nothing here - you do get loot drops but this feels more like MMO farming than narrative agency or even emergent outcomes, like old XCom. 


Despite the small amount of words I have put into the good points the game is great and very good value!
developer_response:
Thank you for sharing your experience on various parts of the game. Even if you gave us a bad evaluation because of Meh and Bad, we would have accepted it. No, it's not simply acceptable, but I would have accepted it with great gratitude to you.

Part of Meh was caused by our lack of experience in game development. In particular, "online resources are limited" and "The graphics are a little flat and some of the animation is a bit janky" were the factors that really frustrated the development team a lot. We have had to make countless compromises between reality and ideals to solve these problems. We have found our own middle ground, but we are well aware that this cannot be a suitable alternative for all gamers. When we produce follow-up games, we will create more thoroughly realistic games based on our current experience.

It is true that the gamer's choice does not affect the flow of the story. In fact, we didn't give gamers a choice to create a story branch. I wanted to give gamers a chance to participate in the one-sided delivery of the story. In fact, if we had made good use of this, the branch of the story you wanted and many stories could have appeared. The next time I develop a game, I will try to approach this from a broader perspective.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005348913', 'num_games_owned': 415, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 15098, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11181, 'last_played': 1679327572}
review: 游戏是个好游戏，但是太难了，真的太难了，我玩的最高难度，挑战模式玩了几次现在 不敢开了，降难度也不管用，敌人永远都是一堆 一堆 的出，被 一个敌人发现，马上周围的敌人就聚过来，大多数时间都 是敌人在行动，老半天轮不到我方行动，敌人各种烟雾弹冷冻弹砸我方，导致轮到我方行动时基本打不中敌人，后面的关卡，被一个敌人攻击，触发周围几个敌人都攻击，一个一个车轮式朝我方人员开枪射击，导致我方人员一次性直接被乱射到死，一个回合下来我方死几个，敌人永远都是高暴击高格挡，打到我方人员大多数时候都是一下死，我方人员打敌人几乎全是被 格挡，多数关卡，敌人占尽高处地利，楼上枪手狙击手林立，我方能打到楼上的也是低命中，NPC警察那点垃圾伤害根本就是给敌人刮痧，拜托你们降降难度，别给敌人那么高的属性和天赋好吧，这最高难度每关敌人好几十个，甚至一百多个，几天都打不过去，卡关卡到心态要崩，你在高难度下增加敌人的数量和精英敌人的出现机率就行了，没必要把敌人搞得和我方一个水平吧，这怎么玩，刷刷刷是一回事，但也要刷得动啊，我这个时间了，还他妈卡关在比安卡和艾丽莎刚出来打面具秃子那里，我们是玩游戏的，不想被游戏折磨，求求你们不要给敌人那么高的属性
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我们通过这次机会认识到,适当地调整游戏的难度真的很难。 在游戏中,我军和敌军共同适用的是,我使用的特性也可以用敌人。 而且敌人根据自己的等级使用特性。 这是选择任何难度都共同适用的事项。 也许这是我们难以让步的事项之一。 

但是正如你所说，游戏是为了享受，我们也不想通过游戏让玩家痛苦。 所以制作的难度是剧情。 使用这个难度，你可以轻松完成剧情任务。 如果不想使用剧情，建议尽量降低游戏难度，优先完成剧情任务。 并建议逐步升级特点和设备。

游戏太简单也是问题，太难也是问题。 要在这两者之间找到合适的点确实很难，但只要我们更新游戏，就不会停止思考这个问题。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198007481470', 'num_games_owned': 226, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 13438, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7995, 'last_played': 1670931985}
review:
Tl,dr : The game is rough in many aspects but the core gameplay is fun and there's a lot of potential... So i think most people will still enjoy it overall. 7.5/10

The good: The amount of customization available and tools to play with is great!

- You get to catch monsters and use them as battle pets like Pokemon. 
- You get to customize and use robots in battle. 
- Crafting system is overall pretty good. 
- Characters feel very unique and interesting with their unique class and skills. 
- Plenty of Masteries to further personalize the characters according to your play style. 
- Soundtrack is pretty good! Good enough for it to get stuck in my head for a few days. 
- Character design is pretty good for the main cast... as long as you can get past the fact that there's a 10 year old looking girl(she's supposedly 15) getting punched by a big buff dude. 
- Introduction of mechanics. I like how the developers tied the introduction of new mechanics with certain characters. It just makes sense that if you recruit an engineer, then you have more tools to play with etc. 
- World building. You can tell that the developers spend a lot of time crafting the world. 

The bad: 

- Translation is not great. Overall it's understandable but many segments can come across as extremely bland. Personality of the characters are largely affected by this. 
- The story and character arcs. I think the developers spent too much time developing the world (which i really appreciate!) at the expense of character arcs. There just isn't any resolution to any of the arc in the base game. Sure you can argue that some character arcs are resolved like Irene's but her story right now is as deep as a puddle!The characters introduced are interesting with their own agendas and motive yet none of them are resolved and its just frankly pretty disappointing . So how's the main story then you ask? Well... The base story is actually pretty simple when you get down to it. You respond to police calls, beat up bad guys, rinse and repeat. I got so numb to it that I didn't even know i was on the last mission until i beat it.
- Enemy variety and design. All of the enemies are reskins of each other. The big final boss looks exactly like the thousands of goons i killed on the way to get there! Maybe he's slightly bigger and wear a different hat... But the animations, enemy pose, sound, soundtrack, skills... none of them are all unique. It gets confusing when 2-3 of similar design goons are talking each other. Its even more confusing when you just beat them the previous level and find the same goons on the next level! You start to question if you actually did beat the guy in the first place. 
- Gameplay balancing. I personally think the base game is way too easy if you get the right build. And despite the tons of mastery of you get to play with, you'll only honestly use about a handful of it and i'll explain why. This game focuses a lot on action time, which means that if your character is fast and does a lot of damage, you can effectively kill everything before it touches you. However if you're slow, you can find yourself in a situation that you'll never be able to use your character again as enemies just dogpile on your character, delaying their action time indefinitely. I did see some effort in fixing this issue in the DLC. (Note: I just started the first DLC when writing this review) Enemies in the DLC are suddenly boosted up to where they one shot everyone that's not built as a tank (and even tanks if they crit). I felt that this is a pretty cheap way of boosting difficulty. 
- Police squad. Okay this is not exactly a con but it needs to be said. I like having control over the police. I think its a great system. But honestly they're tad bit too strong. Sometimes i wonder how crime is even rampant with the police being so brutally strong. 
-Quantity over quality (enemies). If we're comparing this game to Xcom, Xcom has fewer enemies but every enemy is a threat. It takes an entire team working together to take down a single enemy at times. This game is the opposite. They swarm you with crazy amount of trash mobs and each of them with the ability to delay your actions. Don't get me wrong i love it when i can use 1 skill to wipe out 6-8 enemies, but since this a turn based game, 6-8 moves takes a LOOOONG time to execute. There are missions where there are like 100 enemies and over 12 allies! Sometimes after making a move, i tab out to watch some youtube while the AI is doing its thing. 


It might sound that i dislike the game but that's far from it. Overall i like the game. Its a 7.5/10 for me but i could see that it has a potential to be at least an 8.5 or even higher. I hope future titles improve on these factors.  And maybe add destructible environments like in XCom to make it even better. I mean there's already grenades, why not make them useful and worth bringing for once.
developer_response:
" Translation is not great. "

Low-level translation is really a big problem in games where the story of the game is the most important factor. When we developed the game, we thought about the game itself and the translation separately. If the game is fun, I thought translation was not important. But this was our illusion. Translation was not the most important factor, but it was responsible for the beginning and guidance of everything. Soon it became clear that this start and guidance was unstable and it was like no game content. Later, we started to improve our translation, and fortunately, many people corrected our wrong translation. I understand that the translation is still not satisfactory. As long as our updates continue, the improvement of the translation will not be interrupted.

" All of the enemies are reskins of each other. "

Your analysis is correct. We had a clear limit to resource generation capability. In particular, the ability to produce characters has always been less than that of background objects. The result was the maximum reuse of existing models. This was the solution we found, but monotony was inevitable. We're going to study a new way to show you an attractive enemy that's as attractive as an attractive ally character.

" Quantity over quality (enemies) "
" i tab out to watch some youtube while the AI is doing its thing. "

We are well aware of this. We thought that XCOM's way of fighting was great, but the more difficult it was, the more tiring a person would be for one mission. We wanted to make it possible to repeat more missions quickly and without any burden. But when our forces faced a small number of powerful enemies, the battle would easily become entrenched. We thought that if these battles were repeated, the basic strategies of the game would be meaningless, and we thought that new combat situations would have to be repeated constantly. In this process, the shortcomings you mentioned began to be discovered. We tried to solve this in a more aggressive way. We've created more attack triggers and a device that can act more often. This made the battle faster, but it didn't completely resolve the fundamental wait. I think more diverse approaches to how to alleviate this wait will be needed.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198398041590', 'num_games_owned': 447, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 8454, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2412, 'last_played': 1671500733}
review:
玩法像Xcom+RPG 以Xcom的回合制戰鬥系統為基底 然後出場的我方角色可以用不同的裝備 天賦 職業等去構築
劇情是打擊犯罪的執法外包者的日常 主角群塑造不錯 各有自己的性格與背景故事
美術2D非常優秀 人物立繪都很好看 且各有特色 3D不拉近看還行 音樂契合主題
製作組一直有在更新 修正錯誤跟加入新內容 是可以期待會越來越好的遊戲
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

开发组在XCOM上玩得很开心。 在这个过程中，我们升级了所有的士兵，我们想和这些士兵一起完成很多任务。 但是到了那个时候，游戏已经接近尾声了。 所以我们开始引入RPG元素。 我想提供更多的角色成长和游戏故事。 而且您喜欢这个，我们真的很开心。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198221378944', 'num_games_owned': 204, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 10035, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10035, 'last_played': 1669491283}

developer_response:

developer_response:
많은 항목들을 일목요연하게 정리해 주셔서 감사합니다. '노가다' 와 '인터페이스' 부분에서는 많은 반성을 하게 됩니다. 부족한 부분에 대해서는 연구를 게을리 하지 않겠습니다. 50% 할인이 아니어도, 살만한 가치의 게임을 만들 수 있도록 더욱 노력하겠습니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058443096', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 44582, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 871, 'last_played': 1696246317}

developer_response:
If you have any questions during the game, we strongly recommend that you look for help. Our UI is rugged and some of the content is not intuitive. To make up for all this, we're trying to put as much content as we can in our help.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

author: {'steamid': '76561199256763832', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 25472, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1110, 'playtime_at_review': 22802, 'last_played': 1712055911}
review:
오래전 학생 시절에 페이스북 페이지에서 보고서는 전역 후에야 게임을 구매할 여력이 되어 플레이하게 되었다.
개발자분들의 소통능력과 열정에 반하여 페이스북으로만 보던 게임이여서 큰 기대감을 갖고 첫 시작을 했었고,
SRPG라는 장르 자체가 처음이였던지라 첫 적응이 다소 오래 걸려 회의감도 들었으나, 아름다운 일러스트에 반해 플레이하다보니
어느덧 도전과제 100퍼의 고인물이 되었으며, 다음 DLC만 바라보게되는 트러블슈터 게임을 즐기게 되었다.

초반의 고비만 버티면 SRPG 초보자도 즐길 수 있는 게임.
개발자분들 화이팅!
developer_response:
당신의 소중한 시간의 일부를 저희의 개발 여정과 함께 해주셔서 먼저 감사의 인사를 드립니다. SRPG 장르는 진입 장벽이 상대적으로 높고 요즘의 게임트렌드와는 조금 동 떨어진 장르입니다. 그러나 누구든지 SRPG 장르의 게임을 하고 싶을 때 트러블슈터가 조그만 등대 역할을 할 수 있도록 개발팀은 최선을 다 할 것입니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975685860', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 11494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8182, 'last_played': 1702236865}
review:
The big negative first: the game cops to being "season 1" after you finish it. If you squint at it and look backwards you could argue that there's a reasonably satisfying story, but there are a far greater number of plot threads left hanging. Some of it will move a bit more once the second batch of free DLC hits, but I am skeptical that much will be resolved before we see a full Troubleshooter 2 released.

For that to be a negative at all you have to care about the story and the characters, and the translation isn't going to do you any favors on that front. The dialogue never gets much better than stilted, but to my surprise I was pretty invested well before the end. Part of it is just down to determination on the writers' part. You're going to see a bunch of characters who look like mooks when you meet them, and then you're going to spend dozens of hours with them. You're going to make wildly inaccurate guesses about who is a villain and who will join your party. The effort on display here deserves more polish than it got, and it's easy to imagine a cleaned up version really landing these scenes.

On the actual game front, there's a similar mismatch between effort and polish. You could (and I did) easily spend an extra couple dozen hours hunting down, taming, and training monsters who are only useful to one possible class for a single member of your massive party. There will be occasional moments where the combat feels great; you're relying on cover from smoke grenades to advance, and your tactical decisions feel critical. There will be many more moments where you advance a single melee character into a crowd and clear the map with counter attacks, or exploit the AI to sneak out a win because everything will charge and one-shot you.

If none of that scares you off and you have any affection for the idea of vaguely xcom-themed combat existing alongside anime swordsmen who deflect bullets and RPG class changes and skill customization, this is the best game to meet your needs.

Update: the second DLC released between me finishing the game and me writing this review, so this will need an update in another who knows how many hours. It's not free as I'd anticipated, but for the ludicrous amount of content this team has stuffed into everything I'm calling that perfectly reasonable, and I look forward to all the new stuff.

Update after actually playing Crimson Crow: I still can't say I'm satisfied with the overall arc and resolution of the story, but as long as the team at Dandylion keep making new stuff in the setting I'll keep playing it. The new missions are really excellent at forcing you to mix up your approach a little bit and find new, even more degenerate ability sets and it's great. Absolutely top tier developer and you should buy the game.
developer_response:
I know a lot of people are waiting for more stories. In the game, many characters meet Albus and they start traveling. But a lot of the elements that make up their past are mentioned many times but that's not detailed. And then all of that will be explained in detail once again in the story. As always, new characters will emerge, revealing a new past that has never been known before.

" You're going to make wildly inaccurate guesses about who is a villain and who will join your party. "

The narrative of the enemy is often as detailed as that of Albert and his colleagues and his colleagues. This is intended. We are leaving all possibilities open. Carter may join us as allies to recreate the glory of Alley in the past. Ryo could join us as allies and build great teamwork with Kylie. And of course, to be able to do all of these things, there's basically a lot of talk ahead. That's why we're trying to expand the world view of Albus and Valhalla.

We want Troubleshooter to be an SRPG game. Not everything is for battle, but the story wants to lead everything else. In terms of development, the journey is inefficient and time consuming. But I believe that challenging these things is what you want from an independent development team like us.

Thank you for this review.

review: Fun game. A little similar to FF Tactics in the grid base movement. Masteries gives it a lot of depth. Challenge mode is rough. Adjustable difficulties is allowed for each mission. A lot to do on missions and quests if going for full completion. Story is slow but good. Probably need at least >100 hours to complete.
developer_response:
Troubleshooter was inspired by many great games. Among them, FFT is close to the most ideal SRPG we think. We will continue to develop the game so that Troubleshooter can become a modern reinterpretation of FFT with its own original ideas.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029987427', 'num_games_owned': 183, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 13435, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11971, 'last_played': 1672084544}
review:
I can't recommend TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children enough. Not just for what it is, but because of the people behind it too.

By itself it is a total blast of a turn based tactical RPG, think something like XCOM but your characters have a lot more character and serve unique roles in the field. The mastery system offers an extremely wide and varied way to build different characters, and allow for a ton of experimentation and unique ways to build teams. The story is a bit jumbled - with a lot of characters with some non-linear storytelling, but when threads and characters come together is when that aspect of the game shines. All of the playable characters are very likeable and have unique personalities and motivations, and I always looked forward to who I'd recruit to the team next.

Behind the game though are perhaps the most genuine and passionate game developers I've ever seen. Not only does Dandylion respond respectfully to every ounce of criticism, good or bad, but it isn't hard to tell how much love and effort they have put into Troubleshooter itself and to foster a great community around it. You can see in discussion pages - they are always answering questions and taking suggestions on how to improve the game. And not to mention the sheer amount of content they have provided for free on top of an already low-priced game. In a toxic and cynical industry Dandylion has made me appreciate how important and great it is to foster trust between players and developers.

Note that the DLC of the game is still actively being developed, with content updates happening every month or so, but Dandylion has been very transparent with their roadmap, and because of that the content feels worth the wait.
developer_response:
" toxic and cynical industry "

More than any other business, the game field "was" a business field that was fun for both the product maker and the person who used the product and shared their thoughts. But the size of the business has grown day by day, and as the logic of the economy intervenes, the relationship between the two sides seems to have become a little strained. 

In this situation, we thought about what gamers want from the independent game development team, and based on these concerns, we think that the content of the game and communication in the current community were created. This behavior of ours can seem silly on the one hand. But we still learn a lot from the community and believe that this will soon be the basis for a better sequel.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050108355', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 9581, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6581, 'last_played': 1697126756}
review:
Great game, fun missions, good challenges (some missions took me 2h+, with 100+ enemies), a lot of different mechanics. Not finished yet, so can't say much about the story (and don't want to spoil), but interesting and intertwining, maybe with a few things foreseeable.

In short: great, fun and addicting game. X-com type with less base management, can't hire new members (tied to story), but with a lot of other stuff and depth (skills, equipment, relations, shops...)
developer_response:
The development team all really likes XCOM. And I wanted to make up for the disappointment that I felt at XCOM in our way and make a new game. I'm glad that our intentions have been conveyed to you well. :D

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199183880023', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 6976, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4138, 'last_played': 1705512401}
review:
[h1]《纷争终结者》评测[/h1]

[b]立绘很好看，但音乐切换僵硬、强行煽情用力过猛，确实略逊一筹。[/b]
流水账大白话文，反派描述的人不人鬼不鬼，不是纯粹的恶、但深挖又没深度，剧情干巴巴的、又中二又尬，差点坚持不下去。

当然，在SLG游戏里挑剧情的刺是否搞错了什么。
战棋的通病，则是到一定阶段总会不可避免的配置相同与地图重复，导致游玩动力不足。
最值得夸赞的一点是，它从来不会有玩法上感到枯燥。
[b]它有着自己的一套天赋系统。能自由随性地构建属于自己的技能、主动与被动，打造适合自己的角色强度。
每次基本能保证配置和地图的不同；即便是重复挑战的任务，奖励给的很足，用到打完一章节不是问题，很好地规避与解决了同类难题。
资源分配、关卡平衡也很合理。普通难度不刷关的情况下，能不会卡关同时不失挑战乐趣地通关，很值得赞扬。[/b]
P.S. 动画卡顿、优化略拉，希望能改进改进。

[strike]就凭着它不会贴脸miss不就值得一个好评嘛！[/strike]
[b]玩法上，随着人物与天赋技能选择组合越来越多，逐渐上头、越来越有意思；剧情方面，玩到后面收敛长进了很多，起码也能看得下去了。
战棋爱好者强推！[strike]坚持住，毕竟手游剧情都能忍受了！[/strike]玩法上真的很有潜力，因前期剧情而擦肩错过也太可惜了。
[/b]
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

音乐，反派，剧情…

因为你说质量不好，即使你给我们留下了不好的评价，我们也无话可说。 尽管如此,您在亲自体验了第一次玩游戏时无法感受到的内容后，以此为基础给我们留下了好评，对此我们非常感谢。 

对于您指出的不足之处，我们将进行深刻的反省，不断改进。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198018439548', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 4988, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4988, 'last_played': 1626470511}
review:
This game is awesome but if possible you should try to improve localisation/translations. I believe the story is probably quite good, but it is overall confusing and hard to understand a lot of the time. Sorry that i dont have specific scenes to point out, it's been a while since i played it.

also figure out better ways to advertise the game maybe, so more people can find it? cus this game deserves to be played much more than it is! I already recommended it to most of my friends last year and we all had a good time.

edit: by the way, I check the reviews for this game now and then and it's so nice to see you respond to reviews consistently. I really respect you for the dedication and care you put into that. Never seen any developer do it this much before. thanks for that.
developer_response:
The story of the game is one of the key elements of the game. But it's really unfortunate that it doesn't get delivered to gamers correctly due to poor translation quality. You may not believe it, but there are still updates on existing translations. This is both a reflection on our past translation and our determination not to give up the quality of the translation. I want to deliver a better translation to you someday.

While we maintain the format of the independent game development team, it will be difficult to advertise our game. We're a small team and that's why the team can be maintained at a small cost of maintenance. However, the minimum cost for game advertising is equivalent to the development team's monthly maintenance. If we have to make a choice, of course, we are developing the game for another month.

Thank you for saying our little effort well. I didn't know before that I could learn so much from the review of the game. But now I feel how much this is a big part of game development.

author: {'steamid': '76561198833063064', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1669520181}
review:
Great game with visual graphics and if you've played X-COM II/WOTC (War Of the Chosen)  or games with a similar strategy type then you'll enjoy the open world and choices matter theme.  

Aside from the add-on content the developers really put their time and effort into making it very immersive for the players with customization and combat skills and glad that I bought the game which I'm still playing.

Edit: This game isn't X-COM copy nor I'm I claiming it is one.
developer_response:
XCOM is practically representative of this genre and we've had a lot of influence from XCOM. However, efforts are still ongoing to make Troubleshooter a new game, not just a copy of XCOM. Please complete the Scenario mission first and recruit all your colleagues. And make your team stronger from now on!

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.
