author: {'steamid': '76561198010739827', 'num_games_owned': 512, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 13781, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6933, 'last_played': 1670337307}
review:
I'm going to summarise my review here: If you love games, you should consider buying this game. 

When I was much younger, I had the occasional fancy of making my own video game as a labour of love - and there is no better phrase to describe Troubleshooter: Abandoned Children than "a labour of love". On a surface level, this game seems like an X-Com clone; it is anything but.

Troubleshooter is a Korean-made character-based strategy RPG which tells the story of a small mercenary company in a much larger contemporary-technology world populated by people with psychic powers.

I'll get the negative parts out of the way first - the game's 3D graphics are very dated and look like they crawled out of an mass-produced Unreal Engine MMO from the early 2000s. This largely seems to be a technical limitation, because the art direction is very solid and pleasant. Additionally, the story is rich, compelling and creatively told. However, perhaps due to a flaw in presentation, the translation seems a bit awkward at times. There's an insane amount of world-building, and an integrated glossary of key terms (as with some modern Visual Novels) would have helped a lot. Even your enemies are interesting and have their own stories behind them which you get the occasional insight into.

Once you get past the somewhat impenetrable introduction, the game starts unfolding as something truly monumental. Although on the surface, the game seems to be extremely limited with party options (All characters have preset elemental affinities and roles, and only a selection of two jobs), this is compensated by making every character specialised and they have clear roles. Behind this, there's a mammoth of customisation between skills, passives, equipment, pet systems, and other systems I am only just barely getting to know. 

There truly is a gargantuan amount of complexity to fine tune your characters. Although I'm still a bit upset that there's no water-aspected character and you can't create your own units to explore the clearly established game world, it's not a concern which eats away at me. I also find this a bit weird because I have the feeling the developers are trying to push PvP (the game has online functionality), which is something I have little interest in, but I do know the majority of PvP players I have met do not want to sit through a 60++ hour story campaign. Perhaps co-op would have been a better idea.

Additionally, although your characters seem strong, missions often go beyond simple zerg tactics. Creating some form of party synergy is essential if you want to clear battles without suffering any casualties. The gameplay loop itself is fun and only gets tedious when moving units long distances across a giant map (I would have liked some sort of portal or logistics specialised character).

Once I got deeper into this game, I started to realise that the sheer amount of content in this game is mind-boggling considering the low price of the game, which is extremely surprising, considering that the developers did not go the easy route of making some degenerate low-effort gacha game to rake in money and instead have provided an insane amount of support for their game. 

In a better world, this kind of effort and love should not go unrequited, nor unrewarded. If you love the romantic ideal of created indie games by smaller developers, please do give the game a try and I am certain your patience will be rewarded.
developer_response:
Your long review touches my heart. To be honest, there were many frustrations and difficulties while developing this game. Nevertheless, the reason why I can continue to devote a lot of energy to developing this game is because people like you support our game and our development team.

There are some parts that are not available at a good level due to lack of capabilities such as 3D graphics quality. We will do our best not to interfere with pleasure by steadily developing and improving our capabilities.

Although it will take a lot of time due to lack of capabilities, we would appreciate it if you could continue to stay with us while we create a world called TROUBLESHOOTER!

Thank you!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198027603872', 'num_games_owned': 441, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 1173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1135, 'last_played': 1669164703}
review:
There is a reason this game has a very passionate and dedicated following- it has a passionate and dedicated dev team. They've been updating and adding content for years. Much of it is free. 

I would say there is a similar engine feel as Xcom but the player experience is very different. Definitely heavy JRPG elements. I need to spend more time with this game but I've loved it so far!
developer_response:
During we have made this game, we have took many challenges to integrate XCOM style battle interface and JRPG systems such as Final Fantasy Tactics. And we're happy that the challenge can satisfy you with the current results.

After that, we'll continue to update the contents that will entertain you. If there is any inconvenience or improvement, please do not hesitate to let us know. We will do our best to improve as much as our capabilities allow!

Thank you for finding our game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198314274635', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 30862, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25812, 'last_played': 1709649519}
review:
An excellent game all around which I have had many hours of fun with.
Pros:
Beautiful art style.
Good Story which takes it's time and builds slowly.
Excellent Characters and interactions.
Interesting World building and World.
A fun, complex and engaging character build system.
Fun and fair combat with lots of options to tailor it to your enjoyment style.
Runs well.

Cons
The Translation can be rough at times leading to poor phrasing. This is something that has and continues to get much better.
Not exactly the most technically impressive but stills looks good due to their art style.
If you are a collector of everything like me prepare for some GRIND. Fun Grind. But still Grind.
I was not kidding when I said the story takes it's time. Some may not like that.
developer_response:
Despite many disadvantages, we can develop this game thanks to you who enjoyed our game. We 'll do our best to improve our capabilities and give you more pleasure thorugh steady updates.

Have a nice week!!

author: {'steamid': '76561197963498859', 'num_games_owned': 190, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 18345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16322, 'last_played': 1697876101}
review:
Honestly this is one of my most favorite hidden gems game-wise. As a lover of turn-based tactics games and flashy gameplay with a solid story/character development, Troubleshooter really just hits the spot. And that fact that I got nearly 300 hours for like $30 is insane and will be buying all the DLC/Costumes. Gameplay is turned-based, lots of crafting to be had and drop rates are a thing. If you're not keen on spending a lot of time developing builds or experimenting, there is a solid system that will auto install some mods.

I'll be honest, there are some translation inconsistencies, minor bugs here and there that get squashed quite regularly, and graphically, it's a little dated, but not hideous. Some of the systems in the game are obtuse (pet taming/raising specifically), there are RNG elements to mats and loot that can get frustrating if you are impatient.

But it's not MMO/Looter levels of bad. There is a power fantasy here where you'll get so powerful that everything gets one shot IF you optimize and pay attention to your builds. Difficulty can seem to spike on certain violent cases and scenario missions. Often it's a power/level issue that can be resolved with some farming of other missions and new gear with appropriate perks. There are obviously some BIS builds if you just want to cruise, but I'd recommend trying your hand first at what works for your playstyle and which role you feel each character should play (there are multiple disciplines for each).

The Steam community here for this game is great with a few guides to get new players started and refresh old ones. Overall, what you put in this game is what you get out. Decent story elements and the artwork is charming. Coming of age stories are hit or miss, but this one is endearing, weirdly enough.

The devs are very nice, humble, and sweet people. You can tell they are gamers themselves and always are seeking to improve the game for maximum enjoyment. I find it kind of funny they were apologizing for charging a nominal fee for future content despite all the quality free content that was given for over 2 years. I'll happily support these lovely devs/game!

Looking forward to the sequel Team Dandylion! Just let us know!
developer_response:
It has been thanks to the support of the players that we were able to continue to develop until now. And we have a lot of courage again by reading your detailed review.

Due to the lack of our capability, we had no choice but to provide the current level of graphics, and the translation is very sloppy due to the budget cost. It's all our fault and we are so sorry for that.

We'll improve our capabilities. So we'll do our best to make sure to improve this negative points.

We have a plan to create a Troubleshooter story. Although it will take some more time because it's a small team, we'll do our best to give you more fun with this story and play!

Thank you so much for letting me read your review!!

Have a great week!

author: {'steamid': '76561198045872613', 'num_games_owned': 229, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 7495, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5106, 'last_played': 1668884288}

author: {'steamid': '76561198992566528', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 41817, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28173, 'last_played': 1705574035}
review:
《纷争终结者》是我玩过的最好的游戏之一，我为它而深深着迷。
里面的一切设计都令我无比喜爱，主要角色、反派、怪物、剧情、技能、天赋系统、地图、游戏模式等等都是。
这么棒的游戏理应收取合适的费用，第一个D-L-C完全免费令我非常担心制作组的情况。因为我愿意为这样的游戏而花钱，这些收入也会帮到制作组。
因为我认为《纷争终结者》完全值得，甚至觉得它的定价过低，即使原价购买也物超所值。
第二个D-L-C一出便马上买了，我目前已经玩了469个小时，并且还会继续玩下去，玩上很多年。
真心感谢制作组为我带来这样一个出色的游戏、以及感恩其所带给我的众多快乐。
我会继续支持制作组的后续创作，希望能够进行更多后续内容的更新。
也衷心祝愿制作组人员身体健康，并且不要过于勉强工作。
在这里发言，只是希望你们知道，有着我这样的粉丝在永远支持着你们。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

感谢您用动听的话来表达我们的一点努力。 事实上，我们之所以做出这样的努力，是因为第一次发行游戏时，我们承诺的所有内容都没有实现。 我们需要钱来开发游戏，包括您在内的玩家相信我们购买了游戏。 从那时到现在，我们一直在更新游戏以遵守约定。 然后现在发行了第一个付费DLC。 

这一切都多亏了像你这样的玩家。 我们的开发还没有结束。 祝你以后的旅程能与你共度。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198435692208', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 16630, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16448, 'last_played': 1666420628}
review:
趁着制作组发布新的dlc了，突然心血来潮想留个评论，首先我是个战旗迷，或者说二次元战旗迷，侠客风云传系列，河洛群侠传，神界原罪2都让我很入迷，后来就在steam上找，找到这款游戏，好像还是抢先体验那时候，看了当时评论，有好有坏，犹豫了一段时间就买下了，中间断断续续通关删了又下回来，重新build另一套想要的，又可以玩一年，现在常驻放电脑里，无聊就开一把，组合下新天赋看看强度，听说出新dlc天赋全改了，又可以开始排列组合了

刚开始几关其实还挺无聊的，后来慢慢队友多了，技能树组合build多起来的时候，就觉得贼好玩，组合天赋能玩一年，而且关键是当你组合好天赋用这个角色去砍人的时候，真的很爽，思考策略和人物build真的很对我胃口。而且是二次元画风

接着说说我需要改进的地方吧，我的艾琳，（不知道这次dlc有没有加强，加强了回来改评论）很多角色在后期战斗有些边缘化了，艾琳就属于其中一个，你说肉坦吧，有艾丽莎和小黄毛，法师吧，有小黄毛和黑天使（不好意思太久没玩忘记名字了哈哈），在团队里真的很难有作用，我觉得老板也是，高难强度下，这两近战角色有点难生存，老板还好，有那个风的组合而且有流血吸血，艾琳是肉也不够肉，输出也不够看，（我是后面贴吧看到一个无限回合的火场艾琳才救回来），但这么单一的build我觉得是不够的，对于近战角色还有待加强，特别是我的艾琳，hero出动！！（过场立绘的水平也有些参差不齐，请加强，更多更多滴立绘大大滴好）

最后再说说制作组的态度，真的没得说，我从抢先体验的时候一直看过来，周末有空看看商店，看看评论，你可以看到开发组几乎在每个评论下面都有做回复，而且一直在游戏里面做改进，报告进度，我记得我玩的时候有玩家抱怨刷材料太费事了，制作组就开了个修改通道，给离线的玩家可以不用刷，态度好，而且不是说空话，在改进，太良心了，所以之前资料篇的dlc我也支持了，也不是说多少钱的事，而是你用心做游戏了，玩家肯定希望你做得更好支持你回馈你。（是的，说的就是那两款国产游戏，鬼谷八荒和mirror，没有对比就没有伤害，看看别人的制作组，别人的抢先体验，再看看我们的，气死我了）
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

很高兴认识你这么长时间和我们在一起。 而且喜欢某一领域的玩家使用的评价总是让开发组紧张。

游戏的前半部分经验无聊是致命的缺点。 而且最近的游戏趋势与此正好相反。 我们也在很多方面进行了优化，但我不认为这个问题已经解决了。 这部分我们会一直改进到游戏更新结束。

最近英语用户之间讨论了 武术家 和 战斗法师 的均衡。 在这次讨论中，武术家的缺点被指出了很多。 我们也在关注这次讨论，正在考虑如何反映到下次更新中。 期待这次更新适用后，您提到的部分也能得到一些解决。

我们从玩家那里真的学到了很多东西。 玩家对我们来说就像第七个队员一样。 只要我们继续开发【分争调整者】，我们就会和玩家在一起。 队员在一起是应该的。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561197967439740', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 16281, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8111, 'last_played': 1702146929}
review:
I read reviews that this was basically a JRPG combined with XCOM and I was instantly sold on the concept and bought the game at full price. I was not disappointed at all.

[Game Play]
The game plays out like an XCOM clone at first which is made more apparent when the tutorial greatly resembles XCOM Enemy Unknown's tutorial level. However the game becomes much more than that with its many RPG mechanics that allows for an insane amount of customisation.

While there is a static cast similar to most JRPGs, each character has class options and unique roles that they can fill on the battlefield. For example your main character is usually a melee tank while others may be offensive mages or even a sniper.
The way you customise them is both with gear from a Diablo style loot system along with masteries. The mastery system is basically like FF7's materia system on crack. It basically allow you to slot in passive bonuses that completely change the way your character plays. The aforementioned main character can either be a counter-attack focused tank or he can run around the map chain killing enemies. The amount of variety is truly impressive.

The game is divided into missions and a hub base. From what I can tell, just about every story mission is replayable and there are a bunch of optional missions that allow for grinding and farming for new equipment and masteries. Some of these optional missions categorised as "violent cases" are massive maps with upwards to around a 100 enemies that can take an hour or two to clear but the rewards are usually worth it.

The difficulty curve was also done very well. I was initially put off by the fact that my first mage character could tank multiple hits to the face when exposed and not behind cover even on hard mode. However the game eventually ramps up to the point that your squishier characters are in serious threat of getting 1 shot if you haven't built up their defensive capabilities (masteries plays a huge role in this).

[Story]
I think the story will be a bit hit or miss depending on what you were expecting. I would not go into this game expecting a compelling over arching plot. Rather this game feels more like an episodic TV series where the main focus are the characters themselves and how they interact with each other while living out their lives in a city riddled with crime. Be prepared to see a lot of character exposition from both your main protagonists as well as the antagonists as well.

[Potential Cons]
The game gets off to a slow start. People who want to dive immediately into the game may get put off by this.
The game is also insanely deep. I was still getting tutorials for new mechanics 50 hours into the game. This can definitely be off putting to some players that want a more streamlined experience.
There are no custom characters or character creator but this did not bother me.

[Actual Cons]
I think the crafting system could have been done a lot better. It is an absolute pain going through the crafting system and honestly it felt like it was just not worth the effort until the late game when unique set items are available for crafting.
It would be nice to have short cuts when you're missing certain materials so that you can either craft them immediately or at least know where to find them.

I also think its a bit unnecessary that you need to beat a certain enemy multiple times just to fill out their database regarding what items and masteries they can drop.

[Conclusion]
I think this game is a must buy if you're a fan of XCOM and JRPGs. The fact that they are asking for a budget price would be crazy enough, but the first story DLC is completely free which is just insane. I honestly think they can get away with charging more and I don't say that often.
developer_response:
We're so happy that you're satisfied with our game-play. As you said, we aimed to construct a TV series-style story-line that continues "Troubleshooter" story. However, it is a big dream compared to our team's capabilities, so we know that there are many parts that are  lacks.

As you said, we tried to deliver a lot of content one by one, so the time to reach a lot of content in the game increased. It's hard to improve this right away, but we'll consider how to allocate it well for the future.

And we also think it's not a good experience to craft items that have already passed the level from the bottom one by one. It's our fault by low capabilities about game-design. We'll make sure to improve it in the near future.

To be honest, "Troubleshooter" to mix XCOM and JRPG was a huge challenge for our development team. And we are well aware that many parts are still lacking due to lack of competence. We'll do our best to improve our capabilities and improve and refine them to give you more pleasure.

Above all, we gain a lot of courage by reading your review. We'll do our best to make a better experience by remembering your support, not only the DLC we are working on, but also the follow-up work in the distant future.

Thank you!

author: {'steamid': '76561198092617107', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 18060, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12465, 'last_played': 1671735702}
review: Was worried the anime style was going to be a little too much for me to truly enjoy it, but the game is insanely fun and the story isn't bad. Think X-COM but instead of going against aliens, you are going up against street gangs. Game has very deep mechanics that take a little time to understand, but once you understand what is going on, you realize the options for play style are incredibly vast. The mastery system in place is excellent and gives the player a ton of freedom to customize their team. Game could be a bit better optimized, getting around 60-90fps @ 1440p sometimes down to the 40s. (running on a 3080ti, the GPU and CPU aren't hitting full load, so something is holding this game back, I think it has to do with game engine)
developer_response:
" Game has very deep mechanics that take a little time to understand, but once you understand what is going on, you realize the options for play style are incredibly vast. "

In fact, this part has a lot of influence on gamers' experience of Troubleshooter. In fact, it is true that this part is far from the current game trend. These days, the trend is that gamers can access the game and experience everything in just a few minutes, and all rounds are organized individually. It's the exact opposite of the Troubleshooter's structure. We borrowed the structure of traditional RPGs. The pros and cons of this are clear, but I think it's the most appropriate way to describe the narrative we want. And I thought that the experience after fully understanding the game could be maximized. So thank you very much for understanding our intentions.

We are continuing to optimize the game regardless of when the game is released. However, it does not seem to magically improve the situation due to one modification. We will speed up our understanding of the game engine and continue optimizing until you get satisfactory results.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065476962', 'num_games_owned': 218, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 10053, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8573, 'last_played': 1666594523}
review:
[b]*TL:DR Is at the bottom*[/b]
From my perspective After Sinking more than 100+ hours in this Game (Offline mainly).  I love the story and how the characters are especially with their own individual development for each one.  Character customization is on board from their clothes, to the gear they use as well as a Interesting multi-build mastery system. 

The difficulty of each match can vary depending on how your troubleshooter squad is setup I.E. Social bond, Mastery and Gear.  Or even the difficulty your playing on, Cruel is literally Cruel especially against certain enemies.

The soundtrack is pretty cool. Especially when they add in the music on the right scenes. 

 The replay ability of this game is honestly very interesting with an option of changing up how things go in combat to just the straight up Cruel difficulty. 

In terms of the DLC and then on I was SURPRISED when the characters were free and not only just that but they EXPANDED THE PARTY FROM not just 8 to 12 units From there on. I thought that was an AMAZING move from the developers.  Not only that but even DLC characters have their own development and it also carries on with the original story,  I hope they expand the party as more gets added on but that's just my hopes and dreams. (MY Dream is to be a Hero!)

[b]Would I recommend? Yes I do even at it's full price. I think it's a Pickup for sure.[/b]
developer_response:
The development team is starting this morning with a smile because you seem to have enjoyed the contents of the game we prepared. No matter how much we implement in the game, if no one experiences it, it's like nothing. In that sense, your evaluation has a big meaning beyond just the meaning that games are good.

You have grasped all the contents of the game. Fortunately, the development team is about to start updating the new DLC. The development team will continue to improve the game so that you can stay with Troubleshooter for a longer time.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198328578931', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 20487, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18546, 'last_played': 1701487561}
review: 玩了300多个小时了，还会继续玩下去。我简单说下我对游戏的评价吧。首先，对于游戏的价格而言，这个游戏真的是物有所值了，是很值的那种。游戏的有点我就不说了，不然我也不能玩这么久。我只说一说我觉得有待提高的地方吧，因为我希望游戏越来越好，如果出了付费内容我也会买的。1，游戏确实有深度，但是天赋系统过于庞大，十分劝退新人，就连我这样的老手也得认认真真的研究，我希望制作组在天赋深度和数量庞大的天赋坐下平衡，说实话，有很多天赋其实很鸡肋。2，对游戏熟练之后明显感觉敌人的AI不足。3，更新太慢了~~~
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

【天赋】是游戏的核心系统。 虽然游戏有设定难度的功能，但我认为事实上，如何充分利用【天赋】是决定游戏难度的最重要的因素。 因此，我们仍然在研究如何比现在更加多样地利用该系统。 虽然这种研究造就了现在的【天赋】，但也出现了你说的缺点。 开发组虽然重视游戏内容的扩张，但也会考虑让更多的人自由利用游戏系统的方法。

还有，我们的更新太慢了，总是感到抱歉。 我们的更新速度虽然慢，但并没有停止游戏的开发。 希望近期能在游戏中再次见到你。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561197995383253', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 9362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8556, 'last_played': 1666478504}
review:
This game hits a nice sweetspot between sweaty xcom and disgaea. You have this complex mastery/skill system that determines most of your power, a little bit of gear grinding/crafting, and a tactical layer that does involve actual decisions, but largely based on the absolute bullshit that the mastery system enables. You want -50% phys damage (after negating crits and halving damage thanks to 100% block) to get you to taking about 5 damage from some late game bosses? Great. Doable. You want to kill most of the map in one turn? Great, until you run into the guy doing the unkillable thing mentioned earlier (unless you preempt that in masteries).

It's a TRPG with some nice systems. Gearing is kind of meh, the star of the show is the mastery boards. There is a lot of flexibility and build types, with some memey ones included. To me, the game seemed well paced difficulty wise, though I'd adivse hard  difficulty and turning on the risk/reward option to present some challenges along the way. 

What strikes me here is actually some of the story missions that pit you against your own characters: when you've built a really deadly Sion  and then the game pits you against him (+like 3 other competent-ish characters you've made)  with just you and the police on your side, you actually get a sense for how fucked the criminals are. The VHPD training missions were some of the most fun moments for me (I did cheese my way through most of these by stripping those characters bare before actually beating them). 

And that's the real joy of the game: any bullshit you encounter is bullshit you can recreate, and likely better. Annoying impulse fields so you can't OHKO them? You can do that too. Absurd Counterattacks? You can do that better. Bullshit undying bosses that take 1 damage after you lower them to 33%? You can do double bullshit extra undying boss character shenanigans. 

Ultimately a lovely game, a beauty to explore. I'd advise minimal viewing of guides, until exploration of masteries and extraneous clicking gets too cumbersome. 

P.S. The esc button skips through a lot of the VN bullshit like talking to the identifying merchant or paydays, and makes the game flow more smoothly.

Overall, highly recommended.
developer_response:
The number of hearts I can see in the review you wrote makes me feel your love for our game. ( Half joking and half sincere! )

XCOM is actually representative of this genre. And we can't deny that we've been influenced a lot by this game.

Throughout the series, Disgaea has created a strong presence by distinguishing himself from character development and item farming. And this is also a game that was often mentioned within the development team when we tried to incorporate the farming elements of the RPG into our game.

If we had a fantastic way of implementing thse sweaty in one game, we would have been able to quickly tell you more about game development, but I don't think it's going to be easy, either. But this gives us another motivation. At least we disprove that our development direction is not wrong. What's left is that we need to sharpen our skills and make Troubleshooter even better. :D

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198146384177', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 8883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8632, 'last_played': 1672195373}
review: 非常有趣的游戏，高度的可重复游玩性加上大量天赋和装备能够培养出个性化的角色从而带来的多种多样的游戏体验，排除部分天赋的获取过于繁琐的问题（如部分野兽的天赋必须要养到职业满级才能获取，尤其是德拉基无法驯服成体只能从幼体一只只培养来获取天赋，希望这点能得到优化），大部分天赋和装备都比较容易获得，这款游戏在能满足那些有大把时间的玩家的同时也能对轻度玩家相对友好，强烈推荐。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

你可能因为德拉基而感到不舒服，不像其他的。 从开发组的立场来看，没有必要非得把德拉基变成那样。 只是像其他野兽一样制作也没关系。 但是我们认为游戏需要多样性。 我认为,不只是外形不同的野兽,从一开始就需要其他东西。 我认为这只是开发者心态和玩家心态相冲突的部分。 我认为需要对彼此满意的方式进行深思熟虑。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198004257299', 'num_games_owned': 287, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 3835, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3690, 'last_played': 1679254937}
review:
Enjoyable tactics game, definitely a lot of grinding to build up gear and masteries so be aware of that.  You'll be replaying the missions a number of times as you develop your team.  

The abilities are varied and I'm enjoying the setting, not as much the gear crafting as I haven't seen major benefits to engaging with it as opposed to collecting drops or buying vendor items yet.
developer_response:
It is true that the game contains elements of grinding. Maybe as we started adding elements of RPG to TBS, these elements came into play. We will optimize grinding elements so that gamers can enjoy collecting items while at the same time not feeling burdened.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046176226', 'num_games_owned': 197, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 6443, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4438, 'last_played': 1696037625}
review:
Entre más se juega, mejor se pone. Es una experiencia súper sólida desde el inicio, con un desafío constante durante todo el juego e incluso cuando quieres volver a jugar misiones anteriores puedes hacerlo incrementando la dificultad a tu nivel, de forma que siempre el combate sea intenso y atrapante. 

De forma resumida el juego es rápido, intenso y entretenido con la flexibilidad de jugar una misión de vez en cuando y seguir progresando sin perder el ritmo, es fácil de aprender, pero ofrece suficientes sistemas para añadir complejidad y mecánicas nuevas por descubrir constantemente. Los únicos aspectos negativos que puedo decir corresponden a que el juego online y offline se encuentran separados, de forma que si un día quieres jugar la misma campaña y no tienes internet, simplemente no te va a dejar, te va a hacer crear una separada.
developer_response:
No one in the development team knows the Spanish so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

The game has online mode and offline mode. The most important goal of the development team is to make the game a complete single game. All online contents will be tuned separately for offline. There may be differences when it comes to being with others. However, the core experience of enjoying the game's story and fostering characters will be all experienced no matter what mode the gamer chooses. :D

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005987027', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 9999, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4582, 'last_played': 1666703510}
review: Pretty good. Combat is fun (X-COM style).  Building the characters (Mastery) is interesting.  I have a lot of hours in and I feel like I've still just scratched the surface.  Still having fun.  Two things I would point out though:  1) The english translation seems to be pretty weak and 2) even though the combat is similar in style to X-COM, there is no permanent death because all of your characters are story characters (not a negative, just different from what you may expect based on the comparison to X-COM).
developer_response:
The development team determined that translation would not affect the game's evaluation as long as it was good. But it was a misjudgment. The awkward and wrong translation made it impossible for gamers to continue the game any longer and so many of the things we prepared were buried. We belatedly realized the importance of translation and with the help of many people, we are improving the translation little by little. Although it won't be fast, we won't stop improving translation as long as we keep updating the game.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065184441', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 6118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6118, 'last_played': 1643283932}
review:
Slowest burn story I ever seen in gaming. 
Coupled with awful translation.
Still, there is a lot of good ideas and fun tactical combat.
At first, it can be overwhelming to see all the menus and possible aspects of the builds, but it is less complex then it looks at first.
Just learn the systems one at a time.
You don't need an ultimate build right away.
developer_response:
" Slowest burn story I ever seen in gaming.
Coupled with awful translation. "

We've been desperately experiencing these two sentences for the last three years how much of a ripple effect they have. It's not exactly the power of the sentence, it's the disadvantages of the game that the two sentences point to. Nevertheless, thank you for experiencing the game to the end. Although our first impression was never good, we will do our best to improve the game so that gamers can experience greater enjoyment after passing it.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199065185425', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 35901, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17170, 'last_played': 1699399020}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198899586314', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 8238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8163, 'last_played': 1666451310}
review: 经过半个月的肝，进度也算是打了个七七八八了。总的来说，如果你是战棋爱好者，那么我是非常推荐你游玩这款游戏的。整体玩下来到最后，有个我感觉不好的地方：最后一个紫本的机器人BOSS难度太大了，感觉跟其他怪物的强度不是一个级别的，是否可以进行调整？还有就是游戏比较小众，感觉相关攻略不太好找。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

可惜的是，任务中没有调整部分敌人能力的功能。 你所提到的敌人的能力与该任务的总体难度成正比。 如果将所有的敌人调整到boss级别，任务就会变得非常困难，如果降低boss的能力，boss就无法正常发挥作用。 开发组会进一步研究适当的游戏难度。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561199142189721', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 18384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13105, 'last_played': 1705419176}
review:
好きなところ

・面倒なことを気にせずプレイできる
SRPGにありがちな「前のステージに戻れない」「フリー戦闘の回数が限られている」というような、計画的に育成していかないと詰んでしまうような要素がないので、戦闘中に「経験値的にトドメはこのキャラで……」というようなことを考えなくていい。敵に勝てなかったらレベルを上げるなり素材を集めてスキルや装備を見直すなりして再挑戦できるのがとっても気楽。

・いい意味で大雑把なバランス
終盤に正気を疑うほど強い敵が出てきたり、一生ターンが回って来ないほど大量の敵が湧いたりするが、味方もそれ以上に強くなるので問題ナシ！というハチャメチャな戦闘が最高に楽しい。

・ビルドが無限に悩める
RPGのステ振りやらTCGのカード枚数やらで悩むのが好きなので最高に楽しめた。プレイ時間の半分はビルドに悩む時間だったし、なんならプレイしていない間も悩んでいたので実際はもっと多い。


好きじゃないところ

・3Dモデル
別に低クオリティとは思わないが、立ち絵と顔が違うのがどうしても気になる(特にアルバス)。

・翻訳
特性・追加特性の名前など、意味は通じるが直訳すぎて不自然な翻訳がある。一部ではキャラクターの口調が突然変わったり、文章がおかしかったりする。特に後者はストーリーに没入する妨げになるので、そのうち改善して欲しい。


まとめ

緻密で繊細な戦略シミュレーション……というよりは「俺の作った最強キャラをくらえ！！！」という感じのゲーム。
戦場でユニットをどう動かすか悩む時間よりも、ビルドで悩む時間の方が多くなると思う。それが好きなら超オススメ。
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

3Dモデルと翻訳はどちらもゲームの第一印象を決定する重要な要素です。 そして、人とゲームの両方にとって第一印象がどれほど重要かは、私たち全員がよく知っています。 ゲームを売ろうとする立場では、この2つを逃すということは、ゲーム開発戦略の基本がきちんと確立されていないことと同じです。 そのような面で私たちは落第点を受けても言うことがありません。 

それにもかかわらず、私たちが準備したコンテンツをすべて経験してくださったあなたに深く感謝申し上げます。 いつからか私たちは3Dモデルの品質を上げることに限界を感じています。 ここでより大きな発展を遂げるためには、より多くの人材とより多くの時間が必要であり、私たちはこの両方を満たすことができませんでした。 そこで、私たちはゲームに残っているゲーマーを満足させることができる企画的な方法を悩み始めました。 幸いなことに、これらのものが少しでも効果を出し始めているようです。

翻訳は最初に比べるとかなり改善されましたが、依然として不足な点が多いです。 幸いなことに、日本のゲーマーの方々が親切に間違った翻訳を修正してくださって、私たちはできるだけ早くその翻訳をアップデートしています。 より良い翻訳を提案したい、またはあなたが感じた口調のぎこちなさについて、いつでも掲示板を通じて開発チームに知らせてください。 開発チームは決してそれを見逃しません。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198408962809', 'num_games_owned': 277, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1665146966}
review: 把xcom抄的这么仔细也是算苦劳了。那么我为什么不直接去玩XCOM？ 退款了。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

您是这么看的，真可惜。 虽然是以XCOM的方式进行,但我们是和他们游戏哲学完全不同的游戏,所以有用户喜欢的部分。 在XCOM绝对感受不到我们游戏的乐趣。

没能吸引到这一点是开发组的能力不足。 因为相信可以用XCOM的方式玩与XCOM不同的有趣游戏,所以制作了这个游戏,我会为此尽最大的努力。

还有您退款了，真是万幸亏您退货了！ 和符合自己喜好的游戏一起度过愉快的一天！

谢谢你的关心！

author: {'steamid': '76561198122699896', 'num_games_owned': 961, 'num_reviews': 318, 'playtime_forever': 7889, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3609, 'last_played': 1665688611}
review:
Hot trash x-com wannabe anime game.

Pros:
>It has a decent animesque mini stories and characters
> the anime drawings look good
> It allows you to replay all missions and aparently nothing is missable
> There's a gear and skill system for each character
> There's some rudimentary crafting which can be usefull if you can find the materials to use it 
> There's a food buff system
> you can build small robots for one of your characters
> one of your characters can tame monsters and use them

Some things are real deal breakers:
>Character graphics are super ugly and don't match the anime portraits
>It takes forever to farm enough gear and masteries - no respect whatsoever for the players time
> skills are very limited  and most items 
>Basic attacks are locked behind stamina and cooldown system - this is so stupid you'd thing someone would make it up
>Difficulty is all accross the board, you can wipe a mission, and then into the next one and get hammered baddly
>There's tons of loadings all and even in a good PC it's going to take a while
>Missions can take more than an hour to go through
It's cool to have a masteries and gears, but you shouldn't gate the gameplay around these
>Blocking, dodge, armor get absolutely ridiculous by mid game, it becomes an all or nothing system, magic can be blocked, enemies can block and dodge even if they are stunned
>The consumable system makes no sense, it gives you charges to use items, and even if you use a single charge, the item gets deleted after the mission, this is especially eggregious with devices that instead of being recharged have to be bought or crafter again? Dude why?
> item sets are trash
> It's a huge chore to farm items to do crafting
> bestiary doesn't work properly
> crafting system feels like it's from a cheap mmo
> the whole game feels like an alpha build instead of a finished product
> the story goes nowhere and it's made with dlc and sequels in mind
> there's few images in late game and often the story told doesn't match the image
> game crashes and disconnects very often in late game
> there's a multiplayer hub that makes no sense and they put the shops there, if you want to go shop you need to wait for the loading screen, then again to go back
> around mission lv50 every enemy can easily kill any of your guys in a single turn if the RNG is not in your favor, and 50 vs 11 always drags out battles and a couple bad rolls are enough to fail the mission or having to the reload the lack checkpoint
> very little makes sense in the gameplay design and you'll end up feeling like you control a party of weaklings against enemies with higher stats and better abilities across the board especially when get to face clowns in the dlc

The worst of it all is that you're going to spend most of the time either preparing for missions or inside missions watching enemies moving around. The time you actually spend controlling your characters is less than 10% of the game. You 11 guys against like 50 to a 100 enemies each taking their time to take their turn. I really feel like a jackass looking at this nonsense, and this is on max speed which they even warn you breaks the game sound.
developer_response:
Although you could simply leave behind a bad review, you analyzed the game sharply and told me what the development team couldn't satisfy through the game until now. We are very grateful to you for this first.

You can't say that you can fix things you mentioned at any moment. Some are beyond our capabilities, some are welcome elements from others. Some things are so entrenched in the game that it's hard to fix because modifying them changes the whole game's experience.

We will seriously consider and study how to solve the challenges you mentioned while taking advantage of Troubleshooter's personality during future game development.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561199087745456', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 9745, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3738, 'last_played': 1691133953}
review:
[h1]朋友极力推荐买的，玩了一段时间，说说感受 [/h1]
如今2022年才了解并玩到这款游戏，真的感到很亏~
先是游戏性，非常容易上瘾，一关掉就不想打开，一旦打开就根本停不下来！各种职业的天赋搭配也非常值得花时间研究，即使是原价购入也绝对是物超所值。身边有很多玩了数百小时的兄弟，其实有时候也会想想如果可以匹配或者和好友合作，一起打副本就好了。

再说剧情方面的感受，总体中规中矩，吐槽一下：我觉得公司小老板好可怜，除了黄毛几乎都是带着各式各样的目的才临时加入公司，人员内部矛盾也极其激烈，时刻有种随时就要散伙各奔东西的感觉，我已经能预料到小老板接手酒吧后、孤苦伶仃的可怜模样了。（笑）

期待制作组未来的新项目，加油！
最后顺便催一下，dlc快点上架！我已经等不及了！！
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

感谢您对小小的开发组的努力给予好评。 我觉得和朋友们一起合作完成一项任务，真是个好主意。 开发组也曾考虑过开发这种功能。 只是游戏类型的特性上,一个人操作的时候,其他人要等待,但是因为没有可以解决这个问题的适当对策,所以没能引进。 

正如您所说，我们正在准备下一次DLC的更新。 虽然你和我们的见面有点晚，但我们仍然可以一起冒险。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198419761073', 'num_games_owned': 13, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 10491, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10314, 'last_played': 1670329586}
review: 这是一个好游戏。制作组一直有对游戏进行优化和更新，这点是很值得赞赏的。游戏的天赋系统很好，能让玩家自由地进行各种搭配，但它确实有点复杂，对每个角色的天赋搭配进行修改总是让我感到焦躁。所以我本人希望制作组能对角色的天赋系统进行一项优化或者添加一个功能，从而使系统能对天赋进行自主搭配，或者制作组能够对每个角色的两个职业分别预设一套天赋搭配，让玩家能够使用系统预设方案，再或者能让玩家将自己的天赋搭配在游戏里进行分享，而其它玩家能对这套搭配方案进行copy。如果能有这种功能，我相信会极大地便利那些不愿花费太多时间和精力在天赋搭配方面的玩家。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

" 让玩家能够使用系统预设方案，再或者能让玩家将自己的天赋搭配在游戏里进行分享，而其它玩家能对这套搭配方案进行copy。"

啊，这个功能已经在游戏中实现了。天赋是游戏的核心系统，开发组也在思考如何让更多的人更方便地使用它。打开角色的天赋板，选择"管理天赋版"。那么你可以确认天赋版目录，在那里利用"提取天赋版固有代码"和"粘贴天赋版固有代码"共享我的天赋版信息或共享别人的天赋版信息。我希望你能有效地使用这个功能。:D

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198057230391', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 406, 'last_played': 1665014922}
review:
I reserve the right to come back and change this to positive.

 TLDR The xCom with anime characters in a Cyberpunky world.

Between mediocre translation and boring characters, tedious combat, and an overly complicated system for stats this game just kind of misses all the marks.
The funny thing, is that it has everything I like but so far (about 6 hours in) it just doesn't execute any of them particularly well.

It's a B movie blend of tactics, cyberpunk, anime, and jrpg. It's just.... kind of missing something. And honestly, a B is still a pretty good grade but would I recommend the game when there are games that are As out there? No. 

It's a pretty bad sign when I find the game so tedious I keep closing it to play a hand of mtgA or Storbook or an Aram then come back to it because I 'feel bad' buying something new.

If you want an incredibly complicated character driven tactics style RPG just go play Pathfinder Kingmaker or Divinity 2. Yes, this has anime elements and I do love anime but that is not enough of a selling point when your characters are paper thin, the voices are not-english, and the translation has awkward moments.

EDIT: The first few hours of a game should be interesting. Consider Persona 4 which takes literally ages to get past the opening and actually let you play, the story and characters brought me into it. An incredibly complicated stat system is desired when it doesn't feel tedious, consider Pathfinder Kingmaker where I spent hours just building characters. And on that note; introductory combat can be easy without being boring (consider FE3H) or it can be difficult without being tedious. Those are all games from far less indi developers; yet my favorite game so far this year was easily Exocolonist which is from a small studio, so I know that smaller developers can succeed. 

In my first 7 hours of playing Troubleshooter the characters, combat, and stats/item/mastery system has just been mediocre. I may keep playing and feel differently but I really think for me to consider a game there HAS to be more at the start to make up for bringing you into it. What does it say about your game that I set the AI companion to auto and am watching YouTube on my second monitor? What does it say about your game that I am doing my dailys in my phone Gacha while enemies take their turns because your game just drags? I've already played 6 hours, I'm clearly trying.

The Developer responded to my pre:edited review and I thought I would include the text bellow because I find their response interesting. I've given a lot of positive and negative reviews and rarely do devs respond. It is unclear if this is a canned response, but it's certainly nice. And despite me giving a negative review I did not refund the game, do plan on playing more, and would not avoid this devs products in the future.

"""Dandylion  [developer] Posted: Oct 5 @ 5:48pm
We're sorry that we couldn't give you satisfactory pleasure because we didn't have enough ability.

The initial progress and content is slow, especially in the process of wanting to get used to the battle and the process for the overall story of the world that this game wants to convey. I don't think you'll feel much different from other games as you step on it. This is all because of our lack of capabilities.

But if you have a chance to enjoy our game a little longer, eventually I have no doubt you'll find that it's not just bored game. The reason why I say this is because most of the people who had negative reviews similar to you who played for a long time changed the review positively. Of course, I know that may not be the case in your case. :D

The reason why I'm writing this down is because I want to tell us that you have about 80 hours left to play your own mission. Our game may lack a lot, but we will continue to provide you with various elements until the end of the game. Through that process, I hope you enjoy our game even a little more.

Apart from the ability to make games, I want to make our game buyers happy, and it's frustrating because it's mostly due to a lack of initial immersion.

We'll do our best to give you more pleasure.

Have a good day!"""
developer_response:
We're sorry that we couldn't give you satisfactory pleasure because we didn't have enough ability.

The initial progress and content is slow, especially in the process of wanting to get used to the battle and the process for the overall story of the world that this game wants to convey. I don't think you'll feel much different from other games as you step on it. This is all because of our lack of capabilities.

But if you have a chance to enjoy our game a little longer, eventually I have no doubt you'll find that it's not just bored game. The reason why I say this is because most of the people who had negative reviews similar to you who played for a long time changed the review positively. Of course, I know that may not be the case in your case. :D

The reason why I'm writing this down is because I want to tell us that you have about 80 hours left to play your own mission. Our game may lack a lot, but we will continue to provide you with various elements until the end of the game. Through that process, I hope you enjoy our game even a little more.

Apart from the ability to make games, I want to make our game buyers happy, and it's frustrating because it's mostly due to a lack of initial immersion.

We'll do our best to give you more pleasure.

Have a good day!

author: {'steamid': '76561198005440506', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1879, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 947, 'last_played': 1665289857}
review: With the fun tactical gameplay like X-Com, layer upon layer of game systems waiting to be discovered, full traditional JRPGesque story and the ability to tailor the difficulty to be a walk in the park or a significant challenge, this is one of those rare gems at an unbeatable price. A must buy and play.
developer_response:
The development team will improve the game so that more people can relate to what you have experienced. And the longer you spend with Troubleshooter, the more updates will be prepared.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105156799', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 16573, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10713, 'last_played': 1709992662}
review: 剧情对话有点中二，也可能是翻译的原因，我有点看不懂。操作类似于XCOM。这游戏有超多天赋装备可以自由搭配，养成系统在战棋游戏里做的相当好。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

你从我们的剧情那里感受到中二的感觉的原因可能有很多。 但是最重要的原因正如你所提到的那样，翻译和我们缺乏的故事展开能力。这两种能力是我们今后在继续开发游戏的过程中亟待改善的问题。 在某个瞬间，这些缺点不可能都得到改善。 但是我们在开发游戏的时候，不会停止努力改善这个问题。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198335865260', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 2612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 456, 'last_played': 1710860704}
review:
原价买的。还可以。。就是风格之类的可能没有魔界战记，神之战，幻世录2上头。。。感觉还是培养类的好一点。前面太多杂兵帮你打了，搞得时间拖很久，地图也得搜索。然后英雄前面没那么突出。。装备大部分箱子开也比较繁琐，还不如直接掉（刚开始几小时的感受）。
战旗游戏不多，反正基本出来我都会买支持一下。尤其是出了2年竟然还在更新。国产的倒是有点不肯支持了= =
玩了30多小时后感觉内容还是比较足的。套装，红装啥的也都有。如果再有个2转就差不多了。但是因为他这个任务地图比较大，然后还要搜索，导致游戏时间比较长。打发时间还不错。还有就是游戏图标，出来2年了我都没发现这款是战旗，看了别的游戏别人留言才知道（STM目前我喜欢的战旗好像也就这个跟神之战做得不错，魔界6开始不打折不能买了）
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

最大限度地消除妨碍游戏进行的因素,让玩家更快地进行游戏是开发组的一大目标之一。 但是我认为,如果所有的一切都为了快速进行游戏而被删除,那可能会使游戏变得不像游戏。 我们会好好考虑两者之间的平衡来改进游戏。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198090213700', 'num_games_owned': 165, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 58484, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1114, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1712376461}

author: {'steamid': '76561198031777746', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 9049, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4379, 'last_played': 1704905931}

author: {'steamid': '76561198028728947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 5702, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5702, 'last_played': 1647123768}
review:
The amount of effort and dedication this dev team has poured into this game is astounding and should set the standard for the industry.

The game is constantly being updated with new content and bug fixes. There are no gimmicks, no in-game store, no microtransactions, no content-related DLCs.

If you buy the game, you get the full experience.

And what a wonderful experience it is. A mix between XCOM combat and Final Fantasy party management and anime storytelling, the gameplay really hits the spot.

For those who desire complexity and a long campaign, this game delivers. It will take longer to unlock all the game features and playable characters in Troubleshooter than it takes to finish a typical AAA studio 60 hour game. But the pace is exciting, so even as you learn about all the game mechanics you are neither bored nor overwhelmed.

For those who desire a game that can be played in more manageable chunks, everything is mission-based, so you can play as many missions per session as you have time for, with the overarching story to keep everything interesting.

This game is worth every penny, even at full price. And the devs deserve every bit of support for continuing to update their game for free, YEARS after launch.
developer_response:
XCOM is actually a game that represents this genre. And we've had a lot of influence from this. But what many gamers wanted from independent game development teams was not just a copy of XCOM. Since then, our biggest goal has been to give Troubleshooter individuality. The development team always felt sorry for the short story while doing XCOM. That's when we started borrowing the elements of the RPG.

We can't guarantee whether we have mixed XCOM and FFT and implemented it well as a single game. However, your evaluation confirmed that we are not in the wrong direction. We look forward to further expanding Troubleshooter based on this. So I hope I can spend more time with you.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198304956481', 'num_games_owned': 176, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 3338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1690085011}

author: {'steamid': '76561198027090314', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 12897, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10390, 'last_played': 1665169398}
review:
There really is so much depth to this game, I think it stands out as a true masterpiece of the genre.

Likeable characters and an interesting story, but the true joy of the game has to do with its complexity, balance, and challenge that the tactical combat offers. If you are only in it for the story you might not love the game as much as me, but if you can accept the story for what it is and get through a few initial missions where the tactical options are a bit limited, the combat is really, REALLY good.

A lot of different characters, equipment, skills, buffs/debuffs, enemies... the list goes on! What I like is that there's tons of depth, but a lot of it's optional. You can always focus on the story missions and ignore some of the other elements, like the crafting stuff, side quests, and grinding for loot drops, but if you are looking for an ultra build you might spend a lot of time doing all of those as well as looking at some of the excellent guides that are available. 

Also. the dev team is very responsive and active in the forums, and they regularly patch and improve the game. At the time of this review, they're working on another DLC for the game, and then will be focusing on a stand alone sequel.

Edit, post developer response: the early game is only a bit slow when compared to the incredibly vast array of tactical options presented by the mid to late game. There are many other games that do what TROUBLESHOOTER does for the first 2 hours for the entire game! My intention with that comment was to convey that this game is really special, but you need to progress a bit and start growing your company and mastery sets before you truly appreciate just how special it is :)
developer_response:
" but if you can accept the story for what it is and get through a few initial missions where the tactical options are a bit limited, "

In fact, this part has been a mistake and regrets ever since the development team recognized it. We tried to amend this belatedly, but we failed to correct the fundamental part because there was already too much content involved. We've reduced the size of the map and reduced the number of enemies that appear, but this doesn't seem to solve the essence of the problem. Even if we had received bad reviews from you, we would have acknowledged it. Because that's true. Nevertheless, I would like to thank you for your positive influence on the development team through a good review.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198281384826', 'num_games_owned': 166, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3743, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2163, 'last_played': 1665054368}

author: {'steamid': '76561198346039187', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 340, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1688179309}
review:
与其说是战旗，倒不如说是RPG，战旗元素就像是拿一个非常中规中矩的战旗玩法，在加上一些小小的创意，而且大部分远程攻击命中率都低得感人，近乎贴脸才有输出，但是这也意味着对面能贴脸命中你。
比起玩法更侧重角色塑造和剧情，然而剧情实在太俗套，简直就是日本TV动漫编剧写出来的流水剧，唯一能够吸引人的就是生动的角色。
虽然是3D，但是游戏哪怕做成2D也没有太多影响，3D就是锦上添花。
还是给个友情赞吧，游戏品质很好，但是就是说不出哪里有问题，食之无味弃之可惜。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

从游戏的外观来看，我们的游戏比最近上市的游戏水平低。这个开发组也认可。我们是小游戏开发组，不能制作大型开发组制作的高水平图像。那么我们应该拥有属于我们的风格，但是那个还没有确立。这些是我们今后游戏开发过程中必须解决的问题。感谢您不顾诸多缺点，对游戏给予好评，给予开发组前进的力量。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198132360527', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 8538, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2345, 'last_played': 1666900408}
review:
在2D美术设定非常漂亮的情况下，为什么3D建模这么难看？
现在的3D建模和2D人物设定集放在一起，如果不是穿着同一件衣服，我都不觉得是同一个角色。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

" 在2D美术设定非常漂亮的情况下，为什么3D建模这么难看？ "

这就是我们公开游戏后受到的最多的批评。因为我们是小开发组，所以不能像大规模开发组一样展示华丽的3D建模。但是，既然如此，就应该有我们自己的个性，但现在我们的3D建模连那个都没有。开发组也认为这是通过下一部作品需要解决的最大问题。现在开发组将进一步改善【分争调整者】，为后续作品做好彻底的准备。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198999032523', 'num_games_owned': 213, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 8385, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1910, 'last_played': 1666615007}
review: [h1]第三章“扭结的线团”有BUG，剧情任务是营救特勤小组后全员撤离地图，而我则是全灭敌人过关，在过程中，敌人会自己内讧起来，自己打自己人。[/h1]
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

你说得对。任务首次公开时，只有让警察们躲避到安全地带，才能在任务中获胜。但是随着时间的流逝，很多人开始说，击退任务内的所有敌人后，再次将警察转移到安全地带是不必要的。开发组也同意这一点，并追加了打败地区内的所有敌人后完成任务的条件。只是这个没有显示任务胜利目标，所以好像引起了你的误会。我们将改进以更清楚地显示任务胜利条件。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198020478540', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 85718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5624, 'last_played': 1709207015}
review:
This real gem of a game is ridiculously well done compared to a lot of others in this price category and is - for 20 bucks - an absolute steal. Huge playtime, great cast, emotional story, engrossing character customization with lots of cool builds you can try. The gameplay systems work well together and never feel gimmicky, combat is satisfying. 

The english translation contrary to a lot of the complaints is perfectly fitting if you think about it. The sometimes stilted speech and unusual phrasing stem from the language the characters originally speak and is honestly not a big deal. It would be stranger -  I think - if they all had some urban brooklyn dialect since you'd get a lot of stuff lost in translation and it would feel misplaced considering the setting.

The only gripe i have is that you get additional characters rather slowly and since they are all unique you literally cannot make a team full of gun toting crackshots or axe wielding maniacs. I would buy DLC in a heartbeat - more characters and jobs for the existing ones would be amazing.

Anyways thanks to the developers for their passion and for making this great game.
Cheers!
developer_response:
Dandylion is a small development team, made up exclusively of people specialized in game development skills. No one on the team thought of the importance of translation. We thought that as long as the game was well made, other things could be ignored. But it was a misjudgment. Translation was more important than anything else. No matter how much we build and improve the game, people left the game before they even recognized the existence of what we made. The reason was only because of the translation. 

We realized this belatedly and with the help of many people, the translation is improving little by little. (It's still hard to argue that it's a good translation.) Despite these big shortcomings, I'd like to thank you for writing a good review to Troubleshooter and for giving the development team a lot of strength.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999862346', 'num_games_owned': 128, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3548, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3548, 'last_played': 1661560592}
review:
50時間ちょいプレイした時点での感想です。

値段の割にかなり遊べる。これは間違いないです。

XCOMはやったことないですが、FFTやオウガシリーズなどと比較しても全然遊べます。
未だクリアしてないし中盤くらいだと思いますが50時間超えてます。

ただまあプレイ時間が長くなる理由の一つに、１バトルが長くなりがちというのもあります。
敵キャラが30人とか40人とか普通だし、マップも広い。
敵が視野に入っているとその分の敵の行動を見ることになるので
「俺のターンいつ来るねん・・・・」という感じで眠くなってくる。
敵キャラの行動をある程度ショートカットできる設定にしてもこうなる。
かといって敵の行動も見てないとまずいしなあ・・・・という感じ。

あとキャラごとのアクティブスキルが少ない。
だから、アクティブスキルの選択肢が少ないという縛りの中で、めちゃくちゃ多いパッシブスキルをどう組み合わせるか考えることになります。
これが自分的にはちょっと微妙でした。(人によってはこれが良いのかも。)
敵がめっちゃ多いゲーム性だから、「結局一気に殲滅できる広範囲攻撃スキル持ちが強いじゃん・・・・」となってしまう。
単体攻撃スキルばっか持ってるキャラが不憫に思えてくる。
もしかするとそれを覆すビルドがあるのかもしれませんが、そこに行きつく前になんか飽きちゃいました。

アクティブスキルが豊富にあったら多分神ゲー扱いになってたと思います。

あと敵キャラ操作するステージも何回かあったのですが、正直今後恒久的に操作するわけでもないし、スキル何があるか確認するのだるかったです。

なんにせよ、ハマる人はハマって数百時間やっちゃうゲームであるのは分かります。
ということでおすすめです。
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

FFTとオウガシリーズは私が幼い頃経験したSFCのゲームの中で5本の指に入るゲームです。（個人的にはFFTよりはタクティクスオウガがもっと好きです。それの前作である伝説のオウガバトルは、私のゲーム人生を語る時に欠かせないゲームです。)。その当時の私はこのゲームを接しながら日本のゲームと日本という国に対して憧れたりしました。あなたが【トラブルシューター】からFFTとオウガシリーズの感じを受けたとすれば、それはおそらく私に刻印された幼い頃を敵の「良いゲーム」に対する跡がゲームについたためだと思います。

もちろん、このようなゲームにあなたが言及した私たちの短所は存在しません。 これは、私たちがゲームのジャンルの特性をきちんと理解できないまま、JRPGの性質をそのまま導入した私たちの経験不足から始まったのです。 おそらく、私たちがそれほど憧れたシステムを具現できるということだけに埋没し、ゲームの全体的なバランスを看過したようです。

"アクティブスキルが少ない。"

その通りです。 これは私たちの開発チームの限界を示す部分でもあります。 開発チームはキャラクターにもっと多様な動作を作ることができず、その反対給付で多様な特性を製作することにさらに集中しました。 このため、多様な特性を作る目標はある程度達成していますが、アクティブスキルが足りないのは依然として残念な部分です。

今は既存のシステムを改善し拡張することに集中しています。 構造的な問題点は次期作を通じて必ず改善された姿をお見せします。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198806279878', 'num_games_owned': 24, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 16919, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1704288045}
review: 刚入手玩了没多久，本来是想找类似火纹的战棋游戏，看到有推荐这个就过来看了看，评价也都是蛮推荐的，正好打折就入了，玩了几关目前感觉还行，个人很喜欢那个白毛女，有点像DNF的剑宗，又帅又强。有一个问题想问一下，我看到这个游戏一直在更新，我现在玩的是离线模式，如果说更新了，那么更新的东西是不是不会到我的游戏内？我得重新开局或者选在线模式才会更新？
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

很高兴见到你。如果【分争调整者】能成为你寻找的游戏的替代品，那对开发组来说也是非常好的所属。

1.
即使使用离线模式玩游戏，更新也会继续适用。但是玩游戏时，必须始终处于连接Steam的状态。

2.
啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198005003306', 'num_games_owned': 208, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 14575, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13129, 'last_played': 1704537272}
review:
국산 웰메이드 게임
일러스트도 좋고 스토리도 몰입감 있고
가격 착하고 처음에는 오버 밸런스가 있었지만
꾸준한 업데이트로 어느정도 바로 잡히고 앞으로도 잡힐꺼고
추가 스토리 소식에 리뷰 남깁니다.
캐쥬얼하게도 즐길수 있고 하드하게도 즐길수 있는
스킬시스템 매력에 푹빠져서 200시간을 넘게 했네요
턴제와 시뮬레이션 rpg를 좋아하는 유저라면
꼭 해보시길 추천 드립니다.


액션게임보다는 턴제와 시뮬레이션 게임을 좋아하는 게이머로서

추천도 9/10
developer_response:
턴제와 시뮬레이션을 좋아하는 분들에게 이렇게 좋은 평가를 받을때마다 그동안 저희가 해온 일이 부족하지만 그래도 잘 나아가고 있구나 싶어 솔직히 많이 기쁩니다.

이후 DLC 나 신규 프로젝트에서도 계속하여 즐거움을 드릴 수 있도록 최선을 다하겠습니다!

즐거운 한 주 되세요!

감사합니다!

author: {'steamid': '76561197961268382', 'num_games_owned': 908, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 11765, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10680, 'last_played': 1705213714}
review:
I haven't played this game in awhile however I always check in on it every few weeks looking forward to seeing if there's any major updates.

This is the kind of game that I want to play more of but as of right now I really don't have much left to do. If you look at my hours played you can probably see that I've done just about everything this game has to offer and I can say I enjoyed almost every single aspect of it. 

I did not run into a single bug playing this game, it is extremely well polished. Gameplay has a lot of depth and strategy. Story had me contemplating about all the different ideologies the different gangs and factions held and the character development had me sympathetic to their plight.

Honestly can not wait to see what's next. This game is totally worth more than what you're paying for it.
developer_response:
Thank you very much for your experience with everything we have prepared for you. And sorry for not supplying more on time. We are preparing another DLC. Maybe we can start updating it from next month. We do our best to prepare the content at a level that will satisfy you. So please check our news from time to time as we do now. We hope to see you in the game again. :D

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970926635', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1933, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1933, 'last_played': 1660498950}
review: This is very much what I would call "Anime XCOM." And that's not a bad thing by any stretch. The characters each have their own personalities in the story, it's fun seeing things progress. There's more in depth about it than I'm probably going to explain, but the core gameplay loop is very on par with XCOM's turn based, the cover doesn't need to be hugged nearly as much, and actions can have more nuance. It's fun. I enjoy it. I hope that if you read this and you buy it, that you enjoy it as well. The devs have put a lot of heart and soul into this product and it really shows.
developer_response:
We are very sorry that we only gave you 30 hours of enjoyable experience. I think the reason you didn't finish our game is obviously because I am making a big mistake somewhere. If you have any such issues, please let me know at any time through the Steam community. I will never miss your voice. Please check our announcements from time to time. Our development is not over yet. :D

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198159392428', 'num_games_owned': 205, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 8296, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1996, 'last_played': 1681852327}
review:
这是一款你很难给上差评的游戏。
诚然，它的建模不够精美，没有大段大段华丽的cg演出，也不是什么开放世界3A大作。
但是它的每一个关卡都是用心设计的，成长build系统是非常有深度的，玩法也是成熟且具有挑战的。
作为一款2020年就推出了的游戏，直至昨日仍然能看到制作组上传的更新动态，对比起来简直吊打某些动辄50刀60刀的所谓3A游戏。
同样符合亚洲人审美的精美立绘原画，同样是战棋游戏，近期某个日系的要卖400，这个只卖80。400的褒贬不一，这边特别好评，我只能说高下立判。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

" 它的建模不够精美，没有大段大段华丽的cg演出 "

单凭这个内容，即使您对我们的游戏做出不好的评价，我们也不会提出任何反驳。因为你这个评价是真的。我们是小游戏开发组，很难像大规模开发组一样制作好的画面。但是我们应该创造出属于我们的个性风格，但是我们没有做到。这在我们开发游戏的时候一定要解决。今后不会停止技术开发，以便通过我们制作的游戏改善这些部分。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198114116129', 'num_games_owned': 157, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 3199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1359, 'last_played': 1703435513}

author: {'steamid': '76561198244298624', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 237, 'last_played': 1685760261}
review:
1. 스토리 보는 재미로 하는데 전투가 늘어지는 느낌은 있음. 
맵은 넓고 똑같은 적들이 곳곳에 숨어 있어서 일부로 경찰 엑스트라 아군들 맵 전체에 퍼뜨려놓고 벌집 쑤시듯이 모든 적들 다 깨우고 니가와 전략 시전하는중... 게임 중간중간에 간단한 스토리가 대사 형식으로 뜨게 하거나 4지 선다 선택지가 나오는 식으로 이벤트가 더 풍부해지면 루즈함을 줄일 수 있으려나...?

2. 스토리 전투 진입시 캐릭터들의 4지 선다 선택지가 나오는데 다른 선택지 결과가 궁금. 근데 초반이라 그런지 이전 스토리 다시 하는 기능이 아직 없다. 나중 되야 뜨는건가...?

3. 턴제 게임이라서 다른 동영상 틀어놓고 천천히 즐기기 좋음. 
평소에 손가락 통증이 있다보니 FPS 같은거 하고 나면 손이 아프길래 그 다음 게임은 이걸로 선택함. 누워서 한판 하고 나면 끄는 식으로 진행중.

정보처리기사 인강이나 회사에서 강제로 듣게 하는 개인정보보호 강의 같은거 같이 켜놓고 리클라이너에 누워서 발가락으로 키보드 번호키 눌러서 스킬 쓰고 있는데... 귀찮...
developer_response:
짧은 플레이에도 불구하고 저희 게임을 긍정적으로 평가해주셔서 감사합니다!!

1. 게임이 조금 루즈하시다면, 물리적으로 게임을 가속하고 불필요한 이벤트 메시지를 삭제하여 조금이라도 게임을 쾌적하게 만들 수 있습니다.

대표적으로 "환경설정" > "게임플레이" > "아군 행동 빠르게 연출/ 아군 외 행동 빠르게 연출" 옵션을 사용하시면 조금이나마 늘어지는 게임 흐름을 빠르게 가져갈 수 있습니다.

2.  1챕터 완료 후 다시 하기 기능이 제공됩니다. 대화의 선택지는 큰 흐름의 변화는 없지만 해당 상황에서의 변화는 반영되는 경우가 많습니다. 관심이 있으시다면 여유가 되실 때 천천히 진행하시길 권장드립니다!

3. 대부분 게임 중 손 통증은 목/허리 등의 자세 문제로 신경이 장시간 눌려서 발생하는 문제입니다. 자세를 고쳐않고 손에 묵직함이 생기거나 통증이 오면 잠시 손의 사용을 줄이셔야 합니다. 대부분 큰 문제없이 휴식으로 손의 상태가 원상복구되나 장기간 신경이 눌릴 경우, 여러가지 합병증이 발생할 수 있으니 외과 전문의를 찾아가시는 걸 권유드립니다!

정보처리 기사 합격을 기원합니다!

저희 게임을 찾아주셔서 감사합니다!

author: {'steamid': '76561197979856524', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 24334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17892, 'last_played': 1698677036}
review:
Un excellent jeu qui est d'une grande profondeur tactique. On peut d'ailleurs le rapprocher de XCOM 2, mais même moi qui ait 1000 h de jeu sur XCOM 2, je pense que Troubleshooter est bien mieux réussi par certains aspects, voire globalement.

Quelques points positifs :

-Les compétences personnalisables en profondeur, pouvant faire de votre tank un damage dealer ou faire de votre mage à distance un tank dévastateur au corps à corps. Il existe tellement de build et de variante possible que la ''limitation'' à quelques personnages (une dizaine) n'est pas un réel problème.
-Une grande diversité dans les armes proposées, ce qui ouvre la voie à de nombreux builds, bien que les personnages soient restreints à un maximum de deux armes.
-Des ennemis trèèèèèès variés et certains véritablement redoutables, qui offrent un véritable défi dans l'ensemble.
-Des combats avec trois factions en simultanée, qui se battent entre elles également.
-Des niveaux bien conçu, parfois immense, parfois plus restreints, mais qui sont véritablement uniques.
-Des alliés PNJ qui ne font pas que de la figuration, ils peuvent être très bon et vraiment ajouter un + aux combats sans être des poids morts (ce qui est très vrai au début, mais à mesure que vous gagnez en niveau et en puissance, les unités de soutien sont littéralement juste des unités qui vous épaulent. Ce qui est très cohérent étant donné que votre compagnie est censée devenir une force de frappe à part entière et ne pas dépendre d'aide)
-Une communauté très active qui offre des informations et des guides sur ABSOLUMENT TOUS les aspects du jeu, ce qui est d'une grande aide.
-Un jeu d'une qualité de vie très appréciable, avec de nombreuses options pour augmenter la vitesse des combats et des animations de déplacement, de quoi rendre les quelques moments de farm très rapides.
-Un véritable impact de l'environnement sur les stats des personnages, que ce soit la pluie qui améliorent les coups crit des attaques électriques ou la nuit qui réduit la visibilité globale.
-Des personnages réellement intéressants et attachants, tous très uniques et la possibilité de rejouer des missions de campagne afin de faire des choix différents pour avoir une vision différente d'une situation ou en apprendre plus sur le background.
-Une équipe de développeurs réactifs et très agréables qui offrent des skins et des DLC entiers pour le jeu. Franchement, ça fait réellement plaisir quand on voit certaines pratiques chez la concurrence…
-Une histoire prenante, qui est vraiment intéressante et qui n'est pas du tout manichéenne. Cependant…

Points négatifs :
l'histoire met trop de temps à démarrer et on est coincé avec quelques personnages pendant un certain temps, ce qui peut faire décrocher du jeu. J'ai décroché et accroché à trois ou quatre reprise avant de revenir et d'accrocher définitivement. (j'ai aussi farmer inutilement, ce qui m'a fait perdre un certains)
-La grande diversité de compétence peut les rendre écrasantes. Trop d'informations, c'est un peu pesant et on peut rapidement s'y perdre.
-Un environnement non destructible, ce qui est regrettable, mais compréhensible, l'équipe de Troublshooter n'ont pas les moyens de 2k, ce qui ne retire rien à l'intensité des affrontements.
-Une difficulté à doser. Certains combats, même en difficile et en challenge ne sont pas aussi épique qu'ils ne le devraient l'être. Surtout pour des combats de fins d'arc, ça manque clairement de difficultés et de mise en scène, et c'est vraiment dommage. Alors qu'au contraire, certaines missions secondaires sont autrement plus corsées.

Conclusion :
Même si j'ai fini par du négatif, le jeu est réellement excellent et je le recommande à tous ceux qui recherchent un xcom like, vous ne serez pas déçu. Accrochez-vous au début et vous verrez, vous n'aurez pas envie de vous arrêter. Je recommande à 100 %.
developer_response:
No one in the development team knows the French so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

If you wrote a negative review, the development team would agree with you. In particular, some of the things you mentioned are really fatal drawbacks to the review of the game.

- The story is slow at the beginning of the game.
- It did not kindly explain how to utilize various masteries.

The latest game trend is to reduce unnecessary preparations for playing games as much as possible and complete one independent mission. On the other hand, Troubleshooter needs a lot of preparation to experience a full-fledged game and all missions have continuity. It doesn't match the current game trend. Of the shortcomings you've mentioned, the two above point exactly to this. 

We're a small independent game development team of six people and we have clear technical limitations. However, the disadvantages above are fatal mistakes that are misconfigured in the design stage of the game. Nevertheless, I would like to thank the development team for giving them the courage to continue developing the game through good reviews.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040093463', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 457, 'last_played': 1663374206}
review:
X-Com had set gear and random characters.

This has set characters and random gear.

It feels a bit less punishing than X-Com too.
developer_response:
XCOM is a really fun game. And it's a game that lets users know what kind of disaster a single mistake can cause. And the pleasure of passing through such a process safely is indescribable. Like you said, we're a little bit off this. We would rather recommend a way to quickly complete repetitive battles. It is the pleasure of our game to experience the growth of characters in this process.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198258669903', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 7916, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 723, 'last_played': 1664955250}
review:
系统臃肿不堪，大量无意义内容，制作天赋，制作物品数量多的眼花
数值设计稀烂，攒一个大招指示器100%命中率打3个目标有2个miss
AI弱智，救出特务任务敌人随机乱跑触发特务引起恐慌到处乱跑，直接跑进怪堆拉火车送掉，一整场全白打
学学做减法吧
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

很遗憾我们确立的战斗系统没有得到你的共鸣。我们对各种数据不做任何人为的调整。尽管如此,如果你对此感到不合理,那可能是我们表达错了意思或翻译的问题。不管是什么，开发组的错误都很大。我们随时准备面对我们的错误。如果有不合理或游戏错误的地方，请随时告诉我们。我们不会放过你的声音。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198276701589', 'num_games_owned': 733, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 9416, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2581, 'last_played': 1673296267}
review:
装备系统里套装太偏向于功能性了，
如果为了追求输出还是要靠散件，
感觉这方面可以再优化一下，出一些角色专属的套装配合独一无二的机制。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

大部分角色都有相似种类的套装，但并不像你所说的那样都有相同的种类。无论何时都赞成增加只能佩戴一个角色的专用装备。但是，应该摒弃因此角色的性能比其他角色压倒性的提高。安装独一无二的机制的角色不是所有方面都很突出，而是要更加明确地发挥自己的特征。因此，与其说独一无二的机制单纯是为了与其他角色保持平衡，不如说是在角色能力均衡时追加的可能性更高。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

现在所有的角色都有相同数量的职业。在这种状态下，只给某一个角色添加新的职业是不公平的。通过新的角色可以实现新的职业。但遗憾的是，下一个DLC即将上市，有关新角色的工作已经在进行中。为了体现你所提到的职业，现在变更有关新角色的内容可能会推迟DLC的上市。因此，本次DLC将如期上市。更多样的角色和职业将通过未来的DLC或后续作品体现出来。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

review:
非常出色的战棋游戏，战斗系统很多类似XCOM2但是很多方面却胜于他，研究职业技能搭配和队员连携非常有趣，2D美术也很不错，3D有些拉胯不过可以接受

author: {'steamid': '76561199225556454', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 30880, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7134, 'last_played': 1700272518}
review:
最後（8章）までクリア！
あれこれと考えながら進めるとメンバーが見違える程に強くなったり特長出せるので面白い。
これまで数多くのSRPGをプレイしてきましたが、最高と言って良い名作です。
キャラクター、バトル、数多くのイベント一枚絵、システム、プレイ時間（ボリューム）、そして全体の雰囲気と全て満足で非常に濃厚な時を過ごさせていただいて感謝の限りです。
早くも続編（？）の次回作が楽しみ。
私はこの作品が非常に気に入って、同じ様なSRPGであるXCOMシリーズをプレイした派です(笑)

私たちのゲームに来てくださって、こうやって応援してくださって本当にありがとうございます！
