author: {'steamid': '76561198175492299', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 16963, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11309, 'last_played': 1709988669}
review:
No sé a quien no le podría jugar este juego si te gustan los tacticos por turnos. 

Historia: 10 (Muy estilo anime, cada personaje tiene su propia personalidad y lo saben desarrollar muy bien, aunque encuentres algunos clitches del anime, están bien adaptados al juego y se ve organico) 

Historias secundarias: 9 (Aunque tiene misiones comunes, tiene una historia interesante en sus personajes secundarios, como digo cada personaje tiene una personalidad definida, incluso los secundarios) 

Jugabilidad: 10 (Siempre pude posicionar la cámara y saber que estaba haciendo sin esfuerzo alguno)

Mecanicas: 8 (Da mucha pereza estar haciendo equipamiento y maestrías, pero te adaptas conforme el tiempo) 

Bugs: 9 (Al principio solo encontré uno de no tener sonido pero mande un correo y me dijeron como solucionarlo al día siguiente, muy atentos) 

Rendimiento: 9 Para los estandars de hoy en día, no se necesita mucho 

Nota general: 9 (Es un excelente juego, el farmeo no es tan intenso y puedes hacerlo tan dificil como gustes, puede ser un poco abrumante la cantidad de información al principio, pero te adaptas muy rapido)
developer_response:
No one in the development team knows the Spanish so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

Thank you for evaluating various parts of the game from the perspective of the game player. Dandylion is a small development team of six people. Therefore, no matter how much we care about the game, there is a clear limit to reflecting the positions of various gamers. 

So your evaluation gives us a good opportunity to look back on our own game. We can't be sure that we can make a game with 10 points in every field. However, we will try to make a better game by clearly dividing what we should aim for and what we should avoid through future updates or next works.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976620624', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 630, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 630, 'last_played': 1652196677}
review:
Friends of XCOM and JRPGs will find a nice fusion in this game. Troubleshooter is essentially just a clone of Firaxis' XCOM games, however it piles on a lot of character progression and theorycrafting that XCOM (intentionally) simplified away. Where XCOM has very few short 'n' sweet ways to customize and specialize characters, Troubleshooter goes ham with very detailed systems like skill crafting, skill set bonuses, gear customization, gear crafting, gear drops, skill drops from specific enemies, etc etc. adding a lot of depth.

I would not consider the added depth to be an *improvement* over XCOM. Rather, it is a sidegrade. It offers something else for people who enjoy it. Others may consider it just added tedium.

Troubleshooter is, however, designed for more "bulk" of play, by being extensively customizable for animations etc. to happen *very quickly*, leading to you being able to play more missions with more things happening in them. XCOM is more of a slow, more cinematic experience, where each action takes a decent amount of time.

The biggest win for Troubleshooter is in the art and aesthetic. Troubleshooter's character designs are great, if simple, and the art style is very appealing for fans of an anime / manhwa style. Not enough praise can be poured on the CGs representing the characters, or the sheer amount of them.

The biggest loss, however, may be in the writing and the localization. This my one biggest pet peeve I would like to see improved. The story of the game, unfortunately, does not draw me in AT ALL, with very uninspired, bland dialogue and a plot around a "Spoonist" cult which appears rather silly just by its name. It is hard to take any of this seriously.

However I feel that the biggest loss of impact in the story may come from the poor localization. I do not speak Korean, so I cannot compare the original vision of the plot and characters to what we receive in the English version. The English is ripe with stilted, awkward dialogue, very boring, matter-of-factly descriptions of events, and a complete lack of characterization or uniqueness between any of the characters due to the fact that they all speak in essentially the same way. I am forced to enjoy the characters only by the compelling art of their designs, as the writing and dialogue behind them is very uninspired, and I find myself uninterested in their personalities, since they do not seem to have much of one.

This is not even mentioning the various plain *mistakes* in the localization, coming from a lack of cohesive plan behind it, leading to various game mechanics being described in either awkward, or different terms from sentence to sentence. It is clear that, at some points, the localisers did not really know what context they were translating their lines in.

I implore the team behind TROUBLESHOOTER to research ways to provide a better localization of the English text, perhaps with the help of an external company. Focus on bringing across the characters and story in a more lively and interesting way. And make sure that the localization team understands the gameplay and mechanics in order to be able to helpfully translate ability, skill and gear descriptions.

I will recommend the game for XCOM and anime fans, however TROUBLESHOOTER could be *much* better if not for the missed potential due to the above issues.
developer_response:
The development team feels the same way about the criticism that you have devoted much of your assessment. When the development team first planned the game, the idea of the localization was simple. 

' Even if the sentence is a little awkward, there will be no problem in playing the game if the meaning works. '

However, this turned out to be a big mistake shortly after the game was released. Many gamers turned off the game and refunded the game as soon as they saw the strange translation they faced from the first screen of the game, which forced us to accept countless bad reviews.

The development team admitted that it was a mistake and improved it with the help of gamers. You might think, "Is this all you can do to improve?" Yes, that's right. The translation before the improvement work was really bad. This work is still in progress. Since the first language of the development team is Korean, there will be certain limitations to improvement in other languages except Korean. However, as long as the game continues to be updated, improvements in translation will continue.

Thank you for taking the development team to another step forward with your good review despite the game's extremely fatal shortcomings. Although the translation will bother you a little bit, there is definitely a lot of content in the game. We will improve it further. So if you have time, please enjoy the contents slowly.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198303808274', 'num_games_owned': 112, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 12255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7329, 'last_played': 1686134460}
review:
慢悠悠的把主线和DLC通关了，感觉不错，就是难度跨越其实还有点大，我是全程普通模式外加几乎不去重复刷材料过的，令我印象最深的是第一次遇到白虎组，DLC的集市关和DLC的最后一关

第一次遇到白虎组是我第一次觉得不死人过不去的关，我就是在那时放弃了不死人过关这个想法，其实还挺令人感到沮丧的

DLC的集市关是我觉得难度跨越最大的一关，因为我是打完主线直接开的DLC，没有刷过，所以当我拿着平均45+的人进入这关，我就看着我的人物一个接一个的不闪就是被秒还是挺有挫败感的，特别是我想方设法的把前面那堆挨一下打动一下的黑色大叔熬过去之后，来了一堆白衣服一脚一个，而且残血必定格挡这个属性很恶心，特别恶心，最后我是依靠着即使失败也把经验保留下来这个设定才过去的，这个设定我还挺喜欢的，我是特别不愿意去重复刷的性格，特别是战棋一局的游玩时间对比其他游戏特别长的情况下

DLC最后一关是我唯一一次妥协把难度调低过的，其实不一定打不过，但一个是时长太久了，122个小时我才打通，以我的耐心也有点坐不住了，另一个是我用的顺手的角色全在左边，而左边巨大的机器人军团给我的震撼也很大

接下来有几点不能说是建议，只能说是期待。第一个期待是，剧情上虽说有那么多选择，但故事的主进程其实还是单线，我希望有更多可以实质影响到剧情的选择，比如我的选择可以打败马尔科把露娜留下来之类的，或者只是埋下一个伏笔，可以让我在之后的剧情吧露娜也加入到公司来之类的（没错，我对不能把露娜留下来这件事很怨念）

还有就是期待有更多的职业，以及转职职业的再转职，

最后，其实我觉得两位DLC的小姐姐的双人关设计的不错，虽然我不知道你们愿本的意思是什么样的的，但我是站在开始的那个楼顶上，让艾尔莎顶住入口，在上面让比安科，一下一下挨个点掉的，最后问一句，两位小姐姐是会结婚的吧，对吧，你要是敢虐这两位小姐姐，我就让你们公司知道这边一项传统，寄刀片
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

每个人对游戏的经验程度都不一样，从游戏中期待的挑战程度也不一样，因此设定所有人都满意的难度是非常困难的事情。

有人认为可以轻松玩游戏是适当的难度，有人认为刺激自己的挑战欲望是适当的难度。如果满足前者，就会被后者批评为游戏太无聊，如果满足后者，则被批评为游戏太难。 

在这种情况下，我们能做的就是随时变更难度，让所有难度随时都可以再次挑战。幸运的是，您很好地使用了该功能,完成了所有剧情任务，开发组也很高兴。 

虽然游戏有很多选择,但最终会成为一个趋势。也许大部分人都希望根据选择题展开多样的故事。开发组也试图体现这一部分，但由于我们的开发能力不足，未能实现。在进一步改进这个游戏的同时，提高我们的开发能力，总有一天一定能实现您想要的功能！

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198051839153', 'num_games_owned': 352, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 2019, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1751, 'last_played': 1661030992}
developer_response:
(Esta resposta foi escrita por "Google" trasaltor)

Também adoramos XCOM e Persona. E buscamos outro estilo de RPG baseado em turnos baseado na inspiração deles.

Os contras que você disse estão certos. A modelagem 3D de nossa equipe é baixa e não conseguimos aplicar o objeto destrutivo por nossa baixa capacidade de programação. Isso se deve às nossas baixas capacidades de desenvolvimento e, embora seja uma equipe pequena, continuaremos trabalhando duro para desenvolver nossas capacidades de desenvolvimento.

E removemos a pena de morte permanente porque queremos permitir a liberdade de jogar do que XCOM.

Como nosso jogo está utilizando ativamente o sistema chamado maestria, se você quiser entender o inimigo ou fortalecer seus aliados, precisará diversificar sua abordagem à composição do masteryboard. No entanto, parece que estamos passando por um momento difícil porque não podemos orientá-los bem devido às nossas baixas capacidades. Farei o meu melhor para transmitir bem esta parte.

É um jogo que está faltando muito, mas continuarei encontrando soluções e complementando-as para que as deficiências que você mencionou possam ser melhoradas constantemente.

Obrigado por encontrar nosso jogo!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

( This reply is wriiten by "Google" trasaltor )

We also love XCOM and Persona. And we pursue another style for turn-based RPG based on inspiration from them.

The cons you said is right. Our team's 3D modeling is low, and we couldn't apply the destructive object by our low program capability. These are due to our low development capabilities, and although it is a small team, we will continue to work hard to develop our development capabilities. 

And we removed the permenant death penalty because we want to allow the freedom to play than XCOM.

Since our game is actively utilizing the system called mastery, if you want to understand the enemy or make your allies strong, you have to diversify your approach to masteryboard's composition. However, we seem to be having a hard time because we cannot guide them well due to our low capabilities. I will do my best to convey this part well.

It's a game that's lacking a lot, but I'll continue to find solutions and supplement them so that the deficiencies you mentioned can be improved steadily.

Thank you for finding our game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198084463574', 'num_games_owned': 81, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 3777, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1710681378}
review:
我很少给游戏写评价 但这个游戏我不得不赶紧夸一下 一开始我看到这个游戏我是犹豫的 看演示太像XCOM 当时我玩XCOM最大的遗憾就是角色的自定义内容太少了 比起战略我更喜欢角色扮演

结果打开游戏 刚玩到黑星哥那我就爱不释手了 这个就是我想要的游戏 一开始阿尔伯斯与张的平行蒙太奇转场就很不错 有创意 然后很多选择也让我很惊喜 

到希望不要留念章节那里 要去与后面进入公司的伙伴合作救人 超级喜欢 

包括天赋 技能也很有深度 也可以刷刷刷 还可以锻造 这个游戏是在太对我的胃口了 才80多太便宜 太良心了 多出点收费DLC把 我甚至在纷争终结者里找到了当年玩女神异闻录4的激情 太好玩了
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我们也深信见到您是莫大的幸运。而且从战棋爱好者那里得到好评，对开发组来说是很荣幸的。开发组将尽快准备下一次更新，以便您的愉快经历更长一些。

我们也会尽最大努力给大家带来像"Persona 4"这样的名作带来的快乐。

周末愉快！

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198082745919', 'num_games_owned': 108, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 10815, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9364, 'last_played': 1660640277}
review:
7월 23일에 구매해서 지금까지 156시간 정도를 플레이했고... 
더 플레이 해볼 생각입니다. 
갠적으로 정말 재밌게 플레이했습니다.

다만, PVP에 대한 의견이 있습니다. 
아직까진 점령전밖에 안 해보고 하는 말이긴 하지만, 
이 콘텐츠가 흥하려면, 고를 수 있는 캐릭터가 더 많아야 한다고 생각합니다. 
또 유저간에 평준화가 어느 정도 있어야 한다고 생각하는데요. 
그래서 지금까지 키운 캐릭터로 붙는 방식보다는, 
일정 스탯을 정해두고, 아이템은 점령전 게임 한 판 내에서 얻을 수 있는 방식으로 (여타 AOS 게임처럼)하고,
점령전에서 트러블 메이커도 고를 수 있게 하는 건 어떨까요. 

재밌게 플레이했습니다.
developer_response:
저희 게임을 즐겁게 즐겨주셔서 진심으로 감사드립니다.

제안주신대로 점령전에서 지정된 트러블메이커 캐릭터를 선택할 수 있는 모드에 대해 긍정적으로 고민해보겠습니다. 또한 지속적으로 새로운 캐릭터와 트러블슈터의 이야기들을 업데이트하여 더 많은 캐릭터들을 사용할 수 있도록 최선을 다하겠습니다!

다만 저희 사무실 빌딩이 침수되어 일주일 정도 더 지나야 개발을 다시 시작할 수 있을 것 같습니다. 개발이 조금 지연되겠지만 최선을 다하도록 하겠습니다!

폭우와 무더위 조심하시고 즐거운 여름 되세요! 

감사합니다!

author: {'steamid': '76561198259223816', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 17418, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11972, 'last_played': 1704073627}

author: {'steamid': '76561198116831215', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 417, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1660138230}
review: 个人是XCOM爱好者，这游戏我居然这么晚才发现，真的太对胃口了，各方面说实话都做得不错，说极致么，小公司做得游戏很多粗糙的地方，但是游戏性是真的好，美中不足的就是韩文语音，对我来说换成日文语音，真的是帅爆炸。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

很高兴你能愉快地享受我们的游戏。

支持更多的语言语音是一次愉快的体验。对此，开发组的想法也是一样。但是对于像我们这样的小独立开发组来说，这是一件非常不容易的事情。我们是开发专业的队伍，没有外语专家。因此从与配音演员联系开始，很难判断配音演员的演技是否是我们所希望的。

为了解决这个问题，需要和当地的游戏发行公司签订合约进行工作，但是像我们这样对小公司的游戏感兴趣的游戏发行公司几乎没有。最终开发组认为，现在只有更加集中于我们能做的事情。我认为，如果能够坚持不懈地做下去，总有一天机会会来的。

祝你周末愉快！

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198035360153', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1187, 'last_played': 1660093245}
review:
I haven't played nearly enough of this game yet but I'd just like to say that these are some of the hardest working developers out there. The game is nearly constantly being updated, and speaking with a tiny bit of experience developing (basically just looking) with Ogre, major kudos to the developers. I found myself with the urge to leave a review after they posted an announcement stating that they'd be temporarily unable to work for a while as their city was flooded. I absolutely believe this will be temporary, it's so clear to me that this game is a labor of love. 

Best of luck to all of the developers, I hold you in high regard!

Ps. Really my only complaint about the game is that some of the translation to english sounds unnatural, if you need an english-fluent editor, I'd be more than happy to offer my assistance!
developer_response:
We have confused for a this week by the flooding. At present, it'll take at least a week to recover normally. To be honest, it is fortunate that all the development teammember are safe, but it was upsetting that the development suddenly stopped for more than 10 days.

In this situation, we are encouraged by your kind review.

It is our duty to improve the quality of English translation. If you can help, we will actively accept that help. Currently, we are providing a translation suggestion tool.

https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/470310/view/1701737450489872163

In addition to this, we will revise the proposal even if we give it to the discussion below.

https://steamcommunity.com/app/470310/discussions/1/

Thank you for giving us so much courage in many ways! 

Have a nice weekend!

author: {'steamid': '76561198007906465', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 9863, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4602, 'last_played': 1661123109}

Gameplay wise, it's a cheap rip-off of x-com with magic and grinding. Just playing x-com for the 12th time will be less boring.
developer_response:
Recently, the company building was flooded due to heavy rain, so it was chaotic. As a result, I am sorry for the late reply.

We're sorry that we couldn't give you much satisfaction due to our lack of capabilities.

Although it is a small team that lacks development powers as you saw it, we are doing our best to give you a different fun with a different direction from XCOM. So we'll do our best to give you more satisfactions.

Thank you so much for enjoying our game for a long time!

Have a nice day!

author: {'steamid': '76561197981124470', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 18730, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16098, 'last_played': 1690666568}
review:
TLDR: If you like grid based strategy games with a lot of depth, this is probably the single best on the market. If you like a story that motivates you to care about the action and the setting within the game then this will also be a nice treat.
______

I really did not know what I was getting into when I got this game. I was just up one night looking for random grid based strategies and added it to my wish list at some point off hand where it languished for who knows how long waiting for a sale. I can say now without a doubt that I regret waiting for a sale for this game both because I was sitting on a goldmine and because I want to support these devs. At the time of writing this I have 268 hours played according to steam and I just finished the post game wrap up having done almost no farming on the second highest difficulty but not on challenge mode. (the highest difficulty available right away) If you are struggling at any point though you can change the difficulty any time between missions.

Troubleshooter has the best of all worlds for me. As a long time fan of grid based games of all kinds (Tactics Ogre, FFT, Fire Emblem, you name it) I can say with a pretty extensive amount of experience that this is one of the best grid based strategy games on the market in terms of actual strategy. Each of your characters can be customized to a pretty insane degree using masteries which you collect mostly from defeating enemies and then puzzle together in increasingly large numbers as the game progresses to create each characters build. You can basically swap these out at any point which is good because you'll be doing that a lot if you play on higher difficulties as you tailor your team to deal with the constantly evolving pool of enemy types. Now, to be clear, there are some pure stat "boring" masteries and you'll be using a lot of them but there are TONS of masteries that do all sorts of neat things and this system really sets it apart from any other GBS I have played. There are over 700 masteries divided between general, class, and race. What's more, there are mastery sets that activate when you use 4 specific masteries at the same time. You want to make your character focused on getting the last hit on lots of targets? There's support for that. You want to focus on fighting inside of clouds of smoke? Got ya covered. Want to chug potions, throw grenades, and double fist food while you maraud the battlefield? Done. Want to make a muscle wizard that casts punch while being an unstoppable wall of beef? Worked for me.

I would really be doing the game a disservice if I didn't talk a little bit about one of the surprise bonuses for me in this game which is the story. I will not be spoiling at all so have no fear but this game really landed for me in a lot of atypical ways. It really goes out of its way to teach you about the world so that you care about what is happening beyond just punching bad guys and collecting loot, which in all fairness if you're just here for that then the game has you covered too. The nice thing is that it does this all in a very conversational fashion between fairly relatable characters so you don't feel like the game is just spouting exposition at you. There was even a point where I actually felt really bad about taking one of the VILLAINS! out because I had gotten to know them so well and sympathized with their struggles. It is not the most nuanced approach to this I have ever seen but it does a reasonable job of humanizing all parties both in their successes and failures as humans in a way that is believable within the established setting.

I've barely scratched the surface on the awesome things about the game and if I go in detail on the rest I'll run out of space. Very briefly though, there is also a pet system complete with full sets of masteries for each of the pet types, an astounding array of 11 characters with at least 2 main classes each and almost no crossover classes (one exception), you get to bring your entire party to most missions even as it gets huge. The list goes on and on.

This is normally the time where I might mention the flaws with the game... but I pretty much have nothing. The worst thing I can think of is that it was translated to English but the translation for the dialogue is done well enough that I only occasionally noticed. The tooltips are sometimes a bit ambiguous I guess? I'm really scraping for something to complain about. It's a great game, if you like grid based games it's a no brainer. If you don't like typical over the top anime stories then try the story for a while (it's way more down to earth than a lot of anime stories tend to be) and if the story doesn't hook you then you can easily skip it by pressing escape and jump right into the action.
developer_response:
Currently, due to the recent heavy rain, the office building has been flooded, and we cannot normally work for more than a week. In this situation, we're encouraged by reading your detailed and sincere reviews.

Because there are people who love our game like you, we think this hard time is a time to rest for a while. We'll do our best to give you more pleasure after overcoming this hard time. And we promise to steadily improve our poor English translation.

We are very happy that you are the one who enjoyed our game.

Have a good day!

author: {'steamid': '76561198030348643', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 7477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7117, 'last_played': 1660087107}
review: Very good X-Com - style tactical with complex and satisfying upgrade systems. Story isn't bad either, althou its sometimes told in lenghty and confusing way (you dont need to listen to it if you dont want to).
developer_response:
The development team considers the story to be the most important element of the game and has actually spent the most development time on it. Nevertheless, the reason why we couldn't tell you the story effectively is probably because the development team's skills are still immature. 

Nevertheless, you gave the development team the strength to move forward through a good evaluation. We will continue to develop games to introduce you to more interesting stories and more diverse systems.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030341809', 'num_games_owned': 855, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 3910, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2487, 'last_played': 1661610885}

developer_response:
( 這篇文章是在翻譯機的幫助下寫成的。)

感謝您抽出寶貴的時間給我們留下好評。 Troubleshooter確實受到了XCOM的影響。而且，我們正在努力將Troubleshooter打造成新品牌的遊戲，而不是單純的XCOM模仿作品。為了讓你體驗到新的感覺戰棋，開發組今後也會努力開發遊戲。

感謝您的評論。

謝謝。

review:

developer_response:
말씀하신 것에 대해 저희가 반박할 수 있는 것이 없습니다. 왜냐면...말씀하신 것이 모두 사실이기 때문입니다. 그리고 이제는 너무 많은 게임 내용들이 초반의 이야기와 얽히고 설켜 있어서 크게 고치지도 못하고 있는 실정입니다. 그럼에도 불구하고 그 부분을 견뎌내시고 저희가 마련한 내용들을 경험해 주셔서 그저 감사 드릴뿐입니다. 우리가 다음 작품을 만들 수 있다면 같은 실수를 반복하는 우는 저지르지 않도록 마음에 새기겠습니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086382652', 'num_games_owned': 428, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 6812, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5337, 'last_played': 1661261147}
review:
小公司的黑心老板模拟器。
感谢制作组让我体验到当老板的感觉
初来乍到城市，开一家公司，穿行在形形色色的人中。
让他们每天都加班到半夜，干一番业绩。
别人的故事也许波澜壮阔，但我的公司业绩永远不亏。
因为真正合格的大老板都是这样的，朴实，低调，工作狂。

什么？我扮演的是主角？啊？我只是个年轻小伙？这是个都市热血冒险故事？
我扮演的明明只是个小资本家啊？？？
这游戏居然会提及大家之间的爱恨情仇？
说起来，既然公司里大家都是朋友，友谊值都那么高。。。
我决定从今以后发薪日他们都没有奖金。
因为真正合格的大老板都是这样的，朴实，低调，工作狂。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

author: {'steamid': '76561198133282265', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 41796, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10558, 'last_played': 1695921570}
review:
As you can see, I've played *a lot* of this game. Probably way too much. It's addictive, fun, and full of a lot of content. (my hours aren't completely representative since I left the game open; it's probably closer to 100-110 than 170!)

First off, the story sucks IMO. It's badly paced - very, very slow - and goes absolutely no where. It took me about 80 hours to finish the main game and all the DLC. This is the story for a 10-hour game stretched out over 80. Despite taking so long and there being so much dialogue, there was no real resolution to anything. The final non-DLC mission just feels like a regular mission with no build-up, there's no final boss, and all of the major villains have stories that are left unresolved. 

I know they're setting up for a sequel but... come on! Most of this plot is just plain boring. There are comparisons to the Kiseki series (Trails of...), however those games, despite having a larger over-arching plot, are all self-contained; you can play and enjoy and Trails game on its own without the others. Meanwhile, there's no real story arc or resolution here; it's *all* build-up, like a dubstep song without a drop.

But the good - great - thing is the gameplay. I'm now replaying it on always-challenge + cruel mode + some modifiers (almost the hardest difficulty) and yes, it really is hard. But there are *so* many strategic options available to you. Take one look at the mastery board -- over 700 passive abilities, plus mastery sets. If you love theroycrafting and setting up the perfect builds; this is the game for you!

A lot of people compare it to XCOM or Fire Emblem. And, well, it is a turn-based SRPG, so it's squarely in that genre. It's a bit closer to Disgaea than either of those. However, I'd say it's most similar to Path of Exile or Grim Dawn, except you can build out your whole party instead of just a single character. There is such a massive variety of builds and team compositions that it's WAY beyond the level of XCOM Long War.

One thing to note is that the first 2 hours are NOT representitive. The opening several levels are the game's weakest part. You have almost no abilities, no mastery synergies, and are relying very heavily on the VHPD. This is nesescary to teach you the ropes and help you appreciate the complexity later on without getting you overwhelmed, however I can easily see someone playing 90 minutes, deciding the game is too basic/simple, and returning it. If you buy the game, and are on the fence about returning it, I reccomend sticking with it because it does become a lot more interesting as it goes on.

The other thing to note is the online features are a bit undercooked. The game isn't balanced for PvP, and the system is so abusable as to be essentially unplayable -- for example, with the right setup, you can get infinite turns, so a player can just combo off for 10 minutes and the other player's options are either to sit there or to quit. I'm not sure if there is a way to fix the single-player system for multiplayer, since infinite turns and chaining are very core to the late-game SP levels. Maybe if both players had the exact same set of characters, which were specifically designed to avoid certain abusable strats -- at which point you'd suck out the whole fun of character setup. Regardless, don't expect much PvP here if that's what you're in for. This is very much a single-player game where you can trade/chat with other players if you really want to.

If you're looking for an extremely complex SRPG to get addicted to, with tons of content including some very difficult post-game levels, then this is the one. You may want to jump in on hard difficulty to really amp up the challenge. Just don't expect something simple.

author: {'steamid': '76561198352917766', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 17458, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13949, 'last_played': 1661631489}
review:
존잼. srpg 좋아하면 추천함.

- 일단 전투가 재밌음.
- 스킬, 패시브, 직업 세팅을 어떻게 하느냐에 따라 같은 캐릭도 다르게 활용 가능. 세팅 바꾸기 마음대로 가능함.

- 난이도 설정이 세분화 돼 있어서 진입장벽 없음.
- 일러스트 퀄리티 높음.

- 설정이 잘 된 세계관과 스토리.
- 플레이타임 충분히 나옴.

- 파고들기 요소 있어서 스토리 다 깨도 더 즐길 수 있음.
- 2회차 하면 파밍했던 게 영향을 좀 주기 때문에 새로운 재미를 느낄 수 있음.

- 제작사에서 현재(2022년 8월) 업뎃하면서 관리 중. 후속작도 나올 예정.

"제작자님 알버스 상향 좀 해주세요. 리뉴얼이 힘들면 그냥 특성슬롯만 많이 늘려주든지, 탱킹이 되게끔 스탯만 올려주든지 하면 될 것 같습니다."
developer_response:
무엇보다 먼저, 저희 게임을 즐겁게 즐겨주셔서 진심으로 감사드립니다.

여러분에게 전달하고 싶었던 즐거움을 꾸준히 만들어왔지만 언제나 이렇게 즐겁게 즐겨주신 리뷰를 볼떄마다 매번 가슴이 벅차오릅니다.

개발을 시작한 지 오랜 시간이 지났지만 여전히 이런 리뷰를 보며 다시금 힘을 얻고 더 열심히 개발하게 되는 것은 전부 여러분 덕분입니다. 이렇게 계속 개발을 할 수 있는 기회를 주셔서 고마워요.

무더운 여름입니다. 건강 조심하시고 즐거운 하루하루 되시길 바라겠습니다.

저희는 더 많은 즐거움을 가지고 꾸준히 찾아뵙겠습니다.

감사합니다!!

p.s
알버스 상향 부분은 추후 컨텐츠 확장을 통해 고민하고 있는 부분이나 여러모로 미리 고려해보겠습니다!! 바로 좋은 대답 못 드려 죄송해요!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198089361576', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 13050, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3863, 'last_played': 1709523508}
review:
턴제 RPG좋아하는 분이라면 강력 추천합니다. 
어느세 가장 높은 난이도로 60시간이 넘었네요. ㅎㅎ 
노가다를 하면서 시나리오를 진행해서 그런지 아직 컨텐츠는 한참 남았습니다. ㅋ 
그정도로 게임 즐길거리가 많습니다.

엑스컴과 인터페이스가 비슷해보이지만, 전투해보면 컨셉이 완전 다릅니다.

엑스컴, 키메라스쿼드 등이 기본적으로 긴장감 있는 전략을 중요시하는 게임이라면,
이 게임은 SRPG특유의 노가다 요소와 스킬 조합에 기반한 시원시원한 전투에 가깝습니다.
딱히 전투에서 사소한 감나빗에 머리 싸매지 않아도 됩니다.
그보다는 어떻게 스킬을 조합해서 캐릭터를 더 강하게 세팅할 것인지가 중요한 게임이에요 ㅎ

턴제 RPG를 좋아하시고 파고들기 컨텐츠 좋아하는 분이라면 분명 재밌게 하실 수 있을 거라 확신합니다 ㅎ

난이도는 솔직히 "엄청 쉽습니다."
타 게임 할때 일반 난이도 또는 약간 어려운 난이도로 플레이하는 편인데요.
이 게임은 시작부터 어려움-> 가혹함(가장 어려운)으로 시작해도 크게 게임하는데 무리가 없어요. ㅎ

진짜 어려움을 추구한다면 기본난이도 가혹함 + 도전모드 항시 활성화 정도는 해야 된다고 봅니다.

최근 제가 해본 턴제 RPG 중 가장 취향저격이고 훌륭한 것 같습니다.

개발자 분들 힘내시고 어느정도 가격 있어도 구매의사 있으니 퀄리티 있는 결과물 내주시면 좋겠습니다:)

PS) 게임 초반 늘어지는 구간이 있다는 지적이 많습니다. 그런 말을 하기전에 많이 들어서 걱정했는데 저는 플레이 자체에서는 딱히 모르겠더군요. 아마 적들 처리가 늦어서 적이 행동 턴 타임라인에 누적되는 경우, 적 턴이 지나치게 길어지는 현상이 벌어지는 것 같은데 이런 부분을 이야기 하는 듯 싶네요. 이건 제가봐도 좀 문제가 있으니 설정 등으로 적 턴 움직임을 지금보다 더 최소화(거의 생략)할 수 있는 기능 등이 필요할 것 같습니다.
developer_response:
"이 게임은 SRPG특유의 노가다 요소와 스킬 조합에 기반한 시원시원한 전투에 가깝습니다."

제가 감히 이 문장에 대해서 평가해도 될까요? 

"정확하십니다!"

개발팀원들도 XCOM 을 하면서 그 긴장감을 참 좋아라 했습니다. 그리고 하나의 미션을 완료하면 뭐랄까요...기분이 좋은데 피곤해서...(아마 나이가 들어서...oTL) 연속으로 많이 못하겠더라고요. 그래서 우리는 다른 방향을 어필하기로 했습니다. 저희가 이전까지는 "핵앤 슬래쉬 형식의 SRPG" 라고 하기도 했는데, 위의 저 문장이 이 느낌을 한글로 정말 잘 표현한 것 같습니다. 앞으로도 우리는 이런 전투 기조를 이어갈 것입니다.

그리고 난이도는....아마 리뷰를 쓴 분께서 1. XCOM 의 경험이 있고, 2. 반복 플레이(=노가다)를 즐길줄 알기 때문일거에요. 그런데 여전히 게임의 난이도가 선형적이지 못하다는 불만이 많고 이로 이해 나쁜 평가도 많이 받고 있습니다. 모든 이를 만족시킬 수 있는 난이도 설정은 저희에게는 불가능한 일인가 싶기도 합니다. 다만 다양한 사용자의 입맛에 맞도록 여러 설정을 추가하는 것이 차선책이라고 생각합니다.

P.S. 말씀하시는 부분도 많은 지적을 받고 있습니다. 이것이...게임속도를 빠르게 하다보면 그 끝은...거의...모든 것을 건너뛰는 정도가 될 것이라, 속도 이외의 다른 방법으로 이런 지루함을 완화시킬 방법을 연구하고 있습니다. 턴제 게임의 장르적 한계일수도 있지만 최대한의 우회책을 고심해 보겠습니다.

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198896371308', 'num_games_owned': 57, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 66, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1663076680}

developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

向更多样的游戏平台提供【分争调整者】，对开发组的运营也会有明显的帮助。开发组实际上考虑过将游戏移植到NS上，还与相关企业就该问题进行了商谈。但是这里面最大的问题。也就是说，一旦发行NS用游戏，就不能像现在这样经常更新。因此，我们将首先在Steam完成游戏，然后考虑将游戏移植到其他平台。

author: {'steamid': '76561198255105434', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 15646, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4662, 'last_played': 1668848633}
review:
2022/10/02メインシナリオクリアしたので追記
評価はかわらず。

●XCOM系SRPGを最高難易度でやり込めるくらいのヘビーユーザーならいざしらず、
ライトユーザーには難易度を下げてもちょっとつらい難易度かと思われる。
●スキルビルド・装備を見直せば……というのもあるかもしれないが、何百種類あるスキルを見直し
最適解を模索してというのをライトユーザーが望むのか？という点。
●スキルビルド・装備を見直しても後半シナリオになるにつれて数十体のエネミーvs８人、
さらには防御力が紙にも等しくなるくらいの攻撃・連撃を喰らいまくる（難易度を下げても）のは
MAPの広さも相まっていささか心が折れる。

DLCシナリオ・衣装の追加・シーズン２の制作もあるとの続報もあるため期待はある一方、
この難易度問題をなんとかしてもらわないと自分のように素直に楽しめないユーザーも居るのかなと。


＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝
まだようやく4人目の仲間が加入された段階ですが、以下に上げる点から低評価にしております。

○装備アイテムのレア度がわかりにくい。これは日本語化による弊害かもですが、やたらと名前が長い。
そして洋ゲーによくある「ランクと性能は比例しない」タイプなのでJRPGになれたユーザーだとちょっと分かりづらいかも。

○スキルの作成画面もパッと見で何をどうしたら良いかが分かりづらく、また「これを作るにはこれを～」の繰り返しで少しげんなりする部分も。

○１マップがやたら広く、ぱっと見どう行ったらいいかわからないマップがある。（特に山のてっぺんにアイテムBOXがあるがどうやって登るか見えない場所もある）

○敵・味方の移動を最高速一歩手前にしても１マップ３０分～１時間近くかかるため、なかなかに集中力が途切れる。

○アイテム作成・分解・強化画面が分かりづらい。
作成画面も「持ってる素材から作成できるアイテム」の表示じゃなく「アイテムリストから必要な素材がわかる」
表示なら良かったかなと。

○これは自分の環境だけかもですが、ワイヤレスマウス・キーボード・有線コントローラーを繋いでいると一切のコントロールを受付なくなることも。

進めたシナリオ自体はまだ4人目の「彼」が加入したあたりですしキャラもストーリーも好きなジャンルなのでちまちまと進めて行くつもりではありますが、これからどうなっていくかが楽しみな反面、色々と腰が引けてしまう要素が多いのが残念ではあります。
developer_response:
(この文は翻訳機を使って作成されました。)

SRPGというゲームが一般的なアクションゲームと比べてあらかじめ知っておくべきルールが多いジャンルです。 それにTroubleshooterは発売後から着実にアップデートしてきたので、ゲーム内部で知っておくべきことも他のゲームと比べて多い方です。 

開発チームはこの点を認めながらも、一方ではゲームのプレイ時間が一定水準を超えれば、ゲーマーたちが十分にゲームシステムを十分に活用できると考えました。 ところで、私たちがあなたの評価を読んであなたのプレイ時間を確認した時、私たちのこの考えは間違っているかもしれないという気がしました。

あなたは単純に「ゲームが不便だ」と評価することもできました。 それにもかかわらず、あなたが経験した不便だった点を詳しく記述して開発チームに改善の機会を与えて下さったことに感謝します。 開発チームは今後のアップデートを通じて、あなたが上述した点について少しでも改善できるよう最善を尽くします。

いい評価ありがとうございます。

author: {'steamid': '76561198317189454', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 7166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7166, 'last_played': 1659346141}
review:
前期带点Xcom的味道，不过竟然可以莽进怪堆里。。。爽归爽，不当心还是会死的。
有大量刷刷刷的元素，但是也不是很需要你花大量时间在刷上面费神，打不过主线时刷刷即可。
剧情方面比较独特，群像剧一般的展开，每个人（包括敌人）的细腻故事，但是关联性不强，给人一种很生活化的气息，有些故事有头有过程却没有尾巴，像是讲述每个人正在经历的事情，节奏平平，没什么高潮。不过剧情里含有大量精美插画，显然也是花了大功夫的，也不算无聊。
关卡设计也算不错，除了前期莽莽，到了中期就要开始认真规划了。
天赋系统非常有深度，花几十个小时研究BD也不奇怪，属于玩进去就越玩越好玩的类型。
srpg中难得的佳作
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

读了你的评价，你真的在有效地享受着游戏。你说得对。没有必要从游戏一开始就集中于刷刷刷。只要享受游戏里的故事就可以了。完成的任务随时都可以再次挑战，所以不用一开始就提高难度进行游戏。如果一个一个完成【剧情任务】，了解利用【天赋】强化角色的方法，我认为所有人都能像你一样享受游戏。

为了让更多的游戏玩家像你一样享受游戏，开发组将进一步研究可以做的事情。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198972770426', 'num_games_owned': 23, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 22815, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 10122, 'playtime_at_review': 9088, 'last_played': 1712457970}
review:
这游戏我打折买的，真的值，我是战棋爱好者，虽然技术菜，但是玩这个游戏用简单模式打通了，总体体验很棒，剧情体验尤其不错。这个游戏不考验配置，要是电脑暂时玩不了大作的可以买个这个杀时间。游戏机制最突出的地方是天赋搭配，不配出好用的天赋是打不过去的，自己不会配只有在网上找参考一下。然后每个角色有两种转职，各有特色。可以抓野兽，做无人机，都是强大的战斗力。凯利带两个无人机，吉赛尔带个野兽，等于增加了三个可控单位，贼逆天。人物塑造方面，每个角色都很有特点，形象鲜明，你感觉一些角色以后是队友，但他也不会简简单单加入，而是一般都有充分的理由才会加入，非常有趣。反派也很有特色，性格各异没有脸谱化。剧情很有张力，有铺垫，有转折，有戏剧，有插科打诨，同一节主线有时还可以选择不同的势力和人物，可以体验不同的趣味，比如一些章节里可以扮演反派来打好人，还可以反派互殴，真的体验很棒。另外立绘非常漂亮，只有建模拉一点，不过对于战棋游戏来说建模不好不算什么问题。音乐也可以。
比较值得吐槽的是，这游戏中的世界也太混乱了吧，黑帮势力那么大，到处都是恐怖分子，这市民上街不背把枪才离谱。踏踏开，踏踏开，一次摸踏踏开。
快给爷狠狠地出续作，出DLC啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

很高兴又见到一位战棋爱好者。你的评价中只有我们游戏的优点，开发组虽然心情很好，但另一方面也会反省我们游戏是否制作得很好，以至于得到了这样的称赞。游戏中登场的多种角色和【天赋】是开发组在制作游戏时最重要的要素。你好像完全理解和利用这些要素。换句话说,你完全掌握了游戏。

开发组正在努力尽快告知有关新DLC的消息。近期内将通过公告告知有关消息。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561197992751963', 'num_games_owned': 833, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 5224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4518, 'last_played': 1663105142}
review:
It's a janky, Korean anime SRPG. 

I'm really enjoying my time with this one, the story is a little hard to follow at times, but the skill system is really fun to play with. Skills, or Masteries as they're called in-game, are basically items you can pick up in a mission or craft. Certain combinations of skills can activate set bonuses that improve skills or add entire new effects.

On top of this all gear is randomized, old-school ARPG style. So you have a gear game ontop of an interesting skills game, with pets -both organic and robotic - and a buddy system between characters that can grant bonus skills. It's just a really fun mix.

The interface is very XCOM like, which means it'll be pretty easy for you to pick up if you've played that before. It does have a few quirks, since abilities are often tied to masteries which means that often characters will have completely different hotkeys for the same skill.

The game is made by a small team in Korea, which means there is a fair bit of jank to deal with. The most noticeable being the translation. As far as I understand, the translation for this game is completely crowdsourced. This is pretty cool, but it does mean that you're going to come across inconsistencies and strange sentences from time to time. There are also certain maps where buildings may fade out of existence with certain camera angles, and the odd CTD too. 

Thankfully, the game will autosave pretty frequently in combat, making it easy to put the game down if you have to do something else, or pick it back up after a crash.

Overall, I'm really impressed with Troubleshooter so far and can easily recommend it to anyone who's curious.
developer_response:
"The most noticeable being the translation."

Analysis of many of the reviews we have received shows that there is a very high probability of a bad review if the play time is short. And many of the bad reviews were written because of the quality of the translation. Translation is directly related to the first impression of the game, and we overlooked the importance of it and thought it would be enough to convey the least meaning to the user. It didn't take long, of course, to realize that this was a mistake. 

In that respect, your review is correct. Nevertheless, you have left us with a good review, which has helped us move forward once again.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198314447224', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 3616, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2117, 'last_played': 1659681686}

author: {'steamid': '76561198321978708', 'num_games_owned': 112, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 8659, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8624, 'last_played': 1665157414}
review: SRPG佳作，类XCOM游戏，优化了很多类XCOM非常不人性化的设计，比如各种贴脸MISS之类的，整体战斗体验很棒，但是关卡长度上得再优化上，一些长副本玩起来感觉非常臃肿，打完一关后就很累只想休息，没有继续刷下去的动力，除此之外都很不错，期待后续DLC
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

"但是关卡长度上得再优化上"

开发组也很清楚你为什么会有这种感觉。游戏开发初期，我们想通过战斗展现很多东西。但是我们没有考虑到游戏玩家在这个过程中会感受到的疲劳。等待我军顺序的时间，跟着无数敌人移动的摄像机，这些都合在一起，好像让你感到疲惫。我们将最大限度地优化现有的任务，努力避免在新的任务中重复您指出的错误。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198141078652', 'num_games_owned': 545, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 9410, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2128, 'last_played': 1660809568}
review:
非常经典的类XCOM游戏，比不打海量MOD的XCOM好玩。
这游戏最核心的就是七百多个天赋，大多数都有用，天赋之间还可以组成套装效果。
光是研究天赋就能研究很久，每次角色升级，切换天赋，都能实打实的感受到角色的提升。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

天赋可以说是游戏的核心系统。你好像在完美地利用那个系统玩游戏，开发组也很高兴。对于能够更加多样地利用该系统的方法，开发组将继续进行研究。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198017535828', 'num_games_owned': 28, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 16455, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2284, 'last_played': 1662078386}
review:
장점 : 한국게임으로 마인드가 맘이듬
         특성판등등 세부적인 요소가 맘에 듬
단점 : 전술개념보다는 케릭터성이 너무 큼
          적이 너무 많고 맵이 너무큼.  플레이타임이 긴게그냥 쫄들이 너무나와서 그거 원샷원킬 하는거랑
          내턴을 기다릴려고 대기시간이 길어서 그럼
         한번 전투에 45명이상 나온적도 있음.;;;;;;;;
         그리고 도대체 전투중 상자까기는 왜 만들었는지;;;  내가 몽고족도 아니고 전투중에 전리품이나 챙길려고 전투를 안해야하는지

        

디비니티 오리지날씬2 하고 웨이스트랜드3 끝내고 하고 있는데 단점이 너무큼
좀만 다듬으면 더 좋은 작품이 될텐데...

다음작품은 제발 쓰잘데기 없는 쫄들좀 줄이세요....의미없이 저글링처럼 나오고 내가 무방비 상태로 있는데
맞추지도 못하는 쫄들이 많이 나와봤자 긴장감만 떨어져요

그래도 일단 모바일 가챠게임만 만드는 한국시장에서 이런게임 만들것에 대해선 추천드립니다.
developer_response:
무엇보다 먼저 저희의 개발 모습을 좋게 봐주셔서 감사합니다.

말씀하신 다수의 적 vs 소수의 아군이 휩쓰는 클래식 SRPG를 지향하다보니 말씀하신 부분에서 불편함을 드리고 있어 죄송합니다.

물리적으로 지연 시간을 줄여 지루함을 덜기 위해 "환경 설정" > "게임 플레이" 옵션 안에 각 종 플레이 시간을 단축하는 옵션들이 있습니다!  그 중에서도 "아군 행동 빠르게 연출/아군 외 행동 빠르게 연출" 등의 옵션들을 통해 게임 속도를 증가시켜 3배이상 빠른 진행 하실 수 있습니다!

또한 저희가 역량 부족으로 제대로 가이드를 못한 부분이지만 저희 게임의 성장은 특성조합 >>> 레벨 > 아이템의 구조이다보니 특성 조합을 통해 많은 적을 핵 앤 슬래시할 수 있는 방법을 제공하고 있습니다. 충분히 이 부분을 찾으실거라 생각하지만 부족할 경우, 국내 커뮤니티 등에 유저분들이 적지만 유용한 공략을 올려두시고 계십니다.

보통 게임의 실수를 가혹한 처벌(바로 실패시키는) 형태로 미션을 디자인하는 최신 트렌드에서 저희의 경우 게임 시간이 더 오래 걸리는 형태로 디자인 한 것도 말씀하신 부분에 많은 영향을 미치는 것 같습니다. 강해질수록 클리어 시간이 압도적으로 빨라지도록 디자인이 되어있지만, 실제 늘어지더라도 게임 패배를 강요하지 않다보니 말씀하신 단점이 매우 부각될 수 밖에 없는 것은 저희의 부족한 역량 문제입니다.

여러모로 게임을 편하게 즐기는 형태보다 게임 내 컨텐츠를 스스로 해결하는 과정을 추구하는 과정에서 역량 부족으로 단점 가득한 경험을 드려 죄송합니다!

꾸준히 개선하여 조금 더 나은 경험을 드릴 수 있도록 최선을 다하겠습니다.

부족한 게임을 찾아주셔서 감사합니다.

즐거운 주말 보내세요!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198125341731', 'num_games_owned': 102, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 8000, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1660042045}
review:
在主线解锁商店之前，没办法卖出/分解/丢弃物品。
新的物品只能放在邮件里，不能取到仓库，仓库里的东西也没法处理。
我仓库100个物品满了，现在邮件还有20多个装备只能在邮件里待着，我服了，草
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

很抱歉没能及时向你传达必要的信息。

商店可以在你进入 射手街 的时候使用。但是，即使在那之前完成第三个【剧情任务】( 113号外围道路 )，在 沙佛莱宁 也可以完成您需要的工作。卖出 / 分解 / 丢弃 物品是非常重要的事情。 因此，开发组也在进行游戏的过程中，设计了可以在适当的时候使用这些功能的游戏。我希望，希望游戏能再进行一点。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198103000830', 'num_games_owned': 333, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 5081, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3390, 'last_played': 1659366823}
review:
好游戏，真的非常好玩。对我来说和xcom2一个级别。
全程困难难度玩的，难度曲线做的很不错，30级开始后白虎组厚血boss（大流士不是主角和雷帝还真的不好打）和勺子厚血机械的加入才开始有难度的提升。30级前，都是熟悉游戏各方面的机制设定，你无脑冲也可以打。30级之后你要开始有意识的搭配天赋装备、游戏的占位，考虑ai的行动，不然大概率要少员。
种类繁多的天赋搭配真的非常不错，还有宝可梦和机械玩法（doge
玩了55个小时，预期90%命中的单体攻击miss在10次以内，挫败感大大降低。
希望有第三阶的专职。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

XCOM系列实际上代表着这种类型，【分争调整者】也受到了很大的影响。对我们来说XCOM是精神上的大哥一样的存在。但是我们认为，游戏玩家想要的不是单纯的XCOM模仿作品，而是进一步发展XCOM的游戏。我们正在以这样的目标改善【分争调整者】。虽然与XCOM的比较是不可避免的，但是开发组总有一天会努力在游戏玩家之间留下"【分争调整者】"的品牌。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

좋은 평가 감사합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983072949', 'num_games_owned': 646, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 10412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2264, 'last_played': 1692789296}
review:
Le meilleur jeu auquel j'ai pu jouer sur Steam depuis 2022.

Il s'agit d'un tactical RPG agrémenté avec un côté manga. La plupart d'entre-vous dirons sans doute : mouais. C'est précisément là que vous vous trompez.

Ce studio a fait un bijou et possède tout ce qu'on aime dans un bon manga. De l'humour, un peu de drame, une super bande son, la sensation que les héros ne sont pas juste des personnages à entraîner pour écraser les autres. Les personnages sont haut en couleur, parfois un peu (complètement) cintrés.

Une complexité qui a son importance si vous jouez dans le mode le plus dur et qui n'a aucune importance si vous jouez pour l'histoire. On regrette seulement qu'il n'existe pour l'instant pas de traduction française.

Si besoin d'un guide steam en français pour expliquer les bases, joueuses, joueurs, contactez-moi, on verra ce qu'on peut faire !

Pour résumer :
Les + :
- Une bande son travaillée
- Des personnages pas fades
- Une histoire avec un scénario
- Un format manga qui ne comprend pas uniquement les dessins
- Plusieurs modes de difficulté
- Un mode offline et un mode online
- Un tour par tour rappelant Final Fantasy (clair et précis)
- Pas cher (et en plus il y a un DLC gratuit)

Les - :
- Pas en français (pas handicapant non plus)
developer_response:
No one in the development team knows the French so I used the Google Translation to understands your review. I ask for your understanding.

First of all, I would like to thank you for playing the game despite the fact that French translation was not provided in the game. We also thank you for giving the development team the strength to move forward through a good review despite these huge shortcomings.

Providing as many language translations as possible has a huge impact on game sales. Therefore, there is no reason for the development team to hesitate to provide translation for more diverse languages. But we're a very small development team, and in order to hire a French translator, the development team can't do anything for three months.

Now we have no choice but to do what we can. That is to improve the game even more through updates. Through this process, I believe that one day we will have the opportunity to provide you with a French translation.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048582504', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1658840498}
review:
Solid game for those who love a JRPG and enjoy the concept of X-COM style tactical games being mashed up. It works well (and your chance to hit is way better than X-COM lol). Menus can be a bit overwhelming and translations aren't perfect but its only minor stuff at the most that you'll notice.

Overall its a great pickup.
developer_response:
As you mentioned, we are borrowing the form of JRPG to incorporate more stories and more characters into the game based on XCOM's combat system. Since Troubleshooter has not yet fully established its identity, it is difficult to define it in one word. I think your expression is the best expression of the game now. We will continue to develop games to establish a brand called Troubleshooter.

Oh, and have you noticed that there are options that make game speed faster? Please check the [Ally Units Action Speed] and [Non-ally Units Action Speed] in the [GAMEPLAY] in the game option.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198386680619', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2758, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2350, 'last_played': 1660145220}
review: 游戏性主要是靠各种天赋的搭配来实现角色的代入，但是本身的剧情主线不清晰，也就是说讲故事的能力不高。就是靠不停的与罪犯战斗来推进剧情，没有激动人心的背景故事，时间充足的话当做一个休闲游戏来玩也是不错的。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

游戏的故事是开发组最重视的因素之一。我们希望游戏的故事不是战斗的陪衬，而是引领一切的核心要素。尽管如此，如果您对游戏的故事感到贫乏，那么开发组的这种尝试可能意味着哪里有错误。彻底分析该问题的原因，在下个故事中不会重复同样的失误。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198047038377', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 91215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50146, 'last_played': 1704465267}
review: 一开始以为只是普通的泡菜国仿xcom游戏，结果玩下去发现一发不可收拾，这是一款战棋养成类集大成者游戏，战棋养成类爱好者必玩，游戏价格在这个年代也不算贵，超值！
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我们借用了XCOM验证的战斗系统，因此您对Troubleshooter的第一印象是完全可以理解的。尽管如此，还是感谢大家一直相信并体验我们的游戏。开发组也不会就此停止，会进一步改善游戏。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198288035605', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 28712, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13998, 'last_played': 1705543097}
review: Troubleshooter is a superb game for those who enjoy XCOM and similar turn-based tactics games. Imagine combining XCOM with anime characters and JRPG. Each character has a backstory, motivation, and characterization that is well written and consistent. However, you can deeply customize the combat behavior of each character by choosing a class and selecting skills, some of which combine in sets with bonus effects. There is a crafting system that doesn't require too much farming for materials. Overall, I have enjoyed this game more than XCOM (And I love XCOM!) for its story, mechanics, and replayability.
developer_response:
From the time we decided to borrow XCOM's proven combat system, we had to be verified by XCOM fans. The development team received a lot of praise and criticism in the process. But this was a process that we had to go through and we consistently added the Troubleshooter's color. And in this process, We've had a lot of questions about whether we're doing it right. However, through your review, we gained confidence and momentum to move forward again. we will work harder to make Troubleshooter become a new game beyond XCOM's imitation.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076509367', 'num_games_owned': 129, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 6008, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6008, 'last_played': 1658613821}
review:
Excellent turn based tactics game with a massive amount of content. You have a lot of choice in how to build your characters and the difficulty also has a lot of customization options. Combat is strategic and fun, with a huge variety of skills between the various characters. There's an equipment crafting and upgrade system and you can grind equipment/materials from enemies if you want but it's not necessary.
Very easy to recommend to turn based tactics fans. The devs also continue to update the game regularly which is always a plus.
developer_response:
"Very easy to recommend to turn based tactics fans."

The biggest goal of the development team has always been to have a stable development environment, which is ongoing. This is a goal that can be achieved by selling a lot of copies. To achieve this goal, we had to satisfy as many gamers as possible, and the most basic of all was to be recognized by turn-based tactics' fans. The development team can see that our small goal is being achieved through this review. Now that we've set the right direction, we're going to move forward a little faster.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004988917', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4775, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4077, 'last_played': 1690910518}
review:
Great game, fun to play, much to learn (i am about 50%). Only problem are the cheesy characters clearly intended for younger audience. I think there is bit much of grinding too, to get your characters to high levels and do the tasks, but that's all right. 

I know it's bad to review a game you have not finished (yet) but i don't know how many years it will take me to finish :)
developer_response:
Thank you for taking your precious time to give us a good review. You said you haven't finished the game completely yet, but this is like a message to the development team. 

"I will continue to watch this game and my evaluation may change.'

We think positively about this. This is because it makes the development team more positive and makes the game more improved. Please continue to update with the development team.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080984079', 'num_games_owned': 1837, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 4842, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 431, 'last_played': 1659906484}
review:
A game that combines two of my most favorite things ever: JRPG's & XCOM.

So with these materials, and our polymerization spell card is the final result something worth summoning?  The answer is an unquestionable "absolutely".

TROUBLESHOOTER does an excellent job utilizing the enjoyable turned based strategy system similar to XCOM while also incorporating many original ideas to allow character growth & build potential to create an enjoyable experience altogether. 

*[Pros]*

• Interesting world building, and characters.  This aspect might not be for everyone which could make it go into con territory depending on what your "thing" is.  Although I definitely played through worse narratives.  TROUBLESHOOTER kept me engaged so far.

• Gameplay loop is fantastic.  A lot of strategy can be made during a battle itself.  If you liked XCOM then this is an automatic recommend, but if you aren't a fan of that type of game play then this may not be for you.  It also uses a turn order ribbon similar to Final Fantasy 10 where actions can also manipulate the turn order for an additional layer of strategic value.

• Many possible options for character builds.  There are these things called "masteries" that act as equippable passive abilities.  Think of something similar to materia from Final Fantasy except every single one is the purple materia that gives some sort of passive buff that can be utilized, and synergized in many creative ways.  Now think about there being 700+ of them available in the game.  Wowzers!  On top of this there is also equipment, bonds, and other mechanics that help develop your characters further.  Even though you are forced to use premade characters which their own unique skills & gimmicks there is still an incredible amount of depth in the system where you can fabricate those characters in unique directions.  The gameplay, and progressions systems is undoubtedly this games strong suit.

• Music is pretty solid too.  I don't feel my ears bleeding at the very least, and occasionally find myself nodding my head to a good jam or two during a mission.

• Longevity is not an issue.  You can dump many hours into this game.  Especially considering the price tag, if you are a "budgeted gamer" that needs a game to last them awhile then I think you can get your moneys worth out of this unless you really despise JRPG's, XCOM, or to an extent Anime.

• Speaking of price tag, this is pretty affordable even before a discount.  So far my impressions are good enough where I would happily still buy it at full price.

• Many difficulty options to cater to the type of player you are.  Grinding is also possible so hard content isn't exactly a wall of "getting gud".  Its nice to have a game that provide a choice to the player,

• As of the date of this review, the game is still getting updates and support.  Since it isn't a dedicated service game eventually that will stop, but even if it did at this very moment - what we currently have is enough to be satisfied with.

*[Cons]*

• Like with XCOM sometimes your hit chance / RNG can screw you over.  This is inherently something that is always going to exist with these types of games, and I don't see a major issue with it.  Although while 95% of the game feels strategic based on your decisions, there is always still that 5% of RNG that will make you shed tears.

• No character creation will be an immediate turn away for some players.  Nothing wrong with being a gamer that wants to customize their squad in a way they can relate to.  Again I don't think this is a major issue.  The core foundation of this game probably wouldn't work with character creation.  There is a lot of customization for combat, and build potential although customization settings for aesthetics are lacking.  I am just listing this here because a lot of players may look at it then think "Hey anime XCOM clone coooooool" then dive in expecting a character creation.  Not a big deal to me, but can understandably be a deal breaker for some.

• Beginning is a tad slow because it spoon feeds the player new tutorials & mechanics instead of giving them everything all at once.  It can feel tedious for players that already understand the fundamentals from other games in the genre,

• The amount of menus & options can be intimidating.  It may take a small amount of time to understand what each thing does, and how to use the options the game gives you.  With that being said - it isn't necessarily a "grand strategy" game so the learning curve isn't as bad as you might think if just looking at screenshots or videos.

In conclusion, I do recommend TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children to JRPG & XCOM fans alike.  It does a great job taking the best from both then creating something original & worth investing your time into.  While it is a perfect game for a player like myself that is heavily into those genres it may not be perfect for players that aren't a fan of them which is completely ok.  For those of you that are "on the fence" then I still recommend giving it a look.

(EDIT:  Massive respect to any developer that gives direct feedback on reviews.  They are 100% correct that many of the cons I listed are in fact an inherent effect that comes with the genre.  Even if there are challenges going on with trying to optimize the merging of the two genres, from a consumer perspective they still done an incredible job considering the scale of what the devs were trying to create.  I find myself often saying "I can't wait to get a new character", "I can't wait to see more masteries", "I can't wait to play more missions" while rarely ever saying "well I wish this was different..." so the enthusiasm to see more through progression acts as a testament to an enjoyable experience.)
developer_response:
The Troubleshooter was heavily influenced by XCOM. But we wanted to introduce a new game, not just create a new copy of XCOM. From then on, we started to develop more stories and various characters and characteristics systems in the game. So naturally, the RPG elements began to be borrowed, and the Troubleshooter gradually took the form of SRPG. So your judgment on Troubleshooter is correct. However, it is still unknown whether we can implement these two genres well. Our challenge is still ongoing.

Some of the shortcomings you mentioned stem from the structural problems that the genre of the game has. This genre of games cannot completely avoid this problem, but they can be bypassed in a variety of ways. However, we overlooked this point, which further intensified the problems you mentioned. 

This is typically caused by the lack of experience of the development team. At this point, it's practically impossible to make a full revision of all of this. Through future updates, we will continue to revise these things so that we can show better performance than now.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024411191', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 2313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 838, 'last_played': 1677878959}

author: {'steamid': '76561198046470654', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 680, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 680, 'last_played': 1658531298}

Have a good day! :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198097852394', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 880, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 367, 'last_played': 1688779749}
review: Awesome game It’s like a Korean Xcom Great gameplay storyline and characters Definitely one of the best SRPGs I’ve ever played just as good as Xcom I highly recommend it

Troubleshooter started with a lot of influence from XCOM. Now, I will try to establish a unique identity called Troubleshooter. Please keep an eye on our future.

author: {'steamid': '76561198293173615', 'num_games_owned': 87, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 19061, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19056, 'last_played': 1658520943}
review:
绝对是近几年最优秀的战棋游戏，不在是千篇一律的小兵，每个人物都有其独特的技能体系，每个人物通过不同的技能搭配可以呈现出多种多样的打法，地形高低变得非常重要，面对一个占在至高点的狙击手，你可能要抉择是强行冲过去还是绕后偷掉他，迷雾的设置也非常有趣，一个拐角可能就是一场恶战的开始。
如果非说缺点的话，装备制造系统可能是比较鸡肋的设置，主要是制造成本偏高，想要打造出好装备会特别肝
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

无论开发组制造了什么样的系统,如果它对玩家没有意义，那么该系统就没有存在的理由。对于完全理解我们游戏的你来说，如果觉得装备制造系统是那样的话,那么开发组应该迅速重新检查相关系统。如果听取更多关于装备制造系统的意见并确认问题点，将积极讨论改善方案。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198002753105', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 2394, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 622, 'last_played': 1660134672}

author: {'steamid': '76561198811087941', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 9505, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4860, 'last_played': 1687609449}
review:
犹豫了很久要不要写这篇测评，因为我知道制作者几乎会看每一篇测评，而我的建议大多是从根本上做出改变的建议，所以大概率无法实现，到头来可能只会对制作者造成不必要的困扰。
但是无论如何，我真的爱这款游戏，即使你们什么都不采纳，只要继续推动更新，我就会继续玩下去。（而且我似乎不用担心新DLC，最新的关卡已经把上场人数提升到了12，也就是说，未来还有至少一个新同伴在等着我。）
我的建议主要有两个，说实话我并不关心新职业或是新装备，因为我知道你们能做好。
建议一，开局的游戏体验。
我发现这个游戏前中期主线的一些成就达成率都只有百分之二三十甚至更少，明显流失了不少人，而一旦能度过到中期比如黑星和吉赛尔入队之后游戏就会变得好玩和酷炫，根本停不下来。
究其原因，我觉得是因为前三个角色的类型雷同，阿尔伯斯，席翁和艾琳，前期给人的感觉都是有一定魔法能力的近战角色，导致前期的游戏既没有治疗者，又没有真正的远程射手，同时伴随着很多警察作为临时同伴，一切都变得糟糕而漫长。
我本人是因为朋友推荐，且看过一些视频，知道游戏之后会有哪些同伴加入，后期的体验大概是怎样，才有信心慢慢度过前期的枯燥体验。
当我彻底爱上了这款游戏之后，我试图跟我其他朋友推荐这款游戏，但他们无法度过枯燥而漫长的前期，还没体验到这个游戏的快乐就放弃了。
我觉得这件事非常紧急，甚至可能是这款游戏没有风靡全球的核心原因。
如果让我做出改变，我建议的解决方式有两种。
一是改变故事讲述的顺序，直接从至少拥有三名成员的时期开始游戏，然后把个人的背景和相遇故事在中期作为可选任务加入，这样能让前期多一些可用角色，直接提升游戏体验，要知道，阿尔伯斯带着四名警察的那些前期任务真的令人绝望。
二是从根本上做出改变，改变同伴的加入顺序，让风格更加独特的角色先入队，而不是三个近战法师，如果第二名角色不是前期的席翁（我知道后期成型的席翁一个闪电链可以从中距离杀一堆人，但是他前期也还是一个近战法师），而是一个射手，阿尔伯斯作为近战搭配一个真正的远程射手，游戏体验会好很多。
建议二，改变棋战游戏的底层逻辑。
现在的纷争终结者已经非常好玩，不弱于任何我玩过的棋战游戏，但是依据没有突破传统棋战游戏的桎梏。
我从二十年前玩日式角色扮演游戏开始就有一个非常不满意的地方，就是上场人数遭受限制，比如我的同伴有八人，但是战斗只有四人能够上场，这就导致最后我往往只练四个人，直至通关时，主力四人都是八十多级，而那四个坐在冷板凳上的人可能都还是入队时的等级。
这不是哪一款游戏独有的情况，而是那些年几乎所有角色扮演游戏和棋战游戏都有的问题。
这样的情况放在棋战游戏里更加明显，我的阵营里明明有一支大军（三十多个同伴），可我能上场的人数却极少，有时六人，有时十人，这种感觉真的非常恶心。
纷争终结者还算不错，至少上场人数够多，所以目前几乎所有同伴都可以上场，但单纯提高上场人数似乎并不是最好的解决方式。
我更欣赏比如PS1时代的《封神演义》，PS2时代的《最终幻想10》，PSP时代的《战场女武神》，他们的共同点就是可以更换在场的同伴。
《封神演义》有阵营出入口的设置，可以让同伴退场，并让阵营中的同伴登场，《最终幻想10》更直接，可以随时换同伴，而《战场女武神》最酷，它可以通过阵地这一系统登场退场。
这样的设置让我想要练起更多的同伴，即使有些人最后还是不会登场，特别是《战场女武神》，多一个人我真的会有多了一份力量的感觉，这是很多游戏都做不到的，传统角色扮演游戏游戏，当我达到能上场的最大人数之后，再有同伴入队，我不会有任何感觉，往往直接把新人丢上冷板凳。
而纷争终结者作为一款有较大战场的棋战游戏，可以试着模仿《战场女武神》加入一些类似阵地的系统，让队友能够从阵地登场退场，抢夺阵地增加上场人数。
比如一个攻坚关卡，起始只能上场三人，我奇袭对手的一个阵地，获得一个出入口的同时增加两个上场人数，需要的话，占领阵地后会生产出一两个警察帮忙防守，以此展开游戏。
我觉得这样的处理方式要比直接上场十二人，还带着一堆警察有趣的多。
且能让整个战场不那么臃肿，敌人也可以通过敌方阵地逐渐增加，直至阵地被玩家破坏，而不是一开场就站了满地的敌军。
要知道，有时候我十几个人上场，看着敌方的人山人海，两边都令人眼晕。
就像是职业篮球，即使上场只是五个人，但是一个正常建制的球队一般会有超过十个人，然而你并不会觉得十个人多，甚至可能不太够用。
最终，游戏形成，我方阵营有二十个左右的同伴（我比较贪心，希望有更多的角色加入），上场最多八人左右，随时上场下场，而敌方是四到八个阵地，每个阵地都有四到七人防守，且每回合都会产出新的敌军。
这样的游戏体验也许会很美。
以上就是我不切实际的建议。
希望不会给制作者造成不必要的困扰，爱你们。
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

游戏上市已经很长时间了，现在开发组正在进入第二个对DLC制定具体计划的阶段。另外，开发组一有时间就会共享对后续作品的多种想法。在那个时间段，虽然有很多想法共享，但是对于一个问题，开发组全体成员都有同样的想法。那就是游戏初期很多玩家会放弃游戏。

其理由和根据与您的想法非常相似。组成能让玩家感受到快乐的团队需要很长时间。这与最近的游戏趋势正面背道而驰，结合了游戏的体裁特点，造成了更加严重的问题。我们也想果断地修改这个，但是由此可能发生的副作用太大了。因此，部分用户不得不从头开始游戏或跳过部分区间。在故事重要的游戏中，这是绝对不允许的事情。因此，我们正在努力最大限度地减少除这些以外的其他部分。在地图的大小，敌人的数量，胜利条件等方面只留下最低限度的条件，果断地去除不必要的条件或只留下最低限度的条件。

现在开发组继续推出新人员的原因大致有两个。 

第一个理由是我们无法提供的制作角色的对策。很多人想自由地编辑角色的外形和能力。但是制作这种功能需要很长时间，我们放弃这个功能，而是想提供更多的角色来满足这种要求。

第二个理由是为了展开游戏的故事。如果出现新的角色，一方面会讲述关于这个角色的故事，另一方面也会叙述与此相关的中心主题。 

开发组知道随着角色的增加而产生的问题。正在考虑比现在更多的角色加入团队时，如何有益地使用不参加战斗的同事们。在进行战斗的途中，让剩下的人员另外做【刷】，或者作为任务内的支援人力使用,可能会有多种方法。但是现在讨论这些，角色数量绝对不多。现在计划更加集中精力让每个角色的个性更加鲜明，为他们提供能够活跃的多种战场。

我佩服你的敏锐分析。正如您文章的前半部分所提到的那样，您分析的答案现在不能马上显示出来。但是开发组完全同意你的分析。请与我们一起进行开发旅程吧。当我们制作后续作品时，以及公开时，请关注您的想法是如何反映的。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198032426402', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 15179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13248, 'last_played': 1677660219}
review:
10 out of 10 

I've been obsessed with turn based strat games for many years. After completing the first act/Year1 of the campaign I HAD to stop playing because I knew I will probably never find anything that can rival the customization in this game and if I went on to finish it I'd be bored AF until Xcom3 comes out :/ 

At first you WILL feel overpowered and you should set it to challenge mode to get a feel for falling into traps or meeting enemies who you have to out think and outmaneuver (you can be 1 shot killed and you WILL 1 shot many many poor thugs!)

If you're a long time gamer, this is must play. Give it a few hours and the "Masteries" will start to make sense (at first they feel pointless or overpowered but as the game progresses it becomes necessity to tweak and perfect your characters)

I would say this is the best or joint best TBS game I've played. The story feels silly at first but actually is very well written, but you only discover this late on into the game. 

Challenge? 
- Ok, so imagine feeling overpowered but there's 40 to 80 enemies to fight! - They do try to trap you or bait you into make silly decisions. You do get ground down and start to sweat thinking "oh S*%^t I shoulda backed off 20 enemies ago"

- Some enemies will make your jaw drop either as soon as you first meet them carelessly or whether you think you're gonna wipe them out easily, just be ready. You have to be smart and prepared for certain skills and tactics and this game switches it up most excellently! 

- Some characters feel a bit pointless and it's really fun trying to turn them into useful members or powerhouses with the right mastery combinations.


Whats bad then?

At first the story and translation seem poor and silly. (imagine being scared of a cult called "spoonism")

Masteries - This is poorly explained and I feel many new users are put off by how it works. Just kill enemies to get the masteries you want for your characters. it will become obvious after a few hours. 

Missions - Sometimes missions surprise you with choices that should have been made apparent at the start. Like you don't realise you were supposed to equip smoke grenades because ONE character will be taking on a headshotter 1v1. In real life I do believe there would be a briefing screen advising you of what to expect and THEN you make your choices as to what to take etc. This happens 1 out of 10 missions and you replay missions on challenge mode anyway to get the masteries and good stuff. 

- Nature/Forest maps - I really hate them sometimes. For my Pc, which is sh*t, I often find those maps hard to look at. The cursor gets lost because the terrain is so varied. 


Overall, it's just about perfect and I can't wait to find a TBS that beats this. Sadly, I don't think it's possible? Fights in tight spaces and Xcom1/2 are equally good as this but come no where close to the customization aspect. For me, the only way this game could be better is if you could start over but only use the police units or random xcom style grunts. Now that would make your guys feel ultra special (but also super difficult to win against the hoards of enemies)
developer_response:
"the story and translation seem poor and silly."

This is the reason for the bad reviews we received. This is linked to the first impression of the game, so many gamers refunded the game and gave bad reviews as soon as it started. We've been working on improvements in this area for a long time, but I still don't think we've reached the right level. Nevertheless, thank you for continuing to play Troubleshooter without giving up.

"This is poorly explained and I feel many new users are put off by how it works."

Even if the development team creates and delivers a system, if the user doesn't make good use of it, the system doesn't exist. Nevertheless, it is a big mistake for the development team to not easily explain the core system of the game. It's never good to complicate the system. As the system becomes more complicated, I will try to prepare a tutorial that is easier to understand.

Missions

Following the above two points, I am truly sorry that the development team does not seem to be able to deliver the information that is really necessary for the game's progress. In order for the character to grow up, masteries are needed, and the place where masteries can be obtained is missions, but I'm sorry to make you feel ambiguous.

Nature/Forest maps

To solve this problem, the development team must also work on optimizing the game client. However, it is difficult to improve the situation in a short time as it takes a lot of time to achieve noticeable results.

I wouldn't have said anything if you had a bad review of the game because of all these shortcomings. Because you wrote a review based on rich experience and everything is true. Nevertheless, Nevertheless, I would like to express my deep appreciation to you for giving the development team the strength to move forward through good review.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116401941', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 4007, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1676094560}
review: 我目前只玩了一个小时，游戏内容目前初见感觉不错，但是想问一下制作组，这个游戏是不是优化不太好，我至少玩XCOM奇美拉小队的时候2K分辨率画质为普通等级是可以稳60FPS的，这个游戏我分辨率已经下拉到1080P了还是要把画面效果调整到全低才能稳60FPS，如果官方有人手充裕的时候可以再最游戏性能进行下优化
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

我认为这是因为开发组的游戏引擎操作技术还不成熟而发生的事情。游戏的优化从游戏发行后开始一直持续，但一次性实现显著的提高并不容易。但是，我们仍然在更新游戏，因此，有关游戏优化的工作也将同时进行。

啊，游戏正式开始之前，请确认环境设置中的各种选项。包括加快游戏速度的功能(【快进队友行动】，【快进队友外的行动】)，提供利用多种设置舒适享受游戏的方法。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198026458831', 'num_games_owned': 277, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 8716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4681, 'last_played': 1690614452}
review:
This game checks so many boxes for me. 
-Story: Fantastic
-Art: Amazing
-Gameplay: Addicting
-Music: Incredible, especially the DLC soundtrack
-Length: Very long, there is a surprising amount of content here

The crafting and mastery systems are very deep and allow for a lot of optimization, and that optimization feels extremely rewarding. Sometimes you get like 10 mastery procs on the same move and take out half the enemy forces. On the contrary, sometimes it goes down to a 1v1 between the last member of your squad and the last enemy. And that's awesome too. 

Compared to the gold standard, XCOM2:
-It's less about snowballing. You don't get punished for having a mission go down to the wire with permadeaths in the same way as in XCOM2. 
-If you fall behind the curve for the difficulty of the story, you can always be safe about it and farm a previous mission for some XP and loot. 
-The fact that this game saves to the cloud every turn makes it impossible to save scum, but the structure of the game doesn't encourage it anyways. You keep your XP and teammates if you get wiped. Even some loot.
-Yet the difficulty is still almost perfect. Maybe the scaling isn't as good as XCOM2, but it's damn close, and you can always make it harder. You can also over-prepare much harder than in XCOM2. 

I could gush about this game for hours. One day I will convince one of my friends to play it. 

Devs you have done an incredible job, you have a new huge fan.
developer_response:
It is undeniable that the Troubleshooter has been heavily influenced by XCOM. And if we just wanted to stay in the shadows of XCOM, that wouldn't be what many gamers wanted from independent game development teams. So we're applying a lot of things to games to establish a new brand called Troubleshooter. Fortunately, the development team is encouraged by your liking for our attempt.

We will improve the game further so that your friend who received your recommendation can thank you for your recommendation when he starts Troubleshooter one day.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044599865', 'num_games_owned': 110, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1035, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 562, 'last_played': 1658504601}
review: It brings the XCOM-like wargames to the present day 2020s by removing the silly flying saucer invaders and replacing them with korean waifus and state-sponsored vigilantism. Technically an indie game, it's an incredibly polished product nonetheless. 9.5/10 (could do with a more varied soundtrack)
developer_response:
I think the first sentence of your evaluation expresses Troubleshooter really well. But that's just the beginning. The development team will improve the game even more than now so that the Troubleshooter can be remembered as a new brand for you when you experience it to the end.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996467555', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 4087, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2345, 'last_played': 1658496441}
review:
Absolutely fantastic, tons of content and great complex turn based gameplay. 

Superficially like XCOM but actually this is much more based on character building, with classes, abilities and "masteries" (passive abilities) rather than tactics and technology unlocks. The sheer amount of these masteries make for tons and tons of options with which to build your characters up. 

39 hours in and feeling like its just getting started, I was a bit unsure at first as the game is a slow starter but it is well worth the money x 10 for the amount of content you get here.
developer_response:
" Superficially like XCOM but actually this is much more based on character building, with classes, abilities and "masteries" (passive abilities) rather than tactics and technology unlocks. "

All the updates we've made since we released Troubleshooter to the Early Access four and a half years ago have been to listen to the words right above. We've been influenced a lot by XCOM, but now we're going to continue developing games to create a brand called Troubleshooter.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087144756', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 7388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6148, 'last_played': 1686675213}
review:
Good game with a few drawbacks.

Some maps take forever because there are too many actors, we're talking 40+  visible NPCs (allies and foes) acting before you can play. Of course you can speed up the animation but good luck keeping track of what happened  and where if you do that. So it's not unusual to have sequences where you just observe the AI doing its things for a solid minute, minute and half.

Game is way too easy on normal difficulty, so you juice it up and... you completely breaks map design. Game will spawn several more  ennemies, including elite/legendary, now these guys have a rally/alert feature and request backup from everything of the same faction within their line of sight, which will likely include an elite, which will request back from.... and you end up with a chain reaction where the whole map is swarming at you. That's not really a problem gameplay wise, but it does destroy the whole work put in crafting interesting maps as you will often fight in a 5th of the map and then sweep for remaining isolated targets.

Game has multiple HUB which are tedious to navigate between and redundant but with some NPC interactions tied to a specific kind of HUB (city/office)

Poor translation sometimes leading to game mechanics or game modes (difficulty) being barely understandable.

But it's a very good game :)
developer_response:
Among the many reviews we have received so far, the most mentioned issue for the reasons of bad review is the shortcomings you mentioned in this review. Even if the Troubleshooter gets a bad review from you, the development team will not be able to deny it. Because the part you mentioned is absolutely true. Nevertheless, thank you for giving the development team the strength to continue through good review.

In order to solve the shortcomings you mentioned, the aspect of the battle must be changed. The current battle is designed with the mind of quickly overpowering many enemies, and the side effects of this are exactly what you're talking about. We will reduce the number of enemies, provide additional missions to engage with a few but powerful enemies, and continue to account for existing missions to update them so that they can experience more comfortable battles than now.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198359588751', 'num_games_owned': 60, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 4811, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4697, 'last_played': 1664976952}
review:
[h1] 相当不错的游戏 [/h1]
内容比较丰富，不论是任务的种类跟数量，还是角色的养成都有很多选择。剧情比较平淡没什么爆点，但各个角色的塑造都比较饱满，感觉还有很多故事可讲，期待后续。

[b] 一些问题跟建议 [/b]

1.目前刚打完本体主线，还没玩dlc内容。我玩的是困难难度，但感觉不够“困难”，几乎是平推过去的

2.在目前难度下，我的席翁手镯是[u] 25级蓝色品质 [/u]，但带上喜悦跟一枪一个后就能随便秒小怪刷满sp，再解决精英怪或boss。而且他的技能几乎必定暴击，且暴击伤害能轻松破两万，还是aoe。其他的角色往往只有对单技能，即使暴击伤害也在5000上下。差距实在太大了。（这个是角色设定吗，还是我的天赋搭配问题？）而小怪血量只有1500左右，boss血量也不超过5000，伤害实在溢出太多，没什么刷装备的动力，更别提刷词条了

3.希望附加天赋的可见度解锁由解锁该附加天赋后解锁改为角色等级或职业等级提升时也能解锁

4.希望内置一些天赋搭配模板给玩家参考。我比较喜欢开荒的感觉，不想上网抄一套毕业天赋，但天赋搭配对角色输出能力影响太大了。

5.希望提升警员属性，至少能跟上玩家角色的移动速度。这些警员跑得慢，没伤害，回合速度也慢，连当沙包吸引火力都不是很合适。后期等他们到达指定地点我已经把敌人杀光了，真不知道操作这几个角色有什么意义
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

1.
你对游戏的理解度很高，好像有很多经验。因为我们还有很多人在抱怨游戏的后半部分太难了。如果你完成了DLC的话，试试挑战模式怎么样？

2.
如果你在【剧情任务】有过这样的经历,那就是开发组想要的事项。我们希望很多人完成所有【剧情任务】级任务，向暴力事件发起挑战。高难度的恶性事件可能会让你想起肝的必要性。

3&4.
那是有很多争议的事项。有人要求公开附加天赋的所有信息，有人讨论发现的乐趣。另外，由于哪一方意见尚未成为主流，所以开发组也很难听从哪一方意见。这将需要更多的讨论。

5.
VHPD在游戏初期和中期，为阿尔伯斯还没有充分召集同事时起到辅助兵力的作用。除此之外，只有在故事需要的情况下才会出现，开发组也在游戏后半部尽量减少警察的出现。如果能让警察正式成长，VHPD可以再次正式介入任务。但是现在比起VHPD，在介绍新角色上使用开发力。

谢谢你分享我的好意见。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198103950204', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 13106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5817, 'last_played': 1661018680}
review:
Been a while since I played a game that challenged my skills at creating builds for characters, this one sure scratched that itch.

Cool beans.
developer_response:
Character customization is one of the most important factors we think of. The growth of characters in the SRPG genre is a key factor in keeping the game going. It's an honor for you to experience it through our game.

Thank you for this review.

author: {'steamid': '76561198894782438', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 120146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1820, 'playtime_at_review': 25327, 'last_played': 1712162707}
review:
相当好的游戏，我就大概说说自己几个观点吧：
1、后续的DLC，价格合适的话，我是愿意继续买的。
2、故事性不错，每个人物都有刻画，很丰满。
以下是我对以后游戏发展的建议：
1、重复的任务，玩久了也无聊，建议后面增加随机任务，让任务重新有新鲜感，随机任务最好会出现随时的紧急情况，比如任务打了一半，有新的命令，要救人什么的，或者背后突然出现一伙新敌人，或者猛兽乱入什么的。
2、人物多了以后，建议有战役之类的超大型任务，要进行分兵，警察等NPC要发挥更大的作用。
3、加强和其他纷争终结者队伍的互动，有合作，也有竞争，
4、建有人才市场，有职员空格的情况下，可以去人才市场里面招随机职员。


我不知道开发者是否可以看到我的回复，大体是这样的，上文我说的随机任务，并不是一个剧情任务，而是可以理解为类似于”训练“类型的挑战任务。很多任务已经反复刷了多遍，对地图，对敌人已经非常熟悉，这样很容易厌倦，而保存新鲜感，最好的方式就是”随机“，地图是随机的，敌人是未知的，途中发生特别的事件，临时加入的怪兽，不稳定的后方，反而更有意思，当通过反复的调整，队友已经非常成熟的情况下，更想尝试他们在复杂情况下的表现。保持游戏的新鲜感，谢谢
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

1. 
随机发生的情况可能会成为某些人非常不愉快的因素。特别是在战略游戏中，由于无法预测的因素，自己的战略崩溃，进而导致任务失败时，游戏玩家放弃游戏的情况太多。每次不同的经验虽然是增加游戏寿命的因素，但也有明显的缺点，因此很难随意引入游戏。

2.
如果角色增加，没能参加战斗的人员也会按比例增加。开发组也在考虑如何利用这些角色。但是我认为现在角色的数量并没有那么多。

3.
您所说的很有可能通过在线模式的联合训练实现。

4.
正如您所知,所有角色都有各自的故事，通过这个故事展开游戏的故事。开发组认为，在这种结构下，引进没有故事的角色对游戏没有太大帮助。我认为，将很多人想要的类型角色编入游戏故事中，应对这种要求的方法更好。

谢谢你分享我的好意见。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198034983549', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 6098, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2508, 'last_played': 1700709078}
review: 这游戏啥都好，就是只有韩语语音，听着头疼
developer_response:
( 这篇文章是在翻译机的帮助下写成的。)

支持更多的语言语音是一次愉快的体验。对此，开发组的想法也是一样。但是对于像我们这样的小独立开发组来说，这是一件非常不容易的事情。我们是开发专业的队伍，没有外语专家。因此从与配音演员联系开始，很难判断配音演员的演技是否是我们所希望的。

为了解决这个问题，需要和当地的游戏发行公司签订合约进行工作，但是像我们这样对小公司的游戏感兴趣的游戏发行公司几乎没有。最终开发组认为，现在只有更加集中于我们能做的事情。我认为，如果能够坚持不懈地做下去，总有一天机会会来的。

感谢您的评论。

谢谢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198226904172', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 13299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2554, 'last_played': 1709167933}
review: its like Xcom with JRPG (korean RPG maybe?) skin, or maybe JRPG with XCOM style combat? basically if u like modern XCOM and JRPG, this could be ur cup of tea
developer_response:
The beginning of Troubleshooter is an SRPG based on XCOM. However, from now on, efforts will continue to be made to establish a new brand called Troubleshooter.

Thank you for this review.
